1.content:
It was a beautiful day outside. After spending the past few weeks mostly indoors due to lousy weather and some work you needed to do you were more than eager to get out and stretch your legs. Gathering some things for the short trip, you locked your door and headed out for a trail in the nearby woods. Little did you know, this short walk would end up turning into a grand life changing adventure.

As you walked along the trail, you looked around taking in the beautiful sights around you. After about a half hour you stopped to rest a little, taking your camera out of your bag to take a few pictures. Then a strange whistle echoed nearby. You tried to look around for the source but couldn't see anything around you. Then a bright light engulfed you causing you to black out.

When you finally woke up, it was dark. You must have been out for a while. As you stumbled around trying to find your things you bumped against something large. As you looked up you noticed this gigantic structure was actually a log. The same log you could have sit on earlier only now it was HUGE. You weren't going to spend too long questioning it. You were shrunk. And in the middle of nowhere. At night. You needed to find shelter or help fast. As fate would have it, you heard a voice nearby. As you moved towards it cautiously, you spotted a tent with a small campfire nearby. Wasting no time you headed towards the campsite being occupied by...
1.title: Your Huge Adventure Begins Now

111.title: Gen 1 (Red or Blue)

1111.content: Alright, which red do you want?
1111.title: Red

choices: ... getting up... he's leaving! Follow him!
11112.content:
‘Wake up.’

This forceful command, given from the depths of your minds, successfully interrupts your slumber as your breath slows down, your consciousness returns and your eyes open.

Feeling somewhat groggy, you place a hand on your forehead as you sit up, trying to recall what had happened to you.

You were walking in the forest to get back home, but then? What happened to you? How were you knocked out?

Weirdly, the only thing you seem to remember is a blinding light shining out of nowhere, just before you lost your consciousness and fell asleep.

Slowly - very slowly - you get back on your feet. After a few moments of disease, you manage to stand properly on your legs as you proceed to examine your surroundings.

Like you guessed, you are still in the forest, surrounded by tall trees... too tall trees. You've never seen so high ones before! Your gaze casually shifts to the side. And you notice something green, roughly your size, standing there...

Panicking, you look down. And you pale as you notice that this thing is coming out of the ground, which seems way closer than before...

Realization hits you like a punch in your stomach. You stumble back and, lacking any surface to hold onto, you fall on your behind.

"I've... I've shrunk..." you mutter, incredulous.

You get up and take a better look around, noticing that you're currently in a small, enlightened clearing. You also notice a stump.

You walk towards it. It's huge.

So... you aren't dreaming... you've really shrunk...
"Holy-" you are unceremoniously cut off as a loud noise echoes, and the ground beneath you quakes softly.

Not enough to make you fall, but still pretty enough to scare you. You take a few steps back as the sound - and the quakes - grow stronger and louder.

Stronger and louder, until you notice a huge shadow approaching. You cower in fear, dreading the chance that it could be some wild pokemon ready to make a decent snack out of you.

But, much to your luck, it is not.

A human boy suddenly walks into the clearing. You gaze up to fully look at his form.

Light brown hair, hazel eyes, slim form and a neutral look on his face. Your gaze shifts from his body to his clothes; red and white shirt, jeans and red and black shoes. A red hat and a yellow backpack complete everything.

A sudden voice talks from the back of your mind.

You've already seen this guy, you're sure of it...

Your eyes widen as you realize who he is: it's Red, a living legend as a pokemon trainer!

For a moment, you stare at him in awe as he stops.
"..." he inspects his surroundings, remaining though unaware of your presence.

He gives a shrug, before moving towards the stump you are standing close to.

You recover from your surprise as a giant shoe steps at a few inches before you, before rising again, crafting a huge shadow above you.

Without thinking, you dive out of the way, avoiding getting stepped on by Red. That wouldn't have left you so alive afterwards...

You turn back to the trainer, noticing him sitting down on the stump, removing his yellow backpack, gently putting it on the ground. You discard the idea of him setting up camp - it's still, like, 3 PM - and you decide that he is simply resting before resuming his walk towards wherever he is going.

For a moment, you stand there, perplexed of what you should do now.

And then, you unhappily remember what situation you are in.

Reality hits you like a slap across your face. It's your chance to get help!

Quickly, you make your way to the giant's shoes, unsure of how to approach him.
"Uh... Hey?" you call out, feeling tremendously awkward, being at the mercy of such famous person.

The same one person who just didn't hear you at all.

"Help...!" you try for a more practical approach. Which still doesn't seem to work.
"..." Red keeps gazing around in a lazy fashion, still unaware of you.

You try several other times to get his attention, but every call you make sadly ends up as the others: totally unheard.

Sighing, you lean forward, placing one hand on his red shoe, thinking of a way to get his attention.

However, you soon feel the shoe starting to move. You look up to see the legendary trainer...
11112.title: A living legend

choices: Red was tired, wanting to sleep here for the night.
A wild Pokemon appeared in front of him.
111122.content:
(For the record, Red's 14 in GSC/HGSS and 16 in Black 2 and White 2. His appearance is the same anyway, (supposedly), so let's just say this is B2W2 Red.)

Out of sudden reflex and desperation, you ran to the teen's shoelace as the shoe you were standing on kept rising, nearly making you lose your balance. You lunged towards the lace and cling on the very tip with your arms and legs, as it waved with the motion, making you feel dizzy.

Red meanwhile decided he was done resting and to continue his trek through the forest clearing.

"Great, just great..." You muttered to yourself as the lace kept waving back and forth with every step, desperately trying not to get flung off. "I'm suddenly shrunk to the size of a Joltik, with no clue where I am, and the only person that can help is a legendary trainer that can't even notice me..."

Still, you figured, it could be a lot worse. If it wasn't for your quick thinking and reflexes, you'd still be stuck near that stump, with no clue what might find you next. Hell, you'd be nothing more than a tiny red stain on Red's sole if you didn't dive out of harm's way.

As the trainer's trek continued, you kept trying to get him to notice you, constantly calling out his name. Like before, Red didn't even look like he noticed your shouts, the responses always ending up as,

"..."

...much to your dismay and frustration.

It was honestly surprising that he didn't encounter any wild Pokemon yet. You'd at least like to know what region you could possibly be in and see if you left your home region or not before shrinking, (the details were still fuzzy in your mind about what exactly happened). Even at this time of night, there were usually some Pokemon out and about. You should know as a night owl yourself.

"Actually, does Red even sleep to begin with?"

You felt a bit dumb for asking that. Of course he does, everyone needs sleep, yet you couldn't imagine such a stoic trainer sleeping for long. Red looks like the type of person that wouldn't stay in one place for long, (you still think those rumors of him being on Mt. Silver for 3 years straight was absurd. He was most likely training a bit and Ethan was lucky enough to spot him before he left.) Given how short he stayed at that stump, you seemed to be correct on that assumption.

Speaking of which, you also wished he was resting a bit longer at that stump because the constant motion of the lace moving back and forth a lot was starting to give you motion sickness, severely regretting your method of travel on this titan of a teenage boy. You might not be able to hold on much longer. Thankfully, Red decided to stop for a moment, giving you some time to catch your breathe and stop your eyes from spinning. You briefly wondered why he stopped and soon found out it was because...
111122.title: Clinging onto a legend's shoelace

choices: "It's just a peek, nothing more than curiosity." (Sure buddy, sure it is)
1111221.content:
You were staring in astonishment, as the silent teen covered his mouth, his eyes shut. The most silent yawn you ever heard left his mouth for a second. Again, everyone needs sleep, but it was still surreal to see such a stoic trainer showing any sign of weakness, (not that you dared to think of Red as weak).

"..." Red glanced around the area for a bit, you guessing to make sure there was no Pokemon in the area. You doubt it was a safety concern, because you were 100% sure his team would demolish any attacker. If anything, it must have been concern for Pokemon sleeping in the area. It was actually really heartwarming to think that Red cares about Pokemon like that.

Actually, you were now a lot more convinced that Red would be the type to help you if he noticed you. Now if only you could think of a way to get his attention without being accidentally put in harms way.

When Red deemed the clearing to be Pokemon-free, he nodded to himself and started walking over to a wide flat area to place down his stuff, you desperately clinging once more to the lace.

"I can't hold on anymore! Ngh..." Your hands were too sweaty by this point. As he finally lost your grip and fell, a stroke of good luck hit you, as Red stopped moving the moment you let go, you landing onto his shoe. It wasn't exactly a soft landing, but much better than being flung off.

You looked up and expected Red to start undressing and changing into pajamas, which would have been an...interesting sight. Instead, the brunet took out a tent from his bag. That's right, a tent.

A whole entire tent, curled up nicely.

"...How the?--I don't..." You were at a loss for words. How did that backpack carry an tent inside of it!? He has to other items inside of it for Pokemon battles or even catching new Pokemon, right? So that made it even more astonishing that his backpack had space for it. That backpack is not big enough to carry a curled up tent, and there's no space to attach it to the backpack.

"My head hurts..." Deciding to not think about this blemish on the laws of physics any longer, you quickly ran towards his leg to start climbing, hoping to get his attention before he finishes setting up and you'd have to wait until he woke up. As you latched on and started to climb, the leg moved and you fell down in between the crevice of Red's sock.

Red meanwhile, starting set up the tent. Evidently, he was an expert on setting up tents since he set up rather quickly, even putting the stakes using only his fingers and then his foot.

You meanwhile, had another stroke of luck, as you were trapped between the fabric and just above Red's heel. While you certainly didn't think of this as stroke of luck, the smell already making you a bit nauseous, this was also the foot Red used to push the stakes into the ground. Better this than being painfully pressed against metal right?

"I got to get out of here!" Struggling with all you had though proved to be in vain. Red's foot was constantly moving and this made moving very difficult. After what seemed like half an hour, but was actually only 5 minutes, the motions stopped and you wonder if this meant he was finished so he can finally start changing and maybe noticed you during it. After another 3 minutes went by, nothing happened.

"Oh you have got to be kidding me!" You couldn't believe it. Red was already sleeping by the looks of it. So much for that hope of him wearing pajamas. Better than being the type that sleeps in only underwear though. You couldn't even understand those types, especially on cold nights.

"Well at least I can finally move now..." With a heavy sigh, you began climbing on Red's foot, out of the smelly sock that imprisoned you. When you got out, you found yourself inside the red and blue tent. You had a few words about the color scheme, but now was not the time for them. It might be too late to get his attention for the rest of the night, but you could at least put yourself in a better position for him to notice you when he wakes up.

As you climbed on top of the trainer's leg, you were a bit intimidated by how far away his face was from you're current position. Traveling all the the way up to his face was going to take the rest of the night if the distance was anything to go by, but it was the best place to get his attention. With a resigned sigh, you began your long expedition.

After what had to have been an hour of traveling, you were now currently resting a bit at Red's thigh, blushing slightly at the bulge just up ahead.

(What happens next decides your preference in gender and a bit of your personality from this point onward)

Option 1) You are homosexual, and the temptation of exploring inside a famous male trainer's underwear was too much for you to resist, especially with that trainer being your idol.

Option 2) You are straight and wanted nothing to do it. Slight adoration for Red or not. Onward we go!

Option 3) You are bi and have a bit of a crush on Red, so you were admittedly curious to see what he was packing before you continued onward. Just a peek though.
1111221.title: Even legends need their rest, also what is logic?

choices: No, prepare to face more consequences you peeping tom!
11112213.content:
You figured it was just a peek. You kinda had a crush on Red. Who wouldn't? He's famous and a bit of a hottie. You were sure anyone else would kill to even be this close to him. Maybe not at your current size, (unless they were real desperate or something), but your point stands!

"Sorry Red. I'm just taking a quick look." With that, you head straight towards the bulge in front of you, going to the massive brunet's fly and using all of your strength to push the zipper open just slightly enough for you to fit through the small opening. The musky smell immediately was driving your senses wild and with blushes that got more red by the second, you made you way into his underwear's fly and were now next to the very thing you were wanting to peek at.

Right between the pubic forest you resided in was the boy's soften member. At your size, even flaccid, the pillar of flesh looked quite long and enormous, more than 5 times your size. Unfortunately, you couldn't even see that. One thing you forgot, was that the zipper wasn't opened wide enough for light to come in and you didn't have any source of light on your person.

"Aww come on!" You suppose it's for the better like this, as this was an invasion of privacy, but it's very frustrating to not even get to see it after going this far. With a sigh, you were about to turn and head back, until you heard a soft grunt escape from the colossal teen's mouth and your landscape shook. You were helplessly thrown sideways as Red turned in his sleep.

When you came to, you tried to find the exit, only to see nothing but darkness all around you, constantly running into strands of pubic hair. After a few minutes, you had to accept the fact that you're now lost inside the pubic jungle with no way of knowing how to get out. You cursed your curiosity and yourself for not thinking this through a bit more. Not every rushed action leads to a positive outcome it seems.

"... ..." Red meanwhile was slightly feeling something in his lower region through his sleep. Half-aware, he brought his hand down to scratch the itch.

Without much of warning for you, Red's hand came into his underwear and for a brief moment, you saw that you were actually right above his huge penis. You couldn't get a good enough glimpse to measure as you decided to move from the incoming fingernail. You dove into the hair strands as the fingernail scratched the surface of his ball sack. The hand then left moments later and trapped you in darkness again, as you felt your heart pound against your chest.

"That was way too close!" While not as long as say, more feminine types would keep their fingernails, at your size, Red's looked like they could cut you in pieces, especially if he scraped them against your body like he was about to. You gulped and decided getting his attention from this position was a bad idea. Aside from the possibility of accidentally killing you, you began to think about the likely scenarios that would occur if Red found you in his private area.

One case involved him possibly looking annoyed and crushing you for peeping, or maybe just using his Pokemon to do the dirty deed, (like possibly Charizard incinerating you with flamethrower, or Pikachu electrocuting you to death). Another had him doing the same thing while thinking you were just a bug, and another had him possibly torture you in various ways while you were down there. That last one seemed unlikely, but it could happen.

You shudder in absolute fear at the thoughts. Yup. Definitely out of the question to be found here. Sadly, you were kinda stuck, because moving too much will obviously cause him to react again and you could only dodge so much more. You were exhausted by this point. The musky smell around you though made you want to leave, as it was driving your hormones insane. Even if you had wanted to jerk off here, (which you didn't for some obvious reasons), your moving would cause him to react again. You felt like pulling your hair out from the situation you got yourself into.

"ARGH! Why am I so dumb!?" With a heavy sigh, you resigned to your fate of staying here til he woke and began moving again. Hopefully you could think of a way to escape without him noticing by then. If you did, then you would try getting his attention from a much less compromising position and get him to help you. You also figured you could get some shut eye until then. With slow, careful movements, you lied down on the fleshy surface below and shut your eyes, trying to ignore the musky smell and go to sleep.

When you next opened your eyes, you felt the ground moving and yawned, trying to remember what happened. A loud rumble from outside that sounded like a deep 'Pika' startled you awake and you remembered everything, eyes shot open. You look around and wonder if you somehow fell out and Red's Pikachu found you. As you moved around, you felt something on top of you and whimpered when you looked up and saw that you were trapped underneath Red's dick. There was now a bit of light shining in from somewhere so you could see your surroundings. Hey, at least you got to see what you wanted right?

"Why me?..." Thankfully, by some miracle, Red moved and his member, which was definitely more than 5 times your size, moved to the side enough for you to break free and put some distance from the pillar of flesh. You heard the trainer make a confused hum, telling you he felt your movement. Your heart beat a little faster, knowing he was about to try and find out what just caused that itch. Knowing you had to flee fast, you look upward and saw some slight light leaking out, which is how you found out where you were, you climbed upward, using some of his pubic hair for elevation, as his hand entered once more.

Do you escape being captured?
11112213.title: The consequences of perverted curiosity...

choices: Start the climb back down and get Pikachu's attention instead.
111122131.content:
You had somehow managed to do it. You avoided the teen's hand and clung onto the waistband, slowly climbing up until you were close to Red's shirt. Taking a moment, you paused and blushed at what you just went through. It was well-deserved punishment for peeping, but you still found yourself amazed by the package the teen was packing in there. You dumbly giggled before shaking your head and scolding yourself.

"No, no more of that! Not worth the trouble!" "Pika~" You froze in fright and slowly turned to see Pikachu enjoying some berries nearby, thankful it didn't hear you and wasn't looking at your direction. Slightly afraid of being spotted by the abnormally large creature, you jumped and clung to the inside of Red's shirt, working your way up to the top from in there.

Red meanwhile scratched a bit more but finding nothing, looking a bit confused. He was sure he felt something in there when he woke up. As his Pikachu curiously turned his head to looked at him, he quickly took his hand out and acted like nothing happened, a bit embarrassed at the thought of being caught scratching his privates in front of his Pokemon. He must of just been a bit too tired still and imagined feeling something there. With a frustrated grunt, the teen slowly got up and went to go shower to get all the grogginess out of his system.

Or at least that was the plan, until a grumble from the trainer's stomach reminded him that he didn't eat anything since yesterday. Combined with all the travelling he did yesterday...

Quietly sighing, Red turned around and went to eat a few berries from the massive pile his trusty partner Pikachu found around the area while he was sleeping, said electric mouse curiously tilting his head before continuing his breakfast.

You were almost towards the top of the shirt, nearly thrown of a few times by the trainer's movements. Thankfully, the movements slowed down and were less erratic, and judging by the chewing sound above, you guessed that the famous teen was having breakfast.

The thought of how long it's been since you ate made your stomach growled, part of you now craving food. But you also wanted to be found quick before being put in any other situations that either made you uncomfortable or endangered your life. Moaning from your aching stomach, you kept climbing and hoped Red would share some food once he found you.

When you finally got near the top, you were sweating up a storm and panting, feeling like you might just collapse from hunger any moment. At the same time, you were ecstatic to be so close to your goal! All you'd have to do is climb up Red's facial hair and--

You were frozen in horror as you got to the top of his shirt and saw his chin, completely void of facial hair. Now that you think about it, his chest lacked facial hair as well. It was now you realized with great horror that you fucked up. There was no way for you to climb up to his nose and wave to him now, not without serious risk of being flung off by just the slightest movement. Assuming you survived the long fall, which was doubtful, you'd be back at square one.

You were now regretting not getting Pikachu's attention instead, but was it worth the risk? You don't know what Pikachu is like when it's not battling. More specifically, how it interacts with other Pokemon. Even if it was nice to them, could the same be said to anything smaller than it?

Some possible unsavory interactions came to mind and you shuddered, deciding to at least try and get Red's attention first from your current position. With a deep inhale, you began yelling and screaming his name in hopes he'll somehow hear you.

"..."

"..."

That was all the responses you got like usual, your screaming now out of anger. It was a fruitless effort especially with the loud chewing blocking out your screams at some points while the teen ate. You gave up and sighed, still clinging to the fabric and wondering where to go from here.
111122131.title: Narrowly escaping consequences.

1112.content:
Before we go, there has been an update of Gen 1 which introduced some more characters...

Let's Go!
1112.title: Before We Go

11122.content:
You thought that being a grunt in Team Rocket would be easy money, even at a low level you still made a pretty penny as a criminal. You even got a promotion recently, and got moved to one of your group's better facilities! You were stationed in your secret base under a casino run by Team Rocket. The machine's were actually legit, even though the group had to replace the slots with some arcade games. And the base was only accessible using a secret switch hidden behind a poster in a corner of the shop! It was perfectly hidden and there should've been no way someone could find it.

But somehow, some brat found your expertly hidden base! And right in the middle of your experiments too! You had been working on a device to neutralize larger Pokémon and make them easier to capture. Specifically, it shrunk large Pokémon like Snorelax and made them tiny enough for an Eevee to carry around like a pup. You had just started the testing phase when that brat showed up. That little boy charged in, and destroyed your fellows with his Pikachu showing powers well beyond that of any you'd seen before. You could've sworn it was performing some moves that weren't proven to have existed before. The destruction they caused launched you into your machine, electrocuting you and knocking you unconscious.

Now you were waking up with an unbelievable migraine and a feeling of being incredibly dirty. As your migraine disappeared you see that you were no longer base... now you were in a forest!

"Chu!" You hear a loud sound behind you. You turned around and got a face full of massive Pikachu paw! The air is crushed out of your lungs as the giant rodent's paw forces you into the ground. You can feel that your entire body isn't stuck under the paw, but it sure as hell felt like it and you peeking between his toes up at him didn't help. "Pi Pika." It said smirking at you between his toes.

"That damn rat is taunting me!" You thought to yourself as you struggle to lift the massive paw off of you. No wonder you felt so dirty, the stinkin' rat was using you as a personal floor mat. All your struggling did was make the Pikachu more satisfied with himself, being his little toy was fitting for such a piece of-

"Chu, where are you buddy?" The voice of a young boy reaches your ears and you suddenly feel the weight of Pikachu's paw shift as it looks towards the voice. "Is that the brat who destroyed my work?" You struggle to look past Pikachu towards the voice. As if one cue, the young boy who attacked your base rounded the corner and he was absolutely massive! If you just barely poked out from under Pikachu's paw, you were certain you could fit under that kid's foot with room to spare. Was he the one that gave you to this rat?

"What are you doing all the way out here?" He asked kneeling and petting Pikachu. "You kind of just ran off after we finished up in that base, you had me worried."

You just growled, pissed off at the kid treating that rat with such kindness. "Yeah, he wanted to play with the guy you ended up shrinking!" You try again to move a bit, but are quickly interrupted by Pikachu putting pressure on you again.

He wasn't really sure what he wanted to do now. He had been having a lot of fun messing with you, but he loved his trainer and wanted him to have some fun. He gave him presents a lot and this wouldn't be any different. Of course he wasn't sure how his trainer would like this gift. Maybe he should put you somewhere his trainer would find later or wouldn't find at all. Someplace like, his shoe! Or maybe his food. Somewhere that wouldn't seem like Pikachu put him there. Of course, he could also just keep you for now... just toy with you a little longer.
11122.title: Let's Go be Tiny!

112.title: Gen 2 (Ethan or Silver)

choices: Screw it! Run away from the campsite.
1121.content:
As you follow the voice, you start to find yourself heading towards a campfire, where you saw a small yellow tent set-up. You observe the area ahead, finding it to be occupied by a young black-haired boy wearing a red jacket, black pants and a black and yellow cap. You also noticed that he was barefoot, with his sneakers (you'd assume they are his) over back to where his tent was. What amazed you the most was how big he was in comparison to your tiny body. However, even though he was a giant to you, you couldn't help but sense that this boy was familiar to you somehow, as if you had met him earlier in a friendly encounter before you had shrunk.

Carefully navigating through the tall blades of grass, you start making your way towards him, hoping to get his attention. Upon closer inspection, you glance up and watch as the boy smiles while he's casually roasting a marshmallow, humming a friendly tune to himself.

You were somewhat getting nearer to him but your nose also picked up a strong scent comprising of sweat coming from the deserted sneakers. It smelled alright to you, maybe even tempting but you also want to get his attention and his help. Decisions, decisions!
1121.title: Ethan

choices: Heck yes! Go inside the opening of the sock.
Nah, maybe you'll suffocate in there.
Before you make your decision, the boy finds you in his shoe.
11211.content:
The temptation of his footy scent was too much for you and you instinctively run towards the red, yellow and white sneakers,

From your perspective, the distance between you and the sneakers wasn't too far and a measly few seconds later, you were within arms reach of the heavenly sneakers.

Now that you were literally next to those sneakers, the musty smell had intensified and your urge to smell and indulge only strengthened.

Driven by your desire to get up and close with the foot sweat , you decided it was time to surround yourself with his scent. You cautiously started climbing the right sneaker, and when you reached the top, you found out that his used red socks inside of them were tucked at the toe section of the shoe. Your excitement only elevated at the realisation and discovery and without hesitation, you jumped in and crawled until you were impeded by the red sock, where the smell was getting very pungent.

You were at the halfway of the shoe and you took a few sniffs of the air to appreciate the somewhat mild sweaty smell of a kid's foot. Really, for how deep you were inside his shoe, the scent wasn't as powerful as your body thought it was. However, his discarded red sock still lies ahead of you, the opening luring you to possibly stronger sensations. Who knows? Are you willing to go further?
11211.title: Run towards the sneakers.

112112.content:
Despite being entranced by the smell of the boys foot sweat you at least had the mental grip to realize that he could put the shoe on at any time and you don't exactly know how durable you are. You turn around and pull yourself over the top of his shoe with less strength then you would've imagined it would take. You think about how it could be a side affect to shrinking and you decide to test it out.

After climbing out of the shoes that were only about 5 inches tall compared to your 3 inches, you look around for larger things to climb to test your physical ability. You look around and notice a tree stump next to the boy roasting his marshmallows. You decided that climbing this would be generally safe because the boy wouldn't switch seats for no reason and you hadn't seen anyone around or seen any evidence to suggest a second person camping with him.

You looked up and approximated the height to be about 30 Inches. If your hypothesis about your physical abilities was correct, you should be able to climb this with ease. After getting a grip onto the wood you started to climb. At first you were pretty slow but then when your body got used to climbing you started going faster and faster. In a time probably faster then any climber could climb the same distance if it were scaled correctly, you reached the top of the stump.

All of a sudden...

A: A large shadow was cast over you as Ethan wanted to move away from a bug pokemon. (No pain)
B: A large furry foot lands on you as Ethan calls out his starter pokemon, Cyndiquill. (No Pain)
C: You get an urge to climb into the boys pants and act on said urges. Whether you get caught however, is up to the next writer.
112112.title: A smart hunter knows when to retreat.

All of a sudden a large shadow cast itself over you, giving you little time to react. You decide to leap forward. As you are in the middle of your jump you get slammed down, although surprisingly there was no pain to speak of. You also aren't tired at all, leaving you to believe that shrinking essentially gave you a superhuman body. You decide to...

You were just a boy who liked the pokemon games a little too much. You had gotten all the pokedex completed in every single game in every single version. Your favorite games however, were pokemon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, mostly because they brought the things you loved about Ruby and Sapphire and made them 3D and epic. One thing they also did for you however, was awaken a crush on the rival character of the game. Before in the gameboy Wally wasn't animated in the slightest but with ORAS, his color was fleshed out and his shyness was multiplied.

You had long since accepted you were Bisexual, as you had sexual dreams about both boys and girls. Many of these dreams involved Wally, the green haired shy but adorable rival trainer. You had been wishing every night to meet Wally or at least someone like him, but your prayers were never answered.


At least, not until a couple of weeks ago. One day when you woke up you were in a room with fairly basic decorations and plenty of books. A few minutes after your initial arrival proved that this situation wasn't exactly a bad one. In walked the Giant (but seemingly younger) Wally, leading you to believe you were in his house at some point before his journey. You heard loud coughing coming from the gentle giant, his illness that was described in the game seeming so much more real now.

Flash forward to now and...


A: You and Wally have met and are great friends. Wally enjoys your company and considers you his best friend and will definitely take you on his journey.

B: You and Wally have met but Wally had decided it was better for you to stay away from him because of his terrible cough, so he sent you off to someone else's house.

C: You and Wally have met but Wally starts to get a little obsessive over you because you're essentially the first person who was nice to him aside from family, and by little, I mean A lot. Like, you literally haven't had a free moment to yourself since you met him because Wally is either always watching you or keeping you as close as possible. At this point you had long since lost your crush on Wally and have tried to escape a couple of times, only to be caught and given "punishment"

Judging by the pokemon in the area, you guessed that you were on Poni Island. "Great, I'm 2 inches tall and on the most dangerous island in Alola!" Your curiosity overpowered your caution and you creeped around the rock and sighed in relief at the sight of another human.

It was some male teenager who had fallen asleep right on the ground, no sleeping bag, no pillow, just.... sprawled out in the grass. "Well, its better than nothing." You started making your way towards him and noticed a few more things about this person. Needless to say, you didn’t bother wasting time. You immediately began stroking you tongue all over her soles and toes, licking the sweat off every inch. You barely resemble the person you were before you met her, but you couldn’t care less. Leaf’s happiness was as precious as your own. If this made her happy, then you would continue to do so until the universe collapsed into itself, which isn’t going to happen, as she had already become your universe.

Eventually, After what felt like several hours, you successfully cleaned both of Leaf’s feet. And after taking the time to catch your breath, you announced this to Leaf.

“Wonderful! Who knew you could clean a girl’s feet with your tongue so well? If you keep this up, i might become your first customer!”

“I-i’m not planning to become a foot-licker!” You protested against Leaf.

“Awww, don’t be afraid. If you want, i could also become your ONLY customer. You’d want that, don’t you?” Leaf said confidently.

“.....it will be a secret of ours.”

Than Leaf began laughing hysterically. She honestly didn’t expect you to accept the new role you have gained. Though you were glad she didn’t, as her sweet laugh was music to your doll sized ears, and she luckily continued laughing for a while until she managed to regain some of her composure.

“S-sure, just b-between us” Leaf said through shaky words.

Tragically, she went to pull her feet back and reach for her socks. An immediate sadness was present on your face.

“Awww, don’t be sad my love. We’ll resume after we’ve catched some Pokemon.”

“Oh, yeah, I almost forgot. It’s just that we’ve spent so much time together just sitting that I forgot my reason for leaving in the first place.”

“Well, you found something better in the process, right?”

“Yeah, your feet of course” you said teasingly. Leaf shot you a glance as she was about to wrap her socks around her foot.

“In that case, you big meanie, you might as well turn around. You probably couldn’t handle the trauma of seeing my feet disappear into my boots” Leaf said with a grain of sarcasm.

Like an obedient dog, you turned yourself into the other direction for no good reason. Maybe you really couldn’t handle the trauma. You waited for her to finish and give the sign, but she had never given you it. When you turned around on your own,

1212.content:
You made it to the clearing without incident. Judging by the supplies and the size of the tent, there was only one person here... or there would be, however despite the fire, the bags and some other supplies laying around, you didn’t see any signs of the actual person who was using this campsite. You looked around curiously, wondering if something scared him or her off.

Suddenly you heard the foliage rustling behind you. You looked back quickly but saw nothing. Probably just the wind. You continued to explore the campsite, figuring you might as well check the tent to see if someone was inside of it. You slowly looked around you as you made your way, unable to shake the feeling that something was watching you this whole time. Maybe the noises from earlier had you a little jumpy. But either way it didn’t hurt to be careful, especially in your condition. As you reached the tent, you saw that it appeared to be empty. Taking a careful look around in the dim light you figured this site was simply empty for now. You pondered wether or not you should wait for whoever set this up and get their help, hide in their bag and hitch a ride to civilization, or quietly swipe some food and keep moving. Sad you turned around to exit the tent, however, your heart almost stopped.

Standing tall at the exit of the tent was a girl with long brunette hair, clad in a black dress and what looked like some extremely short shorts barely peeking out from under her dress. Her long slender legs towered over you as she looked down directly at you with a grin that frightened you a bit. All of a sudden the tossed something at you. “Oww!” You cried as the heavy sphere hit you. Did she just... “Oww!” Another hit you. She was actually throwing pokeballs at you. “AHH STOP IT IM NOT A POKÉMON!” You shouted up to her as another hit you and pinned you to the floor.

You laid there thankful that nothing was broken. The girl seemed to finally stop throwing pokeballs at you so there was another plus, though you weren’t sure if this was entirely a good sign or if the female trainer had something worse in store for you.

As she approached you, she leaned down, picking up a few of the pokeballs she tossed before focusing on you.

Someone approaches the camp before you decide
12212111.content:
"Why don't you come along with us? I could always use someone to talk with regularly. You don't know who you are anyway, so it's not like you're leaving people behind. Plus, maybe we can find something to help your memory. Please?" Kris asks with begging eyes.

"Well, I dunno." She seemed like a nice girl, but you knew very little about her, certainly not enough to justify traveling the world with her. Plus, what if there was someone nearby that knew you and was looking for you? You could be ditching them to run around the world with this random girl you just met.

While you ponder this, Chikorita hops up into Kris' lap right next to you. Grabbing you with her neck vines, she pulls you into her cheek before starting to kiss you. "Chika ." The display of her pokemon causes Kris to laugh.

"Looks like Chikorita likes you too. Come on little guy, come along with us." She begs once more.

What do you decide?
12212111.title: "Maybe you can join us on my journey!"

choices: Screw it, play with her feet
Screw it, play with her body
122121111.content:
“Wow... that kiss was nice, almost makes up for the time that she tried to eat me” You say as Chikorita still held you with it vines. It swung you from side to side as you smile down at it.

“Don't worry about her, She's playful, but nice. I doubt she would of actually tried to swallow you down, maybe just put you in her mouth”

Kris then looked straight ahead as Chikorita pulled you up to her owners face “So is that a yes? Please, i promise it will be fun”

“Like you said i don't have any other options, i suppose i can come with you!”

“Yes!” Kris cheered as she grabbed you, pulling you from Chikorita’s grasp as she held you “This is so great! So many things we can do with you, okay Chikorita hold him for a second.

Chikorita listened as her vine grabbed you, placing you on its back as it gave out a very satisfied “Rita!”

You pat its back as you say to it “Don't worry, were cool now.” You said. The reason you agreed, well you figured that it won't be bad being with these two.

Or three cause Kris smiled “Okay, Hoothoot. Go!” She sent it out. You see the giant flying Pokemon come down and land in front of you. Standing on one foot and twitching its head. it didn't take long for the Owl Pokemon to see you. Hopping on its foot as Chikorita lowered its head, letting you see the owl.

Kris crouching down to introduce you two “Hoothoot, this is (Your Name). He's gonna be coming with us from now on. (Your Name) this is Hoothoot”

“Hoot...Hoot” It said as you move on Chikorita’s back. Standing on her head with one hand on her leaf

“Hi Hoothoot. Your in for a big training session” You say to it as Kris agreed.

“Oh she knows that, and she's ready”

“Wait... she?” You say to her seeing that you were surrounded by three girls right now “Okay then, well what now Kris?”

“Well its late and i think we should go to sleep” Kris said as she reached for you, grabbing you and putting you on her shoulder. She then grabbed her Pokeballs and got to work. Returning both of them as she moved to her tent. After setting everything up she entered. She placed you onto her sleeping bag as you watch her take off her clothes.

“Hey Kris, are you sure... don't you want me to close my eyes”

“I don't mind, i like eyes on me actually” She joked as she took off her clothes. Starting with her hat she took it off, then lowering her hair straight down her body. Then moving over to her clothes she took them all off. Until finally she was left in her yellow underwear. A bra and a pair of panties. She was in nothing but her underwear as she turned to you “Aren't you gonna take off your clothes as well?”

“Right, sure...” You say as you did just that, getting into your boxers as you two were ready for bed. She put her clothes in the corner and followed with yours. Once you two were ready she crawled into her sleeping bag. When she was in and her feet was at the bottom she grabbed you. Putting you right near her face she placed you on her pillow.

“Well, this is the start of a good friendship. To be honest I'm really happy about this, as much as i love Chikorita and Hoothoot, they're not the best conversationists.”

“And I'm glad to be with you, but i got to say.. I'm a little cold. Unlike you i don't have a blanket over me”

“Oh right” She said noticing that grabbing you as she pulled you up to her face “Ill get you warm, just promise you won't do anything weird to my body”

“I promise?” You say a little confused. Moving forward she brought you down into the sleeping bag, right near her feet as it a lot warmer down there.

Dropping you she went back up, kicking her feet around as she stopped “Goodnight” She said going to sleep.

“Uh... Good night Kris.” You shout as you were in the bag. Getting down you sleep onto the soft floor. With her feet hanging right over you as you have to try and ignore them. Ignore their smell and go to sleep right now. Closing your eyes you drift off.
122121111.title: Night With Kris

122121113.content:
"(Your name)? (Your naaame)?" The three of you hear called out. You all turn to the source and see a girl approaching Kris' camp.

She looked to be an ace trainer from her blue hair up in a bun. "Excuse me miss, can you help me? I'm looking for someone." Not sure what to do yet, Kris and Chikorita work together to cover you up from the girl's sight with Chikorita's leaf.

"Sure. Who are you looking for, exactly?" Kris asked.

"I'm looking for a boy about your age and around my height. We were walking through this forest together when he just up and vanished on me. I want to make sure he's safe." She explains.

Kris felt her heart go heavy. It didn't take a genius to know she was looking for you, but she didn't want you to go. Chikorita felt the same as she pressed her leaf down harder on you, trying to keep you hidden. You had a different set of feelings though. '(Your name), so that was your real name then?' You thought.

"Well, what exactly is this boy to you miss...?" Kris starts to ask.

"Oh, right. Sorry. My name is Kaitlyn. The boy I'm looking for is my..."
122121113.title: Someone approaches the camp before you decide

choices: She reluctantly reveals you to her
The pair keep you hidden and convince Kaitlyn to look elsewhere
Cyndaquil pops out of it's ball, sensing you
1221211131.content:
"He's been my best friend ever since we were little. We agreed to get our first pokemon and set out on our journeys together. We were so excited when the day came. We got our pokemon and were on our way to Violet City for our first gym battles. Then, he said he had to use the bathroom and walked off." Kaitlyn explained.

"Are you sure he isn't just finding the right spot to go?" Kris asks, trying to give her false hope.

"I thought so. But after hours of waiting for him to cone back, I went to go look for him. I couldn't find him, but I did find this." She pulls out a pokeball and expands it. "It's the Cyndaquil he got from Professor Elm. He would never just leave it behind. I'm worried something terrible has happened to him."

As Kaitlyn told her story, Kris felt more and more guilty about hiding you from her. Who was she to keep you for herself while your best friend worried herself sick looking for you? Meanwhile, the pieces were starting to come together in your head. While you couldn't put it all together, you are getting flashes of things like playing with Kaitlyn when you were small, to the feeling of finally getting a Cyndaquil and starting your adventure.

Does Kris decide to show you to her?
1221211131.title: "companion."

choices: You keep him anyway, size makes no difference to a trainer
You give him to one of the girls to use
You decide to send him back to Professor Elm
12212111311.content:
"Kaitlyn, was it? I have something you might want to see." Kris starts. Chikorita, sensing her intentions, pushed her leaf even further down on you as she scolded her trainer. "It's not right that she has to worry for no reason and you know that." Kris fired back, causing Chikorita to back down.

"What are you talking about? Do you know what happened to him?" Kaitlyn asks.

"Kinda." Is all Kris can say before she lifts you up past Chikorita and holds you up to your friend. Kaitlyn got in close, getting a detailed look at what this girl was showing her. You knew when she realized it was really you once she saw you move and began to pale.

"(Your name)? Is that really you?" She asks, fighting back tears.

"I think so. My memory isn't all there right now, but some of the things you said are giving me flashes of who I was." You explain to her. She grabs you out of Kris' hand and holds you to her cheek.

"I'm so happy I found you. I had thought you were taken away, or worse. How did you get so small, and who is this girl?"

"I don't exactly know how I got like this. All I remember is waking up this size with no memory, not even my name until I heard you call it out. As for her, that's Kris, my new friend. That's a bit of a story to explain, so you might want to sit down." You answer.

*****

You tell Kaitlyn the tale of how Kris' Chikorita attempted to eat you, causing said grass-type to blush at the reminder of her behavior. Then of Kris saving you and taking you back to her camp and told you about herself. Kris then jumped in and told the highlights of her story real quick. "And that's about the whole of it. When you walked up, Kris was offering to let me join her on her journey."

"What about our journey? We promised we would go on our adventure together. Is that just gone now?"

"Calm down, I didn't even give her an answer yet. I wasn't sure what to tell her." You start to hesitate once again since now both giantesses sat in silence waiting to hear your decision. After several minutes of silence, Kris decides to speak up.

"Well, why don't you come along with us too Kaitlyn? The more the merrier and all."

"Really? Well, I suppose if (your name) is coming along anyway, I guess it's still honoring our promise. Okay then, I'll join you as long as he comes with us." The eyes go back to you, but this time the weight of the choice is lifted.

"Okay. I suppose I'm in too." The duo and pokemon proceed to hug you close to them. Then Kaitlyn spoke up as she pulled out a pokeball.

"But what about Cyndaquil? He really liked you, but I'm not sure how well you can be a trainer at this size. What should we do with him?"
12212111311.title: She reluctantly reveals you to her

122121113111.content:
"Well, I can't really battle with him but I can still keep him. If anything, keeping him is safer because of my current size. It would also be nice to have a ride exclusively for me... not that there's anything wrong with Chocorita or Totodile."

Kaitlyn sighed, before responding with, "If that's your choice, I guess it's fine. Cyndaquill didn't seem like the type that lived for fighting anyways and I suppose he'll be happier taking care of you. Out he goes, I suppose."

And with that, Kaitlyn sent out your Cyndaquill. Your Cyndaquill was a rare female starter, something that had about a 12% chance of happening. Your Cyndaquill looked around confused, not seeing her trainer anywhere nearby but instead his travelling companion and a new female. She tried to inquire but unfortunately, Pokemon don't speak human.


It seems as though Kris understood the nature of the question and pulled you into sight. It took a quick second for Cyndaquil to actually process what they were showing her but when it all processed in her brain she immediately jumped at you, knocking you out of Kris's hands. You were knocked to the dirt floor and was assaulted by the Yellow-ish nose as she tried to nuzzle against you. Kris pulled Cyndaquil off and held her down, while Kaitlyn picked you up and looked you over.

It took a while, but Cyndaquil eventually calmed down. Kris explained the situation to your starter and Cyndaquil let out a cry of approval for your decision to keep her. She wasn't the battling type anyways, she was much more of a pet kind of pokemon, being content with not having to train.

"So, Cyndaquil, you're gonna be carrying Y/N, alright? Be careful with how you move." Kris said, worried for your safety upon a pokemon obviously more energetic then her own starter. Cyndaquil cried out and Kris took that as a confirmation. She layed you upon your Pokemon's head. It was warm but not overly hot. You had pet her before, so it was a familiar feeling. Even the flames on her back changed temperature based on what she wanted, meaning you could probably lie down on her back without worrying.

The five of you, pokemon included headed your way through the forest. When nightfall came the group of you were apporaching...

A: A random Pokecenter in the forest for travelers.
B: Violet City for both of your friend's first gym badge.
C: A clearing in the forest. Time for more camping I guess.
122121113111.title: Staying with Cyndiquill.

1221211131111.content:
Sitting on Cyndaquill's head was certainly an experience you would never forget. It was if you were sitting on a heated bed that moved and talked. Well, more like cried, considering, well you know, she's a pokemon. It was during this self reflection that you looked up and saw how dark it was getting. You call out to your female companions and tell them that you guys should set up camp.

They agree, but just as you guys are looking for a clearing to set your tents you see a Pokecenter in the middle of the forest. Sure, it wasn't uncommon for the league to put Pokecenters in the middle of long roads between towns but it was still really convenient timing, all things considered. You had no reason to doubt it and desired to sleep indoors tonight though, so you kept your doubts to yourself. Before you guys entered, however, Kaitlyn picked you off Cyndaquill's head. Cyndaquill immediately got angry at being separated from her trainer, so Kaitlyn just called her back into her pokeball.

You look up inquisitively at Kaitlyn and she looks back, before saying, "If I just left you there, everyone would have a clear shot of you, and with evil teams like Team Rocket around, that would just be asking to get you kidnapped."

You nod to yourself at such logic. Sure, you didn't doubt Kaitlyn and Kris wouldn't try to protect you but they were still only beginning trainers, not at all a match for Rocket higher ups. Kaitlyn took off her bag and opened a pocket. She lowered you to it and was clearly trying to get you to jump in. Upon dropping in you feel a soft, pillowy texture beneath you. It is apparent that this was Kaitlyn's tissue pocket. You mentally thanked her for the accommodations as the light above you was zipped away. A combination of the gentle swaying with the soft bedding and darkness lulled you to sleep in record times. When you next awoke...

A: Kris was slowly opening the bag while Kaitlyn was sleeping. She wanted to talk.
B: Kaitlyn was slowly opening the bag while Kris was sleeping. She wanted to talk.
C: Your intuition was right. This Pokecenter was actually an Illusion created by ghost types who were very interested in playing with the tiny human known as you.
1221211131111.title: Pokecenter in the woods.

choices: You choose Kris, she needs the help
You choose Kaitlyn, she already knows him
You ask to let Cyndaquil out and have him choose
122121113112.content:
"I guess until we get me back to normal, one of you two should be his trainer." You suggest. "I mean, I doubt I'm making it to the pokemon league like this. This way he still gets to battle and compete while still being with me." You suggest.

Kaitlyn looked a tad worried at the idea. "Are you sure? It's your first pokemon, and if you give him to one of us, he'll be your last too."

"I'm sure. If I can't get back to normal, then being a trainer is out of the question anyway. This way, everyone is happy. Now the only question is, who to give him to?"

"I'll take him. A Cyndaquil might be just what I need to beat Falkner. Hoothoot is a good plan, sure. But with a Cyndaquil, I might stand a chance. Please?" Kris asks.

"Now hold on. Why should you get him? If anything, I should take care of him. He already knows me. Right (your name)?" Kaitlyn interjects.

"Oh come on, I need a pokemon with some power to it that isn't weak against flying types. Cyndaquil is just what I need. What pokemon do you even have Kaitlyn?"

"A Totodile and a Sentret. That gives us two each. (Your name), choose. Who do you think Cyndaquil should go to?"

They both gave valid arguments. How were you going to choose between these two?
122121113112.title: You give him to one of the girls to use

choices: Kris recalls Chikorita (and you) into her pokeball
Kris lets her play around the campsite while she trains.
122122.content:
If you had to imagine the many ways you could have died, the pokemon who could have done you in, eaten by a Chikorita would not have crossed your mind. Maybe being crushed by Meganium but certainly not the first stage of its evolutionary line. Yet here you were, thrashing about in the plant creatures mouth as she savors both your taste and how weak and helpless you were compared to her. She was still upset about earlier, but now she had the perfect little thing to take all this stress and aggression out on. Suddenly the both of you heard the voice of her trainer calling out to her. You hoped that this would mean someone else would finally find you and rescue you from this massive monster.

When Chikorita heard her trainer's voice she started to panic. She didn't have any place to hide you. Well besides sucking you all the way into her mouth. But Kris would definitely see she was hiding something in her mouth if she tried that. With no other options left in mind, the massive grass type starter spit you out into the grass and looked back towards her trainer. Your landing was thankfully soft, but the Chikorita's breath and saliva both lingered on you as you gasped for real air. As Kris saw her small pokemon smiling up at her she smiled back. "There you go. I'm glad you were able to get over that on your own. Just be careful next time okay. Who knows what could be hiding in the grass?" Chikorita seemed to smirk slightly at this question. She knew exactly what, or who in this case, was trying to hide in the tall grass. Trying to regain his bearings before trying to escape. As Kris turned around and walked back to the camp, you soon saw a shadow looming over you as Chikorita immediately found her new toy. You tried to scream, but with her vines you were both grabbed and silenced as the little monster hid you under her head leaf and ran after Kris with more energy than normal.
122122.title: Spit out, But Still Stuck with Chikorita

1222.content:
In the camp, everything was huge, there were many things, a campfire, a tent, several trunks, etc.

Seeing better, you saw how one of the trunks was sitting a girl with brown hair, with 2 pigtails, red shirt with blue breastplate, a white cap with a red bow, white stockings that go to the knee, with red shoes

Beside her there was a yellow bag, she was singing a song while she was starting to take something out of her bag, you did not know whether to try to get her attention or you could enter the tent to get her attention there...
1222.title: Lyra

12222.content:
Seeing the giant girl, you had only one thought in your head. Help. Its better to get this girls attention rather then hide. And although there is probably a better way of getting her attention, you decide to go get her attention directly.

You walk closer to the girl shouting and yelling, although her voice was much louder then you. So obviously your voice became obsolete as she was singing. Giving up you decide to get into eye range of the girl. You run up to near the bag she was searching for, intending on her spotting you on the edge of her eye.
 When you arrive there, The giant Brunette girl finished digging in the bag. Sitting back up straight to her full height. You watch as the girl unfolded a map she had, looking through it very intently. Okay, so your not going to get her to see you. But that doesn't mean your out of luck.

Deciding on your next move you walk over to her foot. If she won't hear you and won't see you. Your going to make her feel you. You walk over and jump on her red shoe, planning on climbing up her leg.

But since you've already been spit on several times already by fate, it decides to go again. You feel her foot lift off as she started to kick the air, swinging her legs back and forth.

Your taken on a ride by this girls unaware movements. It takes all your efforts and all your power just to hold on, only to be thrown around by her feet. At this point your starting to wonder if she didn't see you or if she's just messing with you.

Your hearts pounding as your starting to feel sick, your focus goes away as you fail to keep your grip. Your lifted off of her foot as she sends you flying into the air. You fly over her head only to come back down at alarming speed. This would be dangerous for you, however where you were landing you knew would cushion your fall.

On Her hat. You land on the white soft hat as you breath in, you almost just died then to this unaware girl. Hopefully it will become a lot more safer for you one you get her attention. You move over to the hat, feeling like you were walking on a mattress. You get to to the edge and think about your next move.
12222.title: Oblivious Lyra

122221.content:
Okay, so its proven that this girl is oblivious to everything around her, but they're is no way she will miss you when you jump right in front of her eyes. Looking down at her lap you breath in. Its gonna hurt a lot, but the reward out ways the pain. You've got to just drop down, and of course aim. You breath out as you decide to just roll over the side. You go to free falling as you couldn't see if she saw you or not. More focused on landing on her lap. Which you did, with a soft thud you landed right above her left leg. Rolling around you groan in pain. Defiantly not your smartest move.

You do a quick body check for yourself making sure your fine and not broken. Everything was bruised, but thankfully nothing was broken. Now that your down here you have to look. Rolling around you look up, hoping to see the giant girl’s face looking down.

Instead you saw her giant eye right down in front of you. Causing to flinch in fear.

The girl backed up as she gave you some space “Sorry, guess that was a bit close wasn't it” She apologised.

“Just... just a little bit”

“Can you blame me, your a little person!!” She said with a big smile, “My name is Lyra! Whats yours little guy” She had a big smile on her face. Showing that she was beyond happy to see you. You tell her your name as she loved hearing your voice. You couldn't tell but it sounded a bit more squeaky. Lyra reached her hands for you but stopped beforehand “Um... is it okay if i pick you up”

Oh she's asking, thats a good sign! “Yeah, just be careful. That fall really hurt” You tell her. After getting your approval Lyra’s hands cupped around you. Lifting you up as you were lifted up. She held you in her left and had her right hand on stand by. Just in case something happened.

“Wow....” She said with stars in her eyes “I just saw you fall down in front of me.”

“Yeah, from your hat”

“What were you doing up there Little Guy?” Lyra said as you breathed in, you then told her the whole journey you had trying to get her attention. After that Lyra felt bad. “Wow, i... i had no idea. Im sorry, I've always been slightly oblivious. Well i guess more then slightly”

“Its fine, you found me now and thats all that matters. Id ask if you could help me but right now, I'm more concerned about sleeping off that fall”

“Oh yeah, it is pretty dark. I mean I've stayed up longer but i get it if you want to go to sleep that makes sense” Lyra said to you.

“Yeah.... i don't want to impose, but do you think you can make me a bed to rest” You ask her as she smiles kindly. Always nice.

“Its okay __________”
122221.title: Lyra Helping

choices: Stay with Lyra and see what happens
Throw caution to the wind, just have fun from now on
1222213.content:
“Its Okay, you can sleep with me. Its about time for sleep anyway” Lyra said as she seemed pretty happy with the idea, at least thats what her smile says to you. She smiled so kindly but you couldn't help but feel wrong about it.

“Are you sure?” You say to her honestly “Im okay if you just got a sock and made a little makeshift bed”

“No i want you to sleep with me!” She said with a smile “I don't take up much room on my air mattress and its the very least i can do, after putting you though that ordeal” Lyra said as she stood up, turning around and dropping you down onto the stump. Seeing her smile “Okay, I'm gonna get this fire then we can sleep okay”

She then went to a bucket she had planned and pour it out, making it a lot more darker. She picked you up as she went to the tent. Opening it up you saw her Air Mattress she was talking about, not to mention that she might of not been entirely honest about the size. Sure you don't take up much room but it looks like she can barely fit on it as it is. Walking forward Lyra gently dropped you down onto it. Letting you bounce a bit. Since your body was tired you just collapsed on the most comfortable thing.

“Now I'm gonna get changed, just don't look okay” Lyra said as she didn't seem even bothered with that idea. She either trusts you completly or she's open with it. Regardless you didn't look, in fact you were too tired to move. And this Mattress at least at your size was beyond comfortable. By the time Lyra came down onto the Mattress, she was in her night gown. It was yellow with flowers on. her hat to the side and her hair let down as she got comfortable for herself. Laying down you bounced a bit, enough to disturb you as you got up. Looking at the girl. She placed her head on the side as she got comfortable. Smiling at you as you do think your liking her smile. Its so warm and caring, not to mention it just calms you.

“Now its time for sleep, when we wake up we can figure out what to do with you.” Lyra said with a smile, until she started to think about it “But if I'm being honest i have no idea how you got this size, i guess a Pokemon could of done it but i don't know which ones. Maybe a psychic type if i were to make a guess”

“I don't remember anything honestly, could be a Pokemon for all i know” You say to her, laying down on your side to talk to her giant face.

Lyra cheered to herself as she got happy “Oh imagine if i caught it! Not only would you be bigger again but i would also get an awesome Pokemon. I could drive through the rest of the Gym Leaders!”

“Gym Leaders, are you a trainer?” You ask her surprised this didn't come up before.

“Yeah i am, i have two badges and i.... you know what we can talk about this in the morning. For now we need to sleep.” Lyra said deciding. You didn't have problem as you could go for a sleep. Lyra seeing you laying near the edge wasn't happy about it. Grabbing you with her fingers she dropped you down right next to her face on the pillow. So close you can feel her warm breath on you.

“Lyra, little warning next time?” You say to her as she smiled.

“Sorry, just didn't want you falling off. Plus the pillow i imagine would be more comfortable. Anyway good night, see you in the morning” Lyra said, going to sleep and closing her eyes.

“Good night Lyra” You say back to her as you had a bit harder time, you just started at her face as you took a bit of mental thought with you to your sleep. You've gotten Lyra’s attention, which was good. She seems nice but your not sure if she's capable of actually helping you.
 Still she's your best offer right now. Going to sleep you close your eyes, ignoring the hot breath being sent your way as you drifted off too. Your mind still trying to search for ideas on where to go to next.

Eventually you did come to an idea in your sleep. A plan as of sorts.

You will ____________
1222213.title: Lyra Off To Sleep

choices: May doesn't notice you but stops nearby!
May doesn't notice you and sits on the tree stump!
123.content: You made your way through the foliage, eventually coming across a tree stump at the edge of a clearing. You decide to climb up to the top of the stump and rest there. But as you lie down and try to nod off, you are disrupting by a pounding noise. Footsteps. You blearily rub your eyes and see a giantess coming in your direction! You scream and shout at the gigantic girl, and...
123.title: May

1231.content:
Fortunately for you the giant girl who turns out to be May? Spots you immediately and doesn't hesitate to reach out with her left big hand picking you up for a while she doesn't say a word merely looking at you with pure interest then finally she speaks "Wow! What kind of creature are you? Oh are you a new breed of Pokemon?" You raised your eyebrows at this comment
"Pokemon? And what makes you think I'm a Pokemon? I'm human like you well a shrunken human but you know what I mean!" You said a bit annoyed but she paid little attention to your salty tone instead she began poking you all over "Owww! Hey cut it out! What are you doing....owwww that hurts!"
"Oh I'm just having a bit of fun with you little guy! You sure are cute!!" And she paused for a bit
"Something wrong?" You ask May doesn't answer until she walks all the way to.....
1231.title: May notices you!

12312.content:
May walks through the forest, you softly yet firmly grasped in her fist. Wondering what this girl had in mind for you, you notice her stopping. This place is full of huge trees. The sun has completely settled down in the meantime, soon replaced by the pale moonlight.

"Perfect place..." you hear the brunette giantess mutter as she sits down on a log, releasing you from her fist, letting you sit down on her gloved palm.
"My name's May, by the way. What's yours?" she suddenly breaks the silence. You tell her your name.
"Cute name for a cute little guy such as yourself." she giggles, making you blush furiously.

"Well, as I said, this is a perfect place to camp in tonight." with that, the young giantess gets up from the log she was sitting on and sets you down on it, before reaching for her bag and starting to unpack her stuff, giving you a clear view of her butt.

Your blush grows wider as May starts pitching a cobalt blue tent. Then, she collects some breaches, probably fallen from the high trees, and lights a fire.
"Well then, now that's settled..." May says, sitting down next to you. She then picks you and sets you down on her lap.
"... I think you must be hungry.".

She gets out a chocolate bar from her bag and hands you three pieces.
"That should be enough to fill you up little one. Eat up!" she beams. She doesn't have to repeat it again, as you are already biting into the chocolate hungrily.

After eating your meal, you and May chat for a while, trying to figure out how you got so small. Until you yawn.
"Are you tired little one?" the brunette asks. You nod.
"Well, I think it's time to sleep then.".
With that, she walks to the tent and places you down, before unzipping it and getting inside.
"Do you mind waiting for a second?" she asks.

Without waiting for an answer, she zips it close. Five minutes pass before she opens it again, this time wearing a pink shirt and pink shorts. Her bandana is gone, completely showing her light brown hair.
"You can come in." she says. You nod and get inside, before May closes the tent.

"So, where do I sleep?" you ask. May giggles.
"Well, there only one warm place here..." she points to a sleeping bag.

Shaking off the feeling, you start walking towards the entrance of the tent, soon getting outside. The bright light momentarily blinds you, before your eyes adjust to it.

And you notice the same person you've been searching for, sitting on a stump. She's fully dressed, only her bandana is missing out.

May is in fact brushing her brown hair, her eyes closed as she hums merrily. You take a moment to admire the brunette giantess in all her beauty. She looks so serene...

"Thank I guess..." you reply as you rub the back of your head. Such display of kindness has surely caught you off guard...

"No problem!" she responds.

You smile, before looking around.
"May? Sorry for asking, but... how much longer are we staying here?... Because... We're not staying in the woods, right?" you ask, before cursing your stupidity.

May just giggles.
"Of course not!" she replies.

"Splendid day, isn't it?"

"I almost feel like laying under a tree and stay there until the sun sets. If only there wasn't the risk some pokemon might just gulp me down whole..."

Though the threat was real, May laughed it off.

"Yeah, that ain't gonna happen." she said, beginning to walk,
"Not on my watch, anyway."

The statement made you feel relieved, so you decided to change subject.

"Hey, May," you called from your perch on her hand as she walked around,
"Where are you headed?"

May let a smile spread on her face before she looked down at you and replied,
