As you walked through the undergrowth of the forest, you couldn't help but marvel at everything around you. Shoving aside another blade of grass as large as your body, your eyes were constantly lifted up to the world around you. You didn't really have a choice but to look up at the world now. Trees towered above you, matching if not surpassing some of the greatest skyscrapers in the world, blades of grass ranged from chest-height to towering over your head. You'd never complain about mowing the lawn again after this, as anyone or anything could easily lose you at your current stature within the massive blades. Loose debris; stones, sticks and other detritus left upon the forest floor were annoying, but surmountable obstacles requiring you to either climb over them or go around them. As you walked you attempted to find someone...anyone in your current state though meeting someone else at this size could hold its own problems. Yet as you walked the only thought running through your mind was that you needed to find help. As small as you were, someone could just come along and step on you, that thought terrifying you to no end. Not to mention what would happen if you ran into a Pokemon at your minute size, a cute little Starly, small enough to fit in your palm would probably be several times your current minute stature.
Pushing your way through a bush the size of a two-storey house, you nearly shouted in joy at what you found on the other side. A campsite, and from the items scattered around the clearing it was in, said campsite had to be inhabited. A sizable bright orange one-person tent, cooking and eating utensils, a rolled up sleeping bag, and a small yellow backpack was all you could see at the moment. You nearly rushed right into the middle of the campsite, until you noticed something. Despite all the items lying around, there was no one here. Glancing around as you stepped carefully back into the bush. You nearly jumped out of your skin as a set of massive bushes, large enough to obscure a normal-sized person rustled on the other side of the clearing. In a moment, said bushes parted revealing a young woman, probably
She had a unique fashion sense, on her feet were pink knee-high boots, with long black socks peeking out the top. She was also wearing a black v-neck tank top with a pink skirt, a white undershirt beneath the tank top covering the woman's exposed cleavage. A white beanie with a pink poke ball print on front sat atop her head. Her dark cerulean blue hair was held up with a pair of gold hair clips. Completing her ensemble was a black bracelet on her right arm, a pokewatch on her left, and surprisingly enough a pink scarf wrapped around her neck as if it were a ribbon.
You couldn't help but thank your own foresight as the young woman walked into her campsite, head held high she barely examined her surroundings as she walked around. Gulping softly you could only imagine ending up under the young woman's boots had you gone racing into the campsite as you had planned. At the very least you would have been forced to run for your life as she stomped around, completely unaware of your presence. Looking around she softly sighed, her voice although low easily reaching you on the other side of the clearing. "I guess I'll be spending the night here, this forest goes on forever. How could I remember everything but a map?" Another gentle sigh escaped her lips as she sunk to the ground near the yellow backpack you had spotted earlier. Rummaging around the surprisingly small bag, she pulled out a small pink hairbrush, though it was probably larger than you were at the moment. Losing the beanie, and carefully removing her hairclips she gave her head a gentle shake, her dark cerulean hair, freed from the hat and clips spilling out over her shoulders and down to her lower back. Humming softly to herself, she began to comb the brush through her hair, each stroke soft and gentle as she had all the time in the world to take care of herself.
This seemed like the perfect opportunity to try and get the girl's attention, she was calm and relaxed, she wouldn't be moving around much as she took care of her hair so you could probably approach her safely. So what were you going to do?...
124.title: Dawn

choices: "Oh my, I'm so sorry, are you alright?" she asks concerned (Nice)
"Ohhh, you look so cute!" she exclaims excitedly (Playful)
"Lucky me, I just got a new pet!" she laughs mischievously (mean)
1241.content:
Seeing as how you haven't got many chances, you decide to try and get this girl's attention. She's currently calm, so she'll help you out for sure... you hope.

You make your way to the log she's sitting on and gaze up at the young giantess. She has her eyes closed as she brushes herself, humming quietly.
"Hello? Miss? Down here!" you shout, hoping she'll hear you and look down.

Unfortunately, she doesn't. She must be lost in her own thoughts.
"Please, help!!" you shout again, louder this time. But she still seems to have not heard your voice.

Just then, when you are about to scream again, the giantess gets up and places the brush back in her bag, before starting to walk toward the tent. She gently puts it inside, bending to place it on the ground, giving you a clear visual of her butt in the meantime. You blush furiously at the sight as a thousand thoughts run across your head.

Too bad you don't notice Dawn walking back to the log. Just when the white sole of her pink boot is about to crush you, you return to your senses. And you scream in pure terror at top of your little lungs.

This time, Dawn seems to notice your voice. Her boot stops in midair as she looks down at the source of that faint scream. She spots what seems to be a weird looking bug, there on the ground. But, inspecting closer, she actually sees a tiny person. A terrified tiny person. And seeing she was about to crush him, she can easily understand why.

Her hand makes her way to your small form. Two fingers gently wrap around your waist, picking you up and bringing you up to her face. Her deep blue eyes seem to stare into your very soul. You stare back at her, you can clearly see your own reflection in her twin mirrors, your terrorized look still painted on your face. You wait to calm down a bit before speaking up.
"H-hi... c-could you please help m-me?" you stammer.

Dawn stays silent for a few moments, trying to decide if you're actually real or if her mind is playing pranks on her. She blinks a few times and, noticing that the little guy didn't disappear, she finally reacts to her catch...
1241.title: Try to get her attention

12411.content:
In an instant, the look on the young giantess' face goes from a curious one to a concerned one.
"Oh my! Are you alright little guy?" Dawn exclaims. You note a not subtle hint of worry in her voice.

You open your mouth, but no sound comes out of it, the image of the sole about to crush you still present in your mind keeping your vocal cords from producing any audible sound. So you just nod your head. Slowly, Dawn kneels and places her hand right in front of your small body.

Gulping, you hop on it as the blue haired girl rises her hand back to her face. You stare into her deep blue eyes as she talks again.
"Sorry for almost crushing you little guy. I didn't notice you." she apologizes. Still shaking, you manage to talk again.
"I-It's alright." you stammer.

She smiles warmly.
"Glad to hear that. " she says, sitting down on a stump.
"I'm Dawn, by the way. What's your name?" she asks, her voice filled with honey. Clearly, she wants to make it up to you for scaring you to death and almost turning you into a red stain on the ground.

You don't seem to remember anything else, so you tell her your name.
"That's a cute name." she says with a smile, making you blush.
"How did you got so small?" she then asks.
"I really don't know. I just remember I was walking in the forest... and then I woke up, shrunk." you explain.

Dawn seems to ponder something upon hearing your words. Until she lets out a small yawn.
"Well, I don't really know how to help you, but I guess we can figure out in the morning. Let's eat something and then we can go to sleep." she says, getting up and reaching for her backpack.

Digging into her bag, she pulls out an apple.
"I think we can share an apple." she states, sitting again and placing you on her lap. She slices the apple and hands you a slice. You eat slowly, thinking about this heck of a day.

Lost in your thoughts, you don't hear Dawn calling out for you.
"Little guy?" you look up at her.
"I think we should go to sleep now." she says, picking you and walking towards her tent.

Placing you down, she steps inside.
"Wait here..." she mutters, zipping the tent close, reopening it five minutes later, now in her nightwear.

Grabbing both you and her backpack, she places it on the floor and zips the tent close again.
"So... where am I going to sleep?" you casually ask. Dawn giggles in reply. You immediately get where this is going. A blush spreads on your face at light speed.
"You don't mean..."
"Exactly." she replies with a smile, while making her way to the point where a single sleeping bag is laying.

Dawn slides inside with you still in her grasp. She drops you next to her head. Close next to her head. Stands of her hair lie next to you, some twice your height.
"Goodnight little one. Sleep tight." she says in a whisper, before closing those blue eyes of hers, quickly beginning to snore softly.

Blushing even more, you lie down as well. You try to recollect your thoughts, trying to figure out what could be the cause of all this... but in the end, your eyelids become heavy. You fall asleep before even knowing it.

Her voice and expression conveyed concern for you, but quietly she was getting more and more excited. You could barely do anything more than stammer awkwardly in response until you finally regained enough control over your body to nod. "Aww! Looks like someone's shy." she exclaimed, now making her excitement apparent. "It's okay little one. I know you're probably terrified to see a beautiful giant like me towering over you." As she said this, she gently used a finger to pat you on the head. "I'll bet the whole world looks scary from your perspective." She pondered aloud as a smirk formed on her face causing you to shiver. "Well I guess that settles it. You're staying with me." Her declaration shocked you, finding yourself unable to speak up once again. "That way, you'll be safe in my care and I get a cool new pet." The word 'pet' put you even further in shock. Was this what your life was reduced to? A small... well young girl's pet? Dawn's smirk grew as her expression turned from any shread of concern into one of pure mischief. You were trapped with her.
12413.title: Dawn's pet

124133.content:
You can't believe this. This blue haired giantess wants to keep you as a common pet! You have to escape somehow. But you're currently trapped in Dawn's grasp, several feet above the ground. Falling from this height would mean an horrible fate for you... Unless...

Hastily formulating a plan, you look up to the giantess, who is staring at you silently. You notice that her smirk is still present on her face. She must be thinking about how to have fun with her new pet. Then, her smirk grows wider as she talks.
"Alright little guy, are you ready for some fun?" she asks you mischievously.

Gulping, you decide that this is the perfect moment to put your plan in place. Quickly, you bite her index finger.

As expected, you are released from the giantess' grip as she exclaims in pain, even though you surely didn't do anything to her.

You fall down to the ground. Luckily, as you expected - more like hoped! - you fall on her pink boot. Quickly jumping down, you start running, trying to escape the giantess behind you.

But, of course, Dawn wouldn't let her pet get away so easily. Forgetting about her finger, she starts 'chasing' you. And, in just three steps, she's right behind you.

She rises her foot above you. Fearing that she wants to crush you, you run faster. But that isn't what Dawn has in store for you... In fact, you soon notice the pink boot landing right in front of you, sending shockwaves through the ground. You stop just in time to not bump into it.

Trembling, you slowly look up to the giantess. She staring down at you with a pissed look, hands on her hips. You can literally feel the coldness emanated from her eyes...

Slowly, one of her hands comes to pick you up and, closing you in a fist, she brings you to eye level.
"That was totally rude of you, you know." she begins with a calm voice.
"P-Please, I-I d-didn't..." you stammer, but Dawn stops you.
"Relax. I'll forgive you for this, because I'm sure that, from your perspective, everything looks scary. So, I'm still going to let you stay with me..." she says, her cold gaze shifting to a gentler one.
"Oh, t-thanks Daw-" she cuts you off once again.
"Let me finish. I do forgive you, but you'll have to learn to obey me. And, of course, you realize that now you have to be punished." she ends her sentence...

You waved your arms frantically, and shouted desperately for the girl’s attention, but an incredibly unfortunate turn of events rendered you entomolic. The sun was setting behind her tent, meaning that her shadow was cast over you, giving you no advantage in terms of your appearance, which while average was certainly not bug like. But when she turned her head with sparkling eyes and a huge smile, saying that you were confused didn't fully describe what you were feeling.

"Are you kidding!?" the blonde giantess exclaimed,
"That felt wonderful! Keep doing it!"

You felt relieved. Whatever you were doing, you were doing it right.

You started walking around her back again, pressing down with your feet into the hard bone below her skin, making her murr in pleasure.

"That's it..." she murmured after a while,
"Keep going..."

Some more time passed, but you had given up trying to keep track of it. Eventually, you did reach the top of Bianca's back, where you started, and began 'massaging' her shoulders.

After a while, Bianca declared her satisfaction in a soft moan.

You stopped, feeling that your arms and legs had fallen asleep after the massage you gave her.

She grabbed you before sitting up.

"Thanks, that felt great!" she praised, placing you down onto the soft bed before grabbing her white shirt and putting it back on.

Then, she stared down at you with a smile.

"It was nothing." you humbly replied,
"So, what now?"
1251311131.title: One last time

choices: The night went on smoothly and you woke up the next
You woke up during the night, with Bianca still asleep
You woke up overnight, finding Bianca awake and staring at you
12513111311.content:
Bianca smiled, then began stretching, causing the bed you were on to shake a bit under her weight. A yawn came out of her mouth.

"Well..." she replied, fixing her green eyes back on your form,
"I am a bit sleepy, after wandering through the woods for the whole day. What do you say we go to sleep?"

In response, you yawned as well.

"Yeah, sleep sounds about great right now..." you replied.

Bianca smiled, finding you adorable.

Slowly, she got back up from the bed, giving you a good view of her butt. You couldn't look away, as much as you tried.

Bianca turned around and caught you staring.

You abruptly snapped out of your trance and blushed, staring at her sorrowfully, thinking she'd be mad at you.

But instead, Bianca just giggled, winked and began walking, heading for the a door that connected the room to the bathroom, not before having picked up her bag.

"Be right back!" she said cheerfully, disappearing inside the other room.

She must have gone to change into her sleepwear, you figured, imagining how she was going to look like when she walked out of that bathroom.

Part of you felt guilty, thinking about her in such way, but you justified yourself telling that it was out of admiration for bother her looks and the kind way she acted.

Not many people would have helped a shrunken person who entered their tent in the woods without their explicit authorization, but Bianca went past that and decided to help you the moment you asked.

You felt blessed to have found such beautiful with an as well as beautiful heart.

You sat down on the bed and waited for the blonde giantess to return. You never saw her in her sleepwear, having only met her yesterday before she left the forest, bringing you along in a trip that lasted a whole day.

This made you realize how lucky you had been, not just meeting the right person, but meeting her in the right time and place: had you failed to find her tent last night, Bianca would have left the forest without you, dooming you to a nearly certain death.

The thought was horrible.

Luckily, a distraction came pretty soon.

"Hey, I'm back..." Bianca's voice called, causing you to snap out of your own world and look in her direction.

You saw her smiling face staring down at you, her body fit in a white top over matching white pants that went down to her ankles.

She stopped for a moment, dropping her bag to the ground.

"So, what do you think?" she asked, striking a bit of a pose, causing her bosom to bounce and you to nearly suffer a heart attack..

"Y-You..." you stuttered, several lewd adjectives running through your head; you had to breath in a moment, calm down and reply,
"You look great, Bianca!"

The giantess smiled massively.

"Aw, thanks c- ahh!" she screamed as she went to take a step, but tripped over her discarded bag.

Her impact with the ground seemed to shake the whole room. Having something like this happened before, you came to the conclusion that Bianca was a bit of an air-head.

Seeing her laying on the floor, probably seeing stars... you had to choke back a laugh, watching as she got back up, looking beyond embarrassed, her cheeks burning bright red.

"So-Sorry..." she stammered, flustered, as she skipped her bag and headed to the bed.

The blush didn't leave, but the smile came back to her face as she recalled her previous line of thinking.

"I was saying," she told, sitting down on the bed, leaving one leg out,
"You're awfully cute! None of my friends has ever complimented my looks."

At this point, Bianca paused to sigh dejectedly.

"They're all great people, but they're so taken by Pokemon that they hardly talked about anything else back when we used to travel as trainers," she explained, closing her eyes,
"And now, Cheren is a gym leader and I hardly see him; as for Hilbert, I haven't seen him in a year and a half. Sometimes I wonder how he's doing, if he's alright or if he's still even alive. He taught me a lot during my journey as a trainer, he helped me realize that my path was research," she explained, glad to have someone who listened to her tales.

You nodded your head, not sure how the conversation took direction, but listening anyway.

You asked,

"Do you miss your friends, Bianca?"

It was her turn to nod,

"I do. But... it's nice to remember those times. It's been almost three years now," she said, smiling at you,
"Now, let's go to sleep, shall we?"

She pulled the blanket from the bed and slid beneath it.

You blushed.

"Wait, are we actually sharing a bed?" you asked, causing her to giggle.

"Well, there's only one, so..."

"Oh, well... guess I'll just sleep over here then," you said, moving to the edge of her pillow, which could easily pass as a bed for you.

Bianca giggled.

"Don't be shy now," she said, grabbing you and pulling you embarrassingly close to her massive chest,
"We've already been that close, no need to be ashamed," she told you.

You blushed furiously, but said nothing.

Bianca continued,

"And, this is for the great job you did," she said, pulling you up to her lips, giving you a quick peck.

Her lips felt soft, warm, heavenly. One quick peck was enough to send you in a trance.

Bianca giggled.

"Sleep tight!" she said, bringing you back down to her chest, embracing you, before pulling the blanket over her and your body.

A few minutes passed, and Bianca fell asleep. She had been hiding it well, but she was exhausted.

Seeing as she was asleep, you too laid your head down and closed your eyes.

'I'm in love.' you thought to yourself, before drifting off to sleep as well.
12513111311.title: Bedtime with Bianca

choices: "I need to check in with professor Juniper. Maybe she can help you, too."
"We're going to meet up with Cheren! He knows a lot of stuff, he could help."
125131113111.content:
The night went on peacefully as you slept soundly against Bianca's massive bosom.

You slept throughout the night without waking once and, eventually, dawn's first lights began to shine in the sky.

Gradually, the sun kept rising as you and your host kept on sleeping.

A while more passed.

You were the first waking up. After yawning and rubbing your eyes, you looked up at Bianca, who was still snoozing with you pressed against her warm chest.

You felt your cheeks slowly adopting a red shade as you were reminded of where you slept throughout the night. Not that you minded, since you literally rode all the way here in direct contact with those, but it still didn't keep you from feeling embarrassed about it.

Your moved up to Bianca's sleeping face. She looked very cute while asleep, with her hair disheveled and her mouth opening and closing as she snored softly.

Beautiful was the right word to describe her, beautiful on the outside and on the inside.

You smiled.

Since you couldn't move nor get free from her grasp - not that you really wanted to - you had no choice but to wait for Bianca to wake up, which didn't take too long.

About ten minutes after your awakening, Bianca's snoring came to an end, and a yawn escaped her mouth before she smacked her lips and slowly opened her eyes.

Upon noticing that she was holding onto something, Bianca looked down, discovering you staring back at her.

A small smile crept up across her face.

"Oh, hey..." she said, still mostly asleep.

"Good morning." you replied,
"What time is it?"

Bianca hazily extended an arm behind her and reached for a nightstand near the bed to retrieve her Xtransceiver before looking at it.

"... 9 AM." she replied, putting the device back on the nightstand and sitting upright.

She smiled at you.

"So, how was your sleep?" she asked. You couldn't tell for sure, but you could detect a hint of teasing playfulness hidden beneath her tone.

Regardless, you smiled back,

"It was great, thank you." you replied, making Bianca's smile grow slightly wider.

"Glad to hear that. Now, wait here," she said, placing you on the bed, stretching and getting up. A small moan escaped her mouth,
"I need a shower. Then, we'll wash you up, too."

With that, Bianca disappeared into the bathroom, leaving you alone much like last night.

Shortly after, you heard the sound of water running.

Left to yourself, with not much else to do, you sank into thinking once again and, of course, your thoughts went to Bianca. She was so nice to you, though you figured that when she offered to help you...

The last thought made your line of thinking go from Bianca to... yourself. As much as you appreciated the giantess, you couldn't simply forget that you were still very tiny and very fragile.

You began wondering if there was a way to restore your size. After that... you didn't know, but you'd cross that bridge when you came to it. For now, getting your original size back was what mattered, because without it you were vulnerable... well, not as long as you had your blonde guardian watching over you like a caring mother would.

It was a comforting thought, but the fact you were tiny was real, and you had to find a solution for it.

Perhaps... Bianca could have known of a way to help you? You looked in direction of the bathroom, a low humming now mixed with the sound of water running.

You began thinking about it.

Bianca did mention a certain 'professor', though you couldn't recall their name right now.

If the blonde giantess was willing to bring you to them, then... it would be your salvation!

You just had to ask... whenever she came out of the bathroom.

--

Half an hour later, Bianca came out in her usual clothes, though missing her coat and hat.

"Your turn now, little cutie," she said, smiling cheerfully, grabbing a hold of you from the bed.

"Wait, Bianca, can I ask a question?"

"Heh, you just did," she joked,
"But, sure, go ahead."

You briefly looked down, before meeting her gaze.

"I was wondering... do you happen to know of a way to help me?" you asked.

Bianca lost her smile and stared at you, perplexed.

"What do you mean?" she asked after a moment of hesitation, regaining her smile,
"I am, am I not? I'm taking care of you!"

"And I'll never stop thanking you for it," you replied,
"But I'm talking about my stature. I was wondering if you could help me fix that. Y'know, get bigger again?"

Again, Bianca's smile faded as she adopted a pondering expression.

"That's an odd question," she commented, starting to rub her chin with the tip of her index finger,
"I don't know how I could help you grow big again, at least not by myself. I do know a few people that probably could, though I'm not sure. Yours is a very complicated riddle, little cutie."

You remained silent, and so did Bianca.

She pondered something for a while, staring at an imprecise point of the room as she tried to come up with an idea.

In the end, she looked at you, her expression very serious in contrast to her usually cheerful self.

"Tell you what..." she said,
125131113111.title: A possible solution

choices: What the heck, you agreed. It was only for a little longer, no?
You declined, you still wanted your size back
1251311131113.content:
Before speaking, Bianca adopted a very solemn look, which she sent your way.

"That size..." the young giantess began, looking hesitant to speak. You didn't know why, but for some reason you were starting to feel a little uncomfortable with the way she was looking at you as well as the way she was talking to you.

"What about it?" you questioned, wondering where the conversation was going to go.

Bianca bit her lower lip and looked elsewhere.

"Well... what I mean is, your size, is it that bad?" she asked, readjusting her glasses on her nose.

You didn't reply.

Just where was this coming from? Of course this size was bad, you were completely helpless!

"... What do you mean, Bianca?" you asked. Perhaps you had misunderstood her, it was the most likely explanation.

However, still keeping her expression, Bianca repeated,

"Your size, is it so bad? Do you really hate it?" she asked once more.

Was she playing psychologist with you? Of course you hated this size! Who in the world could ever like being so small?... Well, there probably were people who would enjoy this kind of situation but, sadly, you weren't among them.

"What are you talking about, Bianca? Of course I hate this size!" you replied, perhaps a little too brusquely, but you couldn't help it.

Bianca's expression didn't change.

"That's understandable," she said calmly, slowly taking a seat on the bead beside you, causing the mattress to bounce under her weight,
"But, have you even tried seeing the bright side?"

Bright side? Why, was there any aside from the fact that you weren't in a Pokemos's stomach right now?

Apparently, Bianca read your mind, because she kept going,

"I mean, I'm sure that size must be scary and all, but it's got to have some great perks as well!" she spoke, suddenly cheering up, her face enlightening with that kind smile of hers.

You had conflicted feelings running through you, and the same question as before lingered: what did she want to achieve by telling you these things?

"... Like?" you asked, a bit unsure where this conversation was going, though you had a feeling and hoped it wasn't going to take such turn.

"Well, uh..." Bianca hesitated a moment and put on that cute expression she had when thinking. When she finally came up with something, she smiled,
"How about this, food is giant and you can eat your fill without really eating at all!"

You were perplexed for the next couple moments.

"... Why would I care about that?" you pointed out,
"Honestly, there's a great chance I could become food if I'm not careful enough."

"Yeah, but you have me!" the young giantess countered with a big smile,
"I mean, I'd never let anyone eat you!"

You looked into Bianca's green eyes, which carried a gentle sparkle in them, the same you've seen before: she wanted to protect you. This reminded of the kindness she had shown so far and made you calm down.

Still, you wanted to know just where was she headed with this conversation.

"Look, Bianca, I appreciate all you're doing for me," you repeated,
"But please, tell me, what are you up to? Why are you asking me these questions?"

The moment you spoke those words, Bianca lost her smile and let out a sigh.

"Look," she began, looking elsewhere, the serious expression from before back on her face,
"I don't know, even if I take you to Professor Juniper, if she's going to be able to grow you back to your original size. There's no telling that, understand?"

"What are you trying to say, Bianca?"

The giantess sighed.

"What I'm trying to say is, maybe the best way to solve this problem... is not solve it at all." she stated.

Your heart froze up.

"Whoa whoa whoa, hold on," you interrupted, jumping up, alerted,
"Bianca, just why are you telling me these things? I thought you wanted to help me!"

"Oh no no no, don't get me wrong, I do! But..." again, Bianca hesitated.

You encouraged her to continue.

Reluctantly, the giantess met your gaze, picking you up from the bed to better look at you,

"Listen, it's been so much time I had someone traveling with me that I forgot how good it felt," she explained, finally coming clean,
"As I said, Cheren is a gym leader now, and Hilbert is gone. You... are the first real companion I have had in a long time, and I, uh..."

"... You want me small..."

"Yes..."

"... So that you can..."

"Yes..."

"But, Bianca..."

The whole bed shook as the giantess suddenly got on her knees, hands together.

"Please, stay with me, at least for a while longer! You'll see I'm going to take ca-ahh!" she screamed as she lost her balance and fell off of the bed and to the floor, impacting with quite the thud, leading you to wonder how she had survived up to this point.

That wasn't important. Bianca was really asking you to choose to remain this size so she could carry you around as her 'traveling companion'.

You felt conflicted once more.

As nice as the giantess could be, you didn't want to remain tiny for much longer... and yet, something about her, maybe the way she plead you or the cute way she did it, made you want to make her happy. After all, she had said it herself: there was no telling if you were going to regain your size.

Decisions, decisions...

You sighed.

By the time Bianca got back up, you had an answer ready.
1251311131113.title: Bianca's request

1252.title: Gen 6 (Serena, Shauna)

12521.content:
You wake up, feeling quite dizzy. You recall walking in the forest, then there was this blinding light and you were knocked out... you grunt in pain as you take notice of an annoying headache.

Your left hand travels to your forehead, whole the other gently finds its way on the ground as you stand up. You glance around, and the first question that comes out of your mouth is:
"Where am I?"

All around you are green things you don't recall ever seeing before. They almost look like blades of grass, but that's impossible. Blades of grass couldn't be so tall, right?

A strong smell pervades your nose. And your heart leaps in your chest.

It's the smell of grass.

"Wh-Wha...?" you question as you peer upwards, your eyes meeting with the sight of something green... and totally gigantic.

Your blood seems to freeze in your veins. That's a leaf! And it's gigantic!

Wait... this can't be possible... so there's only one alternative...

"I'VE SHRUNK!" you cry out.

But the emotion for your discover is cut short as the ground beneath you quakes lightly, a booming sound following what seemed an earthquake.

Many other quakes follow the first one, other booming sounds can be heard. You actually hear the noise getting closer.

Closer and closes, until a huge shadow eclipses your body more than the grass itself does.

You look up, discovering a giant girl standing there before you. She has honey colored hair, light blue eyes and a slim figure; she wears a black, sleeves shirt, red skirt with knee-length black socks with matching black shoes, a pink pokeball painted on each side of them.

Looking up again, you notice the giantess wearing a pink fedora hat, and she's carrying a pink backpack.

Then, the sight of the giantess disappears, replaced by the black sole of her boot. You urgently notice that she's going to step on you!

You yelp as you leap out of the way, the boot landing right where you were standing not three seconds ago.

Unaware of you, the giantess keeps going, taking several other steps as she walks towards an unknown destination. You stand there for a few moments, watching her leave, silently thanking whatever higher that you aren't a red stain under her boot right now.

But then, you suddenly think about something: this giantess could be the only one person walking through this woods aside from you. If you can get her attention... maybe she'll help you!

Hastily deciding that you've got no chance of catching her attention while she walks, you choose to follow her until she stops, when there's a higher chance to get noticed and, most importantly, a lower chance to get smashed by her foot without her even knowing it.

So, you gather all your energy and dash behind the giantess before she disappears into the forest. Wherever she's going, it's a mystery to you. But you find that you really don't care, as long as you manage to get her attention and, hopefully, her help with this new, dire situation of yours.

--

You follow the honey haired giantess for what seems an eternity. By the time she stops, the sun is close to setting.

Apparently, the girl noticed.
"Uhm... it's getting dark," you hear her say to herself. You listen as the words you hoped for come out of her mouth.
"Perhaps I should set up camp." you mentally cheer as you notice the girl agreeing to herself, before taking off her bag, starting to dig into it, taking out the things needed for her to camp.

--

Sooner than you had anticipated, the girl had pitched a yellow tent, gathered wood and started a small fire as the sun completely disappears over the horizon, the sky getting dark as the red sphere takes its leave.

"Done!" the giantess giggles to no one in particular as she goes sitting down on a fallen log, closing her eyes to enjoy the warmth it carries. For a moment, you can't help admire her, the red shade of the fire giving her hair and face a fiery look. But you quickly shake your head, remembering your current situation.

This is your chance, you decide.

You sprint towards the girl again, stopping by her black boots.
"Uhm... excuse me?" you shyly try, not quite sure of how to get her attention.

Obviously, the giantess doesn't hear you, and keeps her eyes closed as she relax.

"Er... sorry?" you try, a little louder this time.

Again, the honey haired girl doesn't hear you. Even worse, she starts humming to herself, further covering the sound of your voice.

"Hey!" you cry out as loud as you can. Your call goes unheard.

That, and the several other ones that join it out of your mouth.
"Damn!" you exclaim, punching the black surface of her left boot out of frustration. Only to regret doing so the following instant.

In a moment, the girl stops humming and looks down at her feet. Feeling observed, you look back up, discovering the giantess staring down at you with a curious look.

For a moment, none of you talks. But then, you break the silence:
"Help!" you yell, hoping to get her attention.

You obviously did, you judge as you watch her blue eyes widening, and her face shifting into a...

12522321111312.content:
After the final kiss, Serena pulled back and looked at you. Not with a happy look, but one that sent a shiver down your spine. Your in this girls hand, a girl who has shown that she does not like you and wouldn't be bothered squishing you into a ball. And now she has been given the chance.

Thankfully she didn't see the opportunity she had, handing you back to the girlfriend as she rudely dropped you. Shauna had to act quickly to grab you as you landed safely in her hand. “You okay little guy?” She said as you nodded. She smiled at you with as she brought you back up. Seems like Shauna was happy that she got you back as she continued kissing you.

“I don't know how you could enjoy that. Its like kissing a Bug Pokemon” Serena said off to the side showing her anger about you being kissed by the girl she wants.

Shauna stopped kissing and smiled to her friend “You didn't like it huh, its all right. Theres still plenty of things he can do without kissing. I know how about a-”

“-I don't want him here at all!” Serena answered back a bit angry.

You want to stop this as soon as possible. You don't need enemies at this size so you need to speak up. Maybe clear things up “Actually Shauna” You say getting her attention. Giving off a fake yawn as you tried to seem tired “I could go to sleep. Ive been awake for quite a while. You two can have fun and ill sleep in the corner okay?”

Shauna looked at you. She wanted you to be a part of this, while at the same time she didn't want you to be tired “Are you sure, id like it if you stayed up with us”

“Im good, were Boyfriend and Girlfriend right? We can have time later. For now have fun with your friend” You say. Serena off to the side noticed this and was happy, as well as a little confused. Are you actually tired or are you just saying it because you don't want to be near Serena, or maybe your doing it out of kindness. Regardless she won't say no.

“Okay, i guess you raise a good point, but before you go to sleep” Shauna said as she then raised you up to her face again, giving you a massive passionate kiss. This one longer and obviously with more care. It was the type of kiss that would make Serena jealous.

Pulling you away she walked over to the door, placing you near their shoes on the carpet as you watch her join her friend, after giving you a nice “Good night”

By yourself you lay down, trying to get comfortable. Your not really sleepy to be honest, but you know that this is gonna get you points later. Since your not tired you turn and watch the girls as they continue. You don't know how their gonna continue but you imagine that Serena is thankful that your gone.

Thankful she was, although she defiantly wouldn't admit it to you. As soon as Shauna sat down she got to work, leaning forward and kissing your girlfriend on the lips. Serena was really leaning forward while Shauna was... leaning back?

“Shana whats wrong?” Serena said as she pulled away, noting her friend retreating.

“Its nothing, i just think it would be kind of weird if i didn't do this with my boyfriend around” Shauna admitted as you wanted to slap yourself. Its like she's trying to make Serena angry with you. “Maybe we can just talk now.”

“Talk, but Shauna i wanted to...” Serena said as she looked really down in the dumps. She was so depressed until you stepped in. Once again you get up, acting like your awake.

“Hey, Serena can i talk to you for a second!” You shout. Both girls looked at you, Serena not so nice as Shauna was. Shauna stayed as Serena crawled forward to you. Grabbing you by your sides and roughly lifting you up.

“What want to boast?” She said angrily.

“No its not because of that. Look believe it or not I'm not sleepy. I just don't want to be a part of this. But clearly Shauna wants me to”

“Yeah, thats obvious” Serena said with a bit of anger.

“Okay, but i think I've thought of a plan you can get her frisky.” You say to her as she looked skeptical “What you've got to do is __________”
12522321111312.title: Getting Out Of Serena's Way

1252232113.content:
“Yeah, and whats that” You say backing up in fear, whatever your ‘girlfriend’ has planned for you, you feel like won't be good for you. You see her hand reach into her pocket as she reaches for something.

“Come on” She said sticking her tongue out in a cute manner. She then smiled as she said “Yes found it” You watch as she brings out a small long piece of string. It didn't take a genius to figure out what she was planning. You turn and try to run away from her however she stopped you before you could gain any real distance. You feel her hand wrap around you as your then pulled to her foot. You hit it hard as she pins you to her foot with her finger,

Shauna giggled above you feeling your small body on her foot. “Ohhh This is going to be so much fun” She said above you “Just hold still, I'm going to tie you there”

You then feel her wrap the huge string on your back and pulling you even closer to her bad smelling foot. Once done she tied it to the front of her foot. Shauna leaned forward seeing you tied to her foot. She couldn't help but giggle, a sound which some may find cute but you find really annoying.

You then feel her move as she stands up. Getting up on one foot so your raised above the ground. However all you could see was her pale skin right on your face.

“Okay, I'm going to lower you gently. Yell if it starts hurting you” The giant brunette said as her voice betrayed her words. She sounded a lot more excited then concerned. You feel her lower her foot slowly and slightly. Until you hit the ground. Your then hit with the added pressure of her foot. Her shifting weight on top of you as you have to struggle. She told you to scream if there was to much pressure, however your mouth was completly covered by her sole. So even if you try to get her to stop, you couldn't.

Shauna was amazed, she loved feeling her shrunken boyfriend under her foot, and she's loving that she hasn't been asked to stop. Either it doesn't hurt that much or her boyfriend enjoys this. Shauna being okay with both of those options.

Finally deciding to move on to the second part of her plan she started to _______
1252232113.title: Shauna's Tied

choices: She's giving you a break for now.
12522321132.content:
Trapped under Shauna's massive sole, you were unable to make any kind of response to the pressure Shauna was putting on you. You wanted to shout up to her and say that her foot was putting an uncomfortable amount of pressure on you, but you couldn't. Every time you opened your mouth, you risked accepting some of the moist sweat that clung to her foot into your mouth. You were stuck without a means to communicate your suffering, although you weren't sure if your "girlfriend" would really care.

Up above, Shauna was besides herself in joy. "I got a little cutie for a boyfriend and he doesn't even care about me walking all over him!" She thought to herself gleefully. When she first set out on her journey she knew that she had wanted to make memories, but this was something she never expected to happen! Not only did she get a boyfriend, but she got one that no one else had ever had before. The knowledge that a little guy loved her enough to submit to her every whim made her giddy inside. That giddiness made her eager to have some fun at your expense.

Slowly, she began to rub her sole back and forth on top of your body. "Oh you're such a little cutie~" She began as her sweat rubbed off onto your tiny body, "A little bug so willing to submit to his girlfriend's feet and be absolutely dominated by them is so thoughtful! What's it like down there huh?" She cooed slowly moving you towards her toes. "It must be like a whole new world huh? My feet are suuuuper sore from all of my walking, not to mention sweaty." She giggled to herself, happy to be teasing her boyfriend a little bit. As long as he didn't protest she would be glad to keep going.

Meanwhile down below you were mortified by what you were hearing. Now Shauna was really getting into this whole controlling girlfriend thing. Rolling her sole on top of you like you were some kind of cleaning mat. And you were certain that you were slowly getting dragged towards her toes. Whatever was happening was not good for you.

"Oh my little boy toy, I'm so glad I found you. I've been looking for a little playmate~" She said as you felt yourself dragged further up her foot. "And since you haven't protested I'm sure you've been searching for something like this too. Ha, I like that about you." She coos as you start seeing light poking from the gaps near her toes. You were just about at her toes now, but is she done teasing yet or still rearing to go?
12522321132.title: Cute Teasing?

choices: "Well, gotta go now! See you soon!" Shauna said as she walked away
"Why don't we go hang out a bit?" Serena suggested before Shauna could leave
12522322.content:
"Shauna!"

Your capto- girlfriend turned around to see who called for her, opportunely sliding her hand - and you along with it - towards her shorts.

A smile appeared on her face.

Walking towards her, a honey-haired girl with blue eyes, black shirt, red skirt and knee-high black socks with black and pink shoes, a pink hat on her head, sunglasses resting on top of it. She was waving her hand in the air in a friendly gesture.

It was her friend Serena.

Shauna remembered on the very last second to slide her hand into her pocket. To Serena, it looked like a casual gesture.

Obviously, only Shauna could know the real purpose behind such action... her and you, who were suddenly plunged into a dark, tight space. Shauna's hand lingered inside the pocket, making the whole place even tighter.

"Hi Shauna!" the newcomer greeted her friend upon catching up with her.

"Hi there Serena~ long time no see~" Shauna chimed, her empty hand sliding out of her pocket as she hugged her honey-haired friend.

Serena hugged back.

It was true, the hadn't seen each other for quite a while now. Last time Shauna saw Serena was in Lumiose City, days, maybe even weeks ago.

Inside her pocket, you were suffering a tight hell of heat and darkness. You gulped, trying to use the least amount of oxygen to breathe.

Above you was a thin opening, not so much air could enter your entrapment. You feared that you were going to die asphyxiated if Shauna didn't let you out soon.

Your lungs burning for the desperate desire of air, you started squirming inside Shauna's pocket. But your new girlfriend didn't seem to be able to feel your squirming.

Or maybe she wasn't paying attention to you.

In desperation, you looked up at the opening of the pocket. If you only could crawl up to it, you'd have a chance to get out... Serena would see you, but was she any better than Shauna?

You heard the two giantesses speaking outside this hell, she seemed to be nice... maybe, if you managed to explain the situation to her, she would be able to pull you out of this situation and offer her help.

So, you tried to make your way up to the opening.

Outside, Shauna kept chatting merrily with Serena.

But she stopped in mid-sentence as she felt something moving inside her pocket... her new little boyfriend.

She frowned - what was he doing in there?

She didn't know, but she instinctively gazed down - she choked back a gasp.

A tiny head was starting to emerge from the pocket of her shorts.

"Shauna?" Serena called, concerned about the sudden change of expression on her friend's face.

"O-Oh?" Shauna asked, digging her left hand in her pocket again. She couldn't let Serena know about her tiny boyfriend, that'd be a bit weird to explain... especially because she didn't actually give the tiny human in her pocket a choice.

"Are you... are you alright?" Serena asked, concerned.

Shauna smiled.
"Oh, yes~" she replied, feeling the tiny guy in her pocket struggling.

Serena looked skeptical.

"... I-I just remembered that I have something to do later, that's all..." she came up with a decent excuse, causing Serena to stare at her for a few more moments before nodding, the smile returning upon her visage.

Shauna forced a smile.

Now, she only had to leave Serena. As much as she wanted to spend some time with the honey-haired girl, this wasn't the right moment.

She had someone more important to deal with right now...
12522322.title: Serena

choices: ... You were alone with Shauna. Serena had left
... Serena was still there, your new girlfriend was showing you to her
125223222.content:
Shauna opened her mouth and looked elsewhere, ready to say goodbye to her friend and leave her to head to the nearest Pokemon Center, where she would pluck you out from her pocket and enjoy some quality time with her new little boyfriend.

Sadly, before she could speak, come up with some excuse to dismiss Serena, the honey-haired girl preceded her,

"Let's hang out for a while!" she suggested, catching her friend completely off guard.

"Huh?"

"Yeah, let's hang out together for a bit, like we used to!" Serena repeated, grabbing Shaun's hands in hers,
"We can catch up, what do you say?"

Shauna looked up, feeling conflicted.

It was true, her and Serena, her best friend, didn't spend time together since they parted ways at Lumiose City.

Catching up sounded pretty good, actually, and Shauna was on the edge of saying 'yes', when she remembered she had a tiny person, her boyfriend, in her pocket.

In all of this, you were hearing muffled bits of the conversation and didn't know what you think just like your self-proclaimed girlfriend.

On one side, you would have more time to come up with something to reason with Shauna, convince her to help you. Perhaps, you could still date her when you were a lot bigger than this, because you had to admit she was pretty cute; on the other side, if Shauna hung out with Serena, it would mean more time inside of her tight pocket for you.

Still, it was not like you had any say in the matter.

As for Shauna, after thinking for a bit, she offered a smile. An opportunity like this wouldn't come back for a long time since she and Serena traveled separately, while she could have all the fun she wanted with you later, since there was no way she was letting you go.

"Okay, count me in!" she cheered, causing Serena to smile massively,
"Great! I think we are near Anistar City, we can head there! I could really use a new pair of sunglasses..." she said, taking off her sunglasses from the top of her pink hat to examine them.

"Oh, we can get a treat too! Let's go!" your captor chimed.

"Okay then. We gotta head..." Serena paused to look around, before remembering which way their destination was,
"... That way!"

Shauna giggled and hurried behind her friend.

After all, she told herself, she did need to get to Pokemon Center. She would deal with you later.

As for you, you were able to hear this too and became a bit worried. Judging from the way Shauna acted since she found you, you could easily tell that letting you go was not in the list of her wishes.

If only you could come up with something to convince her... though you were sure she'd still want to keep you as her 'shrunken boyfriend'.

Even though there was barely enough air for you to breathe inside of her pocket, you sighed.

There was no telling how your situation would evolve in the near future.

You could just hope for the best.

--

Anistar City was renown to be pretty when the sun set because of its sundial, though it was still an interesting place to visit during daytime.

First, the two friends went to check out the local boutique, then decided to simply have a walk around the town.

Shauna enjoyed herself as she and Serena casually talked, but the former's mind was still focused on her tiny passenger.

She briefly wondered how you were doing inside of her pocket, before deciding you were fine. She still could feel you moving in there, which was good.

So, deciding that overthinking might appear suspicious to Serena, she decided to just let her mind off of you for a moment. She would check on you later.

So, chatting about their past adventures, the two bought ice creams and went to sit on a bench in front of the sundial.

The moment Shauna sat down, the pressure inside of her pocket grew even more, putting you into an even tighter situation.

"It's really beautiful, isn't it?" the girl whose shorts you were hanging out in commented as stared at the pink crystal with the golden rings below shining under the warm sunlight.

"Yep. It really is." Serena agreed, licking on her ice cream,
"So, how's your journey going? Have you met any interesting pokemon?"

'Oh, I've met someone interesting alright.' Shauna thought, smiling at her friend,
"Oh, yeah. The other day I saw an Eevee, it was so cute! I mean, I do have a Sylveon, but I kind of miss when it was an Eevee."

Serena giggled.

"Feels like an eternity since all that crazy adventure with Lysandre and the ultimate weapon, huh?" she asked.

"Yup. Can't believe it's only been a few months." Shauna replied, recalling how the ultimate weapon and the plans of the Team Flare boss were stopped just in time.

While remembering such things, Shauna polished off her ice cream and stared at the cone somewhat nostalgically, before remembering that you were still in her pocket.

"Um... hey Serena," she said, getting up,
"Mind if I go to the Pokemon Center to heal my pokemon real quick?"

"Sure, but... don't you want me to come?" she asked.

Shauna smirked.

"I wouldn't want you to see them right now," she said, getting up with her bag on her shoulders,
"They're in a pretty rough shape after my last battle. Don't worry, I'll be quick." she reassured.

Serena smiled in response while her friend turned to head to the Pokemon Center.

--

After having left her pokemon to the nurse, Shauna went to sit down and, making sure no one was paying her attention, she slid a hand in her pocket to retrieve you.

"Hey..." she said, smiling, as she pulled you out.

"Finally!" you said, feeling like half of your body had fallen asleep.

"Look, I'm sorry. I wish we could spend some time together, but I can't right now..." the giantess apologized.

"That's not important." you replied,
"I need your help, I can't be this size!"

Shauna adopted a cute smile.

"D'aww, but you're so adorable like that!" she cooed,
"My own cute little boyfriend! Who wouldn't want that?"

"But-"

"Can't talk, I gotta head back to Serena." she said, giggling,
"See you later~"

And, giving you a quick peck, silencing your protest, Shauna lowered you back to her shorts' pocket.

"No wai-" you couldn't finish as dark and tight your world became once more.

With you safely tucked away, Shauna got up and went to get her pokemon back, before heading out and back to Serena.

--

What felt like hours faded away in your tight prison; you couldn't move at all and could barely breath. Even worse, you weren't able to reason with Shauna, meaning that, for the time being, you were stuck with being her tiny boyfriend.

It was hopeless.

Eventually though, your entrapment finally loosened and two fingers came in to pick you out once more.

You breathed in fresh air as you noted that...
125223222.title: Catching up

choices: You gave in. It couldn't be so bad, could it?
You insisted that you needed her help
1252232221.content:
Your gigantic new girlfriend stared down at you with a smirk on her face, her eyes half lidded and a strange gleam in them.

Whoever she was with before was now gone, and you were alone with the giantess, who was sitting on a bench.

"There you are," she spoke casually, but the excitement in her voice was palpable.

You chose to ignore her voice and remained silent. You had tried to get through this girl already and it didn't work.

She seemed determined to keep you as her boyfriend and wasn't willing to help you out.

But still, she was with someone, no? Maybe, if you could get the attention of her friend, she might be willing to help!... Too bad she wasn't there, right now.

"Hey, are you all there?" the giantess wondered, poking you with a finger.

You looked back at Shauna.

"Weren't you with someone?" you asked back,
"A girl... Serena, I think you called her."

"Um, yeah. She's left to take care of something, should come back soon. Me and her still have a lot of catching up to do," she said, before her smile grew wider,
"But so do we, little boyfriend."

Saying that, she brought you closer to her face and puckered her lips, giving you a soft, quick peck.

It felt rather nice, but despite that, you tried to fight back her lips. A pointless effort, since you were endlessly too small and her lips were endlessly too strong.

So, the only thing you could do was flail against the smooth pair until Shauna finally felt you squirming and pulled back with a wet smack of her lips.

She shot you a concerned expression.

"What's wrong?" she asked,
"Why are you moving around so much?"

You wiped your face, which was left damp because of her lips.

"Shauna," you said, feeling like you could talk now that you grabbed her attention,
"I don't want to be your boyfriend!"

The giantess adopted a surprised expression.

"Wha...?" she mouthed, her look becoming one of sadness that nearly broke your heart.

Okay, maybe you had to rephrase that.

"Okay, okay, I didn't mean that, sorry," you said, causing her expression to cheer up a bit.

"I knew it! You like me!" she exclaimed triumphantly while holding you to her cheek, beginning to rub you against it.

"... Lo-Look," you stuttered, blushing,
"You're going too far! You practically just met me!"

'Met' didn't seem like the right word though, 'kidnapped' was more fitting.

Shauna giggled.

"It's not a problem! It's gonna be great!" she said excitedly.

"But, Shauna!" you protested,
"I need your help growing big again! Don't you see, I can't be your boyfriend like this!"

This time, Shauna dropped her cheerful expression and looked at you with a more serious one as she pulled you away from her cheek and held you in both her palms.

"Look," she said,
"Just what is wrong with being my boyfriend?"

"I'm small!" you replied,
"Look at me, I-I... I need to get back to my size! What am I supposed to do, like this?"

Shauna smiled.

"Silly, there's me," she said,
"You can stay with me, no? I can take good care of you!"

"But I do need my size!" you replied.

In response, Shauna gave a cute giggle and waved an arm forward.

"But that size makes you really cute!" she countered, causing you to blush a bit.

You appreciated the compliment, but she didn't get your point.

"Look-" you began, but were interrupted,

"No, you look," she said, wearing a smile,
"You don't need your size to be my boyfriend. You should really see the bright side of this!"

"Is there any?" you sourly asked, curious to see what she was going to pull out to convince you.

Shauna giggled again.

"You can be my boyfriend," she repeated, continuing before you could protest,
"And in exchange I'll take care of, protect and feed you! Plus..." she trailed off, leaning in closer to place another kiss on your small body, this time in an even slower fashion.

She was savoring this one.

This time, you didn't fight back. You had a moment to think, even if it was a pretty awkward one.

Shauna did raise some good points: you needed protection and everything else she mentioned.

And... she was admittedly cute. If this situation was normal, you'd be the one asking her out.

Sadly, there was almost nothing normal in this, except the very fact she wanted a boyfriend. For the rest, you were a shrunken person and she a towering giantess.

Eventually, Shauna pulled back and began panting a bit.

"Okay, I've enjoyed this one." she giggled, winking at you,
"Didn't you?"

"Uh... I..." you paused, reluctant to admit that you were so deep in your own world that you didn't feel the kiss at all.

Luckily, Shauna mistook your embarrassment for shyness, which she found adorable.

"Hehe, I can tell you did," she said, gaining a bit of a blush too,
"So, what do you say now? Are you on on board?"

She figured she almost had you... and, truth be told, that was true: her logic was valid, her kiss nice and her offer definitely not the worst.

For all you knew, she could have wanted you as a pet.

Still, it was a hard choice.

Your previous life over... whatever this was?

You got up, trying to process what exactly just happened. You remember leaving your house to go to the local Pokemon center to check up on a friend's Pokemon while they were out of town before getting jumped by some random Team Skull grunt. You managed to get away and the grunt gave chase, you ran into some forest and turned your head to see a bright flash of light envelop both you and the grunt.

Now, you look around you only to see that everything has become MASSIVE to you, your own footprints were the size of a car! You start to turn towards to where the grunt was before said grunt plows into you, knocking you flat on your ass. The grunt grabs you by your shirt and shoves you the ground. "I dunno what kinda trick you're trying to pull, but it ain't gonna work punk!" The grunt then raises his fist above you, ready to give you an old fashion beatdown before two enormous barefeet land on either side of the two of you, startling the grunt so badly he fell off of you. Looking up at the person the feet belong to, you could see that it was a teenage girl, judging by the mounds on her chest. You could also see this girls whitish-blonde hair, which dangled down from her face while she was looking down at you with her large, piercing golden eyes. Those eyes.... they felt like they were burning a hole right through your very soul, it was almost like if you kept looking into them you'd get lost in them and never find a way out.

Looking over you saw the grunt trying to stumble away before the girls foot moved insanely fast and stepped on his lower body, pinning him to the ground and causing him to scream in pain. You started backing up before her hand swooped down and grabbed you. You were brought in front of those terrible eyes, that piercing stare was thousands of times worse when they were so close. "Just.... who are you?" The strange girl said, the terrifying glow from her eyes fading away, making it easier to look into them. "You look like a person, but you're too small." She said, poking you in the stomach. The grunt was crying in pain under her foot. You saw her eyes dart from you to the grunt as she shifted her weight to put more pressure on him, Your stomach churned at the sickening *pop* the grunts body made as the girl put all of her weight on the foot on top of him.

The girl shifted her gaze back onto you. "My name's Luna, by the way." You were to scared to say anything, this girl just killed someone and went right back to talking as if nothing had happened! You started looking around, hoping that there was some miraculous way off her hand, but no such luck. Seeing you panic, Luna attempts to comfort you.by petting your head with her finger. "There there little guy, I'm not gonna hurt you." Luna said with a caring look in her eyes. You were still trying to struggle out of her grip, which was starting to annoy her. "Hey, stop that." She said in a firm voice. You still kept trying to get out. Again, she told you to stop. You didn't stop. "CUT THAT SHIT OUT!!" She yelled, fed up with your constant movement. You finally stopped, not wanting to piss her off further. She composed herself and looked down at you, her annoyance still visible on her face. "Honestly! If I wanted to hurt you I would've just crushed you like that worthless Team Skull jerk!" She said, indicating towards the red stain on her foot. You look up at her, trying to figure out just what was going on behind those golden eyes. Then...

12531122.title: Sleeping moons.

125312.content:
As you quietly pushed your way through the foliage, you spotted someone sitting by the campfire. It was a girl with long blonde hair, dressed in all white with a matching hat. Her attire seemed rather formal for someone going out camping. Still she seemed nice enough as far as you could tell from watching her for the minute it took to reach the campsite. Hopefully she lived up to that expectation.

As you reached the tent, you pondered how to get her attention. It was getting darker so you didn't want to waste too much time nor surprise her in the dark and get crushed for your troubles. You finally moved near the fire and called up to the giant.
"HEY! DOWN HERE!" You called up thankfully eliciting a reaction from her as she looked around. "DOWN HERE!" You repeated as you jumped. Finally her eyes locked on you causing her to gasp. Lillie carefully scooped you up to inspect you.
"Are you... real?" She asked in disbelief. You simply nodded and waited to see her response.
125312.title: Lillie

choices: You try to find something to do
1253121.content:
She continued to stare at your minuscule form, unable to trust her senses that she was actually holding another human being in the palm of her hand. The stares started to unnerve you. She apparently took notice of your reaction as she slowly backed away. "O-oh. I'm sorry." She apologized in a nervous tone. "I didn't mean to scare you. If you want I could put you back down. I didn't think about how scary it must be when I grabbed you." Looks like luck was on your side, she was acting ever bit as sweet and kind as she appeared earlier. "N-no I'm fine here." You reply to her calming her down a little. "I just... well I-I can hardly believe this. I didn't realize this was possible. How did you get so small?" She asked as she did her best to keep her hand steady. You explain to her that you're not entirely sure what happened. About the bright light and waking up hours later. Lillie seemed very curious about the whole thing. "A bright light... maybe it was a Pokemon. Can't think of many other things that could fit the bill. Oh forgive me, I never introduced myself. My name's Lillie. What's yours?" You gave her your name causing her to smile suddenly. "That's a cute name." She noticed you blushing a little at her comment and smiled once more.

"Well anyway, you're free to stay with me for the night at least. Maybe we can figure out what to do in the morning." You simply nodded in response as she set you on her lap and rested by the fire. The two of you chatted for the next hour or so getting to know each other. Finally she rested her hand open next to you waiting for you to climb on. Once you were safe in her palm, Lillie stood up and put the fire out before retreating to her tent with you. "See you in the morning." She said as she climbed into her sleeping bag, placing you by her head. She fell asleep pretty fast, but you had some trouble due to the shock of recent events. Still at least things were working out pretty well all things considered.
1253121.title: She's nice and gentle

12531211.content:
Even though the shock of your new situation, you decide to get some sleep. And so you lie down, not far from Lillie's blonde hair.

You close your eyes, waiting to fall asleep. Which, as expected, isn't easy, since your mind is still thinking about the events of the day: first, you see this bright light and you faint, just to wake up here, shrunk; then, you meet Lillie, who immediately revealed to be awfully nice, even offering you to stay with her for the night.

Seriously, you still are unable the take in the whole thing, like it all was a lucid dream. But, unfortunately, it isn't.

You try to find a possible solution to your problem, but you have no idea.
'Better get some sleep now, I'll think about it tomorrow.' you think, before yawning.

Finally, you manage to relax a bit. You look to Lillie. Even though you just met her, you fell strangely... safe. Giving a small, tired smile. You yawn again.

And soon, you fall asleep, your breath turning into a quiet snoring, as you follow the blonde haired giantess in the land of dreams.
12531211.title: You finally fall asleep

choices: "... maybe I know someone who can."
"... maybe you can stay with me."
125312111.content:
Morning eventually comes, sunlight lightens the forest. You wake up because of the annoying sensation of light in your eyes.

Yawning, you rub your eyes before opening them. You look around, you notice you're no longer in your bed, and you're no longer in your bedroom.


Instead, you are sitting in a bouncy surface, everything in here is dark... Except for a small amount of sunlight filtering through a small hole.

You stare at it confused for a few minutes, before you remember about yesterday, about how you met Lillie. You remember she let you stay with her for the night, and you fell asleep in...

Remembering where you are, you realize you are still in the sleeping bag. Lillie must have woke up before you did.
And if it all isn't a dream, the blonde haired giantess should be outside.
'It's won't hurt to try.' you think, starting to walk towards the hole.

You squeeze yourself out and you see that you are in a colossal tent.

It takes you a while, but you manage to get out. And, as you hoped, Lillie is sitting there, eating an apple slice.

You clear your throat, getting her attention. Seeing you, she smiles warmly.
"Good morning sleepyhead." she says.
"Good morning." you reply, walking closer to her.

Lillie extends an arm to pick you and sets you on her lap.
"Hungry?" she asks. Before you can reply, your stomach growls.
Lillie giggles.
"I'll take that as a yes." she hands you an apple slice.

You eat silently and wait for her to finish her own breakfast before talking.
"So, what could have caused me this? We know it was a pokemon, but what kind of pokemon could have done this?" you ask.
"I really don't know little guy. Maybe a pokemon learned a new kind of move that can shrink things. And living beings." she wonders.

"...And? Do you know a way to change me back?".
Unfortunately, Lillie shakes her head.
"I'm sorry, I don't" she replies.

Your hopeful expression drops at this one sentence. Lillie notices and smiles warmly.
"Cheer up little guy. I may not know a way to help you, but maybe...
125312111.title: The next morning.

choices: You agree to stay with Lillie
You refuse, but Lillie gets offended by your decision.
1253121112.content:
Her suggestion caught you off guard.
"Stay with you?" You parroted back causing her to giggle cutely.
"Well, that is, if you don't mind staying with me. You clearly need someone to watch over you and I'd be more than willing to help you out."
She hands you another apple slice as she says this. You appreciated the kindness and generosity sje has shown you so far, but you weren't really expecting her to offer to watch over you full time. It was a pretty big decision. Then again, you more or less lived on your own right now and you weren't that familiar with your neighbors yet, so you weren't entirely sure if you would even be able to get help if you chose to stay. You were snapped out of your train of thought by the feeling of Lillie gently rubbing your head with a finger. Looking down, you notice you must have eaten most of the apple slice in your trance. Lillie blushed a little and giggled.
"Sorry, I couldn't help myself. You just looked so cute down there."
"That's okay." You reassured her. It actually felt pretty nice and comforting, granted it would be way too embarrassing to admit that so you simply resumed eating your apple and sure enough, her finger found its way to gently rubbing your head.
"So. How about it? Want to stick with me?"
1253121112.title: "... maybe you can stay with me."

"Well little guy? Want to stay with me?" the giantess inquires once again while caressing your head.

You look up at her.
"Lillie, I'd like to stick with you...." you state.
"So? What's your answer?" she asks with a growing smile.
"Well... yes. I want to stick with you..." you reply.

As you say this, Lillie picks you from her lap and closes your body in a hug. Though she's being careful to not crush you.
"I'm glad you decided to stay. Thank you!" she exclaims happily.

You smile.
"I'm the one who should be thanking you for everything you did for me." you reply.
"Don't even say that little one, I really did nothing. I'll take the best care of you, promise." she says, making your smile grow wider..

Lillie sets you on her lap and starts caressing your head again.
"It's decided then," she repeats with a smile.

You nod. Lillie continues.
"Well then, now that you are going to stay with me-"
"Thanks again." you cut her off.

She giggles.
"No problem. Now, as I was saying, I think I... we can...
12531211121.title: You agree to stay with Lillie

choices: "How about you take a warm bath?" Lillie asks.

125312111212.content:
"Very well then, since you are going to stay with me, I think now we can head back to my house," Lillie says, picking you from her lap and standing up.
"Wait, your house? Won't people freak out seeing you holding a tiny person?" you ask.

Lillie giggles.
"I don't think so." she replies".
"How can you say?".
She giggles again.
"Because, my dear little guy, there's no one aside from me!" Lillie says.
"What?".
"You heard me. Mom is never at home, she's always busy with work. Dad isn't at home as well... And my brother lives elsewhere. So it's just me and you." Lillie explains, smiling.

Finding nothing more to say, you let the giantess put you down on the log she was sitting on. She starts packing up her things.

Once she finishes, she picks you again. She puts you on top of her hat.
"Ready to go little guy?" she asks you.
"Yes." you simply reply.
"Good. We can arrive home before it gets dark. Hang on tightly." she warns you, before starting to walk off.

Hours pass, and Lillie keeps walking. She just stopped a few hours ago to help herself with another apple and you with another slice of apple. Your arms arms sore from holding to her hat for hours.

But finally, Lillie arrives to an enormous mansion. And not just from your point of view.
"There we go. Home sweet home." she says, entering the house.

Once there, she lets herself fall on a big couch. She removes her hat from her head, revealing her blonde hair.

She snatches you from the white hat and sets you on her lap.
"I'm sure it's been a pretty tiring day for you," she says.
You yawn.
"You bet."
Lillie giggles.
"Then, why don't you rest for a while? Hey, speaking of which, if you want to relax, how about you...
125312111212.title: "... go back to my house."

After getting lost in the woods and spending the whole day struggling to cling to her hat, you were in agreement that you were in need of a bath. "That would be great." You said as you lazily stretched out.
Lillie told you to stay put as she went into one of the other rooms. You weren't entirely sure what she was doing. Maybe she was cleaning herself off first. Or maybe she was preparing something for you to bathe in since you were a bit small to just use the tub. Whatever she was up to, you figured you could catch a quick nap while you waited.

You awakened to a large finger gently prodding your cheek. "Wake up, sleepyhead." Lillie said in her usual cute and cheerful tone. "You still. Wed to get cleaned off." Your eyes slowly opened as you sat up.
She placed her hand on the couch next to you, waiting for you to climb on. You decided not to keep her waiting and quickly hopped on. As she carried you into the next room you asked her, "Hey, Lillie? How exactly am I going to take a bath at this size?" She gestured for you to hold on a moment as she needed to open the door to the bathroom before finally replying. "Oh that's easy."

12531211121211.content:
"Oh, that's easy." Lillie says as she enters the bathroom.
She sets you down on the sink and starts filling it with warm water.

When the sink is almost full Lillie turns off the water. She then grabs a bar of soap and drops it in the water. Almost immediately, large soap bubbles spread in the water, making it smell like blueberries.
"There you go. Come on little guy, you can have your bath now." she says.

You blush deeply.
"Uh, Lillie, I... I need to...".
The blonde haired girl looks at you confused.
"What?" she asks, before realizing what you are trying to say.
"Right, you need to strip." she blushes a little.
"Well then, I'll leave you some time alone. I'm going to get some new clothes for you. I should have some doll clothes that should be just your size. If you need anything, just call out for me." Lillie says before exiting the bathroom and closing the door behind herself.

Sighing, you start removing your clothes. When you are standing fully naked, you slide into the sink.

Immediately, you find yourself surrounded by blueberry smelling bubbles. Slightly relaxed, you start washing yourself.

A good while passes. Suddenly, the door opens and Lillie comes in.
"Ready to come out little one?" she asks, grabbing a paper towel.
"Sure... But...".
"Don't worry, I won't look." Lillie empathizes the sentence by closing her eyes and extending her free hand in the sink.

You swim towards her hand and climb on it. Lillie retreats her hand and drops the towel on you, before starting to rub your body vigorously to get you dry.

When she finishes, she puts the towel (and you along) on the sink, before setting some doll clothes next to the towel. She closes her eyes again.
"I left some clothes for you little guy, get dressed." Lillie says.

You free yourself from the huge towel and spot the clothes next to you. You put them on, they fit perfectly.
"I'm done, Lillie." you call out to her.

The blonde haired giantess opens her eyes and giggles.
"Look at you, you look so cute right now." she says, while picking you up.

She carries you back to the living room and sits down on the couch, setting you on her lap.
"There you go, all nice and clean." she says cutely.
"Now then, there's a bit before dinner, so I think there's time to do something. What do you want to do little guy?" she asks you.

"Well... Maybe...

125312111212112.content:
"Maybe we can play a game or something?" You suggested as you straightened out your white doll shirt. This girl must really like the color white. You thought as you looked back at Lillie. She silently nodded and ran into one of the rooms. A few minutes later, she came back with some boxes containing some old board games, a video game console, and some random assortment of toys and dolls.
"Well you got a lot to choose from." She said as she took the contents out of each box to show you. "We got all these games here, oh and this video games controller is small enough that you should be able to reach all the buttons." She flashed all of them as she explained what she had. Then she held a doll. It was roughly your size and lacking its clothes. You figured that was where she found your current outfit.
"We could also... oh sorry nevermind." She quickly backtracked. You looked at her curiously.
"What was it?" You probe causing Lillie to blush in response. Just what was going on in that girl's mind?
"Well..." she hesitated, I figured... since you're so small.. we could try to play something based on that, like using you as a doll or pretend I'm a giant or goddess." Now your face turned bright red in embarrassment. "Like I said, forget I said anything. It was a stupid suggestion." Lillie said timidly.
You quietly nodded in response as you looked back at your options.
