"Actually..." you say awkwardly, your previous blush growing wider on your face.
"I think I wouldn't mind trying that game...".
"You mean the one where I'm a goddess? That one?" Lillie asks back, starting to blush as well. You quietly nod. You don't even know why you are doing this. Maybe because you want to let Lillie have her fun as a way to thank her for everything she's done for you. It maybe because, deep inside yourself, you know you would enjoy doing something like that...

"O-okay then..." Lillie scoops you in her hands.

You sigh, your face faking a look of terror.
"Y-yes goddess..." you whisper with a shaking voice, like someone who's just seen a Mimikyu without its disguise.

Giggling, Lillie starts to take off her shoes and high knee white socks. She then places her foot in front of you. It is twice, almost thrice your height.
"Get to work slave." Lillie commands again, blushing and giggling at the same time.

You walk near Lillie's bare foot. You expected it to smell not exactly good... but boy were you wrong. Her foot smells like blueberries. You inhale deeply, the scent pleasing your nose. Evidently, Lillie often takes good care of herself.

With an impatient 'ahem' from your goddess, you start rubbing the foot slowly, almost immediately getting a stifled laugh from her. You assume she's simply ticklish and you resume your work.

"Good job, little slave." Lillie says with a smile.
"Now for the other." she places her other foot in front of you. Knowing what to do, you start rubbing.

Lillie is in heaven right now. Her new little friend is doing such a good job in pleasing her, she's really enjoying this one game. Even though it is the first time she gets to 'command' a tiny 'servant', she's quickly getting more and more at ease with it. A small moan escapes her lips. Blushing, she covers her mouth and looks over the little guy. Luckily, he doesn't seem to have heard anything. Sighing, Lillie relaxes back, hoping to not get carried away.

Several minutes pass as you keep rubbing, before Lillie scoops you up and brings you to her face.
"Good job little guy. That was wonderful!" she beams. You smile as she speaks up again.
"Now, I was wondering, maybe you...
1253121112121123.title: Serving Goddess Lillie

12531211121212.content:
"Oh, that's easy," Lillie says giggling, a small blush spreading on her cheeks.
"Wha-What do you mean?" you ask.

In reply, Lillie sets you on the sink and walks towards a rather large bathtub and turns on the water.

Thinking that you are going to bathe in the bathtub, you call out to Lillie.
"What is it?" she asks.
"Isn't a bit dangerous for me to bathe in the tub?" you ask, a hint of worry in your voice.

Lillie giggles.
"Well, yes, it would be lethal for a person your size to bathe in a tub... alone..." she explains.
"Yeah, and why I'm- wait 'alone', what do you mean?" you ask again.
"Well, I have to constantly watch you, right? To make sure you don't get in any trouble, am I right?" Lillie asks.
You nod.
"Well, I was thinking, since I need a bath as well... Why don't we share one?" she asks.

Your face gets completely red.
"You want me to what?!".
"Hey, it's for your own good, trust me." Lillie says, turning off the water.
"But... I...".
"I'm going to get undressed, no peeking." Lillie giggles.

Your eyes instantly shut close. You patiently wait for Lillie to undress.
"You can look now." she says. You open your eyes. Lillie is already in the tub, the water doing a great job in covering her body but her head and hair.
"Come on little guy, your turn, undress." Lillie says.

Blushing even more, you start removing your clothes. You notice Lillie closing her eyes as you remove your boxers.
"Uhm, Lillie, a little help here..." you say.

The blonde haired giantess extends a arm to grab you from the sink. You are then moved into the tub. You expect Lillie to drop you in the water, but she doesn't. Instead, she dunks your whole body and grabs a soap bar.

Lillie starts rubbing your body against the bar, creating a bunch of bubbles in the tub. After rubbing your body for a while, she takes you out of the water, letting you breath.
"There! Don't you feel better?" she asks giggling.
You spit some water out.
"Except for the fact I was about to drown... yes. I feel much better now. Thank you." you say.

Lillie smiles and moves you closer, pulling you in a hug. She presses you into her chest, you can feel the warmth of both the water and her skin. Plus, you can heat her heartbeat from here.
"Isn't this nice little one?" Lillie asks.
"Yeah, pretty much." you close your eyes to enjoy the moment. The warm water, the soft skin and the soothing heartbeat, you almost feel like going to sleep right now.

After a good, relaxing while, Lillie takes you out of the water and moves you on the sink once again.
"Close your eyes little one." she says.

You do as commanded as Lillie stands up. She grabs a large towel and wraps it around her body. She then uses another one to dry hair.

You eyes are still closed, but you suddenly feel something soft wrapping around your own body.
"Lillie?!".
"Relax little one, I'm just covering you." she says, calming you down.

Wrapping you in the towel, Lillie picks you and walks out of the bathroom. You hear a door opening. Lillie must be searching for clothes.

"Okay little guy, try these on, they should fit you." you hear her say after a bit. Crawling out of the towel, you notice Lillie in her usual outfit. She's looking elsewhere, trying to avoid seeing you naked.

Looking down, you notice she got you some doll clothes. A white shirt and white pants, along with matching shoes, socks and boxers.
'Wow, she must really like white.' you think, trying the clothes on. And, true to her word, they fit you.
"You can look now Lillie." you say.

The blonde haired girl turns around.
"Aw, you look so cute with that outfit." she giggles, picking you.
"And now we're all nice and clean, I think we can...

Like the other rooms in the house, the kitchen is huge. Lillie puts opens a fridge in a corner of the kitchen.

Finally, she walks out of the kitchen, holding you in a hand and a plate with a sandwich in the other.

She sets it on a table in what you assume is the dining room. Then, she sits down and sets you on the table next to her. You look at the sandwich.

"Yes?".
"How exactly I'm going to eat a whole sandwich?" you ask.

Lillie giggles.
"In fact, you aren't. We'll share it." and with that, she stars cutting a small piece from the sandwich. At least, it's a small piece to her, while to you is as big as a bed.
"That should be enough. Eat up!" she says, starting to eat her own meal. You bite into yours.

Upon finishing her meal, Lillie walks back into the kitchen and returns with and apple and a black box.
She slices the apple and hands you a slice.

After eating the apple, Lillie picks the box.
"And now for the dessert..." she mutters, opening it.

You can't believe your own eyes. Lava cookies, macaroons, chocolate... Sweet things of all kinds. You look at Lillie.
"What are you waiting for? Dig in." she says with a warm smile.

After dinner, Lillie carries you on the couch and pulls out a book from under a pillow. She sits you on her lap and starts reading.

With your belly about to blow up, you decide to take a nap. So you close your eyes and soon drift off.

Lillie notices and smiles, starting to rub your head with a finger while she reads.

After about an hour, Lillie looks up to a large clock.
"Oh, will you look at the time. I think it's bedtime." her sentence is empathized by a yawn escaping her mouth.

You wake up at the feeling of yourself being moved. Your eyes open to.find Lillie carrying you.
"Lillie?" you call out to her.
"Oh, sorry, did I wake you up?" she asks.
You nod.
"What are you doing?" you then ask.
"Well, it's bedtime. I'm going to sleep."she replies.
You nod once again.

Then, a thought crosses your mind.
"Wait, Lillie, where am I going to sleep?".
She opens the door leading to her bedroom before replying.
"That's easy little guy." she replies.
125312111212121.title: "I think we can have dinner now." she s...

choices: You wake up before her, still in her arms
You wake up after, she's not in the bed
1253121112121211.content:
Rather than explaining what she had planned for your sleeping arrangements, Lillie gently deposited you on a massive.
"Is this your brothers?" You question not exactly expecting her to let you stay in her bed with her. Lillie just giggled and climbed in, careful not to accidentally crush you.
"Nah, its mine. I figure you'd be safer here with me." Lillie carefully got into place before moving the blankets up to cover you partially.
"Now try to get some sleep. I'm sure tomorrow will be an exciting day for the both of us." Before you could question what she meant by that, Lillie's eyes were shut and she was already drifting off to dreamland. The bed itself was really soft, almost like sitting on a cloud. You rested against the edge of her pillow and tried to drift off to sleep as well. Less than a minute later, you felt something wrapping around your body. Lillie was grabbing you in her sleep and proceeded to press you against her chest, hugging you like a stuffed animal in her sleep. After you got over the initial scare of this you smiled a little. Lillie's chest was about as soft as it was earlier and the thought of Lillie holding onto you like a teddy bear while she slept was an adorable mental image to think of. As she continued to hug you, you pressed your head against her, listening to her heartbeat. The rhythmic sounds helped you relax even further before you finally fell asleep, still in her arms.
1253121112121211.title: You're going to sleep with her in her bed.

choices: ... Slide out of Lillie's grip and go exploring the house.
Wait for Lillie to wake up.
12531211121212111.content:
Dawn comes. After many hours of heavy sleeping, the morning sun starts to light up the house.

You are still enclosed in Lillie's hug as she didn't let go of you all night long, miraculously managing to not crush you. You are still asleep with your head pressed into Lillie's chest. Her rhythmic heartbeat is doing a great job in keeping you asleep.

Still doing wonderful dreams, you continue sleeping for a few more minutes, before the sound of an early Pidgey chirping wakes you up.

You try to move your arms to rub your eyes, but you can't. Opening your eyes, you notice your arms are still blocked by Lillie, who has you still closed in her embrace. Smiling a little, you decide to relax back again. You still don't want to leave your comfy 'bed'.

You lay still, not wanting to wake Lillie up; she must be doing good dreams judging by the smile on her face. You close your eyes and once again you relax by listening to the soothing heartbeat.

You stand there for a while. But then it starts to grow boring. You're awake and you can't do anything due you being 'trapped'.

If you slide out of Lillie's grip, maybe you could climb down the bed and go exploring the house; after all, the young giantess didn't show you the whole house, and you are a bit curious about the other rooms.

But, then again, you don't mind staying like this. It's warm, soft and quiet. No wonder of why Lillie is still asleep. Maybe you can wait for her to wake up and then ask her to show you the rest of the house. It would be much easier that way since this house is literally huge. And you're around one inche tall, meaning it'll take you days to explore the whole house.

In the end, you decide ...
12531211121212111.title: You wake up before her, still in her arms

choices: "I'd like to see the rest of the house." you say.
"Hanging out is fine by me..." you state.
12531211121212112.content:
You are still heavily asleep, still in the land of dreams. You keep snoring, not aware that you aren't in Lillie's embrace anymore; in fact, the young giantess woke up way before you and, careful to not wake you up, she slid out of the bed and left the room. You remained asleep through all that.

You continue to sleep undisturbed for a couple of hours before waking up. Yawning, your hands find their way to your eyes and you start rubbing them.

Upon opening your eyes, the first thing you notice is you that Lillie is missing; you were - at least until now - laying on her soft, massive bed, the sheets pulled up to your neck and your head gently placed on the huge landscape of the pillow.

With a bit of an effort, you manage to remove the sheets from your body and get up. You walk over the edge of the bed and you carefully start climbing down, using the blankets as a support.

Finally, you manage to get on the floor and head to the door; you easily manage to slide under it and look around; you're currently standing in a massive hallway. There are many doors, so Lillie could actually be everywhere!

Suddenly a strong, sweet smell hits your nose. You sniff deeply, and the smell makes your mouth to water. Wherever Lillie is, you can think about it later. Your stomach growls loudly, asking for its daily meal.

Enchanted, you follow the sweet smell, your belly growling once in a while.

It takes you several minutes, but you finally manage to find the source of the smell.

Lillie is standing there; she's fully dressed, and she's holding a package in her hands. She sets it on a near table before heading your direction.

She didn't seem to have noticed you though. She must be going to 'wake you up'.

Just when the young titaness' shoe lands mere inches from you and you let out a startled screech, she looks down and spots you. A cheerful smile lots her face.
"There you are." she says, bending to scoop you up.
"Good morning sleepyhead. I was just about to come.and wake you up. Guess you beat me." she giggles, making you smile a little.

Your stomach growls again.
"Someone's hungry? I got something special for you little one." the green eyed girl says, bringing you over the table. She sets you next to the package. The smell is incredibly strong here, whatever it is, it's within this box.

Giggling at your impatient behavior, Lillie unwraps the package, revealing two weird looking things.

"They're malasadas." Lillie explains upon seeing the curious look on your face.
"And they're delicious. I got them from a store nearby, they make wonderful ones. Dig in!" she exclaims happily, eating her own meal.

Curiously, you bite into the treat. Lillie is right: it tastes like nothing you've ever tasted before it's delicious. So you dig in.

You feel like you're going to throw up. Sure, the malasada was delicious, but it was enough to threaten to make your belly to blow up. Lillie gently pats your belly with a finger.
"I think someone is full." she says with a smile.
"And now you're filled up, what about doing something together?" she asks.
"Like what?".
"Well, maybe I could show you the rest of my house. Or maybe we could hang out, I could show you around a bit. So, what do you say? What do you want to do?" the blonde haired giantess asks again.
12531211121212112.title: You wake up after, she's not in the bed

choices: A friend (ex. Moon, Hau, Hapu, etc)
125312111212122.content:
Before she could suggest anything, there was a knock on the door. Lillie started to panic as her head desperately looked around the room for a place to put you. But then again, she had no idea who it was or how long they would be staying. She couldn't risk you being found by the wrong people. Hell she wasn't sure how much she trusted her own friends with such a fragile life. She needed to be absolutely certain of your safety. But what to do now? The door knocked again, louder this time. "Coming she shouted as she quickly stuffed you under her hat. It was pitch black and her hair was still a little damp from the bath. Still you did your best not to make a peep until she let you out.

As Lillie reached the door, she opened it to find.
125312111212122.title: Before she can speak, the doorbell rings. A fri...

1253121112121221.content:
Trapped inside Lillie's hat, you swear you can feel her nervousness as she pulls the door.

Standing just outside the mansion is the slim figure of a girl with grey eyes and black hair. The girl wears a red hat with the white symbol of a pokeball on its front, a white shirt with a floral pattern and short sleeves. She wears green shorts and red shoes with yellow shoelaces. In the end, she wears a Z-Ring around her right wrist.

"Hi Lillie!" the girl exclaims cheerfully. Lillie takes a step back, before a smile spreads wide on her face. From within her hat, you hear her pronounce an unfamiliar name:
"Moon!"

Then, a sudden movement makes you leap beneath the hat. Lillie and whoever this ‘Moon’ is just hugged.
"Long time no see, huh?" the newcomer chimes. Although it's just a muffled voice to you, you can hear her distinctly. Just like you can hear Lillie saying:
"Of course! I missed you!" giggling follow Lillie's statement.
"But, why are you still outside? Come in!" the girl whose hat you are trapped in says.

Soon enough, you hear a door closing and Lillie moving.

Lillie and Moon go sit down on the large couch. Moon takes her hat off, placing it on her lap.
"I haven't seen you since you sailed to Kanto!" she says
"How's Lusamine?"

Lillie places a hand over her mouth.
"Oh, my mother is fine. That guy, Bill, managed to remove Nihilego's toxins from her mind. However, he said that my mother needs a lot of rest, so she couldn't immediately go back to Aether Foundation." Lillie explains.
"I see." Moon replies.
"Yep. Gladion is now the Aether President."

"Well, better than nothing, I guess. I mean... if it wasn't for Nebby..." Moon shudders.
"If it wasn't for Nebby and you, Moon. You defeated my mother in the Ultra Space, you made her regain her reason. For that, my whole family will be eternally grateful." Lillie says, shedding a few tears.
"Don't even say that!" Moon says cheerfully.

Back in Lillie's hat, you are going nuts!

You knew about the Aether Foundation, it's a foundation that helps hurt pokemon... hurt in anyway, physically, mentally or emotionally.

However, you can't really get the rest.

Nebby? Ultra Space? Nihilego? Toxins? What are the two girls talking about?

Your attention is drawn as Lillie, momentarily forgetting about the little person in her hat, asks:
"So, Moon, are you staying over? I'd really appreciate that... it's been so long since we last met each other..." she says. You notice the hint of hope in her voice.

A few seconds separate Lillie's question from Moon's reply...
1253121112121221.title: Lillie and Moon

choices: Lillie brings you with her, wanting to show you to Moon
12531211121212211.content:
"Sure! I'll gladly stay over!" Moon accepts Lillie's offer in a cheerful manner.
"It's been so much since we last met that we should really catch up!" the statement makes Lillie smile.

"You're right. We should really-" Lillie suddenly remembers about you, who are still trapped beneath her hat. She can't keep you in there for the whole time Moon is going to stay.

You would die suffocated...


"Lillie? Everything's alright?" Moon asks. Her friend stopped in mid sentence and assumed a worried expression.
"Huh?" Lillie asks, focusing back on Moon.
"You were kinda... off..." the black eyed girl points out.

Lillie quickly makes up an excuse:
"Oh... It's nothing... I just remembered that I need to check something..." she says, getting up from the couch.
"Mind if...?"

Moon smiles.
"Oh, not at all! Do you need any help?" she asks back. Lillie smiles, but shakes her head.
"No, thank you. It'll be brief." she says, starting to casually walk upstairs.

--

Back at you, you're starting to feel dazed from the lack of oxygen.

However, the experience is short lived as the giant hat is removed from upon you, letting you breath again.
"I'm not sure of what you got," Lillie's voice booms from beneath you as she offers you her hand.

You climb on it as she lowers it back to her face.
"But my friend Moon is here, and she'll be staying for a while..." she explains.
"I got that," you reply as you glance around to take a good look at your surroundings.

The big, white bed suggests that you're in a bedroom. The room is quite large, well furnished with a large bookshelf full of books, a coffee table, a desk and an armchair. A small breeze blows inside from a window with white curtains.

Lillie casually sits on the bed, gently placing you on her lap while throwing her hat on the armchair.
"Now, I really need you to stay here for a bit while I'm with Moon," she says.

You mentally huff. Alone and shrunken in a room. Being shrunken means that you can do pretty much nothing. This is going to be boring...

You feel Lillie gently stroking your head with a finger.
"It won't be so bad. I'll check on you whenever I can, promise." she says.

Not wanting to sound ungrateful for all the help she's given you so far, you smile up at her.
"Don't worry! I'll be fine in here!" you cheerfully say, hiding your annoyance.

The giantess smiles.
"If that's so," she says, gently removing you from her lap, placing you down on the bed.
"I'll be back soon." she says, flashing you with a warm, grateful smile.

Then, the giantess takes her leave, closing the door behind her. Only then you dare to huff, laying down on your back, arms and legs spread wide on the bed.

With absolutely nothing to do in such shrunken state, you close your eyes, deciding to catch a quick nap. At least, until Lillie is back...

--

You wake up at the sound of a door opening. Remembering what happened before you got asleep, you glance at said door, discovering Lillie standing there, a smile painted on her face.

"Oh..." you says, before yawning.
"Hi Lillie."

"Is everything fine?" she asks as she walks closer to the bed you're laying on.
"Yes. Just took a nap..." you drowsily reply.
"Oh, sorry. Did I wake you up?" she asks

"Kinda," you reply.
"But, what are you doing here?"

Lillie giggles.
"Checking on you. I did promise, no?" she says. You smile.

"Well, now I really shouldn't keep Moon waiting, so...
12531211121212211.title: Full Moon night

choices: You woke up overnight, finding Lillie awake as well
You woke up, discovering that Moon was in the room, staring at you...
125312111212122111.content:
Lillie trailed off in mid sentence, clearly reluctant to just leave you be in her room. You were a guest, after all, and this wasn't how guests were treated.

However, the fact she was biting her lip while staring at you with a hesitant stare made you understand that she was waiting for you to say something.

"Hey, it's alright. Just go to Moon, I'll wait for you here. I'm not going anywhere, see?" you reassured.

Lily sighed.

"I'll be back." she promised, lowering herself to the bed and moving a finger to you, who fought back the urge to cower and let her gently rub your head with her index finger before she stood back up and smiled at you.

You smiled right back and watched as she turned around and walked to the door, giving you one last glance before ultimately walking out, leaving you to yourself once more.

As the door closed, you let out a low sigh, once more alone and bored.

Dejectedly, you sat on Lillie's bed with your hands on your cheeks, patiently waiting for her to return.

--

"What took you so long?" Moon asked once she saw her friend walking back from her room.

Lillie blushed vaguely.

"O-Oh, nothing. I was just checking that... thing I told you about earlier."

Moon adopted an amused expression, now curious to know what her friend had gone to check twice already.

"What is it?" she asked, before gaining a smile,
"Are you housing a pokemon? What is it, a Clefairy?"

Lillie's cheeks flared up.

"Why would I be housing a Clefairy!? You know I only had Nebby..." she justified,
"And... it's nothing to worry about. Don't think about it too much."

"Are you reeeeally sure?"

"Yes!"

Moon giggled and gave a shrug, loving her friend's reaction. Lillie bit her lip; a part of her wished to tell the other girl about her tiny catch, but it would be awfully hard to explain. Plus... she really had no idea how Moon would react. What if she became overexcited about her guest and refused to leave him alone afterwards? Lillie couldn't have that.

As for Moon, she smirked, now sure Lillie was hiding something.

And she was definitely curious enough to want to find out what it was.

--

In the meantime, you passed your hours in a sad, silent solitude.

You just sat on Lillie's bed without saying a word and with your legs that were beginning to fall asleep.

At some point, you got up and started walking up and down on the bed, expecting the door to open soon and Lillie to enter from it to check on, giving you a minute-short break from this silence before returning to Moon, with whom she was surely having lots of interesting talking that you were however missing.

You felt like a kid grounded by their parents and confined to their room, with the difference that everything looked gigantic to you.

Minutes in isolation passed and eventually became hours, but Lillie didn't come back.
And, at some point, you began feeling sleepy.

After having been wandering in the woods all day, after a warm bath and after having consumed your energies just walking back and forth on a bed, you were ready to hit the hay.

But, the moment you laid down, the door opened.

Hearing it opening, you shot it a glance and sat back up: Lillie entered, yawned and shut the door again before shooting you a drowsy smile.

--

"Good night, Moon." Lillie said to her friend once both agreed to go to sleep, Lillie wanting to check on you and Moon having admitted she was beat after the trip to the former's house.

However, when her friend turned around, Lillie failed to notice the grin she was carrying.

The owner of the house just opened her door and retreated inside, yawning, before closing the door and giving the bed a drowsy smile.

Like she was expecting, she saw you still sitting on her bed.

"Hey..." she said cheerfully, clearly happy from her talk with Moon and even happier she could finally spend some time with her little new friend.

"Hey..." you addressed her right back, before sighing,
"Are you going to leave again?"

Lillie closed her eyes and smiled in an awfully cute way.

"Nope!" she said, before walking over the bed you were on, bending until her giant green eyes were right in front of you. It pained her knees a bit to stand in this position, but she didn't mind,
"I'm staying now. Moon's gone off to sleep... and so will we, if you don't mind. I'm a bit sleepy myself. If you don't mind."

You smiled.

"That sounds great. I'm really tired too." you mentioned.

Lillie too regained her smile and stood back up.

"Great." she said, before getting back up and walking over to a closet, opening it and digging herself inside for a moment, retrieving a white nightshirt with pale blue laces at the bottom.

The blonde giantess turned her head to you to give a a flustered expression with a blush adorning her face.

"Um... could you...?"

Your own cheeks flared up as you have a hasty nod and turned around. From behind you, the sounds Lillie made while undressing made you tempted to take a peek, but you decided against it.

Still, she was very cute, despite how gigantic and frightening she was to you...

You fought the urge and tried to control yourself. This girl was taking care of you, peeking at her wasn't the way to repay her.

"Hey..." her voice came, interrupting your thoughts. You didn't move, but there was no need to: Lillie moved to the bed herself and entered your eyesight, now wearing her nightshirt.

She was wearing an indecipherable expression.

"I want to apologize to you." she said while gently grabbing you in her hand. Her statement perked your interest,
"For what?" you asked.

"I would have liked to spend some more time with you, get to know you better. I mean, with you living in my house and all, at least for the time being..." she mumbled.

"That's okay." you replied, admiring the giantess' kindness. There were very few people like here, you mused, willing to help out anyone, even shrunken lost people like yourself,
"We can do that tomorrow. I'm not mad."

Once more, a smile appeared on Lillie's pale visage.

"Thanks." she said, before yawning,
"Now, how about we go to sleep?"

Without waiting for an answer, the giantess laid down and slid under the blanket, still holding you.

You figured she would place you on her pillow or something, so it was quite a surprise when she pushed you to her chest instead and enclosed you in a full embrace.

"Lillie!" you exclaimed while she giggled, though blushing. One thing was sleeping next to her in a sleeping bag, but this was excessive! You met her just yesterday!

"Sorry," she quickly apologized,
"But it's for your own sake. If I roll around in my sleep, I'd crush you."

From red, your face became milky white.

"Do you mind sleeping like this?" Lillie asked, flustered - this was the first time she slept in bed with a boy. Shrunken or not, you were still a person, she mused.

"No..." you admitted, not lying. Her body shared heat with yours and both her skin and her nightwear felt really smooth, making a comfy bed for you.

"Oh, nice. Good night then, I'll see you in the morning." she said, before laying her head on her pillow with a satisfied smile.

Backed into an embarrassed state, you hastily laid against her chest and closed your eyes, praying for sleep to take you away from this situation.

Your wish was granted minutes ago: you fell asleep.
125312111212122111.title: Shared bed

125312111212122112.content:
You started to fall back to sleep. But just as you closed your eyes, you felt the bed shift from under you. Your eyes snap open to see Lillie smiling down at you, her hands underneath you, scooping you off the bed.

"Lillie, what are you doing?"

"I'm taking you to meet Moon in person. She said she really wants to meet you."

"I thought you were trying to keep me secret. What happened?" Lillie blushes in shame.

"I-I dunno. We were talking, one thing led to another, and you just... came up somehow. Now she's refusing to leave until I show you to her." Well, so much for having a quiet night. Lillie carries you out into the living room, where you see Moon sitting on the couch. "Here he is Moon." Moon looks at you with...
125312111212122112.title: Lillie brings you with her.

choices: are you like Lillie's tiny boyfriend or something?
1253121112121221121.content:
Moons eyes go wide as Lillie holds you in front of her.

"Wow Lillie, he's so tiny. He's really a real person?" Lillie nods. "Can I hold him?" Both giantesses bring their eyes to you for that

"Sure, you can hold me." Moon lets out a squee as she raises her cupped hands up to Lillie's. You carefully cross over so she can pull her hands away.

"Soo cool." Moon says, giving the underside of your chin a scritch. Lillie meanwhile was giggling at her friend's display and took a seat on the couch next to her. "Oh, right. My name's Moon." She extends a finger out to you.

"(Your name)."

"Soo (your name), ..."
1253121112121221121.title: wondered curiosity

choices: Lillie snatches you from her hands and gives you a kiss herself
12531211121212211211.content:
Both you and Lillie turn bright red at this accusation. "N-no no, it's not like that at all really. We're just friends, she's giving me a place to stay while we find out a way to turn my normal again."

Lillie nods her head furiously at your statement. "That's right, we're just friends, that's it." Meanwhile, Moon's face had gone from curious to devilish.

"Oooh really? Well then Lillie, if this cute little guy isn't your boyfriend, then I guess you don't mind if I make him mine?"

"W-what are you talking about Moon? Why would you want him as a boyfriend?"

"Because he's cute, helpless, and apparently available." She turns back to you. "Now come here little guy, and give me a kiss." She then puckers her lips and leans in slow.

What happens next?
12531211121212211211.title: are you like Lillie's tiny boyfriend or som...

choices: "I'm going to bed. You two lovebirds have fun."
"Mind if I get in on this?"
125312111212122112112.content:
As Moon's face drew nearer, all you could do was wait for what was about to happen. She was going to kiss you, and from the sound of it, you were about to be her boyfriend. You close your eyes in preparation, only to feel yourself be roughly grabbed out of Moon's hands.

"No, I won't let you." You open your eyes to see you're back in Lillie's possession. Before you could thank her however, she quickly dove in and gave you a big kiss. Her lips covered your whole upper body. They felt... so warm, so soft. She pulls away and you can see that she's blushing even harder than before. "Oh my. Th-that was my first kiss with a boy."

You can feel your face redden. "Funny, that was my first kiss with a girl before." The two of you sit in awkward silence before Moon piped up.

"I knew it. I knew he was your boyfriend even if you didn't want to admit it. Well then, congratulations to both of you. Now that we got that outdoor of the way, it's time we changed things up."

What does she say next?
125312111212122112112.title: Lillie's first kiss

1253121112121221121122.content:
"I want a piece of this action too." Before either you or Lillie could question what she meant by that, she had scooted over next to Lillie and swung her leg aound so she's now sitting on her lap.

"M-moon, what are you doimmmph." She gets cut off by Moon pushing herself into a passionate kiss with her. In Lillie's stunned state, she lowered the hand you were on down onto the couch, letting you jump off. You watch in awe as the two giant girls engage in a makeout session right in front of you. Or rather, Moon forces a makeout session while Lillie is dragged along for the ride. You swear you could see Moon slip her tongue into Lillie's mouth.

Minutes pass and these two are still going at it. Finally, Moon breaks off, leaving their mouths connected by a strand of saliva. They both sit there, gasping for air, before Lillie asks the question that was on both of your minds. "What was that about Moon?"

Moon puts her hand under Lillie's chin. "I'll be honest with you Lil, I always thought you were cute. So when I saw that you had a boyfriend of your own, I knew that this would be my only chance left to be with you. So whadya say, wanna make this a three-way relationship?" Both Lillie and you felt uncertain, you two didn't even have a relationship until minutes ago, and even that was thrust upon you, to so suddenly add a third could be awkward.

"I-I would be fine with it if he is." She looks back down to you. Moon leans down to you and looks you in the eyes.

"Well little guy, what to you say to having two giant girlfriends?"
1253121112121221121122.title: "Mind if I get in on this?"

choices: "It's time for bed, I've got big plans for tomorrow."
12531211121212211211221.content:
"I wouldn't mind having you as a girlfriend with Lillie." You say as Moon grabs you and lifts you between her and Lillie.

"Of course you wouldn't. What sane man would say no to having two cute girls like us as his girlfriends at the same time? Now come here, I wanna pick up where I left off." She lifts you up into a kiss like she was earlier. Unlike Lillie, her lips felt cold and sticky. She must have lip gloss on. When she breaks the kiss, you find your still feeling sticky from the waist up. She laughs as you try in vain to clean yourself.

She gives Lillie a quick look before getting a grin on her face. She flipped you over onto your front before giving you another kiss on your back. This time, however, she applied suction, so when she lifted her head, she brought you with her. She leans back in to Lillie and gives her another kiss on the lips, sandwiching you between them.

The feeling of both of their lips at once was sensational. Lillie's warmth and Moon's coldness together was soothing. Moon takes it further and starts to prod your back with her tongue. Not wanting to be outdone, Lillie does the same to your front. Now you find yourself being licked over by both of them.

When it was over, Moon broke off, leaving you stuck to Lillie. She brings her hand up to her face and let's you jump off. "So, what'd you two think?" Moon asks.

"It felt... nice." Lillie says first.

"Yeah... nice."

"Glad you think so, because..."
12531211121212211211221.title: "Sure, I'm game."

choices: You wake up before the girls
125312111212122112112212.content:
"Come on. Let's hit the hay. I've got some big plans for tomorrow and we'll want to be well rested for what I have in mind." Moon takes Lillie by the hand that you aren't standing on and pulls her up off the couch before leading her (and by extension you) back to Lillie's bedroom. She takes you from Lillie's hand and sets you down on the bed. "No peeking." Is all she says before covering you with the blanket.

As much as you would like to fight your way out and watch your two new giant girlfriends get undressed, you decide against it simply due tp the fact that they could crush you if they wanted to. You sit there in complete darkness while you can only hear the sounds of the two changing. At one point, you hear a sharp smack, followed by a yelp of suprise from Lillie. You're really considering throwing caution to the wind and looking.

You finally feel the blanket get lifted off you. You look up and see that Lillie has changed into a white nightshirt, while Moon decided to stick with just her underwear, a set of blue-green bra and panties. The two girls climb into the bed with you before turning out the lights. You feel a hand grab you and bring you higher up, where you proceed to be sandwiched between the two of them.

"Good night you two." You hear Moon say before she quickly nods off, with Lillie following soon. With the warmth of the two girls and their heatbeats in almost synchronized rhythm, you fall asleep too.

What happens next?
125312111212122112112212.title: "It's time for bed, I've got big pl...

choices: "How about one of you gets on the other shoulders and i climb both?"
12531211121212211212.content:
“So.... You wanna play a game” Moon said as you didn't really that much, you just met her and you don't know how she's like. Granted she's a friend of Lillie so you highly doubt that she's a bad guy. But still you can be mischievous and not be bad.

You were about to say no when Lillie interjected “Of course!” You look back at her, she was wearing a big smile on her face, until she saw you and looked guilty “I mean the choice is yours, if you don't want to you don't have to”

“Come on (Your Name)” Moon said as well “It will be so fun! Lillie and Me play games all the time, but with you here it will be so much more funner”

Your kind of being back into a corner right now, you could say no but realistically you cant. Unless you want to be super rude right now

“Okay, i guess we can play” You say as Lillie smiles, ready to hug you close. But before you get hugged, Lillie sees Moon hug you close. Right next to her cheek. Smiling to herself as you look away, an awkward smile on your face. That sight made Lillie feel slightly jealous.

“Your playing, thats great!” Moon said as she put you in front of her face “Okay so i was thinking the first game we should play and hear me out on this... Climbing Mount Moon?”

“Like the place in Kanto. Clever” You say to her as she smiles “You went there when you went to Kanto?”

“Yeah, it was beautiful all be it a little weird. You should of seen the Clefairys there, they did some weird stuff”

“Yeah, if i remember correctly they have a move called Metronome, lets them do some weird stuff”

“Yeah, hey want to hear a story” Moon said “Well in the cave i found a Zubat chasing some trainer and-”

“Well i think she should climb Mount Lillie!” Lillie interrupted as both of you looked at her, she wasn't smiling.

“Ive had him longer so he would be much safer if he was climbing me rather then you Moon” Lillie said, both you and Moon unaware of the Jealousy she felt underneath.

“Well, I'm not gonna lie i would” You say as Moon was the one that wasn't smiling.

“What! But i came up with the game! I even came up with the clever title. He should climb me first” Moon argued back as Lillie disagreed

“I can come up with a clever title!”

“Yeah, go for it”

“Um... Lillie.... Um Lillie...” Lillie says extremely struggling to come up with something.

“Anyway” You say deciding to save her “both of you two raise good points but since I'm the one thats gonna be risking themselves, shouldn't i be the one to pick who goes first”

“I'm okay with that” Moon agreed

“Yeah, we will let him pick” Lillie added

Looking at both girls, you think about who you should climb first.

You decided and said _______
12531211121212211212.title: Lillie And Moon. Rivals?

choices: Moon gets impatient with your hesitation
125312111212122112122.content:
“I hope you don't mind Lillie, but i do think it would be fairer if i climbed Moon first. I mean its only fair” You say to Lillie, Lillie had a look on her face like she just got betrayed. “Don't worry Lillie, you can be after her. But its only fair. You understand right?”

“yeah i understand” Lillie said pouting because she didn't get her way

Moon didnt waste anytime, as soon as she heard that she grabbed you hard. Placing you down onto the ground and standing to her full height. It happened so fast, you almost needed to compose yourself to understand what happened.

“This is gonna be so great!. Ok time starts right now! Go go go!”

“Geez, your really excited for this, aren't you” You say to her.

“No talk, only climb!” She cheered.

“Yeah yeah” Your reply as you got to work, walking up to her bare feet, you look up at her long legs. You don't even know how your gonna climb them, they looked so smooth and so.... unclimbable. Regardless that didn't stop you as you jumped onto her feet, moving across her giant foot as you arrive at the pillar which was her leg. Moon could feel you and had to hold in her giggles, in an attempt to not throw you off. Looking up you try to figure out how to do it.
 Just trying it you try to ascend her leg, trying to get your best grip and rock climbing all the way up. You think your a pretty good climber but this was borderline impossible. Moon saw this too and decided to help you out.
 You feel the ground shake as you panic, grabbing her foot and trying not to fall off. She raises her foot and stands on one leg, until her foot was right next to the bottom of her shorts. “Here, a little helping hand to help you get started” Moon said as you took it, jumping off her foot and grabbing onto the shorts. Moon put her foot back on the ground as you hug it.

“Well, this is easier. Thanks Moon” You say to her as she smiles, something that made Lillie slightly sad.

“Well, since there was no way for you to climb my leg and since i didn't want you to be stuck down there the whole. It only made sense.” Moon admitted “Still, I'm kind of sad. I wanted to see that part.”

“Why didn't you just sit down, that way he can easily climb your leg since it won't be straight up” Lillie added as Moon lighted up. As soon as you reach the top of her shorts you feel Moon’s hand grab you, bringing you down to the ground once again. Moon sat down next to Lillie as she stuck her foot right in front of you.

“Thats a great idea! Thanks Lillie” Moon said to her friend.

“Yeah.... Thanks Lillie” You added with a bit of sting, as Lillie felt sorry.
 What happens next?
125312111212122112122.title: Moon First

choices: "I'm staying for the night." he says.
1253121112121222.content:
"I'm really sorry little guy, it's for your own safety. Please, forgive me." Lillie says, running downstairs.

She takes a deep breath. Whoever is outside, knocking at the door, she has to be careful to not let anyone discover about you. Especially if she finds Hau out of the door, in which case she'll have to be extra careful.

Another knock at the door stops her train of thought. Sighing, she opens it. And the sight makes her freeze.
A boy with blond hair, green eyes and a black outfit is standing there.
"Gladion?!" Lillie exclaims. If she thought Hau was dangerous, Gladion is much worse. And if he finds out about you, he could easily kill you thinking you are spying on Lillie.

"Seems like you aren't happy to be seeing me, Lillie." Gladion says.
The blonde haired girl quickly recomposes herself.
"Why do you say that, brother? Of course I'm happy to see you." she lies, letting the boy enter. He closes the door behind himself and shrugs.

"Why are you here, Gladion?" Lillie asks.
"I just wanted to check if my sister was fine." he replies.
"Oh, trust me, I am. I was just about to have dinner." Lillie says.

Her brother smirks.
"Then you won't mind me joining you, right?" he asks.
"N-no, of course!" Lillie exclaims, mentally slapping herself.

Everything is dark under the hat, and Lillie's hair is still wet from the bath. You hear muffled voices. You recognize Lillie's one, while the other belongs to someone she called 'Gladion' and 'brother', so it's pretty easy for you to say what's going on.

Time passes, you don't know what the two giants are doing, but suddenly, Lillie removes her hat and picks you. You notice she's alone in a kitchen.
"Lillie..." you try to say, but she gestures you to stay silent.
"I thought you were hungry." she whispers, handing you a piece of sandwich.
"Lillie what's going on?" you whisper.
"My brother is here, so be quiet. And eat fast." she says.

"Lillie? What are you doing in there?" Gladion's voice calls out to her.
"Nothing, I'm coming." she replies, waiting for you to eat.

As soon you swallow the last piece, Lillie puts you back on her head.
"Be quiet now, I'm going to let you out later, promise." she says, putting her hat back on, trapping you in darkness once again.

Lillie goes and sits back at the table. Silently, she resumes eating.
"So, Gladion, how long are you going to stay?" she asks, hopeful. Gladion swallows whatever he was chewing and looks at his sister, before replying...
1253121112121222.title: Family (warning, Sun/Moon spoilers ahead)

choices: They make it to the next day without incident
You fall out of the hat without anyone noticing
Lillie shows you to her brother
12531211121212222.content:
"I'll be here for the night." Though his words were muffled through the he, you heard exactly what Gladion said. You were worried about how this would turn out for you. Lillie managed to retain her composure as her brother dropped the news.
"That's great! It's been so long since we actually spent time together." She said in a cheerful tone. Though she was concerned about your well being, she wasn't lying when she said that. Her brother vanished years ago, and has been busy with the foundation ever since he came back. The two needed a chance to hang out and catch up. She just wished he had better timing.
"Just let me take care of something and we can watch a movie together." Lillie told him as she casually made her way to her room. Once inside she pulled you out of her hat and whispered.
"Sorry about this. He surprised me." You simply nodded in understanding.
"Tell you what, stay quiet in there tonight and I'll make it up to you tomorrow." As she whispered this, she deposited you back on her head and gently put the hat over you. The next hour or so was pretty uneventful for you. You heard Lillie and Gladion talking about their lives, stuff that happened when they were younger, something called Nebby. Nothing too exciting. Still, at least she was enjoying herself, and you felt she deserved that for everything she's already down for you.
12531211121212222.title: "I'm staying for the night." he says.

choices: You wake up and decide to wait Lillie to wake up as well.
Lillie wakes up and goes make breakfast, leaving you alone.
125312111212122221.content:
Still trapped inside Lillie's hat, you try to listen what the two brothers are saying. You hear them talking, but to you it's just muffled words. Sighing, you lay down, deciding to rest.

The two brothers keep talking as the movies goes on. Then, with a yawn, Lillie turns to her brother.
"I think I'm going to hit the hay. Are you going to sleep as well?" she questions.

In response, Gladion yawns as well. Lillie giggles and turns off the TV.
"I'll take that as a yes." Gladion grins as he follows his sister.
"It's been a while since I actually slept in my bed." he says, letting out another yawn.
"Yeah, I know, you've been away for a long time. Good night Gladion." Lillie says.
"Good night Lillie." her brother replies, entering his bedroom and shutting the door behind himself.

Sighing, Lillie walks towards her bedroom, pulling a sleeping you out of her hat. She smiles.
"You look so cute when you sleep." she whispers.
"Don't worry little guy, I'll make sure nothing bad happens to you, I promise." with these words, Lillie enters her bedroom and closes the door.

She gently puts you on her bed. Making sure you are asleep for good, she reaches for the closet and pulls out her nightwear, which is obviously white. Silently, she removes her hat, dress and shoes, leaving her socks. Then she slips into her nightwear and slides into the bed, next to you.

Lillie then pulls the blanket up to her neck and takes a book from under the bed. She then turns on a lamp on a nightstand next to the bed and starts reading.

Suddenly, she looks up from her book and looks at you. Smiling, she pushes you closer to her and resumes reading.

After a while, Lillie closes her book and places it back under the bed. She then turns off the lamp and lies down.
"Good night little guy," she whispers, pulling you in a hug.
"Sleep tight, you'll need it. I'm sure tomorrow will be a wonderful day for the both of us." and with that, she closes her green eyes, soon falling asleep, dreaming about all the fun you two are going to have together.


Hours pass as the night is replaced by the day. You're still closed in Lillie's embrace, cradled by her heartbeat.

Then, after a while...
125312111212122221.title: They make it to the next day without incident

choices: Try to climb down and go find Lillie.
Just then, Gladion enters the room and spots you.
1253121112121222212.content:
Yawning, Lillie's emerald eyes open slowly. The young giantess finds herself still hugging you like a teddy Stufful.

Smiling, Lillie releases you from her embrace and places you on her pillow and gets up. Stirring, the blonde haired girl makes her way to the door.
She looks at you one last time.
"You're going to love what I have in store for you." she whispers to herself.
"I still have to make it up to you after all." she says, leaving the room, gently closing the door.

You are left sleeping on the massive pillow. Sleeping in a dreamless slumber, you keep snoring, unaware of everything around you.

Finally, after an hour or so, the sound of a Pikipek chirping wakes you up.

Rubbing your eyes, you sit up. With a tired yawn, your eyes finally open. You find yourself on what you find out to be a gigantic pillow.
"I wasn't here last night..." you mutter, recalling the memory of you falling asleep inside Lillie's hat.

Looking further, you notice the pillow you're sitting on is placed on a massive bed. The pillow, the sheets, everything is white in color. Turning your head, you spot Lillie's dress and her signature hat laying on a couch opposite the bed.
"This must be Lillie's bed." you say, before your mind puts two and two together.
"Wait, if this is Lillie's bed - and I slept here - it means..." you blush furiously at the discovery.

One question emerges in your mind.
'Where is Lillie?' you ask yourself.

You look down, wanting to go and find Lillie. The door is closed, but you could easily slide under it due your size. But there is one major problem.
'How do I get down?'you question in your mind.
You can't possibly jump off the bed, it would be lethal. So your best option now is to climb down.
1253121112121222212.title: Lillie wakes up and goes make breakfast, leavin...

choices: She has no choice. She shows you to Gladion.
She somehow manages to hide you into her nightwear.
12531211121212222121.content:
You walk towards the edge of the bed. Grasping the sheets tightly, you start carefully climbing down.

Ignoring the huge sense of vertigo you are having, you make your descent to the floor. It takes you a full five minutes, but you finally manage to get down.

As soon you get down, you make your way to the door. As you expected, you easily manage to squeeze yourself under the crack of the door.

Looking around, you notice a staircase and assume Lillie is downstairs.

Without losing any time, you dash in direction of the stairs.
"This is going to take forever." you groan as you start climbing down the first step, that is almost twice your height.

It didn't exactly took you forever, but it still took you almost an hour to get downstairs. Wiping away some sweat from your face.
"Finally!" you exclaim.
"Finally what?" a familiar, cheerful voice questions.

Apparently, you didn't notice that Lillie was coming your way. She's still wearing her white nightwear.

Smiling, she picks you in her hands.
"Good morning little guy. How was your sleep?" she asks.
You blush, while she simply giggles.
"I was just about to come and wake you up little one. But you came to me instead. You don't like staying away from me?" she jokes, making you blush further.

"Come on little guy, let's go have breakfast. I've got a surprise for you." she says, turning to carry you away.
"Lillie? Who are you talking to?" a voice makes Lillie freeze.

She turns around and quickly hides you behind herself as Gladion appears on the staircase.
"What are you talking about brother? There's no one but me and you in the house." Lillie lies, regretting leaving her hat upstairs.

Gladion gets down.
"I thought - nevermind. What are you hiding?" he questions suspiciously, noticing Lillie holding something behind herself. Your heart skips a beat.
"Me? I'm not hiding anything." you hear Lillie lie again.
"Show your hands then." he says.

Lillie panicks. Her brother is growing suspicions and, knowing him, he won't let her go until she shows her secret.
'What to do?' Lillie asks herself.
12531211121212222121.title: Try to climb down and go find Lillie.

choices: "I think I'll come with you." you reply.
"I think I will do fine here alone." you reply.
125312111212122221212.content:
Without even thinking, Lillie brings the hand that is holding you under the skirt of her nightwear, where you catch a glimpse of her white panties.

Unaware of the deep blush on your face, Lillie presses you into the silky surface of her skirt. As soon she lets you go, you hang on for dear life.

"There. Happy now?" Lillie asks upon showing her now empty hands to her brother, who simply shrugs and walks off.

Sighing, Lillie walks into the bathroom and locks the door, before pulling you out.
"Are you alright little guy?" she asks, noticing your red face.
"Yes, I'm fine." you reply.
"Sorry about that, he surprised me again." Lillie apologizes.
"That's okay." you reply, making her smile.
"Let's have breakfast, shall we? You're going to love it, I'm sure." Lillie giggles.

She then opens the upper part of her nightwear and dangles you over it.
"Hang on tightly." she warns you, before gently placing you inside.

You hang on as you were told. Lillie walks out of the bathroom and into the kitchen, where her brother is literally devouring the pancakes she made.

Sighing, she helps herself with a plate of pancakes and sits down. The sudden movement makes you lose your balance. You fall right on Lillie's lap.

The blonde haired giantess reaches down and pulls you out of her skirt, before handing you a piece of pancake. She looks down and smiles briefly at you.
"Eat up." she whispers, slightly patting your head with a finger. Gladion doesn't seem to notice anything

The two giants eat silently, Lillie occasionally passing you pancake pieces.

After gulping down the whole plate of pancakes, Gladion looks away.
"So, Gladion..." Lillie tries to make conversation while finishing up her own breakfast. Her brother looks at her.
"When are you leaving?".
"I think I'll leave tonight or tomorrow in the morning. Why?" he asks back.
"Um, nothing." Lillie replies.

"I was thinking..." the blonde haired girl talks again.
"What?"
"Why don't we something together?" Lillie asks.
"Like what?".

Lillie stops to think. She perfectly knows that she'll have to hide you again if she spends time with her brother, but she really wants to enjoy his staying.
"Maybe we could hang out?".
"Sounds good to me." Gladion replies.
"Good. Just let me get ready and we can go." Lillie says, before closing you in two hands, getting up and walking towards her room.

Once she entered the room, she closes the door and gently puts you on her bed.
"You heard that, right?" she asks.
"Yes, you're going to hang out, right?" Lillie nods as she picks her dress.
"No peeking." she giggles.

You turn around in understanding as she gets changed.
"You can look." she says after five minutes.
"So, how about me? Am I going to spend the day inside your hat again? Not that I'm complaining, but...".
"Don't worry little guy, I understand. Now, I'll give you a choice. You can come with me, in my hat." she says.
"Or?".
"Or you can stay here, alone." she finishes.
"Alone? Is it safe for me to stay alone in this huge house?" you ask.
"Yes, you'd be perfectly safe. And I'd leave you with something to do... though I'd prefer if you stick with me. So? What are you going to do little one?".
125312111212122221212.title: She somehow manages to hide you into her nightw...

choices: "We can go get some malasada." he says.
"We can go to the beach." he says.
1253121112121222212121.content:
"I think my best choice is to come along with you." you state.
Lillie smiles as she extends a hand on the bed.

You hop on as she brings her hand back to her face.
"Tell you what, I'll try to make this enjoyable for you." she says.
"Ready?".

You give a small nod as Lillie places you on her head and puts her hat on her head.

The two brothers walk on the surprisingly busy road. Even though it's barely 9 AM, a lot of people are already walking around.

"So, where are we heading?" Gladion casually asks.
"What about that nice place - hey!" Lillie is cut off by a small gust of wind that makes her hat fly from her head.

Instinctively, Lillie brings a hand to her head to cover you while trying to get her hat back, aided by Gladion. Finally, he manages to get a grasp on it and hand it to his sister who puts it back on her head.
"That was close." you say, sighing in relief.

"Thanks Gladion." Lillie thanks her brother.
"You're welcome. Now, were you saying?" Gladion questions.
"Right. What about that nice place that makes those delicious malasada? Hau talks about it very much, and I'd like to try it. Or maybe we could go to the beach? Yes, that would great, we could play something. What do you think?" Lillie says.

Gladion looks at her before replying...
1253121112121222212121.title: "I think I'll come with you." you r...

choices: Lillie brings you for a swim.
Lillie decides to play with you on the sand.
12531211121212222121212.content:
"Going to the beach is fine." Gladion mutters. Lillie nods.
"We'll need swimwear though." she says.
"Lillie, we don't have any. Where exactly do you expect to find them?".
"I guess we'll just have to buy them. I think that clothing store will be fine." Lillie replies, pointing to a near clothes shop.

The two brothers walk in and head for different directions.

Lillie picks up a white bikini.
"This one looks cute." she mutters, walking into a changing room.

She removes her hat and, before you can ask anything, she places it on a small bench with you still inside.
"Lillie? What's going on?" you ask.
"Quiet you, you'll see." she says, starting to undress.

In a matter of minutes, Lillie is wearing the white swimwear.
Giggling, she takes her hat off you.

Finally, you are freed from your 'prison'. And the first thing you see makes you blush furiously. Lillie is standing in front of you with a bikini. She looks gorgeous, almost like a goddess from your point of view.

"So? What do you think?" Lillie asks you. You don't reply, you just stare at her with your mouth wide open. Lillie giggles.
"I'll take that as a 'stunning'." she says, placing her hat back on you. She then removes the bikini and slips back into her clothes before putting her hat - and you along - back on her head. Then, she leaves the changing room.

Once paid, Lillie and Gladion leave the shop. She bought the white bikini, while her bought a pair of red and black swimming trunks.

And so the two head to the beach. Once there, they head for two bathrooms and get changed, before going to sit on the sand. Lillie is still wearing her hat though, hiding you from the world.
"I think I'm going to rest here for a bit." Gladion tells his sister while laying down.
"I think I'll go for a walk around here." she says, walking off.

Once she's distant enough from Gladion, Lillie slips a hand into her hat and pulls you out.
You close your eyes, blinded by the bright sunlight after being in the darkness for almost two hours.
"Sorry for that little one." Lillie apologizes, before smiling.
"But now I get to play with you for a bit. And I have just the perfect idea...
12531211121212222121212.title: "We can go to the beach." he says.

125312111212122221212121.content:
"I think I have the perfect idea..." Lillie looks at you with a growing smile. You can't help but wonder what's going on in this girl's mind.

Your questions are answered shortly after.
"How about we go swimming?" Lillie says. You blush furiously.
"What!?".
"Aw come on, we already took a bath together, what could go wrong?" Lillie asks back.

"B-But... But... I don't even have a swimwear..." you counter, even more embarrassed. Lillie giggles.
"Silly little guy, you don't need one. You just have to remove your clothes and leave your boxers. That should be just fine.".

Finding no words to counter her logic, you decide to just do as she wants.

So, sheepishly, you start removing your white doll clothes. You remove them one by one, soon standing on Lillie's palm just in your white boxers.

Silently, Lillie walks back to where she left her hat and clothes, and where Gladion is resting. Lillie becomes surprised finding out her brother is actually sleeping. She smiles.

Careful to not wake Gladion up, Lillie slips your clothes beneath her hat.

Lillie then walks towards the sea and dives into the water, you closed in a tight grasp. Lillie emerges from the sea to breathe. You have to admit, the cool sensation and the warm Alola sun are really great.

Lillie swims around for a bit, careful to not let you go, before stopping.
"Hey little guy, I just had a great idea." she says, looking at you.
"And that would be?".
"How about we play for a bit? Maybe I can be the huge sea monster and you could escape me." the green eyed girl suggests.
"Um... nothing less... lethal?".
"I wouldn't call it lethal. But, if you don't want, we could just float on the water and relax. Well, I'd have to let you lie on top of me in order to keep you safe, but I'm sure you would enjoy it nonetheless. So little guy, what do you pick?".
125312111212122221212121.title: Lillie brings you for a swim.

choices: Check out whatever Lillie left you.
1253121112121222212122.content:
"I think... I think I will do fine alone..." you state. You have to admit, you're pretty unsure about what you're saying, but, you guess, there's lower chance to get discovered if Gladion isn't around for a while.

Lillie only nods.
"If that's what you want... I'll need to get you something to do, I don't want you to get bored while I'm not around..." she thinks out loud.

Oh right, you think, even if there's is a low chance to be discovered, there's a high - if not certain - chance to grow bored. And with Lillie not around, you could not even reach the bed to take a nap while waiting for the blonde haired giantess to return.


Lillie sits down on the bed next to you, thinking of what you can do in her absence.
"Maybe I could give you a book to read?" she suggests.
"Uh, Lillie, how I would be supposed to do it?" you ask, rejecting the idea.
"You're, right, that's a stupid idea. Then maybe I can..." Lillie fell silent as she found absolutely nothing you could do without her right now.

"Tell you what..." she suggests after a short silence.
"I can leave something for you to eat in case you get hungry somewhere you can reach it... I got it!" she suddenly exclaims.

Without giving you time to ask whatever she means, Lillie already stands up and opens a closet. She seems to be searching for something. Whatever she's searching for, she finds it quickly. And you can tell it's something big.

Before you can act, Lillie pulls out a huge dollhouse, completely white in color. And, from what you can say, it's basically the smaller version of the mansion you're currently in... and it's still very big.

"I know you didn't see the whole house, and it would take weeks for you to do it, so I thought you could explore the... smaller version of the house...." she says, placing the dollhouse next to you. It's like a normal sized house to you.

"That if you want of course. If you don't want... I'm sure you'll find something nice to do." she states.

Just then, someone knocks at the door.

The smell was an odd mix of good ol sour cheesiness and cheap as hell foot lotion as lesser undertone. The toes also had an cheap silver toenail polish that was badly. The foot size must be a eight and half to a solid ten

Honestly her feet and smell were very sexy to you. But this...lowly diseased rattata of a girl doesn't deserve your attention.

And that smug kantoian little tramp and hala's grandson came along and rub salt in your wounds. And now this bug had the gall to mock you. You look at your....pet with tearful yet dead fury.

You spoke in a voice that your demented mother would be proud of,and said...
12531241.title: Now she's mad...

choices: She presses down harder and grinds
She orders you to clean her sole
She squeezes you between her toes
125312411.content:
Against all odds this gigantic punk has been a complete pushover to you. Her attempts to assert herself have been hilariously easy to thwart, even for someone of your stature. By this point you were certain that you were in complete control of this situation. But then something happened. Somewhere between this wimpy girl’s tears and sheepish attempts to seem tough, you saw her expression change. It wasn’t her usual pathetic look you’ve seen thus far, but an icy cold stare that seemed to radiate a tranquil form of rage. Despite her prior attempts to lord over you, this look actually did manage to scare you.

“So.” She began in a cold tone that made your blood freeze. “You think Im just some weak and ugly little shit.” With each word she took a step closer until her bare feet were inches from you. Her composure was completely different now. She seemed tougher, scarier... bigger. “Well then, let’s see how tough the doll is when they’re squirming like a wimpod under my aching feet. Congratulations you worthless bug. You’re my new stress toy. And my feet have been literally aching for one of those for a while now.”

You tried to flee but your legs were like jelly causing you to simply fall on your ass, helpless as the pale skull girl lifted her bare sole over you. With a cold smirk the foot slammed down on you, grinding you against the dirt floor. You squealed in pain, begging for mercy, but this only made Lillie go deeper into this mood. She loved the rush of power. And she was only getting started.
125312411.title: Skull Lillie Takes Charge

choices: She thinks that’s enough for now...
She’s just getting started, and puts you in the back of her panties...
She has something else in mind for you...
12531242.content:
"How about I si-sit on you. It will be very uncomfortable for you… But…” She said, seeming to be getting a little excited. “I think that I’ll enjoy it! A lot!” She said with an evil grin before her hand darted to the ground as she quickly snatched you up. Her hand was a little sweaty, which was to be expected in this weather, and she wasn’t exactly gentle with her grip on you.

You felt the cage that was the punk girl’s hand shake around you in the dark as she moved. There wasn’t much you could do except struggle against her hand to no avail. Suddenly, her hand loosened around you, and you were falling for a second before you hit the ground on a rough bolder.

There was a smug laugh from behind you, and you rolled over to see the blonde haired girl standing over you with her hands on her hips. “I-I’ve always wanted to put someone in their place! And you just happen to be the perfect size!” She squeaked out, before twisting her torso so that her backside hovered over you. “Take this as a lesson in manners!” She said before unceremoniously plopping her booty short clad ass down on top of you.

You held your hands up in reflex as her butt hurtled toward you, not that it would make any difference. Everything went dark as what little light made its way down into the forest floor was completely blocked out by the young girl’s slim backside. The pressure on top of you was immense, but it alleviated rather quickly as Lillie stood up slightly so she could drop her ass back down on top of you.

It felt like she was putting all of her weight onto you, and she was probably trying to. She grinded her hips side to side, rubbing her bum into you as much as she possibly could. Her rear lifted into the air briefly before thundering back down on top of you, squishing you between a hard place… and a heavy, yet soft place. You could hear the light haired girl laughing and giggling to herself, clearly having a good time.

On the other hand, this was borderline torture to you. The immense weight smashing around on top of you was unbearable, but that was almost as bad as the fact that you were having your ass handed to you by some girl’s ass. The irony wasn't lost on you, but you were a bit more focused on coping with the assault of the girl’s backside.
12531242.title: Being put in your place...

125321.title: Starting Gen 8

choices: You jam yourself into the shoe
1253212.content:
(I am Terrible! At writing Scottish so please give me some leeway)

As you walk through the giant clearing of the forest that you find yourself in, you look up ahead and see a giant campsite. It was massive, and this was the salvation that you spent so long to look for. You were walking all through the night, dodging Pokemon left and right. Not wanting to be eaten and taken, you were careful. No doubt about that.

Which makes you so happy to find this circular tent, a couple hours after the sun rose. Your gonna get the attention of whoever is camping and hopefully, relax for the rest of the day. Your small body is just so tired at this point.

You ran over and went straight for the tent door. Arriving under the giant door as you look up. There was no way you were gonna be able to zip this up. You could not even reach it, let alone move it.

That did not seem to be a problem though, as you can see above you the zipper start moving. This is a sign that someone is coming out. You take a couple of steps back, ready to give room to whoever was coming out. At your size there is a big chance they won’t even see you and you will get stepped on. So best to avoid that.

As you see it open, the first gain trainer you see comes out. Taking a massive step out, it was a young girl. Got to be in her teens somewhere. She had medium length brown hair all around her head, a green and white cap on. She wore a red dress on and over that a grey sweater. She had boots made for trailing and no doubt a beautiful face.

You took your time and just stared at her. She was beautiful, almost like an angel really. She looked elegant, and down to earth a bit. The type of girl you can’t imagine a single bad word coming out of.

And then she opened her mouth and proved you wrong.

“Uhh! My head’s minced!” She said, letting you note her very strong accent. You think it’s from down region Galor. “Last time i’m flipping with a piking Bewear” She said “Ehh, get over it. Let’s go!”

She said to herself as she turned around, letting you see right under her skirt. More specifically what was under there. Her panties.

They were above you though, and this was a sight you were not sure you should be seeing.   But you were seeing it, no doubt about that. She moved around and pressed a button on her tent. Almost like a wild contraption, it folded in on itself. To the point where it was more like a blanket rather then a tent. Although you could note a pillow and blanket in there. She put it all in there as she got up and put in her bag.

She then grabbed something out though, dropping her bag onto the ground and almost squishing you there.

“Now, where the bleeding hell am i?” She said looking over it.

This girl looked like a beauty, but she had a bit of a potty mouth. And for some reason you were liking that more about her. You just stared at the girl, not noticing the bag until it was far too late.

You did and you jumped, seeing your one chance to be in a safe spot. In there you can rest and you will be moving with the girl. You start to run over to the bag, planning on moving and jumping up into it.

You ruined it cause you moved too late though, as the bag lifted up and she put it back on. You fell onto the ground seeing it raise back up. Now with a new plan, you realise you have to move.

“Apparently, there’s a Xatu up a head. Oh you can bet i’m gonna net that!” She said ready to start moving. While you were ready to move as well. Move right to her boot. You waste no time running right up, running right up and arriving just under her. You leap onto her boot before she lifts it up. Getting to the edge. You hug on for dear life, not wanting to fall off as she raises her foot. She raised it right up, taking a step as it feels like a natural disaster to you. This tells you instantly that you need to move.

As she keeps walking more and more, you climb fully onto her boot. Shifting around and climbing the neck of it. You grab the long socks she had and made sure not to let go. Not to let go at all, as you grip as she walks you can see that she was walking with purpose.

Your starting to get tired, but what are you gonna do to get her attention. Not like you can climb her legs, speaking of how smooth they were. You do look up though, seeing her panties as you blush. Maybe you should just stay on her boot. It’s no doubt the least safe spot you can be, but your not really looking for safe right now. Your looking for help.

Another idea, and this is one your not really keen on but might prove the most beneficial in getting her attention, is to climb into her boot or sock. if you make your way in there, you can jam yourself in like a pebble. So if you do that you should be able to get her attention.

Then again it would also probably irritate her, and she seems like not the girl who you really want to irritate. She seems... well she seems like she has a bit of a hair trigger. Still you were gonna have to pick one of those three options.
 And hopefully before she gets to that Xatu that she is going to. Cause that could no doubt be super dangerous to you. A giant Pokemon

125322.title: Marnie

choices: You took too long to decide and they both left without you.
1253221.content:
You're a team yell grunt, a member of what is basically a fan club. All of you admire one person, a beautiful punk goddess with a pure heart. Most members are satisfied simply watching her battle and stopping other trainers from beating her, but not you. With the help of a Clefairy you had found in the Wild Area combined with constant use of Minimize and Growth from another pokemon used on you, you had gained the ability to use those moves yourself, not unlike trainers who train with Psychic types to unlock psychic powers. Another thing you had learned about gaining these abilities is that while shrunk you became near-superhuman, invincible to nearly everything. You had learned this the hard way when a wild Pikachu gobbled you up and you went out his digestion track the natural way but not getting dissolved by the stomach liquids.

Your reasoning for going through this kind of training was that despite how fervent team Yell was, they could never actually see Marnie in her most vulnerable, alone in her room. You, on the other hand, could easily sneak inside her room and watch her. Some might say this was a scumbag idea, but you didn't care. All that mattered is that you would be able to see your goddess up close and personal. This wasn't solely admiration though, as you were a healthy male and of course, had perverted thoughts.

You, (Like all team yell members) knew where Marnie lived. Spikemuth was a compact area and could hardly be considered a town. There was one path and on both sides of said path were buildings. At the end of the path was where Piers, Spikemuth's gym leader, and Marnie's older brother resided. Marnie also lived with Piers, but ever since she left on her journey she only stopped by occasionally. Coincidentally, Marnie was at her leg of the journey where she would be fighting her older brother soon, meaning it is the perfect chance for you to join her journey without her even knowing.

On the day Marnie was said to have made it to Spikemuth you decided to not put on face paint or wear the team yell uniform, the reasoning behind it that purple stands out much more than beige. You went beside the side entrance of Spikemuth because the main door was blocked off and Marnie knew about the side entrance. You went to a corner away from grass and used minimize, shrinking yourself to a meager 3 inches, about the height of a pinky finger. Just as you reached your final height, Marnie walked around the corner with a pretty cute Scottish girl who seemed really polite.

Just then, they decided to have a pokemon battle. With their focus entirely on the battle, you would have no trouble sneaking on one of them. The thing is, you started to have second thoughts about whether you should choose Marnie or not. Marnie and the new girl seemed to be good friends, so if you stayed with the Scottish girl for a bit you would probably see Marnie again. On the other hand, Marnie was your goddess and you had learned how to shrink and grow just to see her.

The battle was almost over, so you had to choose quickly.

You chose...
