13112.content: The first bug type gym leader will probably be the least bugged about your new size. Of course, that's assuming he doesn't add you to any bug collections he might have.
13112.title: Bugsy?

choices: "You're the weirdest bug I've ever seen!"
131121.content:
You had been traveling through the forest for a while now. It had been almost a week as far as you could tell, though you might be off a day or two. When you first woke up, you were shocked to find that you had somehow been shrunk to a ridiculously tiny size. You were smaller than the smallest Caterpie and you had nearly been food for a few Hoothoots in their place. Lucky you had avoided such a grizzly fate, but it certainly hadn't been easy. Luckily your previous travel experiences helped you know what was safe to eat, you really regretted not getting a Pokémon now, they'd be a big help.

You had just settled into a bush to rest for the night, something you still weren't used to. You could feel the filth covering your whole body, nothing you could do about that unfortunately. It might be helping you to stay hidden actually. It had been awhile since anything had taken notice of you, so maybe things were settling down into-

Your thoughts were interrupted as you were swept up into some sort of object. Whatever it was, it felt smooth and pristine. You could hear some streaking sound as you slid along its surface. The only good thing that could mean was that you weren't sliding down the gullet of some Pokémon. Your slide along the strange surface was stopped as your back slammed into a wall. Inertia forced your legs past your head and you tumbled onto your face. You groan softly, "What the heck was that?" An odd noise sounded above you, causing you to look up.

You instantly recognized what you saw. You had been scooped up into a jar! The lid had just been sealed on, thankfully it had holes in it, which meant whoever was using this meant to collect things your size. You wondered how the owner of the jar had managed to sneak up on you, as the jar moved loudly through the leaves of the bush. Whoever was doing this had to have seen you earlier and moved quietly to scoop you up so easily.

"Alright, I got ya!" You heard a voice from above. Whoever it was sounded really excited. You were lifted up to the face of the one who had captured you. It was a purple, or lavender?, haired boy. The look on his face reflected the enthusiasm in his voice. "Wow I can't believe it!"
131121.title: Big Bugsy, Tiny You

choices: “It’s for safety. I’ll let you out at camp.”
“I’m making you part of my collection.”
1311212.content:
“Wow, you’re actually a tiny human! Incredible!” Astonishment clear in the boy’s voice. “I never thought I’d find something as intriguing as you before. Glad I came out today, I might have missed you otherwise.” He turned the jar you were trapped in around repeatedly, trying to get a good look at you. The movement through you around a bit, but you mostly kept your footing. “It was hard to tell from a distance though. You’re super dirty.”

“Well, I have been out here for a couple of weeks now.” You speak, your tone a mixture of annoyance and exhaustion. “I didn’t figure out a way to bathe myself yet.”

“Oh! And you can still talk too, this is great!” The boy’s excitement continued to grow. “My name is Bugsy, I’m a bug type gym leader. I’ve been catching bugs since I was a kid, that’s how I snuck up on you and caught you so easily.” He explained, correctly guessing that you were going to ask how he snuck up on you.

Part of you was laughing because he talked about being a kid like it was a while ago. He clearly wasn’t much older than what would usually be considered a kid. Most of you, however, was relieved that a gym leader of all people had found you. You were saved! “So you can help me right? I’ve been stranded out here for so long, I’d given up on ever finding help. I figured I’d end up food for a Hoothoot or something.”

Bugsy laughed and shook his head. “Nah, I doubt a Hoothoot would be very interested in you. You’re a bit too small. A Beautifly might have liked you though, you aren’t much for filling bellies, but you still got life force to be sucked out.” Apparently his comment visibly upset you, because he quickly stuttered an apology. “Ah, sorry! I tend to freak people out with bug facts at normal size. You probably don’t need stiff like that on your mind now. You probably weren’t tasty looking to any Pokemon out here anyways.” He hastily adding at the end.

“It’s alright, I was always thinking about how badly things could’ve ended for me. I didn’t think about having the life sucked out of me by a Beautifly though, that’s super creepy. I didn’t know those things lived around here.” You found it strange that you were having this kind of conversation immediately after getting rescued. You figured you were just so relieved that you were up for talking about anything.

“They’re a bit rare in this area, but you definitely could’ve run into one. This forest has been thriving with bug Pokemon for a while now. It’s a phenomenon where several environmental chains have merged together. There are bug types and Pokemon usually found around them all over this place!” Bugsy spoke, his enthusiasm returning.

“Is that why you’re here? To come see all the bug Pokemon?”

He nodded his head enthusiastically. “Yeah! I wanted to see how this massive ecosystem was developing. I was hired as part of a team to observe it. I got another bug type gym leader with me, her name’s Viola, and a whole team of scientists. We’re in the independent phase right now so we aren’t working together but…” Bugsy started going on a tangent about the work he was doing, leading to you losing focus.

Tuning him out, you take a good look at Bugsy, comparing him to your disheveled and horrible appearance. Looking at him fully, you realize for the first time how gigantic he is! He looked like a building with the strange view from your jar. He would probably look even bigger if your view wasn’t slightly distorted. For the first time since forever, you look down, now through the bottom of the jar which gave you a much clearer view. And you were right, the clear view did make Bugsy look even bigger! His brown shoes alone looked like large houses. You could only imagine the blissful heat that was inside of them and under his foot… compared to the cold outside you had to endure for the past few weeks of course.

Just for a moment you tune back into Bugsy’s long tangent. “I think Viola just came here to take pictures though. Why else would she bring her favorite camera? The scientists were providing some for us anyways.” He seemed to be expressing doubts about the other gym leader he had mentioned. He was one to talk though. He brought bug catching jars and you could clearly see a giant bug net on his back. Totally just for research right?

Regardless, you were just relieved to have help and decided to interrupt Bugsy. “I’m sorry to interrupt, but do you think you could let me out of this jar now? It’s not very comfortable.” You note.

Bugsy stops in the middle of the story and smiled sheepishly. To your confusion and slight concern, he shook his head. “Sorry, I can’t do that?” He said simply. You immediately wanted to ask why, but he cut you off. “There’s a good reason for that though…”
1311212.title: Bugsy’s Human Bug

choices: Bugsy wants a better and more "hands on" apology from you...
Bugsy and you share a sleeping bag...lets hope for enough space
13112122.content:
"...I’m making you part of my collection.” The boy hurriedly chuckles with a voice just ripped with shaky hesitance. His eyes darted away from your temporary glassed residence and to the direction of the tents. At first, you only nodded in understanding. Putting most of your trust in the nerdy boy's hands. But quiet little pieces of doubt and suspicion just echoing one little phrase.

' I’m making you part of my collection.'

And it was...

' I’m making you part of my collection.'

Getting...

'I’m making you part of my collection.'

LOUDER!

'I’M MAKING YOU PART OF MY COLLECTION!'

"WHAT IN THE ABSOLUTE HELL DO YOU MEAN BY I AM GOING TO PART OF YOUR STUPID COLLECTION!" After a few minutes of dwelling on it, the reality of the situation dawned on like Monday morning. Your yelling caused the much bigger boy quietly yelped in utter surprised. For someone so tiny, you should do have a big voice. It was amazing that you didn't alert the sleeping pokemon in the trees.

"I-it was a...um..a Freudian slip...yes! A simple Freudian slip." Bugsy quickly responded. His voice shifting from "nerdy boy acting his age" to "professional scientist" in the span of a few thirty seconds. It was both kinda scary and impressive. Even with his cheeks slowly reddening into a fainted pink. "The reason why I said you be part of my "stupid" collection..." The voice Bugsy used to speak the word 'stupid' was a high-pitched nasally parody of your own. That along with the air quotes he used when saying it just shows that you struck a chord with him. "..is because it so I can found out how did you get so tiny."

"Then why not show me to the other scientists in the camp?" You were quick to counter his point. This is your life we are talking about here.

"Because I simply don't know how they will react to you." Bugsy honestly spoke. They were too much of an unknown. And Viola...has her head in clouds too much. Upon hearing this you made silent. The young giant said nothing as he enters his ten-


"I believe you...and sorry for calling your collection stupid. I was wrong for that" You relented with a sigh. Causing him to smile widely.

"All right!" Bugsy laughs almost a little too excitedly. those cheeks getting a little brighter too. Seeing him do that causes you to pale and sweat...which he notices and quickly dons a that neutral "scientist" facade again. "That is good to hear."


'I'm so going to regret this. I just know it.' Bugsy places you on top of what had to be his sleeping bag.

What happens next?
13112122.title: At least his heart in the right place...right?

13133211.content:
“It’s rude to stare.” His voice echoed above despite his calm tone. You quickly realized that this was directed right at you. He knew you were there. He saw the tiny thing in his room despite being apparantly caught up in whatever he was reading. You briefly considered that maybe he was reacting to someone or something else but then you watched as his head shifted from his book to focus squarely on you. “I must say, I’ve had some admirers before, but this is something new.” He seemed too distracted or intrigued by your condition to really think about any possible anger for you for apparantly breaking into his room to spy on him; or any concern for your condition in general. He was so caught up on the fact that the size was possible at all. Thinking of the many implications of this he calmly reached down and picked you up to inspect you carefully. As he lifted you to his face to inspect you closer, his own beautiful features were all the more visible to you. His hair almost seemed to sparkle and his skin was flawless. Though you were snapped out of it slightly by the presence of his eyes staring at you intently, studying every detail of your insignificant frame.

As Ilima finally finished his curiosity subsided as he began to think about the circumstances of finding you in his room like this. The curious and inquisitive look changed to...
13133211.title: "It's rude to stare.."(He's aware)

choices: "..tend to my tired feet,and be their stress toy."
131332113.content:
When the boy smiles at you,you can feel the gentle elegance that was radiating from it,but somehow you can feel the playfulness and amusement that was hidden in it. And it made you..nervous to say the least.

."Well my tiny admirer.I'll take you in,and see what we can do abour your dilemma,but first you must do somethings for me..starting now."the boy said almost teasingly,while his eyes sparkle and making you feel..funny.

"Like..what" you said.,while you try to get your mind out of the gutter.

"Well you can start by.."the boy said,while stroking his chin.
131332113.title: A blessing..or a curse

choices: Ilima gets really in to it.
1313321131.content:
"By tending to my tired feet" the elegant boy coyly said while he begin to take shoes off. And you notice a thirdteen and half on the tongue of his shoes. The thin green socks cling tightly on his long soles,and the socks had a lightbfootprints made of dirt and sweat.

He then begin to slowly and teasely strip his socks,and revealing his long and blushy cream colored soles to you. "What are you waiting for"the boy almost sensually said while elegantly crossing his barefeet to you,and making them wrinkle.

While the idea of climbing the giantess seemed like a good idea, and doing it inside of her outfit was especially tempting, you decide against it. Especially if you were climbing her inside of her clothes, it would be hard to explain why you were climbing inside of her clothes, and looking for help doesn't really excuse you from climbing in that particular way.

Plus it was possible that just interacting with her more directly could simply wake her up. All you did before was pull on her kimono a bit, that's something that she could easily miss. Even if you weren't smaller than a doll, such a small action probably wouldn't get her attention even at a bigger size. Perhaps trying a bit hard to get her attention could work?

You look at the girl again and try to see what you could interact with. Anything above her waist was out. Reaching above that would require a bit of climbing, which means you would already be climbing her. Her legs were completely covered, so that didn't leave you much to work with.

You take a second to look at the girl's face, checking to see if she was starting to wake up. She was still sleeping soundly and remained oblivious to your presence. You had to admit that she was beautiful, radiantly so. Her floral perfume seemed oddly appropriate now. She had this natural beauty to her, like a pristine flower. Hopefully when this flower woke up, she wasn't one that had any thorns.

Refocusing on your task, you look past the girl's legs and check around her ankles. That's when you notice the girl's socks. They seemed to be pretty long and then traveled up into her dress. You had considered trying to take the girl's socks off, hoping her foot being exposed to the air would wake her up, but that wasn't an option now. Your last option seemed to be the girl's foot itself. Quite an interesting situation. The foot is the part of the body that so many people ignore and now your fate was partially tied with this girl's foot.

The girl subconsciously scrunched her toes in her sleep, reminding you that you weren't completely safe from her actions either. Looking at her socked toes, you consider your options. You could just wait for the girl to wake up naturally, that would be the safest option by far. All you'd have to do is make sure that she saw you when she woke up. You decided against climbing her, that seemed too risky and you weren't in a rush to get her attention. Finally, the girl's toes were right in front of you and you were willing to guess that she'd be ticklish there. But would she even feel you through her sock? And would she react consciously? Or could her toes have their way with you?

14131212.content:
Your eyes open slowly as you regain consciousness. Beneath your body, you feel the cold, hard ground of the forest you've been walking through earlier.

You sit upright, and your hand travels up to your head. You distinctly remember that you were walking into the forest, but you can't remember where you were heading. Actually, you don't seem to remember anything aside from who you are.
Weird.

"What happened?" you whisper to yourself. You stand up and glance around.

Your eyes meet with the sight of enormous trees, but without leaves and with entirely verdant trunks. You stare at them in disbelief for a few seconds, before shifting your gaze downwards. The ground seems... closer for some reason.


Wait.

Giant trees... closer ground... You look up again to realize that these are not trees... They're actually blades of grass! Which means... that you've somehow shrunk down to size! And, as if it's not enough, you're deep inside this forest, making you an easy prey for whatever pokemon looking for a snack.

You glance up into the sky. The sun is slowly descending over the horizon. You absolutely have to find a shelter before it gets dark. Otherwise, it would most probably end bad for you...

With your survival instinct starting to kick in, you start running, trying to get out of the thick 'forest' of grass, the sun disappearing completely in the meantime, while the moon slowly takes place in the now darkened sky.


It takes a while, but eventually the grass comes to an end. And you end up in what seems a campsite. A small tent, a cheerful fire burning, and a fallen log. Yep. Indeed a campsite.

But your heart fills with hope as you notice a young-looking girl sitting in front of the fire, a relaxed look on her face.

You make your way to the log she's sitting on and gaze up at her. The giantess has long, light brown hair tied in two small pigtails; she has a light green dress that stops to her knees. She also has a white jacket, an orange bow on her chest and she wears a pair of sandals.

Also, she looks very peaceful right now. You can't help but admire this gorgeous brunette giantess who hasn't noticed you yet. You even momentarily forget your new, dire situation.

But you're so lost in observing her that you don't notice that the giantess...
14131212.title: The shy girl with a heart of steel.

choices: Jasmine is staying for a few more days.
Jasmine actually has to return to her gym. Guess you're going with her.
141312121.content:
Completely lost in admiring the giantess, you don't notice her shifting her gaze, casually looking down at her feet.

The two of you make eye contact. A curious expression paints itself on this girl's face. She stares down at you for a few minutes.

"Are you... are you a tiny person?" she asks shyly. You recompose yourself.
"Yes!" you shout.
"Ehm... you know... how did you... how did you get so tiny?" she asks as she reaches down, placing her open hand in front of you.

You hop on it as the girl brings you upwards, towards her face. Her hazel eyes stare at you with genuine amusement.
"I don't know. I was just walking around in the forest when I was suddenly knocked out. When I woke up, I was like this." you explain.
"Dear." she says with concern.
"I need help. Can you please help me?" you ask.

She blushes a bit from your request.
"Uhm... I'm sorry, I have no clue of how you got like that... nor how to grow you back up... but, if you want, I can watch over you for while... at least until we figure out what happened to you..." she says, blushing more.

You aren't quite sure of what to do but, then again, this giantess is your only chance of survival right now. Plus, she seems nice.

So you agree with her suggestion. Even though the pink shade on her cheeks, you notice her smiling slightly.
"Then... I'll be taking care of you for the time being. Oh, we never got to introduce ourselves. I'm Jasmine," the girl, whose name she said is Jasmine, says.
"What's your name?" she then asks.

You tell her.
"Oh, that's... ehm... a cute name." she says.

She stands up and, with you sitting on her palm, walks towards her tent.
"You must be hungry," she says as she crawls inside and reaches for a bag. Everything is in perfect order in here, you notice. You soon hear your own stomach growling, remembering you that you haven't eaten in a while, and now it is demanding its daily satiation.

Jasmine gently places you down and digs into the bag, emerging from it shortly after, holding a round, red object that you recognize as an apple.
"I'm not sure of what you like to eat. But I think this'll do it." she says.

You patiently wait for Jasmine slice the apple. She hands you two slices and takes the others for herself. She sits down in front of you.

"So, if I understood good, I can stay with you for the time being?" you ask while chewing on your second slice. She nods down at you with shy smile.
"Well, you know, I never thanked you for it, Jasmine." you say.
"Oh... ehm... don't even say it. I couldn't leave someone so small and... um... helpless alone in this forest." she replies, blushing a bit.

You smile gratefully, before a question comes to your mind.
"Hey, now that I think about it, how much time are we going to stay here?... Because, you don't live in the forest... right?" you ask.

She giggles politely at your last question.
"Luckily, no. I'm actually a gym leader." she says. You blush upon realizing how dumb your question was.

You raise your head as you hear the young giantess talking again, and you notice that she is replying to your first question - how much time is she staying here?
141312121.title: Meeting Jasmine

1413121211.content:
“Your a gym leader, really? Then what are you doing out here. I mean don't you have a responsibility to be at your gym?” You ask her curious.

“Well... its just... i like it out here, its all quiet and peaceful. Sometimes i just need to be by myself” Jasmine replied.

“Oh, well I'm sorry for ruining that” You say not realising that your imposing, however Jasmine doesn't see it like that.

“Your Not Imposing! Not at all, i want you to here” She said as she realise how the last part sounded, gaining a blush she added “Not like that... More that um.... i... am happy that i found you, so you won't be by yourself”

“Its fine Jasmine, i understand. So when are you done with this trip?” You say wanting to go back to civilisation rather then stay in the Pokemon filled forest.

“I was actually planning on staying a couple more days, but i can go back now if you want me to?” Jasmine said as you feel like if you said yes now, that it would be imposing on her.

“No its fine Jasmine, to be honest I'm just glad that i was found. After all, when your my size. Pretty much anything can end you. At least with you I'm safe, and I'm getting giant apples” You say as you chomp into the apple slice, something that Jasmine found absolutely adorable.

However it didn't take long for you to be full “Wow, i feel like I've eaten a truck load. I don't think i can take another bite” You say. Jasmine smiled then grabbed the apple slice from in front of you. She looks at it and sees all the small bite marks, finding it as adorable as anything else about you. She then ate the Apple slice, putting it in her mouth in one gulp.

“Show off” You say to her

“Sorry, its just i was was raised to never waste food” She says to you.

“Its fine, i was done with it anyway” You say to her. “Although, it was kind of weird to see something so big to me go into your mouth so easily”

“Yeah... it um... would be” Jasmine said as she gained another blush.

For what you've seen Jasmine is really shy, like really shy. Like unrealistically shy. Although your feeling like your cracking her barrier. Maybe because your so small or maybe its because your so nice.

What happens next?

It seemed like she was actually beginning to leave as she lifted up a bag and looked like she was going to put away her tent, however, while you were mesmerized by her beautiful appearance, you failed to realize that you were standing in the place she was walking to. It took you a moment, but you quickly realized she was walking towards you, and it probably wouldn’t be very good for your health if one of those giant sandals landed on you. “Oh, SHIT, I need to run, like now!” You said to yourself as you began to do just that. You began to desperately push your way through the grass, but because of the size difference, she quickly caught up. One of her sandalled feet landed directly behind you, making the ground beneath you shake to a point where you were knocked into the air and into her toes, it was not a pleasant place, with the sweat and smell and whatnot. Luckily, the slight pressure of your body onto her toes was enough to make her look down towards her feet and notice you. She stared at you with her gorgeous eyes for a moment, simply looking confused until she finally broke the silence. “A-are you a person?” She said quietly “Yeah, you kinda almost stepped on me, but I’m fi-“ you tried to say, but the woman immediately scooped you up in her hand and began to talk over you.

I’m so so so so sorry” the lady said with the most genuine look of worry, concern and fear you had ever seen. “It’s ok, I’m fine, you didn’t actually step on me so nothings broken” you say to her, trying to calm her nerves. “Are you sure? Do you need ice or a bandage or anything at all?” She said in the same worrisome tone. You thought that it was actually really cute that she was worrying about you so much, considering the two of you don’t even know each other’s names. “Don’t worry, you didn’t hurt anything, but could you not squeeze so hard” you said to her with a nervous laugh as she was still holding you in a fist. M-my name’s jasmine by the way” she said smiling while sticking out a finger from her other hand, gesturing a handshake. You tell her your name and hold her finger with both your hands, trying to give her the handshake.

“S-so how did you end up like this anyways?” Jasmine said “I’m not really sure, I just sort of woke up in this forest and saw the fire and then stumbled onto your camp” you explained. “Well, I was just heading back to olivine city, where I’m from” she said “I could drop you off at a Pokémon centre, or...” jasmine trailed off, blushing heavily “what is it?” You asked “Y-you could come with m-me..” she said, extremely embarrassed. Judging by how this girl was talking, you could tell that she definitely wasn’t very good with people, and was clearly shy. You thought that this was also very cute, making you want to get to know her a bit better. “Um, yeah, sure. I’d like that!” You said with both enthusiasm and awkwardness. Jasmine blushed even harder, clearly not expecting you to say yes. “Uh, alright, well let’s get going then, heh heh” Jasmine said, even more awkwardly then you. “But uh, I guess I gotta finish packing up first.” She said while putting you down on the same log she was sitting on before, then putting out the fire and going to put the rest of her stuff in her miscellaneous bags.

As she packed, you couldn’t help but watch her and take in every detail about her. She was one of those girls who was just, pretty and beautiful. Not super hot with a large chest and butt, but somebody who just looks like you could really spend time with. Her brown hair was long and flowed down her back, but somehow also was tied into pigtails that went straight up. Her brown eyes had an air of calmness to them, her long legs suited her white dress quite nicely and her orange bow that was on her somewhat small breasts (but definitely there) was cute as well. You were guessing that she was probably somewhere from age 19 to 25 (she’s going to be 20 in this story). Maybe after all this shrinking business was done with, maybe you’d ask her out, and take her some place nice. But now was not the time to think about that, as jasmine finished with her clean up and was ready to go.

“A-alright, I’ve got all my things, I guess we can go now” she said, still looking embarrassed, but slightly less now. “So am I just going to walk beside you?” You asked “what?! You can’t do that! You could get hurt!” Jasmine said with yet again the same concerned tone. “Here, I’ll just put you here...” she said as she picked you up and carried you towards her...

“I’m just going to put you in my purse, is that okay?” Jasmine asked you. “Yeah, that’s fine, just don’t zip it up so I can breathe” you say, gesturing you hands in a zipper motion. “Of course, don’t worry, I’ve handled loving things quite well before” Jasmine said with a giggle, possibly referring to something, but you didn’t really know. Jasmine then lowered you into the main pocket of her purse “Alright, it should only be about an hours walk back, just hang tight ok?” She said “Yeah, ok...” you said quietly as you tried to take in your surroundings. There was a lot to look at inside, namely the poke balls in the corner. Now, it was normal for most people to have at least one Pokémon on them, that was just sort of a thing people did. However, 6 fully evolved Pokémon, all of the same type, was quite different from most people. Her team consisted of many different steel types, ranging from steelix to empoleon, all seemingly very high leveled. “Is she one of the elite four or something?” You asked yourself, not being up to date with the current people in the league. But considering she said the two of you were headed to olivine city, it was highly unlikely that an elite four member would live so far away. After taking a long look at her animal companions, you decided to look around a little bit more, most people considered it rude to look through a woman’s purse, but it’s not like you had anything better to do. As it turns out, there really wasn’t much else to look at, just a bit of makeup, keys, money, that kind of stuff. So you ended up just sitting there thinking about how you were going to get out of this situation and what you were going to do after. Eventually, you just fell asleep, resting your head on a soft glove that was left in there, hoping jasmine would remember you when the two of you arrived in olivine city.

You wake up to the smell of food, seemingly laying on something else, you’re not sure how much time has passed or where you are. You feel the ground beneath you, it sort of feels like a carpet but not as soft. “Where the hell am I?” You think to yourself as you finally open your eyes, only to find yourself on what looks like a folded up towel on top of a table. You then look towards the place where that smell was coming from. In the other room, there Jasmine was, preparing some sort of food, humming a tune to herself. You doubted she could hear you, so you contemplated wether you should try to get over there yourself. Before that though, jasmine began to walk towards you again, this time definitely aware of your presence. Her eyes lock onto you and she looks at you with the same smile as before she speaks up. “Oh, you’re awake!” She said “I made some food if you’re hungry, I hope you’re not allergic to pasta” “Oh, that sounds great, I’ve been pretty hungry ever since I ended up like this” you say, definitely looking forward to a meal. Jasmine then picks you up again her her delicate hands and carries you over to her kitchen, where she then sets you down at the table in front of a single cut up noodle with a few drops of tomato sauce on it. “I really hope it’s enough, I wasn’t sure how much I should give you” She said as she sat down across the table from you. “No no, it’s great” you say, trying to use the broken toothpick utensils she made you. The two of you eat in silence until Jasmine finally broke the silence. “So...um...do you think you can give me your address or something? Or at least what town you’re from? I can just bring you home after this if you want” she says, with a small hint of sadness in her eyes “sure, I’m from...” your mind blanks “I’m... not sure where I’m from...I can’t remember...” you say to her, unable to recall where you lived. “Well, maybe you can tell me at least what the place looks like?” She asked. You think hard for a moment, unable to remember anything at all about your old life. “I - I think when I shrunk my memories must have shrunk too, I can’t remember anything at all...” you say. Jasmine looks at you with that same look of concern she gave you when she found you, it seemed like she was the caring type. “Well... I guess you can s-stay here if you want...” she said, clearly flustered. You thought about it for a moment “do I really want to live with some girl I only met a few hours ago? I mean, it’s not like I know anyone else, and she’s also super cute and kind...” you contemplated for a few more seconds before coming to a decision.

If you were normal sized, you have no doubt she would be smaller. But with you at this size, she may as well be a mountain. And if she was this big to you when she was sitting, you don't even want to imagine how big she would be if she stood up.

"Hey. Flannery! Look down here!" you yell repeatedly as you try to get the girls attention. She however didn't hear you one bit as she brought the roasted marshmallow to her mouth and ate it. You saw the sticky substance get stuck between her teeth as you can just imagine that being you instead. Her eating your body like you were nothing but a marshmallow.

Seeing no other option, you start climbing her foot. You grip onto it as you pull yourself on top. Her wiggling toes just to the side of you. You ignore them and walk towards her leg, more specifically her long dark blue jeans.

What happens next?
14132112.title: Flannery's Camp

141321121.content:
You walk across Flannery's leg and try to keep your balance to avoid falling off. She's sitting with her legs crossed so it'll be a bit easy since you're on top of her thigh but since it's similar to a ramp, it's still pretty dangerous as you could slide off of it. You look up to see Flannery; still not looking down. You continued your way towards your destination.

After a series of careful walks, you finally made it near the girl's red belt. At this point, she really does look like a mountain to you but that still won't stop you from giving up. As you were about to climb up her upper body, Flannery suddenly stood up from her seat and you quickly cling to her belt after you quickly lost your balance. She began to walk and you try to hold on as much as possible. "Alright I guess it's time." you hear her voice from above. You wonder what does she have in store for herself.

You look right towards Flannery's direction and see that she is heading to her tent. You wonder just what she is planning to do now. As she got inside, she picked up a red bag and leaves her tent. You noticed that she's heading towards a rocky path of some sort. "It's....getting a bit....hot around here..." you said as you began to sweat "Just where on earth is she going?"

You don't want to literally melt in this heat so you fall into Flannery's pocket in hopes that you'll cool yourself off. Thankfully, it's less hot inside compared to the outside so maybe you could stay here a little longer. "Alright, I'm finally here." you heard her say as you peek from inside the pocket. This looks to be some sort of mountainous area but what got your attention was a large pool of steaming hot water. "Wait a minute, isn't this supposed to be the hot spring in Lavaridge Town?!" you said to yourself. So this is where Flannery wants to go. Speaking of Flannery, she goes straight towards a small building; presumably the changing room.

Should you get off now or stay?

You couldn’t help but gawk at her bottom, which was adorned with a black flame pattern swimsuit. “Hmph, looking good as always!” She remarked, before turning to the changing bench and picking up her jeans, throwing you out on the seat.

She turned around and hung her clothes on a rack and grabbed her Pokenav. Flannery had sat down and crossed her legs as she called a certain male friend she had been hoping to see today. Her foot shook in anticipation, causing her ass to constantly rumble on top of you. Eventually, after no answer, Flannery sighed and…

You decided to climb inside her jeans. Probably you could get her attention. The inside was warm and as you continue upward, it was getting hotter. Flannery felt something climb her bare leg, but shrugged it off and thought it was nothing. The journey became harder as her legs began to sweat. You almost lost your balance for a minute or two.

" I heard that Fire Gym Leaders were hot, but JESUS!" You thought to your self. It was either her leg was near the fire or her jeans conduct a lot of heat.

You finally reached Flannery's pelvis. There was a lot more room in here due to your size. You spotted her black panties with a flame design on the front. You blushed and turned away. Perverted thoughts of her flashed into your head.

141321122.title: Fire Starter

14132113.content:
Life up to this point has not been easy for you. From working odd jobs so you can eat to barley having enough to make rent. It wasn't in till you got the opportunity of a lifetime to get accepted into Team Rockets new Hoenn division. That your life actually started to turn around for you. You didn't even give it a second thought, after joining you work hard and became part of some of the top grunts. On your way through this success you even made a girlfriend out of one of the female rocket grunts. Life seemed to finally be going your way, And the boss had decided for your graduation exam if you succeed at it you can skip grunt and become a rocket special agent spy. This was your chance to win.

The mission was simple in your mind, all you had to do was sneak into the local gym that was ran by Winona, Grab an artifact that she was safe keeping for an archaeologist, and escape with it before anyone notices. The only real challenge other then the woman gym leader who would be nothing compared to your strength, was that team magma was also sending a top grunt to steal this artifact. So you took the mission on, got packed and told your girlfriend not to worry you should be back in a few days top. With the arrangements made, you went off towards your mission. But in all the excitement you forgot your Pokemon at home base.

When you arrived at your campsite to begin the mission, you notice that you left your Pokemon at home but figured that you probably wouldn't need them anyway. And so It became a bit late in the afternoon as you began to approach the gym. Looking around the perimeter you saw the staff of the gym going home and the gym leader starting her training in the battle area. This was the perfect time to break in you thought as you shot a grappling hook towards the gym. Once inside you snuck your way around, looking into each room for the artifact. To your luck you found the room and quickly went inside but to your surprise a magma female grunt drops down from the air vent in the ceiling.

You watch as she gracefully grabs the artifact that was in the desk and puts it into some ray gun device. As she turns the woman sees you and then gives a smirk, "... Well looks like we don't have to wait to see if this machine can do its job.." The girl says this. And right before you can even question anything a blast of white light hits you. The next thing you know, your knocked out and the magma grunt leaves.

A few hours past and you wake up to the sounds of vibration and loud stomping noises. You begin the wake and notice that that the desk that was right in front of you is now gigantic. And right as you see that a colossal shoe is stomped right next to you. Leading your eyes up from that shoe you see the giant gym leader Winona standing above you. She walked over to her desk and sat down. She then open her desk drawer and notice that the artifact she was safe keeping has gone missing. "Oh my.. where is it?? I gotta find it..." Winona says this while frantically getting up to neatly search through her desk and other filling cabinets in the office room.

At this point you realize that you somehow shrunk, and now are in even bigger trouble then just lost your chance of acquiring the artifact. You think that if you leave now, there is no telling what kind of things outside of these walls could kill you, now that your so small. But do you really take the chance and try to get this giant gym leaders attention, I man who knows what she would say or do to you if she found out your from team rocket.

(What do you do?)

says "oh my you must be some perv... (angry)
141321133.content:
I'm just going to have to risk it and run away. It would be way to dangerous to just interact with this woman who dosn't know you. Plus being rocket alone she would probably assume you have the artifact. With that you ran for it, dashing your way towards the open giant doors. As Winona who has no idea your tiny and running for your life is searching through her filing cabinet she decides maybe it fell under it. But right as she looks down, Winona see's a bug scurrying itself across the dirty floor. "Oh my.. an insect, I wonder how you got in. Well I can't have bugs just thinking they can just come into my gym without punishment. Its looks like my Skarmory has earned itself a treat" Winona says to herself.But with you being to busy with trying to get out of there you don't even here what she is saying till "Go Skarmory, see that bug over there. It's all yours...". After that is said you see the danger your in and try to pick up some speed. All the while the Skarmory charges itself over to you.

A giant metal beak comes down right behind you, the vibration of the beak hitting the ground launch you slightly in the air. You were luckily enough not to fly into the Pokemon's mouth but instead landed on top of its beak which you grasp out to as tightly as one could. When Skarmory saw this it started to wave its beak up and down, trying to get you to fly up in the air so it could catch you in it's mouth. While this was going on Winona was getting on her hands and knees searching underneath a filing cabinet. But then a the moment happened where you could not hold on anymore and you were sent flying off of the beak. Again you were in luck as you were launched off the Bird Pokemon was shaking its head back and forth. This sent you right under the filing cabinet where Winona was searching under.

Skarmory then came charging after you, and in doing so the bird Pokemon hit Winona into a wall. As the Pokemon's giant beak appeared from right under the file cabinet entrance. It was chopping right in front of you, But had no way to reach you since the cabinet was to low to the ground and you were to far back under the filing cabinet for the Pokemon to reach you. Winona was kinda of angry at this point, just getting shoved against the wall and having a Pokemon who was being bested by a bug. She just said "Ugh... I can't even deal with you right now Skarmory, Now return...".

After returning her Pokemon Winona turns her attention towards you. She gets back on her hands and knees so she could just reach in under and grab you. She looks under and scans for you in the darkness and then suddenly you two make eye contact. "There you are" Winona says as she quickly and easily grabs you with her gloved hand. "Now time to get a good look at the bug who somehow survived.." as she says this her face is starting to come closer and closer to you as you hang there struggling in her strong grip. Winona's face become's a look of shocked as she see's that "Your not a bug.... your a tiny man???" She says. Winona then starts to loosen her grip slightly to allow you to just sit in her palm. And then Winona...
