1413212.title: Liza, Phoebe, or Glacia!

choices: "Learn what it's like to be a bug!" (Feet)
"Understand how it feels to be food!" (Mouth)
14132121.content:
You were feeling pretty lousy after a hard fought battle. You had traveled over from Slateport to Mossdeep city because of work, but you had a few days off after you finished your duties. You were a small time trainer, but had never battle very much because of your city. Slateport wasn't very close to any city with a Pokémon gym and you never got into Pokémon contests. Sometimes you'd go see one with a friend, but you never considered participating in one.

Being in Mossdeep for work gave you the perfect excuse to take a shot on a gym with your Pokémon partners. You figured that you didn't have a very good chance at winning, but you wanted to have the experience anyways. You even had the luck of one of the gym leaders being absent! Usually the Mossdeep gym was run by a pair of young twins named Tate and Liza. Tate was apparently away on business for some unspecified reason and Liza was the only one present. You were surprised by how young she was, maybe it made you overconfident?

But Liza hardly seemed concerned. She even encouraged you to use both of your Pokémon against her while she used one like normal. You thought that the advantage you had gave you a good chance to win. But you were dreadfully wrong. Liza's Lunatone wiped the floor with your duo of Pokémon. They put up a good fight and got some good licks in, but you were hopeless at directing them. In the end they both ended up knocked out at the same time, while Liza's Lunatone stood strong.

Liza had tried to assure you that you had fought well considering it was your first big battle in a long time, but that didn't make you feel much better. She seemed to be able to tell that you were exhausted from the battle, so she let you rest in a private part of the gym. She even offered to have your Pokémon delivered to a Pokémon center, which you happily accepted. You had been sulking in the private room ever since, disappointed that you had grown cocky and let your Pokémon down.

"It really feels like it was my fault we lost." You laugh to yourself quietly.

Your musings are cut short when you hear the door to the room open. Looking up at the door, you quickly look down a bit as Liza entered the room. You were still a little shocked that such a small girl was a powerful gym leader. "How are you doing, challenger?" She asked you, a kind smile on her face.

You smile back, disappointment reflecting on your lips. "I'm feeling alright. Still a bit disappointed."

Liza kind smile shrunk into a stern look. "Why? You did perfectly fine for your first serious battle. I was impressed by the strength of your Pokémon. They were raised well and seem very fond of you." She took a seat next to you, her feet just barely not reaching the ground.

"Yeah, those two did really great. So I feel bad that I did so badly. It feels like it was my fault we lost. I didn't direct them well enough."

Liza laughed before looking at you sternly. "I see. That explains why you are so upset by a good battle. You feel responsible for the defeat."

You nod. "Exactly, if I gave better instructions, they might've been able to almost beat you."

"Almost isn't giving your Pokémon enough credit." Liza's shoes slipped off her feet slightly, only be held off the floor by her toes. "I think I know why you feel like your ability to command is lacking." She said ominously.

"Oh? Why is that?"

"You haven't battled much correct? You are mostly an everyman worker?"

"What kind of kid calls an office job 'everyman worker'?" You thought to yourself, amused. "Uh yeah. Never really got a chance to get into battling."

"That's why you don't feel comfortable with giving instructions for battle. You haven't faced much adversity in you life." She paused briefly before hastily adding, "A-adversity in battle mind you. Adversity in battle."

You click your tongue, unoffended by her wording. "I guess that makes sense. It's too bad my Pokémon are stuck with a trainer like me." You laugh.

Liza laughed a bit as well before everything grew quite. Then she spoke again. "I could help you with that you know." She said in what amounted to a whisper.

"What?" You ask, not sure if you heard what she said.

"I can help you put a bit more adversity in your life." Liza explains, slightly more confident. "To help you lead your Pokémon better!"

You look at Liza for a moment, unsure how to respond. But the earnest look on her face and the fact that she was a young girl trying really hard to sound cool made the scenario feel endearing, so you agree to let her help you.

As soon as you agree, you hear a slap as Liza's shoes seem to snap back on her feet. "E-excellent! I've been wanting to try this out for a while." She admitted, you having no idea what she meant.

You were going to ask what she meant, but were stopped when you noticed that Liza was getting... bigger. Confused, you look at your hand and begin to panic when you notice a glowing aura around you. "Wh-what's going on!?" You shout at Liza as you reach eye level with her.

She had a happy smile on her face as she watched you dwindle below her neckline. "This is all part of your adversity training." She pronounced happily. "And I wanted to see if my shrinking psychic was working yet." She mumbled that second part, quietly enough for you to not hear it.

Unable to get any more words out you watch as you dwindle to an absolutely puny size. The once small girl was now bigger than the Mossdeep space center! "What exactly does your adversity training involve?" You ask nervously.

Liza smiled happily before explaining. "In order to experience adversity you must see what other parts of life experiences. Think of it like living out the life of another being." She pulled her legs up onto the couch you two were and lowered her head closer to you. Her eyes sparkled with wonder at your miniscule size. "Awww, this is cuter than I thought it would be." She cooed in her mind.

"Alright, now let me explain your first task. You must..."
14132121.title: Liza's Adversity Training

141321211.content:
If you weren’t currently the size of an insect, you would be laughing at what Liza just said. But since you were the size of an insect, you were afraid of what exactly she had in mind. The foot of the girl you once towered over probably towered over you now! But you had agreed to letting her help you, so you had no choice but to comply.

“How should I face the adversity of an insect exactly?” You ask Liza.

Liza opens her mouth to speak, but stops. ‘I honestly didn’t think that far.’ She thought to herself. So she wouldn’t look like a fool, she brought her finger to her chin and started rubbing back and forth, smiling at you to make it look like she wasn’t frantic.

Her act was pretty convincing and you wanted to believe that she was examining you, trying to figure out which of her many ideas would be best. But the sound of her feet nervously coming on and off her heels made it hard to believe she wasn’t completely calm.

Liza continued to look at you, her mind swirling with desperate thoughts. How could she sound cool and responsible when she had no idea!? If she was reckless, she could lose her gym license and without her the gym would be less interesting and less challenging. But Liza’s nervous shoeplay actually gave her a quick and convincing idea.

Smiling confidently, she turned around and looked at her feet. She quickly took off one of her shoes and took a moment to compose herself. “Okay, I just got to look confident and the trainer will go along fine with this. Maybe he’ll help make the gym famous when word gets out about my power!”

Unaware of her inner monologue, you wait with baited breath for Liza to turn around. You gasp loudly when you see that Liza one of her shoes in hand. You didn’t like where this was going.

“Okay, brave trainer, what do you see?” Liza said presenting her shoe to you.

‘She didn’t have to put it so close.’ You thought, disheartened at the shoe’s size. It was clear that there was plenty of space in the shoe for you, even if her foot was in with you. And you definitely could see signs of her wearing the shoe, especially around the toe section. ‘I guess posing on your tip toes would cause that.’

“I see your shoe, Liza.” You answer the girl’s question.

She nods and smiles. “Yes! That’s right. Now… pretend you are a bug. Now what do you see?”

You look past the shoe and at Liza confused. “A shoe?”

Liza groaned and rolled her eyes. “No! Bugs don’t know what shoes are!”

You shrug confused. “I don’t know what else to say. I’ve never been a bug before.”

“Well now you are the size of one, so roleplay a little.” Liza said, not understanding how childish she sounded. “I’ll help you. What do humans use shoes for when they see a bug?”

You grimace hearing her question, not wanting to think about that at your current stature. “Uh, we step on them with shoes.”

Liza nodded eagerly. “Yes! And stepping on bugs…” She trailed off expecting you to finish.

“Kills them.”

“Yes! Good job my little pupil.” Liza gave you a small clap, shoe still in hand.

‘I’m some kind of student now!? I thought this was a quick favor?’ You groaned mentally.

“So, as a bug, when you see my shoe you should be thinking ‘death’.” Liza explained, trying to make her point at the expense of intimidating you. “Same thing for me feet or even my toes. They are all death to you.”

“G-great, that makes sense to me!” You say exasperated.

Shifting her position, Liza slams one of her feet in front of you, startling you in the process. She also uses her hand to hold her demonstration shoe in front of you.

“As a bug, these two things are the greatest adversities of your life.” As if to emphasize her words, her toes wiggled.

‘The feet and shoe of a little girl. Bug’s leading humiliating lives.’ You moan.

“So, what do you want me to do? What’s my training?” You ask Liza.

“I have two courses that you can follow.” Liza began, trying to sound cool. “Whenever someone sees a bug, their first instinct is to squish it. I will play the role of the giant trying to stomp you, while you try to avoid my foot. No shoes of course… because I would crush you.”

Gulp.

“Your second course if more difficult than even the normal life of an insect. I could dump you into my shoe and force you down all the way to the toe section. Then I would leave you and my shoes in this room alone for a while. Your mission would be to escape my shoe before I get back.”

The second mission sounded a lot easier to you since you wouldn’t have to directly worry about Liza until the time was up. But how much time would she give you to get out.

As if reading your mind, Liza spoke, “I will not specify how long you have. A bug would have no way to know so neither will you. It will be a reasonable time though. Plus my shoe is pretty small, it should be easy to get out.” Liza laughed softly.

Her description of her shoe hurt you though. Small was not the word you thought of near her shoe.

“So, which of the paths laid before you will you chose?” Liza giggled happily in her mind. ‘That all sounded pretty good I think!’

What is your choice?
141321211.title: Adversity of Insects

choices: You don't see through it in time!
1413212112.content:
You sighed wearily. You really didn't want to chose either of Liza's trials, the whole experience was humiliating! Liza was so young but so massive compared to you that she was asking how you wanted to be tested against her feet! You were smaller than her foot and she was using it to put some adversity in your life. You could never tell anyone about this, not even your Pokémon. You wanted to say no to Liza, ask her to grow you back, but you felt like you couldn't. She seemed so mature and serious about this that it was downright scary. Thankfully she had been generous so far, but you weren't sure if she'd take no for an answer.

Meanwhile, Liza waited eagerly for your answer. As you remained silent, she got more and more nervous. 'Oh no, what if he says no? I can't force him to do this! Well I guess I could, but then I wouldn't be able to let him go ever. It might not be bad to have a little trainer in my shoe forever, but I would have to keep it a secret from Tate. He would be super mad about this.' She cringed internally, imagining what her brother would do. 'M-maybe I could shrink him too! He doesn't know that I've been practicing this type of psychic power. A brother in one shoe and a trainer in another could be nice, and then I could be a strong solo gym leader. Or maybe Tate would want to share? One week in his shoe and then one week in mine..' Liza shook her head. 'What am I talking about? I'm doing this to help a trainer grow, and test out how I've improved, nothing more. I just gotta focus on making this good.'

Liza's internal monologue gave you enough time to make your decision. "Okay Liza, I made my choice." You take a deep breathe, astounded that you were about to agree to this. "I want to try getting out of your shoe."

'Yessss.' Liza thought happily. "A wise choice. The time you spend alone in my shoe will... allow you to grasp your adversities more effectively. It should be a good experience for you." She said trying to keep up her wise teacher image.

"Just put me in your shoe please."

Liza nodded eagerly. "Okay, let's begin your trial." Trying to contain her excitement, she gingerly plucked you off of your seat and moved you to the entrance of her shoe. As she carefully stuffed you inside towards the toe section, a dreadful thought came into her head. 'Oh, I forgot that the assistants at the gym hadn't replaced my shoes. These were supposed to be washed and have the insoles replaced! Sorry trainer... but I guess this is more authentic.' Pushing aside her concern for you, she gently set you down in the toe section, unintentionally putting you in the worn spot of her big toe.

'How long has she been wearing these?' You wonder to yourself as you feel the moist floor, clearly from the sweat that dripped off her toe. 'Hopefully the rest of the shoe isn't as... damp.'

While you were occupied with your new environment, Liza was busy with her psychic energy outside of her shoe. She focused her mind on the entrance of her shoe and mumbled some unnecessary words. This was part of the trial that she didn't tell you about. She figured that escaping her shoe would be a pretty simple task, even for someone of your size. So to make it more challenging, she put an illusion on the entrance of her shoe. When you laid eyes on it, your mind and body would be flooded with an artificial experience. You would feel like you were going through your task as normal, but you would actually be standing in place. The illusion could only be broken by doing something that would cause great shock to you. Liza wasn't sure what that was, but she figured you could figure something out. With her work done, she addressed you at the toe section of her shoe.

"Now, my little bug trainer. I am going to put this shoe on the floor. I ask that you don't start moving until you hear the door to this room close. Of course there's nothing I can do to stop you, but please do as I say."

You grumble to yourself, dissatisfied. "I guess I can listen to her."

Uncomfortable with just one shoe, Liza wiggled her foot out of her other shoe and kicked it away, under some nearby furniture. As she started to lower her shoe with you in it to the ground, she gave you a few more words of encouragement. "Now don't be afraid brave bug. You can escape my shoe as long as you don't give up. You might have a great shock or two on your journey, but you can succeed as long as you persevere." With her last words, she set her shoe on the ground and walked out of the room, making sure to slam the door behind her.

Not wanting to go too far, Liza sat next to the door, her legs crossed together. "Hopefully this will be as helpful to him as I think it will be. It would be a shame if he didn't get anything out of this. How long should I wait anyways?" Liza scrunched her toes eagerly, wondering what she should do to pass some time. Glancing at her feet, she noticed that they were a bit dirty and rather sweaty. "I guess I'll wash up a bit." She stood to her feet and moved to find a place to clean up. "I don't think he deserves to deal with dirty feet and dirty shoes if he fails."

Meanwhile, you were in Liza's shoe, still laughing at her final parting words. She sounded so serious about the whole thing that it was adorable. Even if she did sound mature, she was still adorable. Figuring you should work as fast as you can, you begin your trek to the opening of her shoe, slightly climbing out of the imprint of her toe.

Are you able to break through the illusion and get out of her shoe before Liza gets back?
1413212112.title: A Bug in Her Shoe

14132121122.content: But was it Liza who came back, or an unaware gym trainer that decided to borrow Liza's shoes while she is cleaning up?
14132121122.title: You don't see through it in time!

choices: Liza thinks it would be best to face the adversity of her sole…
Liza takes you out, and has another idea for your training…
141321211221.content:
“Right… So this should be easy…” You said to yourself as you started to walk towards the back of the shoe. At your size, it was a bit easier said than done, but you still felt like you were making progress across her sole, which was damp with sweat, and seemed really worn out. “Unsettlingly worn out in fact…” You muttered to yourself, quickening your pace a bit. Images of Liza dancing around in her shoes, pressing down all of her weight on her soles flashed through your head.

‘Why exactly did she insist on this?’ You thought to yourself. There had to be thousands of ways she could ‘test’ you, or make your face ‘adversity’ at this size. She seemed to insist on using her feet, either trying to stomp you or pin you in her shoe. It was a little strange, but she seemed to legitimately want to help you be a better trainer, and you guess that’s what was important.

Meanwhile, Liza walked to the bathroom to try and clean up her bare feet, and she giggled to herself as she wiped her soles down. “I wonder how he’s handling against the illusion… I bet he hasn’t even moved yet…” She giggled, imagining the trainer idly standing in the tip of her shoe, waiting for her to come back…

“I… But of course he could always overcome the illusion like a strong trainer would… And if he doesn’t, I’ll get to train him more! It’s a win-win… I could think of tons more ways to help train him! I’m sure wriggling around under my toes will put things into perspective” She giggled, wiggling her toes as she cleaned them off. “Maybe I’ll get to keep him, and battle him against my toes every day!

She quickly realized that her thoughts were wrong, he was just a trainer who needed her help, she shouldn’t take advantage of him like that. Even if it would be amazing. “Riiiight…” She said, having cleaned both of her feet she looked at herself in the mirror and smiled. “I should get back to him, I have a bug to sq… Train! A bug to train!”

Back inside her shoe, you were just how she envisioned you, helplessly standing in the front of her shoe. But you felt like you were just where her heel sat in the shoe normally. Calmly, you continued and started to climb the back of the shoe. On the edge of your hearing, you heard the door opening. She was coming, and you were right there!

But you weren’t, and as Liza eagerly walked up to her shoe, something was off. It sounded muffled, but you were right there… “Aw, you didn’t make it…” Liza’s cute voice chided.

No, this was wrong…

Fear ran through your veins and your breath heightened, and suddenly you appeared in the tip of her shoe again. ‘What!?’ You thought, but you were there! This was wrong! You stood in shock as the earth shook beneath you as Liza’s foot gently started to push into her shoe. What little light got into the shoe was quickly extinguished. “I really hope you’re not in there…” She lied, “And if you are…” She giggled, “You’d better be reaaady!” Her toes wiggled around like the heads of a Hydreigon as they made their way towards you, seeming to hunger for you. Instinctively you backed away, only to fall back against the front of the shoe. There was nowhere to run, and all you could do was watch as the light faded. The warm presence of her foot washed over you as you were pinned to the front of her shoe by her big toe.

You supposed that it could have been worse, you could be smothered by her toe, or trapped underneath her sole. Her big toe pushed you against the front of her shoe, covering your lower body while your upper body was pinned against the wall.

Liza giggled and wriggled her toes around, feeling you pinned in the front of her shoe. “Looks like you couldn’t break the illusion, that means you should have tried harder.” She scolded, pushing her toe as far into the front of her shoe as it would go.

You groaned and squirmed against the unstoppable force that was only a girl’s big toe. This was utterly humiliating…
141321211221.title: You don't overcome the adversity...

choices: Liza takes a nap with her shoes on!
Someone visits Liza! (Either Tate or someone else)
1413212112213.content:
Liza smiled happily as she swayed the shoe you were in side to side. She could feel you firmly pushed against her big toe. She made sure to stifle any delighted giggles that escaped her, she had to hide the fact that she was enjoying this. 'When I started learning this psychic ability, I wasn't too sure about it. But now I can say that it was totally worth it.' She thought gingerly, briefly scrunching her toes to let you get some breathing room. 'Not that he has much room anyways, he's... an honest trainer who let me try to help him grow. I gotta at least try to make this a little beneficial for him, even if it is really fun.'

Inside of her shoe, you groan as Liza's big toe once again settles on you. "From now on, I'm always going to check for bugs whenever I put my shoes on." As if hearing your words, Liza's toe pushes against you, further pushing you into the toe end of her shoe. As the giant appendage pushes into you, you notice something interesting about. "Her toes are, agh, a lot cleaner than her shoe is." You say groaning when the toe crushed against you mid sentence. "She must have cleaned them while I was... training. That's pretty nice, even though she stuck me in her shoe."

Having her fill of enjoying you be trapped by her toes, Liza finally settled down. She let her foot drop to the ground and remain motionless, lightly pinning you against the end of her shoe. "Hey, can you hear me in there? My foot might be muffling my voice, so signal if you can hear me. Just... scratch my toe or something." Liza frowned for a moment, did that sound responsible enough? She had to keep up the wise teacher image or else-.A scratching sensation on her big toe let her sigh and relief and forget her worries. "Good, I'm glad you can hear me. We have some things to discuss."

"She's going to leave me in here." You groan, letting your head drop onto her toe.

"Okay so... you failed your first adversity." Liza began, once again making everything up on the fly. "But that's alright. There's no shame in failing a difficult task the first time you are required to do it. I don't think anyone could escape my shoe at your size on their first try." Her heart skipped a beat at the thought of others being in her shoe. What if she had a whole group of people in her shoes? One for each toe? The idea was both embarrassing and thrilling, being in charge of a group for once would be great! She quickly shook those thoughts from her head.

"You weren't even aware of the illusion I put on the opening of my shoe." She felt another scratch on her toe as those words left her mouth. "W-wait! I'm sorry for deceiving you, but it's all part of the lesson! Things will not always go as planned, obstacles you were never aware of can always present themselves without warning. And you honestly probably should have guessed I would do something like that. I mean, if I can shrink you with my powers, a little illusion wouldn't be much trouble."

A frustrated sigh escapes you as you lean against the wall that was Liza's shoe. "I guess she has a point. Her test was a little simple." You weren't sure why you convinced yourself of that, but you felt like you couldn't be mad at Liza. She meant well and everything she said continued to make sense. "No wonder she's already a gym leader."

The lack of any more irritated scratching gave Liza the confidence to keep going. "I'm glad you understand. Now let's go over the results. You couldn't break my illusion and ended up squished between my big toe and the end of my shoe. If you were a bug you probably would've been a stain by now. I won't let anything like that happen, but you should receive a penalty for failing your first test."

Isn't being trapped inside of her shoe enough for now?

Soon after she finished speaking, you felt a tingling sensation across your body. Quietly, Liza's big toe scrunched away from you. Though you had room to move, the tingling sensation prevented you from doing so.

"Since you did not get squished like a bug, I will have to give you a different penalty to make the adversity more difficult. And I have the perfect idea for that!"

To your horror, the cramped space that was Liza's shoe began to grow bigger! What was once a cramped space slowly grew into a hall like space and then into a spacious room! And things only got bigger from there. You never thought you would miss the ability to scratch at a little girl's toe, but now you couldn't do that to protest to Liza.

"I'm sure that you're super confused right now." You heard Liza clearly from outside. "But this is the best way I can penalize you while keeping the theme of the trial. There's just one more tiny detail." There was a brief pause before Liza spoke again. "Sorry, I didn't mean tiny in a taunting way."

All you could do was wait to see what else Liza had planned for you. By now the toe you had once been close in size with was like a large building! The tingling sensation continued to wash over you even though you had stopped shrinking. To your horror, you felt your body begin to move! You weren't headed out of the shoe like you wanted, but were being dragged closer to Liza's toes! No... it wasn't her toes, you were being moved to the gap between her toes! You were tossed into the gap between Liza's big and second toe, the space acting like a vast canyon. "Good luck brave trainer!" Liza said in a cutesy voice.

In the world outside of her shoe, Liza finally let loose a giggle. She had just tossed a trainer into the space between her toes! The experience was absolutely surreal and she loved every second of it. "I'm such a good mentor." Liza mused to herself, half kidding, half genuinely proud.

What dose Liza do as you have your perilous journey?
1413212112213.title: Toetally Legit Penalty

141321212.content:
“Uh, what do you mean understand food?” You ask nervously. “Are you going to like eat me!?”

“Yes, and you will-” Liza wanted to say something grand, but stopped when she saw you start running away. A sad, disappointed noise escaped Liza as she watched you scurry away. Gently she reached forwards and scooped you up in her hands. Feeling you struggling, she created a cage with her fingers, cutting off your escape.

She looked at you, her eyes clearly apologetic and spoke, no longer concerned with sounding cool. “Hey, please don’t be afraid! I don’t mean I’m actually going to eat you! I’m not a cannibal!” Liza explained desperately. She hadn’t thought you would react so badly to the start of her speech.

Seeing the look on her face and hearing her speak made you realize that maybe you overreacted to what she had said. “I’m sorry.” You nervously rub the back of your head. “I guess I overreacted. I’ll trust you, gym leader Liza.”

You didn’t know, but adding the gym leader part made Liza really happy. Since she was pretty young and fought as a tag team with her brother, she didn’t get much recognition as a gym leader. She understood it was weird, not even normal gym leaders were referred to that way, but she wanted to hear it once. It sounded more respectable in a strange way.

“Don’t worry. As long as you know I don’t mean harm. I just want to help.”

You nod. “Okay. So… how are you going to eat me without actually eating me?”

Liza, keeping you in her hands got up from her sitting position and made her way towards the exit. “Okay, I just thought of this now but I think it will really help.” She admitted honestly. She decided to stop trying to sound mature for now, she had to focus on her idea.

Moving through the strange halls of her gym, she finally got to a new pair of doors. Hoping to keep you secure and comfortable, she pushed against it with her back and made her way inside. Inside you saw that there was a single table with a simple chair tucked under it. On top of the table was a plate of food. A simple bowl of white rice.

Liza gently set you down on the table, next to the bowl of rice. “Okay, so before I saw you, I had one of the workers prepare a snack for me. I know white rice is pretty boring but I like it.” She stopped, noting she was blabbing, and continued. “Anyways, I think this is the perfect scenario for your training.”

Down on the plate, you were confused about what Liza meant. She had just brought you to her snack. Was she going to have you watch her eat it? Close to her mouth maybe? You stare at the large bowl of rice, not certain how to proceed.

“So… you want me to watch you eat?”

Liza bit her lip nervously and groaned. “No, I’m going to eat the rice and you are going to… be inside of it.” She mumbled that last part, embarrassed.

“You said you weren’t going to eat me!” You complain to Liza, ignoring your desire to run again.

“I-I know and I won’t!” Liza answered defensively. “But you being in the rice while I eat it is the only way this will work.”

You sigh and look at the bowl again, trying to convince yourself of Liza idea. But you can’t. “But- you’ll be eating me.”

Liza held a finger in front of you, telling you to hold on a second. She had to think of a good way to explain her plan to you. She didn’t want to eat you but the way she explained it sounded like she did. Eventually she figured it out. “I-I won’t be swallowing you! You’ll just be in my mouth while I eat the rice!”

Okay, now the pieces were starting to come together but you still had concerns. “Not getting swallowed is good, but you’d still chew me into pieces!”

“No, I wouldn’t! With each bite I’m going to feel it on my tongue, tasting for you. If I feel you, then I’ll give you time to get somewhere safe and observe from inside my mouth.”

“What exactly am I observing?”

“Well, you’re not just observing, you are also experiencing the adversity of food.” Liza explained, figuring trying to sound mature and cool now would help. “While you’re submerged in that rice, waiting for me to come in and eat it, you will understand anxiety. Then when I start eating the rice, you will understand fear as more and more of it is eaten away. Eventually being moved towards my salivating mouth and watching food go down my throat will give you a greater rush of fear. And then when you’re inside of my mouth, watching the rice get chewed ans swallowed, you will be filled with adrenaline and a desire to survive! Fear, anxiety, and adrenaline are all important parts of Pokémon battles. This will help you understand those emotions better; I promise!”

You hated to admit it, but somehow Liza’s crazy idea made sense. The things she was saying sounded like they made sense and her confidence really sold it better. Your unwillingness from before falters before giving way. “Fine. I’ll go along with your idea. Just don’t swallow or chew me please.” You ask as you begin climbing into the bowl.

Liza pumps her fists happily; she had convinced you to try her idea! “Alright, I promise. Don’t worry, I’m a picky eater. I might spit you out by mistake if you taste bad!” She giggled cutely, making you a bit calmer about the whole thing. “Okay. I’ll come back in in a minute. I can’t make the experience feel real if I know where you are in the bowl.”

You wanted to protest but when you caught your breath to do so, you heard the door close. Groaning you continue your way into the bowl.

Unknown to you, Liza actually had a plan to make the experience truly authentic for you. “I bet I could temporarily wipe my memories of the trainer in my rice. That would make the whole thing more effective! Oh, but if I don’t remember him I could break my promise. And if he somehow caused the accident, I might not remember him in time to fix it. What should I do?”

Liza scratched her head and paced back and forth for a while, debating her options. After a small debate, she made her decision…
141321212.title: Adversity of Food

1413212121.content:
Liza decided to temporary wipe her memory's of you. She then walked out of the kitchen and began to hold her hands up to each side of her head. After a few seconds, she completely forgot about you.

"What was I doing here?" Liza thought to herself. She began to walk back into the kitchen until she spotted the bowl of rice, unaware of you presence.

"Oh, what a coincidence. I was getting hungry!" Liza said happily as she licked her lips.

She sat down, chopsticks in hand, and began digging in. You were able to climb back to the surface of the rice, just as you saw a chunk of rice began to ascend towards of the young trainer's mouth as it disappears almost instantly. You decided to stay where you are to get it over with and sure enough, Liza's chopsticks began to dive towards you. Liza was right, you began to fell anxiety as you were brought towards her mouth. Her lips parted slowly as you were dropped into her maw with the rice. You felt her warm breath blown on you as you saw the last bit of rice vanished behind her tongue. You later felt a huge amount of fear and adrenaline rush through you. Liza began chewing the rice as you began to move to safety. Bits of rice were obliterated from her pearly whites and at the same time, you almost backed up to the edge of her tongue. You stared down her throat as you almost became mesmerized by the sight, but you snapped out of it, remembering that you didn't want to be eaten. You manage to back away towards the tip of her tongue, only to be surprised attack
.
"This piece of rice, why does it taste so good!?" Liza thought to herself. She began sucking on you like a jawbreaker, moving you from cheek to cheek.

"MMM! Whatever it is, it's better than this rice!" Liza smiled to herself. She then opened her mouth, revealing you to the outside. Her tongue continued to taste you body. Her breath became more humid, you could tell she was enjoying this too much. Finally, she closes her mouth with you inside and......
1413212121.title: Deja Vu

choices: Digest him, he clearly likes it, maybe other people will too?
Teleport  him out, ASAP.  Good feelings don’t trump morals, and this
14132121211.content:
Liza continues to suck on you with increasing intensity, your body being coated in thick layers of saliva as she enjoyed your new and exotic flavor. A part of your adrenaline addled mind had started enjoying being treated like a piece of candy in the now dark cavern that was Liza’s mouth. The rest of you distinctly remembered Liza’a promise to NOT eat you and was getting increasingly worried that she had somehow forgotten about you.

Suddenly, the moans of contentment stopped, as did the sucking as Liza’s tongue returned to its resting position in her mouth, with you laying in the middle, too exhausted by your ordeal to move. The vigorous tasting and sucking had devastated your clothes. Your shirt was gone entirely, having been weakened by the saliva and torn off at some point, while your shorts had mostly disappeared, revealing your plain black boxers underneath. Your shoes and socks had been left outside as Liza had determined they would taste bad and had stealthily teleported them off while you were carried by her, leaving you barefoot.

As you tried to catch your breath, too weak to call out to Liza, your fears were confirmed as the tongue lifted up and the whole of Liza’s mouth tilted back, sending you straight towards the back of the throat, like any other piece of food to pass through the young Psychic’s mouth. Any attempt to stop your inevitable descent was foiled by a combination of your pitiful strength and the slickness of her saliva covered tongue. Before you knew it, your body was caught headfirst in her esophagus.

There was a brief moment that seemed to stretch on for eternity, as you sat on the precipice of no return, of being nothing but nutrition for the growing gym leader. No one would remember the challenger who had been defeated by one half of the Psychic gym leaders and had disappeared the next day. Liza obviously didn’t remember you, as it so obviously seemed. And part of you... enjoyed this? Yes, the same part of you that felt inadequate to be a trainer, the same part that enjoyed being sucked on like a piece of candy wanted to disappear down her throat, past her collarbone, and into oblivion. The rest of you, too weak to protest, accepted your fate as a loud *GLUCK* and a final moan of contentment rang around your ears and you were pulled down past the point of no return.

Liza took a second to breathe as the oddly large piece of rice slipped down her throat. She could feel it as it slid down and felt compelled to trace its path with her finger. Down, down, the lump disappearing behind her collar bone. She continued to trace the rice as it slid towards her stomach, the feeling being indescribable. A fuzzy part of her mind seemed to protest, but it was smothered under these amazing new feelings. She felt the rice slow as it approached the stomach ring and waited with baited breath for it to enter her stomach. “Sooo good!” She thought. “Hurry up and get in my tummy! I can’t wait anymore!” Liza murmured to herself as she panted, a strange feeling building in the core of her body, getting stronger as the rice piece, or whatever it was, got closer to her belly.

Your journey down the esophagus was far smoother and more pleasurable than you could’ve ever believed it would’ve been. The muscles massaging your entire body had been an amazing sensation, as had the gentle sound of Liza’s heartbeat. It all had to come to an end though, as your head bumped what felt like a small, circular indent in the throat, “her stomach ring!” you realized, as your journey was about to come to an end. Around you, you could hear Liza’s heartbeat speed up, as if in anticipation for what’s coming next. Sure enough, the ring started to open and one last push from the esophagus sent you barreling face first into your new home with a thump.

“Yes, Yes Yesyesyesyesyes!” Liza chanted to herself as the most delicious piece of food to ever pass through her mouth finally dropped with a noticeable thump into her stomach. A shockwave suddenly shot through her body as she arched he back and opened her mouth, a silent scream passing through as her vision turned white. Liza’s powers seemed to pulse through the room, lifting various things like her rice bowl and some pair of shoes and socks someone left behind.

In a moment, it was over. “Ahhhh... Soooo goood...” Liza moaned to herself as she pat her belly, feeling more content than ever before. Not even catching her beloved Lunatone had compared to this! “You feel so yummy in my tummy Mr.rice!” She giggled, feeling a bit childish after that amazing high. She frowned, as the fuzzy feeling from earlier started coming back, like she had forgotten something vitally important...

Before you could take in your new surrounding, the stomach lurched, throwing you around as Liza’s heartbeat reached a fever pitch and a load moan rocked your world. When the stomach settled enough for you to get your bearings, you realized that you had a surprising amount of room in the stomach, enough to stand up and even walk around a little. “Did I shrink more without realizing it?” you thought to yourself as you caressed the gently pulsing walls of your fleshy home, the stomach acids tickling your ankles. After walking a bit, you sat against the fleshy walls, closed your eyes and listened. Around you, the warm stomach pulsated and gurgled gently, the acids, (which didn’t seem to burn as much as you thought they would) rocked back and forth, splashes sounding around you as more dripped from the walls and ceiling. The heartbeat had calmed down, along with the stomach, and resumed its gentle beat.

By now, you had completely given up on returning outside. Liza very clearly thought of you as only food now, and you didn’t really mind anymore. The sounds and sensations around you were making you feel things you never had before. Your boxers had dissolved a while ago, revealing your erection as your now obvious vore fetish manifested itself in full. So great was your arousment that a few mere strokes were enough to send you over the edge, causing you to white out temporarily as you hit peak levels of pleasure. Yes, you were content to disappear in Liza’s tummy, to melt away into nothing but nutrients, like any other piece of food. That’s all your were now anyway. Liza’s stomach agreed, as the level of acids rose to your waist and the liquid stared to churn slightly. As you sighed in content, you wondered why the acids still didn’t burn just yet...

Outside, Liza held her head, as the fuzzy feeling got stronger, culminating into a sudden *ping* as her psychic memory wipe wore off, and a slowly growing dread replaced it as she realized what that delicious rice piece was. “Oh no... and I even told him that I wasn’t a cannibal, but why did it feel so good then?” Liza’s thoughts were split. Unbelievably, she had enjoyed eating him, more than anything before, yet if she kept him in her tummy, he really would end up like any other piece of food. She had to make a choice, and soon...
14132121211.title: She swallows you

141321212111.content:
Liza stopped and pulled her hands away from her stomach, just as she was about to teleport you out. “It felt sooo good... and he’s not trying to escape. Rather than fear, I can feel... happiness?”

Liza was so confused, what kind of person LIKED being eaten? Yet, that was all her psychic powers felt from you. Slowly, the dread began to melt away, slowly being replaced with a victorious smile, as feelings of happiness, satisfaction, and power replaced them.

“Soooo.... you really like being in my tummy that much Mr.rice?” She giggled, no longer thinking of you as a person, just like you wanted. “Well then, I’ll make sure you stay there. Don’t worry, I’ll send all your friends down with you!” She rubbed her tummy as it gurgled happily around it’s food. With that, she sat back down, all feelings of guilt gone, as there was nothing to feel guilty about eating food after all.

Inside, your heart felt elated as you saw more rice fall in from the ceiling to join you. You had started to enjoy Liza’s stomach so much, you were beginning to worry she might teleport you out. Worries assured, and your final fate confirmed, you reached down and pumped your rock-hard erection more vigorously than ever. The stomach walls seemed to shrink slightly, contorting around you and the rest of the rice. The walls began to rub against you with renewed vigor as the stomach got warmer, the acids now at your chest. The experience was overwhelming, as you indulged in the complete fulfillment of your hidden fetish, as well as Liza’s new one. Before long, the acids filled the stomach as you came one last time, sighing in contentment as you disappeared below the pool of acids, never to resurface. Liza’s little tummy continued to churn and mash away at its contents. Eventually, the acids drained into the small intestine, with no trace of the human that used to occupy it.

Liza sighed, rubbing her tummy in content as she felt the last of you melt away, her body happily absorbing your nutrients. A small burp escaped Liza’s mouth, one she didn’t even try to cover as she kept giggling over the absolute power she had felt over you.

“I think I’ve discovered my new favorite food... heeheeheee... hah hah hah!” Liza’s giggles turned to laughter as her enjoyment reached new heights, her psychic powers letting her feel you as your nutrients spread across her body, her power growing as you were absorbed. Soon, a dangerous thought popped into her head...

“I wonder... if eating other psychic trainers would make me even MORE powerful...? Teeheehee!” The now very carnivorous Liza happily skipped out of the kitchen, pausing only to casually throw a pair of shoes and socks away, the only proof left that you existed. Liza’s skipping turned to levitating as she tested her newfound power. “Look out bro, you and all the trainers in our gym will go a long way to granting me supreme power! Hahahaha!” Liza cackled to herself as she headed straight for her gym, where she felt that her brother had just arrived. She couldn’t wait to devour him too! She bet he would go well with some rice...

141321212112.content:
As you sat in Liza’s belly, your vision starting to fade as the air grows stale and your mind starts to blank. The acids have risen to your neck level and will soon cover you completely. In spite of your fading conciseness, you can’t help but notice your body glowing...

Suddenly, you hear a *pop* as you seem to rush through an invisible space. Before you know it, you’re out of Liza’s tummy and back on the table, your very naked body still dripping acid and tingling slightly from your near digestion. A small towel suddenly covers you, causing you to look up at the red, mortified face of Liza as she looks anywhere else but at you. As your mind clears, so does your memory of the last 30 minutes.

“Um, Liza, I think you forgot not to actually eat me...” you say, not nearly as mad as you thought you would be. She flinches, before muttering, “well yes, I kinda did actually... But it was to make the process more realistic, I swear! I didn’t actually mean to eat you, no matter how good you tasted- EEP!” She turns away in embarrassment. Liza’s voice starts out soft, quickly getting louder and faster before she blurts out that you did, in fact, taste very delicious. Rather than being infuriated that she had the gall to enjoy you, you feel somewhat flattered.

“It’s okay!” You yell out, trying to reassure her, “it wasn’t that bad!”

She turns back to you, looking simultaneously relived that you weren’t mad, yet bewildered that you could have enjoyed the experience at all. “Wasn’t that bad...” she slowly repeats after you, suddenly looking more thoughtful... “Hey I have an idea...” she says, her voice getting slightly more confident, even as her face seems to blush even harder. “How about I...”
141321212112.title: Out of the stomach you go!

Phoebe notices you, but would rather keep you as a pet or toy
Phoebe doesn't see you and you end up under her foot.
14132122.content:
You approached toe camp site and sure enough there was a person there. In fact you have no clue how you missed her earlier. The girl was dancing around the fire in a graceful, yet energetic manner. She had a slender body, tanned skin and wore an outfit you'd expect to see on some sort of islander rather than some random person out in the woods. By your guess she was visiting from one of the island regions. You were so mesmerized by the movements of her dancing that you almost forgot about asking her for help.

Reaching the campsite you cautiously made your approach, watching out for her bare feet. This girl clearly had a lot or energy in her so you had to be careful. When you were close enough you started yelling up to her, hoping to grab her attention and possibly get some help. The first try was mostly fruitless as her foot came crashing down inches from you, knocking you on your back from the impact and proximity. You quickly got back to your feet and tried again, confidant in her ability to actually hear you. The question was getting her to notice you.
14132122.title: Phoebe, the ghost type specialist of the Elite 4

141321221.content:
You're trying your hardest to get this girl's attention before she steps on you. You start to wave your arms and jump as you yell to her. You yell one last time before you see her foot coming towards you. It's too late to dodge and you're too out of breath from yelling to try. All you can do is close your eyes and brace for impact.

But it never comes. You open your eyes again to see her bare foot hovering mere inches above your head. You lean yourself around her foot and see that the girl is looking down the you with a confused look. She pulls her foot away and replaces it with her hand laying next to you, palm up. You take the hint and climb on as she lifts her hand up to her face.

"Hey little guy. Who are you? How did you get so small?" She strokes your cheek with her massive finger, it actually felt kind of nice.

"I'm (your name). I don't know how I got this small or how I even got here. All is know is I need help. Can you please help me get back to normal?"

"I don't know anything about size changing. But I promise, if I do find something, I'll do whatever I can to help you. Until then, you're welcome to live with me. Oh right, my name's Phoebe by the way."

"Thank you Phoebe. I'll gladly live with you if it means I get shelter."

What happens next?
141321221.title: Phoebe spots you and tries to help

"I hope you don't mind little guy, but all that dancing left me a bit tuckered out. I think I'm gonna turn in, and since I don't want to leave you out here alone, you're coming with me." She then starts walking towards her tent.

"So what was that dance anyway?"

"It's something my grandmother taught me that I wanted to try. Apparently, if you perform it on a full moon, the spirits will be pleased and cause something special to happen to you." She brings you inside the tent and sets you on her pillow before unwrapping the cloth around her hips, revealing a pair of panties with a similar coloring and floral pattern. She lays down in her sleeping bag before giving your cheek another stroke with her finger. "Good night little guy." That's the last thing she says before she is out like a light.

What do you do now?

choices: You wake up the next morning.
14132122121.content: You don't want to risk creeping her out by getting weird and walking around on her sleeping body, so you figure all you can do is go to sleep. Unfortunately, it was a cold night in that night, and you were shivering in the cold. You didn't want to freeze to death, and getting in the bag with her might not be smart. "Uh... Hi?" You say, trying out break the ice. You hope that you could try and get on her good side before the subject of your current position was addressed.

"Hello there. I'm Maylene, who are you?"

"(Your name). I'd shake your hand, but..." You try and free your arms again. Maylene takes the hint and pulls you out of her breasts. She sets you in her palm before extending her other hand to you, of which you can only shake one finger.

"So (your name), just what were you doing in my shirt?" Crap, no time to lighten the mood. You explain your entire situation about your shrinking and finding her. After hearing your tale...
141322122221.title: She feels you and looks down

choices: You go to sleep in her hands
She decides to warm you up with her body
14132221.content:
(By The Way, Theres Snow Everywhere)

After walking through all the snow most of the day, needless to say you were happy when you saw the burning light of a campfire. Your body was so frostbitten that you feel like you got an ice beam straight from a legendary.

Wasting no time with adrenaline, you run closer to the fire. Not even bothering with the girl who was sitting around it. As you got closer you felt the warmth of the fire as you were beyond happy. Sure your still frozen beyond belief, but there was fire!

“Um... hi?” You heard the voice say, sitting right next to the fire was a giant girl! Staring right at you in shock. She defiantly didn't expect to see a small person walk closer. She was beautiful, a clear face and loving eyes. Her hair was sent in twin tails to either side and her black hair close. She was wearing just a white shirt, with her jumper wrapped around her was it. “How... how are you so small?”

You tried to answer back, but you were too cold... far too cold. All you could manage to do is shiver and give out chattered teeth. Something Candice saw and realised. “Ohh, let me try to help” She then leaned forward and grabbed you. You were in her warm hands as she lifted you up. Closer to the burning fire. Her hands were warm, and you got a much better warmth from on hr hands then you did on the ground. The fire got to you as you welcomed it. You turn around and see the girl looking worried. Unable to say anything you gave a thumbs up to her, calming your saviour.

“Okay, just take the heat of the fire and don't stress yourself. if anyone knows how bad the snow can be, its me.” She said with a smile “Since you can't really talk right now, i suppose ill tell you about me. My name’s Candice. Im the Gym Leader of Snowpoint City” You looked at her in surprise, out of all the people you could find, your lucky it was a Gym Leader. “I was out here training my Pokemon but i kind of went too long, and got stuck out here in the snow. Kind of stupid i know, but i know its stupider to move during the night. Especially with all the Sneasels around. Is that you were doing, moving at night?”

You turn to her and rub your back, saying yes. Kind of embarrassed “I thought so, your lucky a Sneasel didn't eat you. Your about the right size. Im curious as to why your here, but i think ill ask that when your warmer. I suppose your also curious how far away you were from town, only a couple of hours honestly. But like i said before, to risky to move at night.”

There was a moment of silence, until finally you get on your knees and bow to her, thanking Candice.

“Oh you don't need to do that, i wasn't gonna let you die out here in the snow” Candice said nicely.
14132221.title: Candice's Warming Help

choices: Candice moved you towards the back of her pants...
141322213.content:
The kind words sank into your mind, causing you to look up, shooting the giantess holding you a smile.

However, your smile faltered when the cold's sharp stinger sank yet again into your skin, causing you to try to warm yourself up by gripping your shoulders, hugging yourself.

Candice gasped seeing the scene of the tiny person she had just found shivering on her palm.

"You still cold, huh?" she emphatically said, before offering a smile,
"Don't worry, if the fire isn't enough, I think I can help too."

You didn't have time to wonder what she was talking about. You only had time to open your mouth, letting your breath escape in the form of a small cloud of vapor, before Candice moved you forward, right towards her-

The hand that held you shoved you straight in between the giantess' breasts as she embraced you to her chest, her other hand joining in the hug shortly after.

You blushed furiously while a wave of nice, comforting heat began spreading through your whole body.

"Better?" the voice of the girl chimed from above and, looking up, you became aware that she was staring at you with a smile.

You returned the smile in response, silently tell her that this was at least better than before despite the cold still hitting your body.

You feared you were going to enter hypothermia at some point if the cold didn't stop soon.

"Okay, now how about we talk for a bit?" Candice suggested, unaware of your current predicament,
"For starters, can you tell me how you got so small?"

You wanted to reply that you had no clue, but when you opened your mouth only another cloud of vapor was able to slip out before you had to close it again, feeling like you had just inserted your head in a freezer with your mouth open.

Candice took notice of that.

"Y-You're still cold?" she asked, concerned as she stared at the tiny person nestled in her arms, like an extremely tiny child in their mother's embrace.

A nod was the only reply the young gym leader received.

"Hmm..." Candice didn't know what to do to warm you up properly.

Still, if she didn't so something soon, her latest 'catch' was going to suffer frostbite and thusly die in her arms.

The mere thought made her shiver.

You watched the giant gym leader of Snowpoint City with pleading eyes, hoping she found a way to pull you out of this situation you had found yourself in. At least, if she couldn't grow you back, she could at least protect you from the cold.

Candice pondered her options.

She couldn't travel back to Snowpoint, not at such dark hour when, like she already mentioned, she could be the local Sneasel's next victim.

But how was she supposed to warm you up...?

The gym leader finally had an idea... and blushed bright red; her gaze finally fell back on you.

"Um... listen, I think I've got a way to warm you up," she declared, her blush becoming more intense,
"It's gonna be a bit... awkward, but I see no other way I could help."

You quickly decided you didn't care, as long as it saved your shrunken behind.

You offered another nod, letting Candice know that you agreed with whatever was in her mind.

Candice nodded too as she made her move.

The hug was suddenly broken and the hand that held you began moving.

You gazed at the giantess in front of you, noticing what she was up to...
141322213.title: Candice's warm embrace

choices: She wants you to be her servant…
She just wants to get you back to the city safely…
She wants you to be her little pet...
1413222132.content:
Not wasting any time, Candice’s hand moved around to her backside and gently set you inside the sleeping bag that she had been sitting on. “Plenty of Pokemon sit on their eggs to keep them warm. This is a natural thing to do?” She said, seeming to be unsure of herself, but she seemed to be intent on going through with it.

You didn’t really want to protest, but you didn’t exactly have the option, you just sat there chattering your teeth. Candice looked at you, the embarrassment on her face being replaced by her former concern. “Okay, just stay put. This should warm you up.”

Candice moved around on her knees and positioned her backside over you, which under the skirt and coat that she had wrapped around her waist, you could see her satin white panties clinging to her pale backside.

Without saying anything she gently sat down, slowly enveloping your world in darkness. She pinned your right underneath her crack and moved around to get comfortable. It took you a few seconds to notice, but her ass was warm. You were still freezing, but it almost felt like you’d jumped into a hot bath.

In an effort to warm you up quicker she gently rubbed her butt back and forth over you. Despite how steaming hot that her backside was, your teeth were still chattering. Candice bit her lip as she continued the movement, “Mmmmph, come on, you’ll be warm in no time…” She cooed, as she was starting to get aroused. Her face was flushed red with embarrassment.

You were more worried about warming up, but you were only a guy and couldn’t help but get a little excited by the situation. Eventually, she slowed down as you started to feel a bit warm again.

Every once in a while she would move around, maybe to feel if you were still there? Maybe to feel you out? Once she felt confident that you’d warmed up enough, she lifted her behind off of you and reached down and gently pressed her fingers against your chest.

“You feel like you’ve warmed up.” She said as her fingers wrapped around you and brought you up to her face.

“Yeah, I uh… Thanks.” You said, more than a little confused about what to say. She’d undoubtedly just saved your life… By sitting on you.

“Of course!” She said, beaming with delight, “Anyone would have done the same in my place, you were freezing.”

“Not sure anyone else would sit on me like an egg,” you joked.

Candice laughed, her face flushing, “Well… Uh, it got the job done. You’re warm aren’t you.” She said, fingers cupping around you to feel you.

“Yeah, I can’t thank you enough… I owe you my life.”

“Aw, that’s sweet…” Her expression seemed to change, as she considered what you said.

141331111.content:
"Well well. Looks like I won!" Iris cheered cheekily as she returned her Pokémon to her pokeball. "I'll admit though, you're really good despite your awkward prospective." She was referring to you of course. You were a unique trainer to say the least. An incident with a mischievous legendary Pokémon had left you shrunken to an incredibly small size. You were so small that when your house Pokémon, a friendly Mightyena, had almost swallowed you many times after she first dealt with your diminutive stature. Everyone had insisted that you give up on being a trainer, saying that it would be too dangerous for your size.

Despite their protests, you were persistent in your goal of becoming a trainer and tried to tame some wild Pokémon. The only reason you survived some of the encounters was because your small size made you an unappealing snack to the Pokémon you foolishly confronted. Your hard work eventually paid off though because a kind hearted Ralts eventually took pity on you and agreed to be your partner. She would eventually grow into a towering Gardevior who was very eager to protect you. Although even she couldn't resist the temptation to occasionally toss you around in her mouth or keep you restrained in a hug. Regardless your bond was still strong and you hoped to challenge some gyms with her to prove it.

Iris, a relatively new gym leader was your first target. You thought her inexperience would make her the best bet for a win, but she had thoroughly smacked you and Gardevior. You sat on the ground in shame, embarrassed that you had let your partner be humiliated, when you felt a shadow be cast over you. You look up to see the smiling face of Iris, a glint of wonder present in her eyes. "Oh don't feel bad cutie, you and your partner did really way. It was an honor to face someone new at the Gym scene like me." She said smiling warmly. "Thank you." You reply simply. "Luckily for you, I think I can arrange for you to get my badge anyways." Iris says, her voice becoming laced with mischief. You look up at her quizzically, raising your eyebrow to encourage her to elaborate. Her grin only becomes wider as she begins to explain...

You admit slightly guilty.

"But they still leave in the next town over, so they're not very far if you would end up needing them." For a moment you thought you saw a scary flash of eager mischief flash across Iris' face, but it was too quick for you to be sure. "Oh! Well that's great then!" Iris said very eagerly. "Since you're parents are so close by... I think I can allow you to have a go at this special battle." Suddenly Iris' massive hand slams down behind you and begins pushing you towards the edge of the table. "There's no time to waste! We need to start your challenge right away!" She pleaded eagerly as she pushed you over the table's edge and...
1413311111.title: "You'll have to win a special battle!"

14133111112.content:
Her dark hand keeps pushing you towards the edge of the table. Is she just going to push you off. That's crazy!

"Hey, just so you know I'm tough, but I won't survive a fall from this distance." you say thinking that's what she's planning.

Don't worry, your not going to hit the floor" she says as she moves around still keeping her hand on the table. She reaches down to her pink shoe and pulled it off. Because she wears no sock your able to instantly see her big brown foot. It only took you a moment from this point on to understand what she is going to do.

She grabs the shoe and places it near the table. Meaning if you fall back, instead of hitting the ground, your falling right into her shoe.

"Your not pushing me in there, are you!" you shout, a bit stricken with fear

"C'mon, you want that Gym badge don't you" she teases as her hand keeps pushing you back. Your at the Edge of the table so if you take a single step back, your falling in.

She stops moving her hand, wanting you to jump in their voluntarily. Her big grin growing bigger as you ask.

"If I jump in there, will I get the Gym badge?" hoping that it's all your going to have to do.

"If you jump in there, you accept the Special Battle" she replies. Great that means this is only step one for you. Deciding you can't put it off anymore you turn and jump into the shoe that was in her hand.

You land onto the soft sole of the shoe. It was soft and cushioned which was nice. However the smell coming from it made it a terrible situation. It smells like a dump in here. 141331111122.content:
You're sent sprawling onto your back as the "world" around you begins to shake like a herd of Taurous stampeding by. Looking out the entrance of the shoe, your face begins to pale slightly. Iris had already been massive before when you were on the table earlier. She had to squat down just to keep you at her neckline and her finger was bigger than your head! But now you were being reminded of how truly massive everything was compared to you. Truth be told it had been a long time since you were alone on the ground, so this was a re-learning experience for you.

The adrenaline pumping through your veins made the short time it took for Iris to set down her shoe seem like eternity. Even after it settled on the ground, you were still to unnerved to pull yourself off of her sole. Your body awkwardly sunk into it, wetting your body with Iris' sweat. "Aw! You look pretty cute in there!" Iris cooed happily. "Almost like a little bug in his house." Her words never reached your ears, you were to busy having a panic attack to hear them. Iris towered like a goddess above you! She was so big that her face loomed almost out of view and if you were registering her voice it would sound like the roars of her dragon Pokémon. She wasn't just a goddess to you, she was bigger and more powerful than that! You would've prayed for Arceus to save you, but you were pretty sure she could snuff it out under her toe if it did come. Of course it would actually be bigger than you and her but that wasn't on your mind right now.

"Alright it's time to reveal the details of your battle. Dun dun dun!" Iris says dramatically, trying to make light of the situation. Her shoe and your world begins to shake again as her toes suddenly appear over the opening of the shoe and wiggle cheerily. Being so close to her feet, you notice some of the wrinkles in her feet and the sweat trapped in them. You would probably be joining them soon you thought. "Your special battle involves spending some time in my shoe with my nice soft feet! Ha, I bet this is a lot easier than you expected huh?" She said leaning closer and putting her finger to her cheek. "Well you might be underestimating me if you think this will be easy. I happen to live a very active lifestyle beyond being a gym leader and you were my last opponent for the day before I could leave. Now you'll get to see what the rest of my days are like! ...At least the part that happens in my shoe. See ya later cutie!" She says with a wink.

Hearing those words, your body reflexively sprung into action. You might have willed yourself to do this earlier, but the unfamiliar fear of being on the ground alone had overcome whatever sense of bravery you had developed before. You tried your best to scale the inside of the shoe and hop out before Iris got her foot inside. Fortunately for you, she was really taking her time putting her shoe on, probably trying to tease you a bit before your epic battle for survival. As you near the top of her shoe, you can see the light from outside her shoe and feel some of her sweat drop onto you before...
