1413311111222.title: In Iris's Shoe

choices: Iris drops the whole trial and simply keeps you
14133111112222.content:
You positioned yourself quite comfortably beneath the Gym Leader's toes. As weird as it was, you were finding the experience.... kinda sorta... pleasant. Maybe this trial won't be so bad after all. Iris was also enjoying this feeling. Feeling the tiny person's body pressed under her toes was definitely a surreal and empowering experience for her. She pondered the possibility of convincing you to stay with her after the trial was over. Heck, no one knows you're there, she could just keep you and tell no one. Though that would be mean. Though she definitely enjoyed playing with you, she didn't want to do anything too cruel... maybe. It was definitely a tempting thought. But for now, you had a trial to clear, and it was about time you earned it.

You were busy being rolled around by Iris' toes when you heard her speak up. "Okay, enough warm-up. Let's get to the real trial. I'll try not to go too hard, but you'll still want to try your best to stay near the toes." Before you could ask her what she meant, you suddenly felt everything jerking around violently. You were flung to the toe end of the shoe before falling back to the thankfully soft ground below. Seconds later, her toes cam crashing down on top you you. Iris was careful not to put too much weight on you, but the weight was still overpowering. Without another second to waste you were flung to the back again as the process repeated. Iris had upped her pace to a brisk jog as she made her way out of town. The feeling of you inside her sole distracted her from the exercise as she kept pondering what else she could do with the toy sized trainer. She felt that there was plenty she could do to add to your "special trial." Her mind then shifted to curiosity over how you were handling this. As she took another step down on top of you, she felt something around the toes. At first she wasn't sure but soon she realized that you were clinging to her toe for safety. She blushed slightly as a huge grin filled her face.

Back inside, you were clinging to the dragon master's toes for dear life as her pace seemed to speed up even more. Each step, while not enough to cause lasting harm, hit you with an enormous amount of pressure. You felt the air forced out of your lungs, forcing you to breathe in more of the cheesy air that was trapped in her shoe for so long. You slowly tried to make your way over to wedge yourself between the toes, hoping to avoid being stepped on again. This did not go unnoticed, Back outside, iris felt you shifting and squirming your way between her toes. She was tempted to force you back out, but decided to just give you a gentle squeeze before resuming.

The jog went on for roughly another 20 minutes. By the time she got back, Your surroundings had gotten much warmer and a bit damper. Iris finally removed the foot from the dark prison, pulling you out as well as you seemed to stick to it. You heard laughter overhead as your eyes readjusted to the light. "Great job down there. I was worried that i was going a little overboard, but you hung in there like a real champion." Hearing these words of encouragement you couldn't help but smile, despite what she just put you through. Maybe the impromptu trial Iris put you through was worth it after all.
14133111112222.title: Jogging with Iris

choices: "We're going to do some more test trials."
"I'm taking your Pokemon to the Poke Center."
One of you family members interrupt!
141331111122222.content:
"That wasn't really what I expected." You explain to Iris as you stretch and try to forget about your experience inside the gym leader's shoe. Through your whole tiny life you never thought you'd end up in a stranger's shoe. Sure it had happened before with your family, but that's when you and your siblings were younger and brattier. Plus it only happened once, your parents were furious after they learned about that little incident.

Iris simply laughed in response. "Yeah I'll admit I just kind of made it up. But it turned out fine! It actually felt pretty good too. Maybe I could find a way to make it an alternative to gym battles."

The idea of someone other than you being stuck in Iris' shoe was amusing and you figured it would certainly get her gym a lot of attention. "I'm not sure if the league would allow that." You chuckle.

Iris rests her chin against her hand and sighs. "You're probably right. That's not that much of a challenge... there would have to be a bit more too it!" She adds excitedly.

Uh-oh. Did you just give some new ideas?

"It would probably be hard to find someone else with my... condition too." You say trying to change the subject.

"That's true, but I still want to try some stuff out." Iris had a smirk on her face as she said this. Truthfully she had considered keeping you in her shoe and for herself. It would be pretty easy to cover up, and no one would've believed that a gym leader would trap a challenger in their shoe. The idea of a tiny person would be too unbelievable for anyone who hadn't seen it anyways. But she decided against it, she didn't want to be a kidnapper. Besides, she could just manipulate you without having to take over your life. A tiny boy like him probably wouldn't say no to what most girl's said.

"I don't know Iris, I really shouldn't stay out too long. Honestly I shouldn't have done this at all, my family will be furious when they find out I tried this." You say trying to get Iris to sympathize with you.

"You challenged me at your size without anyone knowing?" Iris asked shocked. Knowing that gave Iris all the material she need to get you to do what she needed. "Do you know how dangerous that is!" She scolded you wagging her finger. "It might've been okay if you had won the battle and had your Gardevior left to carry you home, but you lost! Imagine if I had just made you leave after that, how would you get home?"

You cough nervously, realizing that she had a point. You just assumed your bond with your Pokémon would win the battle for you, losing never crossed your mind. Even if you somehow got to a Pokémon Center, would you even be able to get the Nurse's attention? You realized that Iris was actually being pretty responsible.

"As a gym leader, I can't let you wander outside without supervision. We are supposed to be leaders of our communities, the people in the city are our responsibility."

"I'm technically from out of town-"

"That doesn't matter, you live around my gym so you're my responsibility!" Iris insisted. Noticing you were a bit anxious, she softened her voice a bit before adding, "Just consider this part of the trial, once you're home I'll officially give you a badge in front of your family. Just think of it as an awesome way to show off!" She brought her hand down in front of you and ordered you to hop on with a commanding tone of voice.

You immediately comply and hop on her hand, holding her finger for support. She brought you up towards her face and giving you a stern look all the while. Secretly, on the inside she was pretty happy. She had convincingly put herself in charge of you for a good amount of time. You were all hers for at least a few hours before getting you home safely. Surely she could have some fun with you before giving you back to your family!

"Okay little guy, here's the plan." She announced to you with authority in her voice.
141331111122222.title: Dragon Trial Continues

choices: Ask to ride in her mouth.
1413311111222222.content:
"I'm taking your Pokémon to the Poke Center."

"Really?" You ask, certain that she was going to make you endure some experimental trials like she was hinting at.

"Of course! Taking care of your Pokémon is the most important part of being a trainer. They aren't slaves and they're more than pets you take for a check up every now and then. They're partners who deserve all the respect and care you can give them. Trust me I know, my relationship with my Pokémon wasn't very good until I proved I respected them and earned theirs. Right now Gardevior likes you, but that doesn't mean you can slack off."

You were surprised by how serious Iris was being. She really was trying to help you and set a good example as a gym leader. Stuffing challengers into her shoes for a jog aside, she did seem to be a model gym leader. At such a young age it was impressive and you felt compelled by her. "Thank you so much Iris, you really are pretty cool!"

Iris blushed in response. She had never been complimented like that before. Well not by someone close to her age at least, her old boss always encouraged her before he retired. Since then she'd mostly met people who didn't care about the gym leader and only wanted the badge. She never really had fans like the other gym leaders did. Elesa and Skyla had huge fan groups dedicated to her and Lenora was well respected by the other gym leaders and in other industries. Even that punk Roxie had a bunch of fans and her "gym" was her stupid rock club in some basement!

"W-well, I'm glad you noticed! I do have to set good examples for aspiring trainers like you." She said winking at you. "Remember how important it is to bond with your Pokémon and someday you'll be just like me. Now uh, where is Gardevior's pokeball?" Truthfully Iris had been curious about that since you challenged her. She had no idea pokeballs could get so tiny.

"Oh, uh hold out your other hand I guess." You say to Iris. Her monolithic hand moves itself in front of you as you work on your belt. The single pokeball you had on your belt actually wasn't specially made for you, just a regular pokeball. Somehow they were able to shrink down to accommodate your special size. You were always concerned that somehow affected Gardevior, but she had never done anything to show it.

"Here you go." You say placing the pokeball as far on her hand as possible. You were only able to reach the middle of her fingers though and she gently rolled it the rest of the way to her palm.

"Oh that's so cute!" Iris gushed happily. "Such a teeny pokeball, I didn't know they could get this small." She maneuvered the ball between her pointer finger and thumb and squinted at it. "Ha, is it polished? Kind of cute to think that big Gardevior stays in here. It's like her way of letting you be bigger for a bit."

"I guess, but she used to stay outside of the ball and keep me all the time. Even as a Kirlia she barely listened, sometimes she tossed me in her mouth while she went about her day."

"Really!? Didn't your family get mad at her?" Iris asked as she sized up the pokeball and put it in her pocket.

"No, I never told them about it." You admit blushing in embarrassment.

"Why not? Were you scared that she'd do something to you?" Iris asked as she put on a pair of socks with one hand. It was difficult for her do that and balance with you on her hand, and you felt shaky as a result.

"No, I didn't want her to get in trouble. She was stuck with a little trainer like me, I don't blame her for wanting to keep me out of sight back then."

"Wow and now she adores you enough to battle in a gym battle. Your relationship really improved." Iris complimented.

You simply nodded your head and wait for Iris to finish getting ready.

As Iris slipped her feet into her shoe she gave you a sideways glance, "You wanna hop in?" She joked as she finished putting her shoes on. She brought you closer to her face and opened her mouth wide, extending her tongue outwards. "Or maybe you want a trip down memory lane and want a trip in a cute girl's mouth?" She finished with a giggle and started heading towards the exit, ready for a normal trip to the Poke Center.

Meanwhile you were seriously considering her words. Iris had been pretty pleasant, and the idea of being dismissed by a giant did seem oddly nostalgic. You weren't aware that was exactly what Iris was trying to do. Do you want to give in and let her have some fun with you?
1413311111222222.title: To the Poke Center

choices: Inside the nurses want to do tests on you.
14133111112222221.content:
As much as you were tempted, you decide against letting Iris play with you for now. For some reason the idea sounded of being in her mouth or shoe sounded good, but you knew that you'd feel differently once inside. "As tempting as that sounds, I think I'll have to pass." You answer Iris, trying to sound like you were joking. "I don't want to give Gardevior any ideas by having you pull me out of your shoe or mouth in front of her."

Iris simply laughed. She could tell that you had thought about her offers, and that excited her a bit. If she was a bit more subtle and indirect with her suggestions, you might give in eventually. Slipping her shoes off a bit, the occasional toe wiggle, and deliberately obvious swallowing of food might be good motivators. And, of course, if you asked she would tease you a bit about it. That would have to wait a little for now, she had to get you to the Pokémon Center. There would be plenty of time for her subliminal messaging while you two waited.

"Got it. Oh, I just realized that I can't really hold you out in the open." Iris explained as she closed the door of her gym behind her. "Even a gym leader would raise a few eye brows if she was carrying a shrunken person in their hand. There's no way they'd know you were always like this. They'd think I shrunk you to make you my little toy." She said trying to get the idea into your head. She knew she shouldn't be too heavy handed about it, but this was too good a chance to pass up.

"Well, you have put me in your shoe already, so they wouldn't be completely wrong." You joke to her as she sets you on her shoulder.

"True, but that was to earn your gym badge. It was totally legit and you agreed to it. Officer Jenny couldn't arrest me for that. Even if I was the shrinking terror they thought I was, she couldn't do anything about it. If she confronted me, I could shrink and keep her too. Then she could be my second little toy. One for each shoe."

You were glad that Iris had put you on her shoulder because you were blushing so hard that your face felt hot.

"Or maybe..." Iris continued, "Maybe you too could share a shoe! If I made her small enough then you could both fit under a toe."

"T-that would be something." You can't help but stutter.

"And whichever one of you did a better job would get a reward. I'd shrink the worse toy smaller and make them the other toys servant. Imagine massaging a giant Jenny's foot while she gives my toes a little massage."

"A-are you saying that I would be the worse toy?" You ask with a slight smile.

"Hmmm, not necessarily." Iris hummed, "But I imagine you would enjoy that more than the alternative. Would you want a little Jenny serving you? To be the big one for once?" She asked genuinely curious.

"I'm not sure. It seems so unrealistic that I can't even picture it."

"I could say the same thing for having a mini trainer standing on my shoulder, but here we are." Iris said tapping you on the head without turning to look to you.

Iris simply returned her attention to her walk to the Pokémon Center. Meanwhile, your mind swarmed with dirty thoughts. You realized that Iris was simply teasing you, but she was really good at it. It was like she was trying to brainwash you with thoughts of submission. You shake that thought out of your head. Iris was too nice to do something like that. If she wanted to keep you, she could do it whenever she wanted and she hadn't yet so you had no reason to suspect her.

"Alright! Here we are!" Iris exclaimed once you two arrived at the center. "Now let's get your partner healed up and you two back together again."
14133111112222221.title: Normal Ride

choices: You've fallen for the giant gym leader
You want to get away from Iris, now
141331111122223.content:
You stood there waiting for Iris to do something. Present a badge, continue her congratulations, get up to grab something, anything really. But she didn't make a move to do anything. She simply stared at you, a neutral expression on her face. You weren't certain but you thought you could see a smile vaguely present on her lips, fading and emerging at different times. You call up to her, asking if anything is wrong.

Iris doesn't even process your voice as she is lost in her thoughts. "Wow, I can't believe how well that went. I was practically running by the end of the trial. He should've been trampled but he's perfectly fine. If he's that durable, he could be really fun to keep around." She could feel herself getting giddy at the idea. "So many people I meet are bigger and more powerful than me. I've always been trying to catch up. Before this little guy, hardly anyone came to my gym and people who did though it would be an easy battle." Iris curled her toes slightly, reaching out at the sensation of you hanging onto them.

You were starting to get weirded out by Iris' lack of response and started waving and calling up to her. You were still unable to get her attention and toes started to wiggle as her train of thought continued. "But him, this little guy is definitely weaker than me. He lost to me in battle, and he only survived being near my feet because he clung to them for dear life. I'm like a goddess to him! I could've made the trial harder, but I showed him mercy. Don't I deserve a little payment for that?"

Smiling, Iris began to rise to her full height, knowing what she planned to do. As Iris rose to her fulll height, the realization of your position in the world once again dawned upon you. This girl, despite the kindness she had shown you, was still akin to a goddess and you could only trust her word and pray that she would keep it. Looking at her face, you say a mischevious grin quickly transform into a kind one.

"Like I said before, you did a great job down there inside of my shoe!" She beamed proudly. "Not anyone could do a trial like that you know? Only the strongest and most diligent people would be willing to endure a cute girl's shoe to earn a badge." Her words gave you encouragement again, and you slowly forgot that she was a towering goddess in size. Perhaps this was the start of a friendship?

"And I have great news for both of us! I've decided to call off our little trial and alter our deal." Iris said cheerfully. You felt your body tense in fear and shock. What did she mean by that? Had you done something wrong. You wrack your brain to try and think what could've gone wrong. And then you remember how you had clung to her toes during the trial. Was that not acceptable? Had that been cheating and now she wasn't giving you a badge? You asked her these questions and she simply laughed in response.

"No no it's not anything like that! I could not be more proud of your performance in the trial! Now I know that you have what it takes." You ask her what she means by 'have what it takes' and she smiles. "Well, to be my permanent servant! I can't be a goddess if I don't have a servant." Iris responds in a matter of fact tone. You couldn't believe what was happening. The sweet Iris you had known earlier had suddenly become a lunatic who thought she was a goddess!? You couldn't let her think like that and you immediately protest.

Iris simply stares at you with a smirk on her face. "Aw, that's cute how you're trying to deny that you love this." She says coyly. "Don't act like this hasn't crossed your mind at some point. I saw the way your Pokémon coddles you, how much you love it. This has been a dream of yours for a while now I bet. You didn't have to accept the trial inside of my shoe. I could've thought of something else. But you agreed so easily and then, during the trial, you clung to my toes like a security blanket. You love being at my mercy, you love being a tiny little toy for me to use as I please. I'm just trying to fulfill both of our wishes. You know I'll be a loving goddess, you just need to admit how much you'll love being my servant."

As those words left her mouth, you felt some emotion stir up inside of you. A feeling that you couldn't deny. You pause to think on this emotion and then you realize something...
141331111122223.title: Part of the Dragon Hoard

1413311111222231.content:
Iris could see it in your eyes and in your face you thinking about what she just said. And thats all that Iris needed to spring some more words. “I can see it, you know its true. And you could try to deny it all you want. but you want to be my slave. You want to serve me to your deeper desire and more importantly. I want to be served. Its a win win situation for the both of us, there is no reason to turn it down.”

“What about my Pokemon, i need to go get them”

“Oh i can do that, and as far as I'm concerned a slave isn't allowed to have Pokemon. So i guess ill just take them of your hands” She said as you had more to consider.

You often felt bad about your Pokemon following your orders. Having a diminished trainer. With Iris they will not only belong to a great trainer but also a Gym Leader.

“Okay, ill be yours Iris” You say as you look up at her. She looked back at you with a smile that was one of victory. “I knew you would see it my way, where going to have so much fun together and trust me, its not going to be just you serving your new goddess”

“What your going to serve me?”

“No, not at all” She said laughing at your words. “Your far to small to be served, your position is as a worshiper and you better remember that. What i mean is theres a certain Pokemon of yours, oh i mean mine that would love to see their former trainer under them”

It didn't take a genius to figure she meant your Gardevoir. “But thats in the future, for now i need to put you some place. Don't worry, your quite familiar with it”

That was when she removed her shoe once again, bringing you down to the ground as she dumped you in. “Oh and this time, don't run for my toes. Your Dragon Goddess wants to feel you under her sole.”

She then brought her foot down on you as you follow her order and not run, however you do lay down so your not squished in an uncomfortable way. Iris stopped bringing her foot down. “Nah uh uh, onto your back” She commanded as you flip. She then brought her foot down onto you as you squished under her sole. Iris felt you there and had the biggest smile she think she's ever gonna have.

“Oh, i can already tell this is going to be the start of a great relationship” Iris said as she then went outsides the door to get ‘her’ Pokemon from the Pokemon Centre
1413311111222231.title: Guess Your Iris's Now

choices: Spending the day under Iris’ feet
Spending the day serving other parts of Iris
14133111112222311.content:
A few weeks have passed since that fateful day. The day you gave yourself up to the gargantuan dragon master as her personal servant and worshiper. Most of your Pokémon have gotten used to their new owner pretty quickly. In fact you wondered if they even knew where their diminished original trainer was this whole time. Reguardless, they all served Iris well and she took great care of them in return.

As for you, you were still feeling a bit weird and uncertain about this new arrangement in your life. Despite your stature, you had freedom, a semi-normal life ahead of you. Now you were property of the dark skinned dragon goddess. Your life belonging to her whims. For the most part, iris had you serve her feet, rubbing them, kissing them, staying inside her shoe when she exercises or accepts gym challengers. She did occasionally have you serve other parts of her godlike form, but seeing you at her feet seems to amuse her the most. It was what truly made the upcoming gym leader feel like a goddess deserving of worship.

This week however was differant. Iris finally decided to let your... HER new Gardevoir discover the fate of her old trainer... sorry, that would be her new pet now. At first iris simply let Gardevoir hug you, she probably did miss you after a few weeks of vanishing suddenly. But then she started to encourage the green haired creature. Helps her realize that you were no longer her trainer. The first day was innocent enough. But as the week went on, Iris continued these little sessions, making your former guardians more and more open to the idea that you now belong to Gardevoir rather than the other way around. The whole role reversal in your relationship made things feel even weirder for you.

Iris however was loving every second of it. She declared the Gardevoir to be your secondary owner after herself, and even pondered if any of your other Pokemon would be fun for such a position.

Today as you woke up, you saw Iris beaming down at her tiny servant. “Excited for a big day? I hope you are.” She said as she moved on to her plans with you.
14133111112222311.title: A Few Weeks as Iris’s Slave

141331111122223112.content:
Great, she's totally the first thing you want to see in the morning. You roll over and try to go back to sleep but Iris wasn't having any of it. She picked you up with her fingers and dropped you down onto her palm. Scooting over back to her bed you get pulled up to her face.

“No going back to sleep, you've got a big job today given by your big goddess.” Iris said as you know you won't win this. You get up and face her. Stretching your body and preparing for the rigurious work your gonna get.

“Another day with your feet?” You ask her while you do some stretches, Iris loves seeing you do this and she's often requests it. She really finds it so cute to see.

“Nope, not today” She said as you were surprised. “Today I'm planning to have fun with you in all different ways. And since I'm pretty sure that no one will visit me today considering the big parade in town today. Ive got the whole day”

“Parade, why is there a parade?” You ask her as she dismisses you.

“Sorry, but thats something only big people need to know. Since I'm big i can know, since your small you cant” Iris said as you groan. That was by far the worst part of this entire thing. Not the being enslaved to a giant girl who loves putting you with her feet, no surprisingly your okay with that part. Its the fact that she constantly puts you down and tries to belittle you. You've had this happen all your life though but coming from Iris is just the worse. “Anyway, like i said I've got big plans for today. But first i think we should eat up.”

“Eat” You reply.

“Yes and today, I've decided that I'm not gonna feed you puffins. Your gonna get actual food. Am i not the nicest or what?”

Real food. Every since Iris has made you her property she's just feed you pokemon puffins. Sure you got used to the taste but you cant help but miss real food. “Yes you are Goddess Iris. Yes you are!” You say smitten as she laughs.

“I know i am, now I'm going to go grab the food, i want you to stay here and get ready. Because you wont sit around in my shoe like you do most days. No this day is gonna be action packed.” She said dropping you onto her bed and getting up, looking down at you before smiling. “Ill be right back you little cutie” She said before going, your left by yourself for sometime doing as she ordered and stretched.

Funny enough you've gotten more fit ever since you've been with Iris. Maybe from all the protein puffins or the fact that your constantly working with Iris. Regardless she's liked that you've gotten into shape and your happy that your impressing her. After a while Iris came back and was carrying a huge ______________
141331111122223112.title: Iris's Break Day

choices: You decide to scavenge from her slippers
1413311111222231121.content:
You can't say that you were expecting much, a large bow of cereal was more than you were expecting, but you were kind of hoping that it would be something a bit more extravagant. Maybe something like bacon or eggs? You were glad that you were going to get something other than puffins, but the sogginess of the cereal really only reminded you of Iris' foot sweat. She probably thought that too and that was why she chose cereal. ...No she probably just chose something quick and easy, not everything about Iris revolves around her feet. Well that was true for her at least, you were a special case.

Your thoughts were interrupted as Iris' rear came barreling towards you. She did feel the need to look for you when she sat down. It was your concern avoiding getting smothered under her rear, not hers. You desperately dive out of the way, just barely getting out of the way before Iris' massive (to you) rear came crashing down. As you caught your breath, you looked up to see Iris smiling at you mischievously, already eating the cereal. "Well, well looks like your pervy antics almost backfired on you. Of course I don't really blame you. You're used to being under my beautiful form, you probably feel uncomfortable not being beneath me." She said coyly before slowly bringing another spoonful of cereal up to her mouth.

You nervously watched Iris bring the cereal into her mouth and close her lips around them. Lately you'd begun to had dreams about Iris becoming a goddess for the whole world and not just you. Everyone, including the family you once knew, were specks before Iris and she did to them what she did to you on a grander scale. Cities were her foot rests, mountains were her chair, and the people were nothing but tiny foot servants. And the people outside of the cities were livestock waiting to be swallowed by Iris. In reality that spoon was full of cereal but in your dreams tonight it would be filled with dozens if not hundreds of tiny people being sacrificed to a goddess.

"Hey, tiny guy." You were snapped back to reality by Iris' voice. "Quit having pervy thoughts and listen to what I have to say." Iris said before swallowing her latest bite of food. "I thought you were just giving me some breakfast?" You asked in response. "Have I ever made anything simple for you?" She asked wagging her finger at you. "What do you want me to do?" You sighed, unwilling to put effort into questioning her. Iris smiled cheerily, an ironic appearance for someone taunting a shrunken human she kept as a pet. "It's simple really! I'm gonna lower my spoon to you and you climb in. I'll drop you into my bowl and you can eat whatever cereal you grab." You groan to yourself, half in annoyance and half In terror. "But if I'm in there while you're eating, then you'll scoop me up and swallow me!" You protest. Iris' smile simply grew. "Well of course! You can't try and take a cute dragon's food without risking becoming it." She explained as if it was common knowledge... and did she just refer to herself as a cute dragon?


"Can't you just give me the breakfast you said you would?" You begged. Iris brought her finger to her chin and hummed to herself. "Well..." she started after a brief pause, "if you don't do the challenge I won't give you any of this cereal, but if you check inside my slippers you could probably find some crumbs you could eat. It's your choice little guy." She said lowering her spoon next to you. Will you jump in her spoon or scavenge around in her slippers for crumbs that might not be there?
1413311111222231121.title: Another Challenge

14133111112222311211.content:
“Why cant you just make this easy for me” You say under your breath, mostly to vent and not for her to hear. If she heard you say that she would make it much worse. And you don't want that. “Fine! Lower the spoon.... ill climb in”

Iris smirked down at you, Tilting her spoon to get all the contents off she lowered it down onto the bed. You were small, but the Spoon was still a hard platform to stand on, mainly cause of the wet floor. Once you were on completely Iris lifted her spoon back into the air. You've been picked up before, but normally theres a grip to hold you. Whether that was her fingers or her toes.

You expected it to stop at the top of the bowl, but instead it kept going up, until you were right in front of Iris’s lips. And even worse she licked them. “No Goddess, please don't!”

“Relax, I'm the kind of Goddess to play with her food, it would be boring if i just ate you now” She told you. “But just so you know i could totally do it” She demonstrated this by opening her mouth wide. Letting you see right inside. Her pearly white teeth, her wiggling tongue and the inside of her mouth. One line of Saliva trailing from the top of her mouth to her bottom.

You roll your eyes as you act quickly, jumping off you didn't wait for her to lower you down. This is actually people food! You cant wait! You land in the bowl and due to your size it wasn't a hard impact. Making sure to avoid the hard bowl or the soggy cereal.

Once you landed you got to it. Swimming towards one you lay into it. Eating it, and it was just as good as you remember. “Oh wow I've missed you” You say with a mouth full. Eating cereal, drinking milk and treading water isn't an easy thing to do. But your too determined to quit. You keep going, you were so into eating that you almost didn't realise the giant spoon shark coming from the side. Seeing it you quickly backstroke away. The spoon grabs the cereal, surrounding cereal and the milk around. You watch as it gets lifted up to where you were just before, going into Iris’s mouth as she swallowed it.

Seeing her eat cereal here was a lot more intimidating.

“Hm... pretty good, but i cant help but feel it was missing something? But what could it be? Oh thats right! You!”

Iris brought her spoon down and this time aimed for you, you acted quickly and kept swimming away. The spoon swoops up a few more obstacles as she lifts it up.

It was at this point you realised Iris’s true intentions. She never wanted to reward you with Cereal. No she wanted to mess with you. She probably schemed to drop you in her cereal in her sleep. You wouldn't put it pass your dark skinned goddess.

“Im coming again” Iris said in a sing song pattern as she reached down again.
 What happens next?
14133111112222311211.title: Iris's Tricky Plan

choices: She licks you a few times and lets you down
141331111122223112111.content:
As you tried to swim away from the oncoming spoon, you noticed that her next scoop missed you by a large margin. She only seemed successful in pushing some the The cereal forward and creating waves in the bowl. Though it made things slightly trickier, you were still at it, not letting up. You watched the spoon descent again. Once more or missed you by a large margin. She had to be toying with you here. Maybe she was only trying to give you a scare earlier, or maybe she’s planning something. You had no clue. As you watched her move the spoon once more you tried to swim away soon bumping into something hard. Oh no!

You were against the edge of the bowl. This whole time Iris had been subtly herding you from one direction to the next before causing you to trap yourself. You tried to swim back to the center, but she had all of the remaining cereal pushed right in front of you. You fell into this trap hard. “You’re not escaping this one.” She tainted in a sing song tone. You certainly weren’t in a place to argue. The debris slowed you too much to make much of a getaway as the spoon soon scooped you up and pulled you towards the dragon master’s mouth. You begged and pleaded for her to stop this offering anything you could in return. But none of it seemed to matter to Iris. She only brought you closer. Now too high up to safely jump off you watched in horror as her gaping maw gat closer and closer.
141331111122223112111.title: You get scooped up

choices: She puts you at her feet
She puts you by her rear
She slides you into her shirt
She has something else in mind
1413311111222231121112.content: You were shivering as your otherwise playful goddess moved you closer to her. Her mouth was open wide allowing her hot breath to flow over you as you were pressed closer and closer to the void before you. Then suddenly the spoon stopped. Before you could ask what was happening the tongue shot out and started licking around your body. Before you knew it, the tongue grabbed your tiny form and pulled it inside. Iris savored the taste of you covered in milk and bits of food. Gently licking and sucking what she could off of you. You panicked as you felt random prodding and pressure in complete darkness but to your surprise you were soon spat back out into the awaiting palm of your goddess. “That was fun. You lasted a lot longer than I was expecting.” She said in her carefree and cheerful tone. You were still a bit shaken, though you wanted to glare up at her for treating that whole ordeal so lightly, it was probably for the best that you couldn’t right then since she was actually in a very good mood with you. “Since you did so well, why not have a few pieces of the cereal. No tricks this time I promise.” You were initially skeptical, but true to her word, the dark fingers soon dropped a few pieces of the puffy cereal before you. They were a bit soggy by now, but compared to the poffins you were usually fed it was still a treat. Iris giggled as you devoured your share. “Oh, I guess someone was hungry. Well I hope you had your fill. We have a huge day ahead of us.” You looked up as you wiped bits of food off your face, curious what she had in mind. Iris was difficult to read sometimes. Sometimes she could be incredibly nice and sweet to you. Other times she would spend hours demeaning You for her amusement. “I told one of the trainers to close the gym today, so we have the whole day to ourselves.” With that she got started with her big plans.
1413311111222231121112.title: All Fun and Games

choices: She sends out a Pokémon  to play with you
14133111112222311211121.content:
The way Iris hyped up her plans for the day, you expected something special to happen. So you were a bit surprised when the dragon master moved you back to the familiar position on the ground between her bare feet. Looking back and forth, you saw the part of your owner that you were most frequently assigned to. You didn’t exactly mind this fate (though you were reluctant to openly show that to Iris or else she’d tease you even more). You watched the toes wiggle as she seemed to be preparing something. Looking up you awaited her command. But Iris remained silent. Were you missing something? She never spoke since she placed you on the floor. But it turns out that your inaction was the wrong choice.
“More than a minute and you still haven’t moved. I thought by now you’d get to work without having to be told.” Iris said in mock annoyance. You tried to explain yourself but Iris neither listened nor cared. In all honestly this was just part of her game. “I suppose I’ll have to give you a crash course in keeping me happy. Quite literally in this case.”

With that her right foot lifted up and over you. Not wasting another second with begging you quickly dived out of the way just as it fell down to where you were seconds ago. Iris simply giggled as she raised it again. You dodged again, but it was clear that she was only toying with you and while seeing you flee was cute, right now she wanted to see her toy squirm. The foot moved about with lightning fast speeds. You almost couldn’t keep track of where it was going before suddenly you felt it on top of you, pinning you onto your back. “There we go, that’s much better.” She shifted the foot back a bit so that your head was sticking out between her toes. “Now let’s get started on the actual event.”
14133111112222311211121.title: Back at Iris’ Feet

choices: You fall out during the walk!
14133111112222311211122.content:
You wait for Iris' orders with baited breath, expecting the feet you had become so familiar with to plant themselves in front of you and for you to throw yourself at them like normal. But that didn't happen. Instead Iris got out of bed and rose to her full height, looking down on you like the day she first shoved you in her shoe.

"I'll admit something my precious bug," she began with her chipper voice, "When I decided to keep you that day, this arrangement wasn't exactly what I had in mind."

You looked at her confused, unsure about what was wrong with the situation on her end. You had been serving her diligently since the day she took you and you had thought you'd done well.

Iris simply giggled in response. "Don't worry! You've done a great job as my little bug! But that's kind of what the problem is." Okay now you were really confused. "When I decided to keep you I thought of you as my little boy toy. And you've been a lot more of a 'toy' than a boy. And while I do love that so much, I kind of want to spice things up a bit. Little toys exist only for the people that play with them; that's what you've been. But boys, even the little ones like you, want something for their hard work. And I've decided to give you a bit of a break. After all, a boy toy is only good as long as he keeps the boy part." She ends with a smirk.

You sit on your bed, your mouth hanging open slightly. You're not really sure what she just said, the dragoness' thoughts followed their own logic that was beyond yours but you did understand part of it. Apparently she wanted a bit of change and to reward you at the same time.

"Th-thank you goddess, I'm so glad you've decided to reward me!" You thank her enthusiastically.

She gave you a half smile. "Sure, I think you've kind of earned something."

You rise off her bed sheets and get ready to make your request. "Okay goddess I'd like you to-"

"Ah! I didn't say that you chose your reward." Iris cuts you off with a wag of her finger.

You can't chose your reward? How does that make sense?

"I guess my speech was a bit confusing for you. Just because I'm trying to make you less of a toy, that doesn't mean you're suddenly not my boy toy. I'm still in charge and I'm just giving you something that should satisfy the boy side of you."

"And what is that?"

Iris smirks and turns around, showing off her massive (to you) rear. "I know little boys like you go crazy for a girl's butt, so you're going to spend some time in their today!" She punctuated her sentence by slapping her butt. "It's not as adorable as having you in my shoe, but I'm sure even someone as obsessed with my feet as you are will loving being in here."

You blush furiously, causing Iris to laugh when she turns around. You hadn't really thought about being near Iris' like that before, you had only ever really known her feet. Spending so much time with her rear would be a completely different experience.

You were about to say something, but Iris simply yanks you from her bed between two fingers and holds you over her outstretched pants. "I hope you appreciate my generosity! Go ahead and struggle while you're in their if you want. Show me that you're more boy than toy. Bye bye!" She finishes dropping you into the darkness of the back of her pants. She lets go of the mouth of her pants and with a snap your forced against her right cheek as she walks out the door. She misses your presence as she slips on her shoes, but she enjoyed feeling you under her butt as she sat.

Now are you going to struggle and show a bit of defiance? Or are you a good toy who will stay still and enjoy the ride?

I want to make your life a living hell here under your new ‘landlord.’ So punk, what I'm saying is... whether you like it or not your staying”

“Great”

“Oh and stop brown nosing, its weird” Roxie added just at the end “You got something to say, say it. If you don't have the stones to say it, stay quiet. Ok”
14133112111411.title: Roxie's Law

choices: You keep hidden so Roxie takes a nap.
141331122.content:
Without taking a moment to look back, you begin sprinting away from the giant rocker. If you were lucky, she wouldn’t notice you running away and just assume she was rocking so hard that she yanked the cord out herself. “Hey.” You heard the voice from moments ago. “Not cool dude.” Well those hopes were out the window so you started to sprint even harder than you did before.

You expected to feel the giantess’ thundering footsteps and to run face first into her boots any moment now. But neither of those things happened. Instead you heard a loud thud behind you, quickly followed by a dull tap against a wall. The giantess sighed, slightly angry but mostly sounding irritated. The telltale sound of a cord being plugged into an amp sparked through the air.

You barely processed this information though, considering you were preoccupied trying to run for your life. The giantess spared you only a sideways glance as she looked over the amp settings. “Dude’s so slow that he probably didn’t have time to mess with the settings.” She concluded seeing how long it was taking you to make distance between you and her. Curiously, she lifted her heavy boot and stomped on the ground hard. The sensation made you trip slightly and increase your speed again when you recovered. The sight caused her to snicker. “I know these are some heavy boots, but they aren’t that bad. He’s probably flippin’ out so badly right now.”

Roxie’s assumption was spot on. You continued to dash relentlessly towards the place you had made your home the past few weeks. It was a crummy little hole in the wall, but you’ve made it a bit nicer on the inside. It was part of a waist high wall (well if you were normal size), so it was self contained and no rattatas or other small things could unexpectedly crawl into it. It was the safest place you could stay in and you were glad you had found it. Now you had to hope it would protect you from a giantess.

Unfortunately for Roxie, she missed the amusing sight of you dramatically diving into the whole. She likely would have laughed out loud had she seen you crash onto your face. Though she guessed something along those lines happened when she saw you frantically crawl into your whole on your stomach. “Either he got really lucky ‘running from me’” She sarcastically added air quotes, “or that’s where he’s been living. Who’d have thought I had a tiny dude hanging out in my practice studio.” She chuckled to herself.

Inside of your home, you tried to catch your breath after you had sprinted faster than you thought possible for yourself. Your attempts to steady your breathing were difficult when you were thinking about the vengeful giantess probably stomping around your home, waiting for her chance to grab you. For her part, Roxie had strummed a few chords on her bass guitar to make sure the sound was still properly going through her amp. She doubted that you had managed to damage it, but she was always one to make certain that things were working right. Satisfied that everything was working fine, she set her guitar against the wall once more and made her way towards your home.

Instead of doing something less startling like knocking, Roxie kicked the spot near the entrance hole, unintentionally knocking you to the ground. “Hey, dude, I saw you run in there. What’s your deal?” You naturally didn’t answer her, Roxie sighed. “Not comin’ out huh? I can just wait you out ya know. Or I could just plug your little hole and keep you trapped in there.” Smugly, Roxie leaned against the waist high wall, though without her boots on it would probably be taller than that for her.

Naturally you didn’t come out of your home, too terrified of the situation to do it willingly. Roxie’s taunting and vague threats did not help you to calm down and trust her either. Cautiously, you try to peer outside of the hole. You didn’t dare risk poking your head out, less you risk getting it plucked off or stomped flat.

As more time passed without you coming out Roxie huffed irritably, annoyed by your refusal to come out. “Dude, you know I’m just screwin’ around right? I’m not mad at you or anything. If I were, I actually would’ve chased you while you were running.” She still didn’t get any response from you. Even if she was telling the truth (which she was), you were too nervous to come out for her. You had been shrunken for a few weeks without any humans nearby. This titanic girl was the scariest thing you had seen over the past few weeks.

As her irritation rose, Roxie began to drum her fingers against the top of the wall. “Come on, you just accidentally yanked out the power cord. You probably just tripped over it. It’s nothing for me to be mad about or for you to be worried about… so come out!” The last part of her sentence came out as an angry growl, clearly showing her frustration. Her growl betrayed the laid back and forgiving image she was trying to show off, so you refuse to come out of hiding.

Roxie could only grit her teeth and sigh. “Alright, so I guess we’re going to play the waiting game. If that’s how it’s gonna be, then I’ll keep coming up with ideas about why you’re here.” Roxie said smugly. She planned on making up a bunch of stories, hoping one would get your attention and have you come out. Or she’d annoy you so much you surrender, that’d work too.

“Let me start with the easiest one I can think of. You're totally a fan of mine! Like a super hardcore fan. I doubt you’re naturally that small, so you’re one of those eccentric fans that Elesa always talks about.” Roxie laughed excitedly. “I bet she’s never had a guy shrink himself just to spy on her. I’ll have to tell her to eat her heart out later. She thinks she’s so popular, but she’s got no one like you in her fan club.” A red tinge washed onto Roxie’s cheeks, having a fan like that would be pretty cool.

“I wonder why you’d shrink yourself though? I figure stalking would be enough for a super fan. You already figured out where my practice studio is, why’d you feel the need to shrink yourself too? Oh man! Maybe you’re a perv? You wanted to get a good look at me while I was practicing and getting a little sweaty. Or maybe… you enjoy being tiny.” She spoke in a teasing voice now.

“Yeah, you want to be tiny around me and enjoy every part of me on a whole nother level! Oh man, just imagine how awesome my voice and moves would look at your size. I’d be like a goddess of rock! Not to mention all the fun I could have with you personally. I’d imagine any fan of a celeb would looooove to be pressed against their big, soft lips. Or maybe you just want to get close to these bad boys.” She said tapping the toe of her boot against the floor. “I’ve heard about fans like that, Elesa and Skyla both complain about it. But I don’t mind. If you want people to love you, let them love every part of you. They do get pretty sweaty, if a fan wants to be small and help clean them I wouldn’t complain. Hell, I’d let em be in their during a concert. Give them a seat even closer to my show than the front row.”

Roxie went on speaking for a while, going on and on with the teasing and the stories of how you got here. All of her talk had gotten to you and you were starting to blush. It’d be more accurate to say that you were a tomato at this point though. You didn’t really know who this girl was, but the way she was talking was starting to make you a fan of hers. Maybe you should let her grab you?

141331131.title: Elesa / Skyla

1413311311.content:
You still couldn’t wrap your head around how you ended up this small, but you’ve already accepted that you were and you had to at the very least try and do something about it. Coincidentally, you ended up just outside the Nimbasa City gym, which doubled as fashion show most days.

Now, you wandered the halls backstage, finding it to be a much better idea than trying to find help in the crowds watching the fashion show. You had almost got stepped on by various models multiple times, but you had to admit that you were enjoying the view more often than not. But it was a little hard to grab someone’s attention when they were walking past in the dark confined hallway.

Much to your surprise, one of the doors to a makeup room was open. Naturally, excited that you might have a chance to find someone to help you, you quickly entered the room. Much to your surprise, it belonged to the Nimbasa’s famous Gym Leader: Elesa.

As you gawked at the superstar looking at a mirror in the small room, the door was suddenly kicked shut behind you. “Huh…” Elesa gently said in surprise, looking at the door that had been slammed. She hadn’t remembered leaving the door cracked, but she was much more surprised by what had just entered her room. Wordlessly, she slid out of her chair and approached you with a confused expression on her face.

“Hi…” You timidly said, as the model crouched down and approached you.

“You’re… Tiny?” She said, holding her hand a few inches away from you, not sure if she should touch you.

“Yeah, I uh… don’t know how I ended up like this…” You said, struggling to stay composed as the gym leader’s light blue eyes stared down at you.

“I’ll help you!” She enthusiastically said, gently picking you up and holding you in front of her perfect face. You felt lost in the incredible detail of her gorgeous eyes that your small stature allowed. “...But fiiirst, you’ll have to help me!” She said, sitting up on her haunches.

“What… What do you mean?” You said, snapping out of your trance.

“I… I’ve been having trouble deciding what I should wear for the fashion show today…” She thoughtfully started, “Maybe you can help me!”

“Okay…” You said, seeing no reason why you shouldn’t help the beauty.

“Okay, sweetie!” She said, standing up and carrying you over to her makeup station. “Now stay put, I’ll be right back!” She said, before dancing over to her changing room. Uncomfortably, you looked around the room before she came back into the room wearing one of her new outfits: yellow/blue shorts, top, an extended version of her headset that pointed up like ears, and an intricate yellow fluffy coat (B2/W2 Design). She hopped right in front of you, twirled around and throwing her hands into the hair.

“I… Uh… You look amazing!” You said, really unsure of what to say. She looked beautiful in her casual clothes, she looked beautiful in this outfit, and you were confident that she would look just as lovely no matter what she was wearing.

She giggled, “Thanks, but I’ll be right back!” She said, before quickly hopping back into the changing room before you could comment further. Before long, she burst back into the room wearing an old outfit of hers consisting of high heels, dark leggings, a striped half open sleeveless top, and a sleeveless yellow top that framed her undershirt. She must have been wearing a wig, that matched the yellow of her clothes, and a similar headset, but instead of the ‘ears’, she had wires dangling down nearly to her feet.

Agily, she walked up in front of you on her heels and stood over you with her hands on her hips. “Well…?” She said, smiling down at you.

“Uh… Amazing…” You said, awed at the blonde beauty.

“Mm, okay.” She said, before turning back to the changing room. She tried on several more outfits, exhausting almost every non-embarrassing compliment that you could think of. Eventually, standing in the last out of outfits she wanted to try, which seemed to be an electric version of Skyla’s outfit. “Okay… So which outfit do you like the most?!” She excitedly said, leaning down over you…
1413311311.title: Shrunk with Elesa!

choices: Some evil people crash the party
14133113111.content:
"Well, I like the coat. It looks really fluffy and huggable," you admitted.

"I know, right?" Elesa gushed, "And the wool to make it was sourced from a farm right here in Unova! Every time I model this I feel like I'm drawing attention to all the hardworking people who put their love and care into making quality products, not just the fashion designers and workers in he fashion industry, but the farmers as well, it just makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside." She hugged her body and pressed her face into the soft wool.

She stayed like this for a while before releasing the coat and letting her arms drop.
"Look at me,I'm starting to get sentimental," Elesa sniffed. "Alright, I think I'll go with this one today Here you go bud, for all your help you get a front row ticket to the show!."

She carefully picks you up off the floor and places you into her coat pocket. The wool was rather easy to climb so you had a perfect view of the runway. You couldn't believe that you were about to go on a runway walk with a literal supermodel. This was going to be great!

Fashion show, here we come!
14133113111.title: Elesa's B2/W2 Outfit

141331131111.content:
As Elesa got moving, you could hear the crowd getting louder and louder. A show was about to be put on, and you got the best seat in the house. Well worse seat actually. You may be close to one of the models, but you could not actually see anything. Not that you minded in the long run, you just love being there. You hear music start, one that you would say was for the models. An announcer no doubt, and suddenly Elesa was strutting. Guess the star of the show should go first, and knowing what type of girl this was, she will probably also go last. So you get comfy in the flurry pocket. Laying down and relaxing.

-

After what felt like hours, it was over. Elesa said goodbye to all the girls, as she then headed over into the room. The one where she took you first. She walked right in with a bottle of water, drinking it as it was nice. With that out of the way, she can help you like she promised.

It isn’t going to be easy though, given your size. You are so small, and she has no idea how this happened. Thinking about it for a while, she eventually decided on not worrying about it. One step at a time, no doubt about that.

She walked over to her makeup chair as she reached into her pocket. Sitting down and bringing you to her face.
 It was a nice sight, amazing really. When she sent you her smile as well, that almost made you faint there. “Hello there.”

“Uh... nice work. Seems like the crowd was really into you out there?”

“They did mostly come for me.” She said taking the compliment “When i am out there. It’s my stage, and the world loves me.” She said as she smiled, opening the corner of her eye as she looked at you. Seeing if you were impressed.

“Can’t argue there you are really... anyway, what now?”

“No,” She said quickly, that surprised you “What were you going to say. Just then, what were you going to say?”

“That... you were... beautiful.” You reply to her as that was something she wanted to hear. She wore a smile. She has gotten this compliment more than any other gym leader in the world, in fact more than Cynthia as well. The woman that made her change the colour of her hair. Those flows she has, it was impossible to compete. Instead of being seen as an inferior version, she changed.

“Well good to know!” She said happily with a swooning smile. She brought you forward and dropped you down. She dropped you down and placed you on the table as she talked. “So here is what i was thinking little guy, i can’t help you.”

“Yeah, thought not. Shrinking isn’t very common. Even the Pokemon that could use Minimise can’t do it on others. As well those Dynamax Pokemon. They can’t shrink and use it on others so... i am lost.”

“Me too, i’ve traveled all over this Pokemon world, and i have never seen something like you. But hey, that makes you one of a kind.” She said as you blush a bit. Turning back as it was amazing to hear that from her. Those simple words stunned you. “So anyway what to do with you. If you want, and i am assuming you want. You can stay with me.”

“Stay, with you?” You question as you think about that only for a second. Just to appreciate this “Yes! Of course yes!” You say back

“Good, although i’m not sure how. Maybe as my pet.” She giggled, making a joke as you thought about this for a while. Why did you even consider that. Well she was that beautiful, she was a model after all.

“I... don’t want to be a hinderance.” You say to her “I mean, you no doubt make enough money but... being this size it is a big responsibility. I can’t really do anything by myself. I will need you with me for basically everything that i do. That’s a lot, are you sure?”

She thought about it for a second, putting her hand to her chin as she wondered. “Well, it does sound like a lot, but i do think i can handle it. In fact, i am actually looking forward to it. Not only because of how cute you are, but because of what you are?”

You blushed at the cute remark, then you thought about the other part. “Okay, what am I?”

“A boy!” She said “And a handsome one at that. I can test small clothes on you. See what works in private and what doesn’t. This way, we can get some models to wear the clothes. Of course yours would be doll sized, but still it’s genius.”

“Uh... glad I can help, but... when you say this, do you mean boy clothes or girl clothes.”

“Of course boy clothes... but now that i think about it, you wearing a dress would be quite the sight.”

“Did i just put that idea in your mind?”

“Hehe, you did.” She said with a beautiful giggle. You lay down for a while, seeing this as you suppose it was nice. You are with her, not for a little while but seemingly until the foreseeable future. Elesa is really being so nice to you, you feel like you need to offer her something in return. Not money since you have none. She already has that clothes test thing in her mind, so you are gonna offer her more.

“Well, if you need anything else. You can get it. Whether that be foot rubs, entertainment or if you just want me to get stuff for you. I will do it with a smile on my face. Promise it!”

“And i don’t doubt that for a moment.” She said with a smile as her eyes then shined. “Wait, anything? If that is true then how about ___________

While she is deeply sympathetic to you and your rather unfortunate predicament, the scientist in herself was simply too interested by it. "I heard of many old tales and folk stories of little people. Though it was getting dark, you could clearly see the silhouette of someone sitting by the campfire. Not wanting to waste another second out in the wild where you could fall prey to the smallest animals you quickly made your way towards the mystery figure, not even caring if the person is friendly or not at the moment. You kept walking to the origin of the smoke, but a tremor made you stop, it came from behind you

Before you turned around, you heard a loud noise accompanied by a light that almost blinds you

When you open your eyes, you got a very "big" surprise ...

In front of you, was the gym leader bug type, viola, with a camera in his hands

She had apparently taken a photo with flash, since it was something dark

After that...

While you were approaching, some marks on the ground caught your attention, they looked like wheel marks, although you did not pay them much attention.

When you came out of the grass, your face was filled with surprise

You came closer to see her better, great mistake ...
