14133121212.title: You tried to run!

choices: She's been talked out of it
141331212121.content:
It would seem Korrina spotted you just in time, she saw you and quickly tried to stop, knowing that she won't be able to simple put her foot down and stop herself that way, she did the only thing she could think about doing to stop herself and miss you. She jumped.

You watch as she leaps over you, not prepared for it as she soared above you like a flying Pokemon. Only for her to land on the side in a massive crash on the ground. No longer on her feet but instead on her stomach. She was dirtied and uncomfortable. Feeling bad, you ran up to Korrina as you wanted to make sure she's okay

“That looked like it hurt, are you okay?” You say running up to her face as she shook her head.

“yeah I'm fine, believe it or not I've had much... much worse crashes” She said as she then suddenly became more concerned about you rather then her.

“Why are you so small? Are you okay? you didn't get hurt did you? And what were you thinking running in my path?” She asked as she scooped you in her hands and brought you closer to her admirable face.

“Um.... don't know, besides being small I'm doing fine, no i didn't you jumped over me completly and i was trying to get your attention, admittedly not thinking” you say to her answering every question she sent your way.

“Okay, lets just carry you back to the tent, from there we can figure things out okay” She said as you agreed. Unknown to you she's going back there for bandages, feeling some wounds on her body from that fall. She was out here to get better on riding on grass and dirt so she was kind of expecting a lot of crashes.

She entered the tent as you look around. It was pretty messy considering everything. Clothes scattered around and packets of crisp’s open. She dropped you down onto her bed as she started digging through her bag, throwing stuff everywhere as she quickly covered up her bruises. Fast enough so you didn't see anything.

“Okay, lets sort this out. Are you sure you don't have any idea how you got like this. You didn't annoy a psychic Pokemon or psychic trainer. i hear they have some weird powers so it could of been one of them.

“I don't remember anything, expect for an Espurr that i caught following me a couple of days ago” You tell her

.

.

“It was the Espurr?”

“It was the Espurr” She told you as you smack yourself in the forehead. Of course it was, why didn't you put two and two together.

“When did this happen, if it happened today then we should be able to find this Espurr” She said showing care.

“I mean, i found myself small when i woke up but are you really gonna give chase to it. It can shrink people! Chances are it will shrink you too” You tell her
141331212121.title: Korinna Used Jump

choices: She smiled gently. You were still her trainer after all!
She smirked mischievously. You were nothing but a toy now...
1413312121213.content:
"True." Korrina stated while taking off her helmet with a sigh, letting her blonde hair come into view.
"But if it shrunk you, it should be able to grow you back, no? I mean, I've got pokemon too, I can make it grow you back if needed."

On her bed, you fidgeted nervously as you regarded the towering giantess.

"It can't be that easy," you mused.
"I mean, it can shrink pokemon too, I guess. And if that happens, it'd probably shrink you down too..."

"You do have a point there..." Korrina replied, but you remained silent, with a terrified expression painted all over your face.

"Hey! Are you feeling alright?" Korrina questioned with a hint of concern in her tone,
"Why are you looking at me like that?"

You opened your mouth, but no sound came out but a bunch of incoherent syllables.

Concerned, Korrina began walking to the bed, only to find that it was bigger than she remembered.

"... I must have fallen really hard, this bed looks bigger." she was joking while hoping to cheer you up, but you found nothing funny about what was going on.

In fact, you weren't even looking at her, but to where she was shortly ago.

Korrina followed your gaze and turned around, examining her tent.

Her heart skipped a beat.

Standing there, by the opening of her tent, was an Espurr, who was oddly bigger than the average.

Or maybe...

Korrina urgently understood why you were looking so scared, and why her bed looked bigger.

The Espurr was shrinking her too!

The giantess made an attempt to sprint towards the small psychic-type, but quickly discovered that she couldn't move, held in place by Espurr's Psychic.

On your perch, you watched as the towering giantess slowly shrunk down to size.

"NO!" you shouted, but couldn't do anything as Korrina shrunk and shrunk, until she was roughly your size, floating in mid-air while still held by Espurr's mind power.

"K-Korrina?" you called, but got no answer.

Slowly, she floated back to the floor, and you noted with horror that she fainted, much like you did when Espurr shrunk you.

The gigantic feline slowly moved towards its newest victim, regarding her fainted form with its huge eyes.

According to the Pokedex, this Espurr was a female, and could use just Psychic and Fake Out. You didn't exactly mean to catch her when you did.

You just met her while walking around, and she didn't stop following you. She didn't seem to have any malicious intent (not back then at least), so you asked her if she wanted to be part of your team.

A slight nod was your answer and you caught the Espurr.

How it learned to shrink people was still a mystery to you.

But still, even when helpless and utterly pathetic, you had to do something, you couldn't leave Korrina like that.

"Leave her alone!" you cried out, angry and scared at once.

The Espurr ignored you, but inadvertently followed your command as she lost interest for the fainted girl she had shrunken.

Instead, she seemed to have taken a lot of interest in you, minuscule on the giant bed.

The gaze of the gigantic pokemon, staring straight at you, made you feel uncomfortable.

"Uh..." you started, but Espurr started moving towards your perch on top of the bed.

Your heart began galloping within your chest as you stumbled back. But you knew there was no way out of this unless Espurr willed it.

Said pokemon reached the bed and, with a surprising agility, leaped straight onto it, her gaze now pointing downwards, right at you.

You kept stepping back, but the giantess used the faintest of her Psychic to stop you and list you up to her face, right in front of huge, seemingly bottomless eyes of hers.

You could see your reflection in those, and you were utterly scared.

"C-Come Espurr, remember all the great times we had together!" you shouted out of fear, before realizing what you had just said.

"... The last two days I mean! Weren't those fun!?" you cried in an attempt to stop whatever the psychic-type had in mind before it happened.

Seeing you so scared, Espurr's facial expression changed, like it hadn't in the two days she was with you.
1413312121213.title: Miniaturized Korrina

choices: She takes you and Korrina to get the Pokeball
She doesn't care and just eats you
Korrina's awake and sent out her normal sized Lucario
14133121212132.content:
(Not the caught what i originally meant but ill play along. 8) )

You look at your giant espurr that you made the mistake in capturing, now wishing that you just left it alone and minded your own business. Especially when it sent you a big and devious smile.

“Purr” It said to you pretty intimidating as you try to get away, doing a swimming motion in the air comically. It didn't do anything though.

“Come on Espurr! I didn't do anything that bad to you!” You tell her as she starts squeezing you a bit with the psychic. “Okay i guess i did abduct you from your home and was going to keep you with me.... but i would of treated you nice i swear!”


It seems you reasoning and cowardly rationizing of the situation didn't accomplish anything. As Espurr had a plan and she was going to put it into motion. Scared you watch as the giant Espurr opened its mouth as your eyes went wide.

“No Espurr I'm sorry. Please don't eat me!” You say to it as it slowly brought you closer and closer. Drawing it out just to mess with you as you got a good look at the inside of her mouth, the saliva coming from the roof and her wiggling tongue. You cant explain how desperately you don't want to go in there. And cant explain how more you don't want to go near her throat at all.

“Okay Espurr, you've made your point. Ill release you if you want me too!” you say as it stops.

“Purr?”

“Thats right i can!” You tell her as your plan seemed to work. “I can get rid of your bond with the Pokeball that caught you and you can be a wild Pokemon again. But i cant do that if you eat me!”

Espurr looked conflicted right now... She really wanted to eat you right now, like more then she originally thought she would. While at the same time she wants to be a wild Pokemon. The fact that she feels attached to you was a cause of the Pokeball and she hated it. Espurr knows some wild Pokemon in the forest which would love being captured by a trainer but not her.

“Espurr... Espurr Purr Es Es Purr” It said to you.

“Um.... yes” You reply not really sure what she was getting at.

Espurr just rolled its eyes and brought her stubby hand to you. Hitting you in the head as she transferred her question to you via psychic.

“Oh you want to know where the Pokeball is?” You say now knowing what Espurr was saying. “Well it was with me when i first found myself shrunk. It was too big to carry and i was too small to open it.”

Espurr was surprised with itself it doesn't remember the Pokeball at all. She watched you from the moment you shrunk so she's really shocked she didn't see it. She didn't see it, or maybe your just lying to save your skin.

What happens next?
14133121212132.title: Bargaining With Espurr

choices: ... the poke-ball was still there! You could release Espurr!
... the poke-ball wasn't there anymore, now what...?
141331212121321.content:
The gigantic Espurr stared straight at you as it thought deep and hard, deciding whether you were telling the truth or lying to save your shrunken butt.

Ultimately, she decided to give you a chance.

She really wanted to return to her ‘wild pokemon status’, but she couldn't have done it if she ate you.

So her only shot was trusting you for now, submitting herself to being a trained pokemon for still a little bit.

"Esp." she simple said while you began hovering closer to her gigantic form.

You watched in silence, your vocal chords paralyzed by fear, as the giantess' psychic grip faded, letting you fall down onto her stubby paw.

"Purr." she said again, though you couldn't understand her.

One thing was certain though, you were going to live. The only thing you weren't sure about was whether you were or not out of danger.

"Thanks, Espurr. It means-" a second tap to your skull caused you to trail off.

You looked at the pokemon.

"Y-You... you want me to find the poke-ball?" you parroted back the words you heard in your mind, almost like a ghostly hand had written them straight inside your brain.

The Espurr nodded, much like she had done when you asked her to join you; you couldn't help but wonder the reason of it now, but you were sure that you misunderstood her gesture.

Or perhaps she really wanted to be part of your team, but then realized she actually didn't.

Whichever it was, you didn't care.

"... If I help you find the poke-ball - don't look at me like that, I can't on my own! - you'll grow me back?"

Again, Espurr shot that devious smirk you've grown familiar with.

‘Maybe’, you assumed she was telling that.

"... Alright. But you'll grow Korrina too." you gestured for the shrunken girl that laid on the floor of her own tent, unconscious.

Espurr nodded, before she jumped down to the floor and started walking to the opening of the tent.

She stopped by the unconscious body of Korrina though, and the girl began hovering in mid-air, held by Espurr's psychic.

Korrina was roughly dumped on top of Espurr's other, free paw as the gigantic feline began walking again, out of the tent and back into the woods.

You swallowed.

Your only way out of this was to find that poke-ball.

You sure hoped this was going to be easy...

A groan beside you interrupted your train of thought.

You looked to the side to see Korrina fidgeting on Espurr's paw. You saw the blonde girl stirring, before she sat upright.

"What a dream..." she muttered, before her eyes opened, and she found herself on top of an Espurr's white paw.

Startled, she looked at the pokemon, then at you, seemingly extremely confused.

"I... uh..."

"No, it wasn't a dream. My Espurr," the giantess growled softly at this,
"... This free Espurr I don't deserve to have as a pokemon followed me, because she wants to be free again. We'll have to find her poke-ball first." you said, and the pokemon's face returned deadpan as it was before you spoke.

Korrina nodded, seeming though still extremely disoriented.

"But," she mused,
"... What if the poke-ball is no longer where you left it? If some pokemon took interest in it and took it? You know it couldn't capture it since Espurr should be technically held in that poke-ball..."

You didn't reply, but swallowed deeply, like Espurr was probably going to do with you if Korrina's predictions turned out to be true.

--

"Purr." Espurr broke the silence she had kept intact for a while as she arrived to the place where you were shrunken down by her own paw.

She was sure of it: Espurr have an incredible sense of orientation, they could find their way out of a forest like this in no time.

"Purr." she said, lowering herself and letting both you and Korrina down.

"Help us at least," you told.
"It will be easier for the three of us to find it if we search together."

Espurr looked at you with the same deadpan expression, not wanting to take orders from you, a human she had shrunken.

But still, she nodded since you had a point, and out of respect that these were the last instants of you being her trained.

"And remember: if we manage to find it, can you please grow us both back to our original sizes before I actually release you? If you don't do that, I... uh... won't be able to do it, understand?" you tried, hoping that the pokemon would fall for your lie and didn't decide to destroy the poke-ball whenever you found it.

You and Korrina, who stood silent beside you, watched as the Espurr let your words sank in, before she looked back at you and nodded her head. The message was clear.

You had a deal.

"Good." you said, before turning to Korrina,
"Let's search for the poke-ball, or we'll never have our sizes back!"

"You're right." she whispered as the both of you started wandering around, in search of the gigantic sphere that was going to decide your date.

Korrina looked at you, and for the first time since you met her you saw the most vague hint of a smile on her face.

"That was genius, y'know. This way she'll grow us back!" she whispered, while the ground beneath you shook as Espurr herself searched for the poke-ball.

"It won't work if we don't find it," you replied,
"Let's hurry."

You, Korrina and the gigantic Espurr searched around for quite a while, but your search gave little to no success.

Until you spotted something familiar, laying abandoned in the middle of the forest floor.

"My bag!" you exclaimed, drawing Korrina's attention.

Indeed, it was your bag, now as tall as a skyscraper. You probably lost it when you shrunk down so much that you simply slid out of it. It looked intact.

"This is your bag?" Korrina questioned, like trying to convince herself that you owned something that big.

"Yeah! This must be the exact place where I lost the poke-ball! I-" your mind filled itself with the moments of your shrinking.

Espurr's poke-ball rolled out of your pocket as you stumbled around, trying to figure out what was going on. You saw it falling on the ground, before everything became dark.

"... It must be around here!" you said.

"What are we waiting for?" Korrina asked as Espurr approached the bag too,
"We need our sizes back!"

You looked at you bag and hesitantly walked up to it.

You began walking around it, before stopping behind it to notice...
141331212121321.title: Espurr's quest for freedom

choices: She returns espurr to the pokeball and keeps you as a shrunken man
1413312121213211.content:
You were in luck, the pokeball is still there. It was still in it's collapsed state, yet it was still almost as tall as you. You shudder to think about how big it will be when it expands.

"I found it." You yell while you roll the ball around the bag to your companions.

"That's great. Now release espurr so we can get back to normal." Korrina yells out. You tap the button on the ball and it expands to over 4 times your height. You couldn't even reach the button now, let alone adjust the settings you need to to free espurr.

"Okay espurr, now grow me back and I can free you." Espurr looks at the pokeball, then back to you and shakes her head. "What, why?" Espurr gives Korrina a tap on the head like she gave you.

"Ohh, I see." She turns to you. "She doesn't trust you still. She thinks you'll just return her to the pokeball."

"Well I'm too small to do it like this, so how am I gonna free you?" Espurr puts her paw to her chin before giving a look of realization. Her eyes begin to glow blue with psychic energy as Korrina begins to levitate and grow back to normal.

"Oh, you want me to do it?" Espurr nods in response. "Okay then." She walks over and picks up the pokeball. "Here we go."
1413312121213211.title: ... the poke-ball was still there!

She double crosses both of you and reshrinks Korrina

"Just gotta twist this dial aaand done." She taps the button on the front of the ball and it opened up, causing espurr to emit a blue glow before the blue energy was sucked into the ball. "There you go espurr, you're free now."

Espurr leapt in joy, diving head first into Korrina's cleavage and nuzzling in. "Your welcome girl." She turns back to you before jumping out of Korrina's arms and levitating you into her furry grip. You got scared that she was gonna eat you anyway. Instead, she hugged you against her body like a child with a stuffed tediursa.

Korrina knelt down beside her. "Okay espurr, you're free now, can you grow him back now like you promised?"

What does espurr do?

She teleports you and her away from Korrina
141331212121321111.content:
Espurr starts to back away, putting herself between you and Korrina, acting like a child who's mother is trying to take their toys away. She holds you even tighter.

"Oh come on espurr. You promised you would regrow him if we freed you." Espurr looks down at you and brings you up to her cheek to nuzzle you. "Awwww, you just want to play with him don't you?" Espurr nods. This makes Koreina pause and think. "Tell you what espurr, I have a deal for you. It wouldn't be safe for him to just be left out here in the wild. How about I take him with me back to Shalour City, and you can come and play with him whenever you want? Does that sound like a plan?"

How does espurr respond?
141331212121321111.title: She wants to keep you as a shrunken pet.

choices: Espurr heard Korrina's plan and is pissed
1413312121213211111.content:
Espurr gives you once last look before levitating you into Korrina's outstretched palm. "Don't worry espurr. You can come and visit him any time you want." She grabs your bag and races back to her camp with you now in tow.

"So what now? I wanna get back to normal, not be some toy to a giant psychic pokemon for the rest of my life."

"I know, that's why I made that deal." Now you're confused, how is letting espurr play with you get you back to normal? "Think about it, what type is espurr?"

"Psychic."

"Right, and the Shalour gym, the gym I lead, specializes in fighting types. Now, how do fighting types handle psychic types?"

Now you start to see where she's going with this. "So your plan is to let espurr have her fun with me, meanwhile we bide our time and wait for a trainer to challenge you with an espurr of their own, then we can ask them if we can use their espurr to grow me back?"

"Ding ding ding. Right on all counts."

What happens next?
1413312121213211111.title: She gives you back to Korrina

1413312121213211112.content:
You suddenly felt Espurr's tight grip tighten even more somehow, before Korrina's form vanished, and the tree's changed their position. It was then that you realized what Espurr did, she teleported away to keep you to herself. You look up at Espurr and see her looking straight back at you, a weird smile on her face. You felt your furry entrapment rise in the air, before feeling yourself rubbed against her furry cheek yet again. Espurr's cheek didn't feel that bad, quite the contrary in fact. It felt furry, which is a given, but it also felt warm and comforting, probably because it's keeping you safe.

All of a sudden you hear a voice shout out from the left. "I'm gonna catch you Espurr!"

Who was it?

A: Psychic gym leader Olympia, wishing to add a new psychic pokemon to her team
B: Bonnie, Clement's Sister, wishing to have a new friend to hang around with (After the anime)
C: Readers Choice (AKA I can't think of any other ones I'd like to see)
D: Espurr quickly eludes whoever it is. You’re alone with her for the time being.
1413312121213211112.title: She teleports you and her away from Korrina

choices: Bond or not, she didn't care - she threw you in her mouth and swallowed!
She resignedly put you down - you were her trainer now...
1413312121213212.content:
With horror, you realized that poke-ball was nowhere to be seen.

Your jaw hung open, while your mind vegan screaming ‘no’ over and over.

"This... this can't be true..." you mumbled breathlessly as your gaze darted around to try and spot the red and white ball.

No such luck, it was nowhere.

Some pokemon must have moved it or some passing trainer must have taken it, you sourly figured out.

"Es..." an impatient voice rang behind you, on the other side of your bag. Espurr wasn't willing to wait anymore.

You pondered running away, but you remembered about Korrina, who was still shrunken and with Espurr herself. The giantess could have eaten her instead of you if you ran...

Reluctantly, you walked back to where the pokemon and the shrunken girl were.

Espurr was staring straight at you, and so was Korrina.

You looked at the girl first, before your gaze moved on the pokemon.

"I'm sorry," you reluctantly said, pausing to gulp down a lump that formed in your throat,
"The poke-ball... the poke-ball is gone. I can't... release you, unless whoever has it breaks it. I'm really really sorry..." you said carefully.

Korrina gasped before her hands rushed to her mouth as she stared at you; Espurr's jaw opened slightly at your declaration.

Her gaze lingered on you for what seemed an eternity, before her expression finally shifted, becoming that devious smirk she wore before, right when she was about to-

"No..." you mumbled, but it was too late; a psychic grip caused you to start levitating in mid-air, before you were shot across the air and in front of the face of the psychic-type giantess.

"Let him go!" Korrina shouted from below, but Espurr ignored her, opening her mouth wide instead, giving you a clear view of her pink, slick insides; big drops of saliva fell from her palate and onto her tongue, each drop falling being the equivalent of a boulder dropping on your heart.

"C-Come on Espurr, don't eat me!" you begged, but your plead fell on deaf ears; instead, you started moving closer to the slick cavern that was her mouth.

She was deliberately taking as much time she could to let you in the pink, fleshy hell that was going to be your end, unless you thought about something real smart real quick.

"Come Espurr... I c-can be a good trainer! I'll do anything, just don't eat me!... I could be more useful alive than dead, no!?"

Again, she ignored you, and inched closer to her mouth.

"It wasn't his fault!" someone bellowed from below.

This got Espurr to close her mouth to look down; Korrina, who was standing by the giantess' leg, had a terrified look on her face.

You opened your eyes again and looked down at the blonde girl, wondering what she was up to. What wasn't your fault? You discovered that you didn't care as long as it was enough to convince Espurr to not eat you.

"He brought you to find that poke-ball, but if it's gone it isn't his fault!" Korrina continued, giving you a new hope as well as a new idea to cling to.

"T-That's right Espurr! It isn't my fault if someone t-took your poke-ball, I don't have anything to do with it, I swear!"

Once again Espurr felt conflicted.

She really wanted to deliver your punishment and eat you, but, oddly, she also felt like she didn't want to eat you, which was weird.

Why would she-

With a small, nearly inaudible gasp, Espurr realized that it was because of the poke-ball!

The damn sphere bound her to you, made her feel bad about eating you, and she hated it! She wanted to be free!

But still, that meant the poke-ball was still intact, and it also meant that you were still her trainer...

You saw the hesitation in the eyes of the pokemon giantess and decided that this was your chance to convince Espurr to not eat you,

"Please Espurr, don't eat me. My only fault is having mistaken you... It's really not my fault if the poke-ball is gone!" you cried again.

"That's right! Let him down Espurr!" Korrina shouted from below, and you shot her a meek smile, grateful for the support.

Then, you looked back at Espurr, wanting to beg her one last time, even though it meant humiliating yourself.

But the giantess had already made up her mind...
1413312121213212.title: Unsuccessful search

141331212122.content:
Unfortunately she does not listen to you ...

You were in shock when you felt the wheels go through your body, slicing in half

Before you could give a last cry, Korrina stepped over you again, crushing your body

She felt as if she had crushed something on her wheels, looking at them stained with red, she thought it was just paint, cleaning them
141331212122.title: She does not listen to you

1413312122.content:
You found yourself in a middle of a hallway after you woken up from your sleep. The last thing you remember was that you were walking around a forest and it was getting late so you fell asleep at a random spot and you don't remember anything else after that. Anyways, the hallway itself looks absolutely huge; so huge that you almost felt like an insect within this building. The structure around you seems to have an eastern-style architecture, almost like you are inside a Japanese castle of some sort. Thinking of that, you wonder if anyone around here can speak English around here so you find someone and tell them how did you end up in this place.

You didn't get a chance to set one single foot on the wooden surface when your surroundings start to shake. Is this place going to collapse?!


No, instead you saw something that shock you more than ever.

Coming your left, you watch as two giant girls come into view and walk across the massive hallway. You suddenly realized the untold fact: This place is not really that huge, you were actually very small!

Just like this building, these girls also have an Oriental look to them; both are wearing short kimono-like dresses, knee-length socks and sandals. The one on the left has orange hair and wears a blue and pink kimono while the other has blond hair tied up in pigtails and wears a white and black kimono. The duo are currently talking to each other while they are roaming the hallway. As such, neither of them noticed you.

You quickly backed yourself to the wall as they unknowingly passed you. The stomp from the giant sandal which belonged to the orange haired one almost made you lose your balance, but you didn't fall off from your feet. If it was apparantly that you wanted this, at least from the start, she’d probably put the boot back on and subject you to something else. You had to play this smartly. But... how long should you hesitate... how do you do this without seeming desperate.

Meanwhile, while you were hesitating to move anyway due to your train of thought Hapu looked down curiously. Since she couldn’t see any facial features besides your eyes, she simply assumed you were just scared or reluctant. Hapu thought briefly about how both of you must be in this boat. But still, you needed to be taught a lesson, and if you weren’t going to get started like she asked, she will hce to find a way to make you get started. You were snapped back into reality as Hapu put on a frown and cleared her throat impatiently. I know this doesn’t look fun and I know you’re already in a rather stressful situation, but you still have to face some punishment for what you’ve done. Every ridge, groove, curve, and the slightest specks of dust were crystal clear from this point of view. “If you won’t start yourself, then I’ll just have to help you get started.”

Unknown to you Hapu was blushing at the feeling of a tiny person underneath her foot. She felt an odd mix of embarrassment and enjoyment as she started to feel you squirm underneath her. “Maybe... this isn’t... so bad?” She quietly pondered. Perhaps misbehaving and earning more punishments... or maybe convince her that you slowly grew to enjoy the experience... would she find that weird? Should she punish you for that? Back above, Hapu noticed you slowing up. She wasn’t sure if you were tired already or just being lazy, so she gently squeezed a toe against your head before letting back up. She soon felt your tiny hands rubbing against her foot making her grin a little and let out a relaxed sigh.

It was hard to believe that just this morning you were thinking about how all other trainers on the island should bow at your feet. Now here you were, in the exact opposite position and enjoying every second of it.
After about 30 minutes Hapu finally lifted her foot up. You laid on the ground, messy hair, exhausted, and blushing under your bandanna. You swear you saw a small grin before her expression shifted back to normal. You silently prayed that this was a sign of more fun like this in the future.

Hapu thought back to how she felt when she had you squirming under her sole, rubbing and pampering while struggling beneath her little feet. A small blush formed for a brief moment as she considered something.
141332223.title: Without thinking you blurt out how you felt

choices: You manage to get her attention
14133224.content:
Go to Alola they said! it was a getaway paradise they said! And for the first couple days you had to agree with them. The sights were beautiful, the people was nice and the Alolan Pokemon were awesome to see. Then it changed when you managed to tick off a Pokemon you shouldn't have. And now you've been traveling the woods all small and all alone. And it has not been a good time for you. From almost being stepped on by a Bewear to almost eaten by a Lurantis, you've managed to get away every time you ran into a Pokemon. And it would seem your about to run into another Pokemon. As you hear heavy hoof steps coming your way. It didn't take long for you to see the Giant Muddle galloping your way. You act quickly and dive out of the way, avoiding being trampled by the ground type. It was only after it was passing did you realise something, Someone was riding the Mudsdale.

You didn't catch a good look at the person but you chase after them, someone to help you! Thank Arceus!!

You chased after and luckily they stopped not to far away from you. They stopped at a campsite hidden in the woods as you finally see the human. She was young with dark skin, dark hair into twin braids and purple and tan outfit. She was holding a pokeball and was recalling her Mudsdale, Then she turns to the campsite.

“Darn Tourists, why do they always Camp where there no suppose to.” the girl said revealing that she was a local “Suppose i should look around” The girl said as she started looking for any evidence that there is someone camping here rather then an abandoned campsite.

While she checks the Campsite you run up to her. You obviously would rather get the attention of an adult rather then a young girl, but at this point you just want to be found and get out of danger.

You get close to the girl as you marvel at her size, you didn't even make it past her boots. And she is quite short, you cant even imagine how big a normal sized adult would be.

What happens next?
14133224.title: New scenario with Hapu

choices: She brings out her Mudsdale (Uh oh)
141332242.content:
Looking up at the giant girl, you don't want her to really leave yet. She's your only chance to actually do something. She seems nice enough to help you, or at least thats your assumption. Granted she could be the worst person in the world, but sometimes you just gotta take a risk. Running forward to her boot you pound it, wanting her to actually look down. Granted your little punches obviously weren't gonna bust through her boots, and if you were thinking straight you'd realise that. But you weren't, you were very desperate. Eventually you gave up as it became clear you didn't get through her boot.

“Ill have to get some rangers out here so then can pack this all up.” The girl said “I really can't believe the nerve of some people, leaving things . Oh well, not like ill catch them now” She then start walking away. Moving away from the shoe instantly you watch as the giant dark haired girl walks away from you. If only you were a little bigger she would be able to see you. It really sucks but your gonna have to send some more time out here until you see someone else. Maybe you can form a plan with them.

But thats not the end, as Hapu was walking away she didn't see something on the ground. The people who camped here didn't have the decency to not pick the food from the Pokemon. Eating fruits from the trees and berries for the Pokemon. Even worse throwing it onto the ground making it very easy for someone to trip on the slippery surface.

While Hapu walked away she put her boot onto a half eaten Oran Berry. Unable to keep her balance she found herself tripping over. Falling down onto her rear and hitting onto the ground. She landed hard and didn't like the sudden pain. “Geez that hurt, I'm really glad no one was round to actually see that” She said to herself, thinking that was the case.

But it wasn't, in fact you saw the whole thing. Even worse you felt it. You just watched as the girl walked away in disappointment when suddenly, she went off balance. You watch as the titan lost her balance and fell back. For a second you thought she wouldn't fall onto you but frankly you were able to realise the truth. You try to run away but your little legs couldn't carry yourself very far. You watch over your shoulder as her pants keep coming down and down. You close your eyes as the pain suddenly happened. You felt yourself get squished by her enormous (To you) rear as you get pushed into the ground. She sat down onto you with her entire weight as you really want her to get off you. You like butts but not when they're killing you. You hear her say something but you couldn't really hear anything. Anything she's saying coming muffled thanks to the massive ass onto you.

Hapu getting up from her sitting position stood up onto her legs. You were taken for the ride as well cause frankly... you've been pushed into her butt. Rising up you were nothing but an imprint. She stood up to her full height as she dusted herself off. Knocking the dirt off of her and almost you. You got free as you almost fell to the ground, but you manage to grab onto her pants as you were officially going with her. Hapu angrily calmed herself, not liking to do something that can be viewed as immature or childish. Tripping over something that she didn't even see was pretty immature. Walking away she planned to go to the rangers station and tell them about this. Hopefully though she can find the people responsible. Hapu wouldn't hurt them of course, she's nicer then that.

But she is willing to give out a scolding that they need to here. What would they have done if a Bewear was drawn to them or their snacks. Chances are they would be in the hospital right now. Beware is a dangerous Pokemon that everyone needs to know about.

While she walked, you were holding onto her pants. With your arms holding on as you dangled like a little keychain. You don't want to fall so maybe moving around her would be smart. Although your thinking that maybe you should go to her pouch over there. Wait until she stops moving so you can get her attention safely.

What happens next?

Her subtly hard and cracked heel and ball now had the feel of an apporaching guillotine,and you're the dead row inmate.

14133231121.content:
"...apologize to my feet." Kahili sternly ordered as her massive feet finally slipped out of her shoes completely. The boy immediately blushed at the sight of her brawny and wide feet. Her slightly chipped nails are painted in a rich turquoise color. The golfer began to giggle, amused by the boy's reaction.

"Well, I guess one of us is an eager little horndog." The Golfer snidely mocked the boy. The boy huffed, and his fists clenched in anger. Kahili let out a cold snicker.

"Oh my, someone is looking quite miffed. Let's hope you can channel that anger in something more productive." Kahili added in a tone that was colder than the summit of Mt.Coronet. With no further words, she presents her light pink colored soles to him. Her flat medium sized toes waved at him in such a mocking way.

The boy resists the urge to make his own insult at the bitch, and walk towards the monolithic appendages. For a couple of seconds, he got a small sampling of the almost almighty odor. It is a pure stench of spoiled eggs, sour cheese, and stale popcorn. His legs became like a jelly, and his head starts to swirl around like a spinda. After a while, he soon regained his balance. And then began to breathe through his mouth.

'That was unimaginably gross…yet at the same time…kinda sexy.' The boy grimly reflects as he places his hands on her sweltering flesh...only to side on the skin likes it's a heavily greased metal. The dominant task-mistress let out quite a few surprising chortles. The boy formed a devious grin.

'Well lookie here, the queen bitch is ticklish.' The boy cruelly mused as he was about to have his vengeance. Until Kahili quashed any would be attempts of insubordination in a mere instant.

"I sure hope you aren't about to do anything idiotic little boy.. For this is for my own pleasure, and definitely not yours. If you so happened to go against me. Well, let's just say it won't be a joyful time for you."The older woman said in a too quiet voice and a sneer that almost made your heart skipped a beat. Her left light blue eye looking directly at you through the crevice between her two biggest toes. You hastily nodded your head and began frantically knead her foot. Kahili made a content and motherly smile."Good boy, perhaps if you do good enough job. I'll let you have a reward, and let you indulge in your desires. But it's a privilege and it's one that you have to earned first."

The boy heard her words but was way more focus on his arduous task. The feet's texture was a bizarre mixture of hard worked callouses and natural softness. But despite the contradicting feel of the feet, one thing was clear. The damn things were overworked and firm as hell. It took him a good hour and ten minutes of pounding, kicking, and just plain old beating the ever loving rockruff-shit out of her feet. But by some good damn miracle of the tapu, her clods are finally back to the normal consistency of feet. Kahili was fully relaxed and almost went to sleep. But she felt your little hands stop moving, and saw you catching your breath.

Her sleepy half-lidded eyes inspected her feet, and give him an impressed look. She gives him a lax smirk. He was both tired and scared at the same time. Perhaps she is too hard on the boy. The perverted child has proved himself to be a diligent hard worker. Maybe with her guidance, she can teach him to control his desires. And honestly, he looks pretty adorable right now.

"I suppose you deserve a reward." Kahili intoned with a coy smirk. A part of him was excited to finally play with those feet, but another part is extremely wary of the intimidating as hell woman

"Don't worry little boy…you earned this." The sleepy golfer gently reassured him as she…

The woman's feet slowing crossed, becoming almost akin to monuments. His eyes widen the way they made wrinkles at every single. Kahili lets out a content sigh and her lips produced a thin smirk.

"I think you truly earned the right to savor the fruits of my labor. So it's best you enjoy it" Kahili proclaimed as her eyes were directly on him. Her toes frayed and spread, a clear sign she was teasing him further. The boy's legs became like wobbly jello as his nostrils haplessly flared up. Once again, filling up his lungs of the potent odor of the golfer's peds."Oh, what is the matter? You were oolging them like a hungry houndor. Hmmm…maybe your sense of common decency finally settled in."

The boy's teeth grinded together and his head was hung down in shame and anger. This bitch…this sexy golfing bitch is really pushing it! He knows what he did was very pervy and creepy, but what gives her the right rub it in. But why can't he just ditch her, and run off? Was he that scared and desperate for protection? Or…or he has gotten too attached to herself already?

"If you don't take up your reward. Then I am afraid that I have to take matters into my own hands." The woman made a another ultimatum, seems she has a thing for them. Seriously though, what is the point of a reward if just going to be forced upon you regardless.

Her blue pupils sparkled as they studied his form, making the boy very on edge. He can't even look directly at because of the pressure she emitting. The sounds of hardened skin grinding against it each other made goosebumps to form on his skin. Sweat drip his face, and the boy's breathing hitched.

Judging by the steadily increasing loudness,and pace. This was Kahili's way of telling him 'Don't keep me waiting'.

What happens next?
141332311211.title: Some reward...

choices: Sneak by and hide in the building
14133232.content:
Night grew darker as you made Your way past the abandoned campsite. Though it was pitch black, you had a feeling that you were being watched. A strange piercing feeling. You did your best to ignore this and press onward, but soon you found yourself looking in all directions in a paranoid ferver despite the fact that it was pitch black out. You shivered, both from fear and from the cold of the night. You needed shelter. And you needed it bad. Your blind, aimless wandering soon lead you to what looked like an abandoned store or warehouse. You looked around for any other structures or persons, but it seemed like this was the only choice. You didn’t like the look of this place. Something about it just seemed off... and eerie. Still it had to beat freezing out here. You made your way as you heard birds cawing in the distance.

As you reached the building you saw something you didn’t expect: a person, a young girl by the looks of it, standing outside the creepy abandoned building. She had some sort of patchwork dress and sandals on. Kinda a weird mix of cute and creepy radiated from this girl. What was she even doing here. Perhaps you’re better off avoiding her. Still, she might be your only ticket to some sort of shelter and protection... assuming she can be trusted. You pondered your voices in this gamble.
14133232.title: Acerola

choices: Staring at you in shock and worry
She thinks you’re just an illusion caused by the ghosts.
“Ah here you are!” (She somehow knows about you and your situation)
141332321.content:
You figured, strange or not, this girl was probably your only shot at a decent form of shelter. Hell, chances are you’ll more than likely die if you don’t get someone’s attention. Taking a deep breath, you looked up at the strange girl. “Here goes nothing.”
You approached her sandaled feet, noting how big her feet were. At normal size, they would probably be considered rather small. But from your current scale, it was bigger than your entire body. Quite the humbling sight to say the least. Hopefully your faith in this girl isn’t misplaced. Nervously, you reach out and poke the side of her foot. At first she barely twitches. But after some harder jabs, a giggle echoes overhead as she looks down to find the source of the tickle. As her eyes scanned the ground, they finally found themselves fixed on you. Trying to determine what you were before her gaze changed.
141332321.title: Approaching Acerola

1413323211.content:
However strange the girl was, it was clear that she still held empathy, proven by her worried expression towards you. She lays her hand on the floor before talking "Hop on little guy, I won't hurt you". You have no reason to disbelieve her and she is your only help for now, so you hop on her hand.

After assuring that you're in a safe position, the girl slowly raises her hand up with you in it and talks."How did you get so small, little guy?"

You replied "I don't know, I suddenly woke up in front of you and knew I had to get your attention."

Her eyes soften again, realizing that you must of been terrified at the thought of being near her feet. "Well little guy, I'm gonna help you out so you don't have to feel scared anymore." You suddenly feel her hand lift you to her mouth and kiss you, leaving to breathless at how surprisingly good that felt. "My names Acerola little guy, what's your name?" You hear the newly named Acerola ask." You tell her your name, and she smiles before saying "That's an adorable name for such an adorable little guy. So, where should I carry you until I get back to my house?"

You reply "________"

A: Just carry my in your hands, probably the safest option
B: Hide me in your hair, no one will see me and I can grab onto your hair
C: You choose (AKA Readers Choice)
1413323211.title: Staring at you in shock and worry

choices: To show you to a friend
14133232113.content:
You look back down to her sandal-clad feet. They looked so pale and creamy white. Part of you wanted to get closer to them, even if it seemed dangerous. Swallowing your shame, you turn back to the giantess girl.

"I-if it's okay with you, would it be okay if you put me in your sandal? With your foot still in there of course." You say that last part with a blush on your face. Acerola laughs a little at your request.

"Are you sure about that little guy? That's awfully dangerous. You could be smushed." You nod your head in shame. She laughs again. "Well then, it looks like my new little friend is a foot pervert. Okay then, if that's what you want." She slips off her right sandal and drops you inside. "I'll try and be gentle." She slides her foot back in, pressing her sole right on top of you. It felt so cold and soft. You feel her begin to walk, each step pressing you into her insole. You could feel the effort she was putting into not trying to squish you.

Where does she go with you?
14133232113.title: Readers Choice

choices: Defy her and try to get away
1413323212.content: Soon her inquisitive stare shifted. You’re own expression changed to one of fear as you saw her lips curl into a mischievous smirk. Her eyes now locked into you like a cat staring at a toy. “Hello there little guy. What’s your name?” You tried to shout it up be she didn’t seem to react, wether she didn’t hear you or simply didn’t care was unknown to you. “Well you picked a good time to show up, I left a book by the old Megamart over there and I doubt you’d like to spend your night like this inside a haunted building.” You gulped at this. “H-haunted?” She nods, signaling that she can hear you. “Yup. The ghosts don’t really bother me that much, but someone like you could get into a lot of danger in a place like that.” She gave you a catlike smile as you shuddered in response to this. “But this book’s really important to me and I can’t afford to let one of the ghosts hide it as a joke. It’s all about old Alolan Royal Families. She showed you the cover which looked rather old. “Y’know. I happen to be a descendant of the royal family. It might not mean as much now, but it’s still a pretty powerful name to hold.” She tucks the book Under her arm and takes you to a nearby shack that also looked abandoned. The inside was dimly lit and the interior looked rather run down. She placed you and the book on an old wooden table and sat near you. “This book has a lot of fun facts about my ancestors.” She suddenly gave you a look that you did not like at all. She clearly had something on her mind. But since you were high up on the table, you had nowhere to get away from her. Her grin seemed to grow as this realization dawned on you. “The royal family would have servants who would tend to their every need and command.” She started. You knew where this was going. “Perhaps this is why fate shrank you and threw you to a place where only I would be able to find you. After all, a princess like me deserves a nice, cute, and weak little servant. Perhaps one day you’ll realize this is what destiny had planned for you. Perhaps you’ll accept that you are a weak little soul who’s natural place is serving the princess. Maybe you’ll even enjoy it. They say people are happy doing what they are destined to do.” You backed away even further but you couldn’t make any real distance from this crazy giant ‘princess.’ With a loud sigh, Acerola lifted a bare foot onto the table, resting it in front of you. “Let’s get you started, the beginning of your new, rightful life. Come here and give my feet a nice long massage.”
1413323212.title: A playful, mischievous grin

14133232121.content:
You suppose there are worst ways to spend the rest of your life, being a servant to a little girl is one million times better then being in a giant Pokemon's stomach. But still you need to get all the details before you can really accept.

"If I say yes, how will you treat me?" you ask her curious. You want to know what your going to get in to.

"Well that depends on how you react to your situation. Either you be a good slave and do what I say, then I'll treat you well, if you are rude or defiant. Well let's just say that if I were you, I wouldn't be rude or defiant. Ever." she told you as she continues to wiggle her toes pretty much inviting you, ignoring the fact that she just blatantly threatened you.

Seeing that your best option was to comply you start walking over towards her sole. You put your hand on her foot and start massaging it, pushing it up and down and trying to make an impact. Which is pretty sad considering your a grown boy and she's a little girl. A little girl who could probably crush you underneath her foot.

Acerola was beyond happy. Not from the foot massage, it was subpar at best. But from the fact that you didn't try to run away or try to defy her. Although she's a cheerful girl, she doesn't have many friends. Besides the ghost Pokemon all around her. Maybe it's because she is known as the creepy ghost girl. Sure some of the other Trial Captains like her, but Acerola wasn't that close to them.

But now she has someone who she will alway have with her. She has so many ideas on what to do with you.

What happens next?
14133232121.title: Acerola's Job Interview

choices: You submit to her demands, and tend to her feet
You remain defiant, prompting her to go harder on you
14133232122.content:
The mere sight of Acerola's upturned foot sent shivers down your spine, and made you heart skip a beat. It was massive, like a tower of sweltering flesh rising above your minuscule form. Droplets of sweat poured from her wriggling toes, sending down a salty rain that made quickly you back away from its gloomy shadow.

"U..Ugh!" you gagged in disgust, the putrid stench of her feet only now reaching your nostrils, and managing to bring you down to your knees. Though it appeared surprisingly pristine, and well cared for, lending some credence to her claim of being of royal blood, her sole shimmered with 'fresh' sweat. It was bloody drenched with it from heel to toes, and gave off an appropriately rancid smell to go with this miserable image.

The giantess giggled cutely, as she watched you stumble and fall in front of her foot, apparently finding your suffering very entertaining. To amuse herself even more, Acerola began to lower her foot down to the table, ready to mash her sweaty sole all over your poor, defenseless self.
"Please, no! Don't!" You cried out to her, while desperately crawling away from the collapsing wall of sweaty foot, but the wicked goddess was unrelenting in her idea, giggling even more at the sound of your pleas. The closer it came, the less hope you had that you'd be able to escape it, but with one final push you've managed to pull yourself from underneath its shadow, leaving the giantess to let out a disappointed sigh, when her sole failed to bury you beneath it.

Breathing heavily you looked behind, cringing at the sight of her wiggling toes, the giant digits yearning for an opportunity to pummel you like a bug. You then shifted your gaze to her face, noting her smile waver for a second, the girl overall displeased with your opposition to her will. It quickly came back however, once she realized that she can now punish the unruly servant, and properly shape him into his new role.

"Heh, so you're trying to resist?" Acerola mused, dragging her foot back, and putting it under the table "Can't say I expected it. After all, who would willingly defy a cutie like me~?"
With a flash of her cat-like grin, the whole table suddenly started shaking, as the giantess started pushing at it from beneath, tilting it away from her. Desperately you started clawing at its surface, as you started sliding backward, yelling at the girl to stop.
"Don't worry, though" She continued, apparently deaf to you struggles "I'll show you the error of your ways. You will learn to love your new place at my feet. That, I promise~"

Just as you were about to fall off, you've managed to grab onto the edge, barely hanging on. You continued to plead with her, beg her to lower the table down... Until you looked down, and saw what was splayed below: a pair flip-flops. Her purple footwear lied right underneath you, their putrid insoles as uninviting as you would've imagined from the look of their owner's feet. Looking back at Acerola, you've noticed that she held a Poke Ball in her hand... and she was about to roll it down the table, with you in its path! She was going to force you down!

Your cries intensified, but if there was one thing to learn from your experience so far, it's that Acerola really couldn't care less. With a cheerful cry she dropped the Poke Ball, and watched with glee as it rolled down. You, meanwhile, let out a loud, but squeaky shriek as you dropped down, crashing right in the center of her right shoe. Though alive, your body hurt all over, and you were forced to roll around in pain on the spongy surface of her flip-flop. By the time she made it over, you were already drenched in the residue sweat.

Acerola stared you down triumphantly, as if challenging you to try and defy her again. Unable to do so, you could only shoot her a deadly glare. The giantess found it pathetically amusing.
"Oh please, don't give me that look" she said mockingly, giggling at your foolish bravado "This is the price you have to pay for disobeying, and we both know that you can't afford it."

Tauntingly slow, she rose her foot upwards, and the quickly brought its heel down to its shoe, hanging the rest of her meaty sole above you. Having picked up some dirt from the floor, its surface was now splotched with dark patches of moist grime, tarnishing the once semi-clean look they had. Surprisingly, she did it on purpose.

"As you can see, my feet got dirty from that short. I'll leave it to you to deal with this mess" As she explained your task to you, she waggled her foot left and right, raining down some of that filth around you "Ooooor, you can continue to defy me, and see where that gets you. I'm curious of that myself, since I've never had to deal with someone this disobedient before. If you push my buttons too hard, however..."

Her foot got dangerously close for a second, as if it was about to stomp you into the insole itself, before she slowly settled it down, carefully burying you within the sweaty folds of her sole. Giving you a couple of stomps, Acerola made sure that you were secured, and suffering underneath her dainty footsteps, before setting out to continue on with her daily routine, and leaving you to your morbid task...
14133232122.title: The Price of Defiance

choices: She keeps you in her sandals, letting you enjoy yourself!
She takes you out and gushes about how happy she is.
141332321221.content:
Honestly, Acerola wasn't sure what she should do as she waited for the answer from the little bug in her sandals. She didn't really have any plans on what to do to pass the time, she wasn't really eager to go to any nearby city. Being around people could only entertain her for so long. She had taken to dressing in raggedy clothes in order to appear approachable to the people in the cities. Even if her clothes were unappealing, she assumed her natural cuteness would attract everyone to her anyways. And she was always right, at least one or two people from the city would approach her. But they never gave her the attention she wanted. She wanted something more subservient than passing compliments about her cuteness. She wanted a life that she could command and do whatever she wanted with. And now she had you to fulfill that wish.

As Acerola contemplated her situation, you were down below, under her feet in a personal hell. Encased in a world of foot, dirt and sweat you vainly struggled against the spoiled girls foot. Your feelings of humiliation continued to grow as you her foot sweat continued to soak into your clothes and your body. Your hair was soaked and your face was drenched, as if you had just emerged from a pool. Except this pool was filled with a bratty girl's foot sweat rather than clean water. You could've sworn you've only been under her foot for a few minutes at most, how were you already so soaked?

The most humiliating thing was how much Acerola's putrid foot absolutely dwarfed you. The fold's in the adorable child's foot seemed absolutely massive to you. If some crazy person wanted to, then they could probably crawl into some of the bigger folds and hide from the outside world. You imagine that they would immediately regret it though. You dreaded imagining all of the sweat and grime that was probably trapped in those folds. The idea of being surrounded by Acerola's warm, soft foot flesh, while bathing in a soup of her grime and sweat was a tantalizing-- You stopped yourself mid thought and felt a strange sense of dread wash over you.

Did, did you just describe that brat's foot as soft and warm!? As you were drenched in it's sweat and grime!? The foot of the same girl who had just lovingly taunted you with the delicate swaying of her foot. Once again you stopped yourself. 'Lovingly taunted'!? That cold blooded cutie was torturing you and now-and now you were calling her a cutie too. What was going on!? You were currently trapped under a little girl's foot, trapped between her well worn sandal and dirty foot and you were calling her cute and giving her foot compliments. Why were these thoughts going through your head? Was it Stockholm syndrome? No no, it hasn't been that long. It hasn't even been half-an-hour. Or maybe it has been? The sensation of being under her foot has become so familiar that time seems to have come to a slow.

Without thinking, you slowly raised your face upwards and pressed it against Acerola's foot, cuddling it like an animal. Up above you Acerola subconsciously registered the sensation of your rubbing and scrunched her toes in delight. The scrunching of her toes caused your head to be absorbed by one of the folds in her foot. As you thought the inside of her folds held a wonderful surprise. Within the fold was an amalgamation of some grime and foot sweat. Your head was quickly enveloped in it, your sense completely overwhelmed by the residue of Acerola's foot. At that moment your entire existence was defined by Acerola's foot and you loved every moment of it.

The whole experience had apparently awoken something within you. You realized now that your situation wasn't that bad. At first you thought that being shrunk to a pathetic size was horrible, but now you knew it wasn't that bad. You were lucky that Acerola was the one who found. She was revealing things to you about yourself that you never knew. That you were actually good enough to be the servant of a princess. You never thought you were worthy of such an important position. But she saw potential in you and pushed you to accept your role. The part of you that wanted to resist Acerola disappeared. Perhaps they drowned in the grime and sweat in Acerola's foot fold, but you were alive and knew your place now.

As soon as it happened, your head was released from the fold of her foot. Your spirit of resistance had been sucked out of you and was forever trapped in the folds of her foot. All that's left was a little bug ready to serve a princess. You fell back into your original position, once again sandwiched between her sandal and her foot. Pressed against your back was a swamp of Acerola's foot sweat and grime. Above you was the source of the sweat and grime. You quickly got to work. Pressing your face into her foot and letting your tongue run along the surface of her foot. The immense amount of sweat flowed off her foot and into your mouth. The taste of the sweat itself was not sweet, but knowing that you were serving an adorable princess, treating her like a princess should be, made the act feel sweet. You continued your task with gusto, occasionally switching to smooching her foot instead of licking it. You were Acerola's now and you would do whatever you could to please her.

This entire time Acerola had been contemplating what she should do to pass the time, and then she suddenly felt your little tongue go to work. Even though she expected this to happen, a blush creeped its way onto her cheeks and shy giggle came out of her throat. "Wow, I thought the little guy would resist a bit harder. I figured after the display he showed that it would take a while to bust him in." She thought coyly. She squatted and looked at the foot you were under lovingly. "Or maybe that was just an act? That doesn't really make sense but how else would you explain such a sudden change." She wiggled her toes in delight. "Is this what he always wanted? To serve and adorable princess as her foot bug? One couldn't hope for a better fate I guess." Regardless of the reasons behind it, Acerola finally got what she wanted. She now had a loyal servant who would do exactly as she said.

Now what would she do with you?

To your surprise, the girl gained a massive smile on her face, staring down at you as you really didn't expect it at all. “Ahh, here you are. I was wondering when you would get here” She said as you were really confused. Did... did she know you were coming here?

“Ohh, i want to pick you up so bad” She gushed as she bent over, bringing her hand to you as you panic. She scoops you up letting you sit on the edge of her hand raising you up to her face. She had a smile that was a mix of many things to you. A little bit of mischief, some pure happiness and a lot of adore coming from her smile at the same time.

“Im surprised. I thought you were gonna take a lot more time getting here. But i guess those tiny legs are faster then i thought.” She said.

“Wait who are you? Did you know i was coming here? Were you spying on me?” You say panicking. The creepy girl laughed covering her mouth before responding.

“My name is Acerola. The Ghost Princess. Yes i know who you are and yes I've been following you. Well not lately, lately I've just been telling my ghost pokemon to stalk you and push you here” She said as your eyes go open.

“Ghost Pokemon! I didn't see no ghost Pokemon!” You tell her as she laughs.

“I mean i told them not to be seen, what did you think you came to this creepy store because you wanted to.” She said raising a good point. Of course you would normally not go to this creepy place.

You suddenly got a child down your spine. “Wait, me being small. Did you have something to do with that or....”

She didn't respond, but instead stuck out her tongue in an adorable fashion, showing that she actually did this.

Your in full panic now as your afraid of Acerola. You want to get away from her but you know you cant, not as long as she holds you up to this height. Which is why you think you need to talk your way out of this and stay calm.

“Why, why would you go through all the effort to not only shrink me but coral me here?” You ask her as she laughs.

“Because i wanted a friend!” She said gaining a big smile. “I always have trainers come here to do the Trail but they always leave right after. Then theres the other Trial Captain’s but they don't like spending time with me either i think. They probably think I'm too creepy or something. I brought you here because i wanted someone to talk to. A Friend”

This girl isnt evil. She's just Lonely. Very lonely it seems. And since she's a child she probably doesn't see whats wrong with kidnapping and shrinking another human being.

“Wait but why did you shrink me?”

“So you can never leave” She said hugging you to her chest, Showing that this could be good for you.

“Um Acerola... can i talk?” You ask her as she pulls you away, smiling at you lovingly and bringing up to her face. “Well, i know you want a friend. Ill be your friend i promise but can you please grow me big once again. I don't want to be small at all Acerola”

“but i want you to be small” She whined. “And if your big then you'll leave and i don't want you to leave!”

That way ill be more happy during my time being small. And who knows we can do this later after the week is over. You don't have to kidnap someone to have a friend”

Accrual looked unsure whether she's actually gonna agree, the more she thinks about the better the deal. She wants you to have fun and you won't if she takes away your chance of being big. “Okay! Ill grow you in a week. but until then your small with me”

She hugged you against her chest once again and you hug her back. Acerola was shocked for a quick second but then hugged you even tighter afterwards.

You tell her that your just gonna explore until then, wanting to see what you can see at your size but Acerola stops you. “Actually, i was wondering if you can play with my foot until I'm thinking”

Kinda weird but your in no position to argue. You move forward to her ghostly foot and jump right on top of it. Acerola giggled as she felt you hug her foot. You didn't know exactly what to do so you just played on her foot waiting for Acerola to come up with an idea.

1413323321.content:
You wake up to a sweet aroma hitting your nose.
"What the heck was that light?" you ask yourself, taking a look around.

The firs thing you notice is that you're no longer in the forest you were walking in before falling asleep. You instead seem to have ended up in what seems a bedroom. The second thing you notice is that everything around you is literally huge!

A huge, green bed in a corner, a huge clock resembling a Dhelmise on a wall; a lot of books placed on a colossal bookshelf; most of them seem to be about cooking, judging by the titles you manage to read on some of them.

The sound of a door opening makes you turn your head as a gigantic green shoe steps in, a giantess enters the room.
"That was delicious!" she merrily chirps, rubbing her belly. You take a good look at her.

She has green shoes and two long, tanned legs. She's wearing gray shorts on a gray, sleeveless shirt with suspenders. A pink shirt can be seen beneath it. This giantess has dark green eyes; she has her long, green hair in two large ponytails. A smile is painted on her face.

Before you can do anything, the giantess looks right at you. Curiously, she extends her arm to pick you up.
"Hey, are you a tiny guy? How did you get so small little one?" she asks, in a mix of concern and excitement.

You tell her about the light and that you don't have any idea of how you got here shrunken.
"Oh dear." she exclaims once you finish your story.
"Quite the predicament you got in."
You nod.
"My name is Mallow anyway. Nice to meet you." she says cheerfully.
"And tell you what, maybe I can help you." she says, with an expression of someone who's pondering something.
"How? You know how to grow me back?" you ask hopefully.
"Well, not exactly. Sorry." she apologizes.

You sigh. How did you even manage to get in this?
Mallow continues.
"But maybe you could stay with me... at least until we manage to find a way to grow you to your original size." she suggests.
"What?".
"Yeah, I could take care of you. What about it? Want to stick with me?" she asks with a smile.

You think about the idea. You're alone, people would easily crush you thinking you are a bug. And Mallow seems really determined to help you, even though you just met her.

But, she seems also a bit too excited about the whole thing. She could easily hurt you... or worse if, she isn't careful enough.

Sighing, you take a decision...

“Oh,” her eyes opened to the trick, “Hey! Get back here little guy!”
Suddenly you feel that running may have either been the best decision or the worst decision. Being a criminal, the likelihood of her treating you as an enemy was quite high; therefore keeping out of her clutches was wise. All the same, there was a chance she would treat you decently if she was not a hardened criminal yet, but it was too late for that. Now, all you could do was run.
Luckily, there were only a few acorns the size of large rocks to you that were easily skirted around; however, the tremor from the girl’s red boots caused tremors that tripped you up more than once.
“I won’t ask again! I don’t like being told no!”
She was getting upset. You shuddered at the thought of your life ending because of a teen girl’s temper tantrum. Tears welled up as you thought of how unique and peaceful your life could have been if left alone in the woods with your pal Oddish and the abundant food readily available.
The life reemerged in the form of a small opening in a tree. A chance!
You sprint as fast as your tiny legs will carry you across a small patch of dirt.
“Aha!” she cried with glee, “found you little guy! Come on, I won’t hurt you.”
She was only a few yards away, and yet it was just enough to allow you to jump in the hole. Landing on your hands and knees, you scramble to the innermost part of the hole, feeling the stress of the situation subside slightly, but not the physical stress. You lean your back up against the tree wall in the back, and close your eyes. Please be enough, you thought.
The girl tries her fingers, but they are too short to reach you.
“Ugh,” she was dead set on capturing this tiny person no matter what, “Go! Poochyena!”
The all too familiar flash of light and electronic outburst of sound filled the tree hole.
“Poochyena, use bite on that tree, but don’t hurt the little person inside. And,” the Poochyena looked back at its trainer expectantly, “don’t overdo it. I don’t want you to hurt your teeth, Ok girl? Then, make sure you catch the little guy, but don’t be too rough. ”
“Pooch!” she responded enthusiastically.
She sounds like a mother, you thought.
Her Poochyena bit through the tree easily and tore off your hiding place.
“Got ya!” this victory dissipated her irritation.
The Poochyena used her tongue to snatch you up quickly into her mouth. The warm saliva soaked every part of your body. You heart began to race as you realized the peril you were in.
“Uh, Ok girl,” the Magma grunt shared your anxiety, albeit on a lesser intensity, “ just bring him over to me and I’ll give you a treat, Ok?”

First, you see the blue sky as she lifts her head, then the blueness begins to drift away from you as you sink slowly into the back of her maw. Finally, she swallows, engulfing you in darkness. The juices only reached up to your chin, so there was no risk of drowning; however, the place caused a cathartic experience unlike any you have ever had before. The certain death made you feel insignificant and melancholy; however, there was an air of peace and nostalgia. Strangely, it reminded you of a hot spring you had visited a year ago with friends. Thought you felt yourself passing out and perhaps suffocating due to the stomach vapors overpowering the small amount of oxygen, you felt grateful that your death was not horrific. You begin to drift off...

choices: “It must have been fate for us to meet, you’ll be my little boyfriend.”

144121.content:
The sound of massive feet thumped behind you like an earthquake as you sprinted as fast as your tiny legs could take you. There was a patrat a little while back that had noticed you and judging from the way that it looked at you, it thought that you were food.

As you were approaching a clearing, your pursuer’s footsteps seemed fainter and you dared a look behind you. Nothing. You gasped with relief and turned back around only to come crashing into what looked like a dark wall.

You fell back into the dirt and looked up and realized that what you’d run into was a massive thigh. You gasped with surprise and looked up to see that it belonged to an ace trainer. It was strange that all of the self-proclaimed aces seemed to dress the same way in their respective regions.

Like all of the other female aces, the one you bumped into wore a dark orange and very dark blue mini skirt, knee-high boots, and her blue hair done up in an elaborate set of twin tails. “Huh?” The blue-eyed trainer gasped as she looked down at what had just run into her. “Is that…” She said to herself as she reached down and picked you up before you had a chance to react.

The ace held you just above her thighs and looked down at you, “Aww, you’re a cute little thing, aren’t you.

“I… Uh, thanks…?” You said, scratching your head at this turn of events.

“Almost as cute as me.” She teased, holding her other hand over her mouth as she giggled. You awkwardly blushed, she was probably one of the cutest girl’s you’d ever seen. And talked too of course.

“I’m Marina,” She continued, taking your silence as her cue to persist. “I’m one of the strongest and most beautiful trainers in the whole Unova region. I’m sure you’ve probably heard mention of me.”

Not once had you ever heard mention of an ace called Marina, but it seemed like it was probably a good idea to indulge her ego. If only a little. “I, yeah! I think I’ve heard of you before. Strong, beautiful, and really cool.”

She giggled, “Yup, that sure sounds like me!” Seemingly satisfied with her introduction she asked the obvious question. “So how did you get so small cutie?”

“I don’t know. I was just out for a walk, then the next thing I remembered I was like this.”

“Huh, that’s weird. Well… Since you’re like this…”
144121.title: Unova Ace Trainer

1441211.content:
You almost winced at Marina’s sudden proclamation, you’d just met her less than a minute ago and she wanted you to be her boyfriend. “What?” Was all that you could blurt out.

“What do you mean what? Are you telling me that you do want this beauty to be your girlfriend?” She said, her fingers slipping out from under you as she laid you on her thigh and whipped her hand into one of her pigtails and gazed down at you like she was some sort of supermodel.

“Well, I… Uh, yeah… But.”

“But what? It’s a yes or no question, and news flash it should be a real easy one!” She started to sound like she was offended.

“I just met you, don’t you think that maybe we should get to know each other first?”

“That sounds like a great idea! Here!” She said, raising up her other leg into the air. It towered over you and really put you into perspective just how tiny that you were. “You can start by meeting my thighs.”

Marina’s thigh quickly fell down on top of her other, instantly sandwiching you between them. She wrapped her upper leg around her lower one and squeezed together. “Hehehe, nobody’s got thighs like these!” Her muffled voice boomed from above you as she continued to squeeze and started to rub her massive thighs back and forth.

You screamed in protest, but she couldn’t hear you over the sound of her own voice. “Awww, you were so right! My thighs love you, they just want to hug you to death!” As if on cue, she squeezed ever harder and started rubbing back and forth faster.

Just when you thought you were going to become a person shaped pancake on her leggings she lifted her thigh back up and you immediately gasped for air. But your relief was very short lived as her hand snatched you up and pressed you against her face.

“You’re just soooo cuuuuute! I can keep you and play with you forever.”

Even if you end up stuck like this, I'll make sure you don't have to worry about food, shelter, or other people taking advantage of you." Her tone made it clear that these intentions were genuine. She pulled her finger free and smiled down at you once more. "Tell you what, you must be hungry. I'll be back in a bit. I'll let you explore around your new room while I'm away. Just be careful while I'm gone." And with that, she placed you on the floor of her room and exited, making sure to shut the door.
