1443122222222222222221.content:
Capturing Pokemon is something that has always come easy to you. Ever since you were little if you saw a Pokemon that you wanted, it was already yours at that point. This is what made the best job for you when you did get older was a Pokemon hunter. People from good to bad to just flat out rich and bored hired you to go out to catch Pokemon. Sure there have been some times where the Pokemon was a little difficult to catch but with true persistence you were always able to get the job done. No matter if it was a rare or even a legendary, you were able to catch them to deliver to your employer. The best catch that you have had to this point was a Mewtwo which helped put you on top list of best Pokemon Hunters and most wanted. But there was nothing the police could really do since it's not illegal to catch Pokemon just stealing them is and that is why you have always had a rule against catching Pokemon outside of the wild.

One day you were approach with what could be your biggest challenge yet, Team rocket has hired you to capture the god Pokemon known as Arceus. They offered you enough poke-dollars that would be impossible to spend in 10 lifetimes next to your 1. Which turned you onto the challenge even more. Sure at this point you didn't really need it cause you had enough to last the rest of your life and more. But it's all about the sport now and this challenge was way to good to give up on. And so you accepted there offer without any hesitation. Then you packed and headed straight towards what you believe to be your destiny. To be the first to capture a God.

Team Rocket apparently found where Arceus is calling home, and so with there map you were easily able to find the location and done into a deep cave you went. The place was filled with danger and Pokemon that clearly didn't want you here but were easily beaten by your might. It took you about 3 days to reach Arceus domain, but you were finally in the den of the god. Looking around at first no such Pokemon were around, just a huge bedding nest that clearly look like it belonged to a big Pokemon. You chose to setup camp and wait, but as you were doing so and had your back turned. A hove liked thing grabs the back of your shirt and lifts you up. You turn and see Arceus face looking you in the eye, the Pokemon then touch your head and started to speak "Listen human I am speaking to you through telepathy. Now I ask you to tell me why you have come to my home". Arceus looks so menacing to you and even though your scared out of your mind, you think of a lie to say to try and calm down the god Pokemon "Oh great Arceus I have come to you with a request. I am trying to gather more information on you to spread across the region. And was wondering if you would be so kind as to allow me to ask you my questions".

Arceus can see into your mind and knows right away that you are lying, but instead of freaking out. The god Pokemon puts you down and without reading your mind any further tells you to ask away. This forces you to think on your feet, but luckily that is something that your good at "Of course, just give me a moment as I grab my notebook. It has all the questions that I have written down" You say this and Arceus allows you to search your bag for a notebook that is probably not there. With a bow to the God you run over to your bag, and with a sneaky grin on your face a gun is taken out. Then with as much speed as you can muster, you aim the gun and fire. Hoping the electricity inside of the net is enough to take the legend down. But to your bad luck today the net is broken up by a hyper beam that was blasted by the huge Pokemon.

Now you have really anger the God Arceus, the Pokemon blasts the remains of your bag into oblivion. "My stuff, hey that was..." Arceus silence you with his god like abilities. At this point true fear was coming over you, this kind of feeling is something that you have never felt before. As Arceus approaches you and with the god's psychic abilities, you are forced onto the ground to kneel before the God. "Human you have angered me, and I was honestly going to just let you go. But this trickery is not to go unpunished. Your Pokemon are now set free (you check and see your poke balls are gone). I will only allow you to keep your clothing but the punishment does not end here. Now tell me, before I decide what to do with you who are you". Arceus ask this to you in a demanding way, gives you back your ability to speak.

Thinking that you might have more to gain then lose by telling the god Pokemon who you are. You gain the confidence to strongly say "Arceus my name is (Your Name) and I am a Pokemon hunter. But not an ordinary hunter, I am one who was blessed by the gods with the ability to never allow a Pokemon to escape me. I am the biggest deal in the Pokemon world. And even being stuck in this ..." Arceus cuts you off by saying "ENOUGH!! Human I have heard enough out of you. Let me tell you that you are not special, just lucky and luck has a way of running out eventually. Now I have decided your punishment, I think its time you learn just how small you truly are in this world and I have the perfect person in mind who could really teach you, just how little you really are..." With that said you were teleport-ed you out of Arceus sight and into a dark place that kept bouncing you up and down. Without ever giving you a moment to catch your footing.

Eventually the bouncing slow and turns into a more manageable bouncing. You here what sounds like a door closing and then followed by light pouring from the top of the confined darkness space you were in. Then a giant hand with a pink fit wrist band on enters the space and scoops you and a couple of other big things into its grasp. Once out you see before you a small town that just look small because of your distance away from it. the hand then dump you and the other stuff into the town, which felt normal size to you.

You look to the side of you and finally got a good look at the other things near you, two big trees that seemed plastic, a person who was about twice your size who also looked plastic, and a car which you know was plastic. What is going on you thought to yourself as in that moment you then begin to look up to see a beautiful woman's face taking up the sky. She was smiling down at you and the other objects around you. She then started walk away for a moment to put away her key and get something to eat.

A voice then pop in your head as your sitting there confused out of your mind. "Well hunter this shall be the last time we speak to one another, so you better listen good. I have shrunk you down to a tiny man. And have gifted you to a woman cyclist who has a kink for feeling giant and powerful. So she collects miniature figures and sets them up as her town that she looks over. Now she has no idea who you are and thinks your just a toy she found out in the wild. To her your nothing but an object. But maybe you can change that or maybe not and you will live as her favorite little miniature for life. I don't care or even want to know. So good luck Hunter your going to need that..." with that said Arceus voice disappeared. And the stomping noise that was coming in from the distance meant that the woman was coming back to play with her miniatures...

144312222222222222222221.content:
As you blindly wandered through the towering vegetation, you suddenly heard screaming coming from up ahead. The scream sounded like a girls, but it didn't sound like screams of pain or danger. More like the kind of screams some people do when they try to get themselves pumped up before physical activity. Regardless, this was your first sign of life since you shrunk and you weren't going to pass this possible opportunity up. Running as fast as your little legs could carry you, you pressed onward, pressing the plant life out of your way as you tried to find the source.

As you finally reached a clearing you saw the source of the screaming. Standing in the far end of this clearing in the middle of the woods was a lone girl dressed in orange, though not in a lot. She seemed to be wearing a top and short shorts and nothing else. Kinda understandable since she was in the middle of some intense physical training, practicing kicking on an old tree. She probably would want an outfit that granted her more movement. You quickly identified the person as a "battle girl" type trainer who mostly seem to dress in identical styles to this. You faced a few of them before in Pokemon battles. Seeing some of the things these girls could do on their own made you very relieved that the Pokemon were the ones doing the fighting and not the trainers. Almost on cue with this thought, the girl let out one loud scream before kicking the tree with everything she had. You stared with your mouth open as you watched the tree crack and finally snap and fall over from the point that she attacked it. You were both amazed and terrified by the sight. Even if you were normal sized, seeing someone do that, even if the tree was already in fairly poor shape, would be enough to make you question approaching them for help. And you're MUCH smaller than normal size. You're less than dust compared to her power. Still you didn't have any other options. You swallowed hard and made your way towards the resting giantess, hoping that she was friendly. You tried to calm yourself with thoughts of someone who could do THAT being your protector. Of course if she wasn't feeling so nice, you dreaded your chances of survival.

Finally you were at her. The battle girl was sitting down on the ground, legs crossed. She was panting loudly, recovering after exerting herself so much. She didn't seem to notice the tiny person by her leg just yet, though it would be pretty hard to miss you if she starts paying the slightest amount of attention. Standing so close to her, you saw just how fit this girl was. Her legs were well toned, her revealing wardrobe showed off her muscles very well. Despite this, her form was still rather feminine, albeit one that could clearly kick your ass with no effort at all. You stood in silence. Your mouth was open, but no words came out. Fortunately, no words needed to as her eyes finally seemed to notice the tiny person standing there looking half scared to death. She shifts a bit to get a closer look at you inspecting her find curiously. Though you still couldn't talk, she figured out your predicament rather easily. The question is, what will she do?

"If you don't do this, I won't help you." the Battle Girl said in a causal tone. You just stared in disbelief as you hung on for dear life. "Oh don't give me that look. Keep in mind, I don't have to do anything for you. I'm the one being nice. All I'm doing is making sure you earn your portion of the food and water." You really really wanted to argue about basic compassion and empathy with this girl, but she was right about one thing, so long as you were getting food, water, and protection from this girl, she was the one in power to decide the terms. At the very least she's doing this.... somewhat fairly... you hope.

"So... how many do I have to do?" You said finally resigning to her whims. The battle girl pressed a finger from her free hand to her cheek as she thought. "Hmm, lets start something simple like 30." Wait WHAT? "Twenty? I... I can't do that many!" you argued hoping you can convince this girl to lower the reps down to something more your speed. "Not with that defeatist attitude." she retorted bluntly. It's clear that her expectations are a teensy bit skewed by her own abilities. "I... I don't work out like that so much..." you started as her free hand poked your stomach. "Yeah I can see that." Well that was just mean. You might not be like this workout nut, but you certainly weren't out of shape. You swear she had a playful grin when she did this. Is she intentionally doing this? Before you can continue she speaks once more. "Fine you just have to do five for now. But they better be perfect form." This was a huge relief to you. Even though you were a bit tired from your traveling, five seemed doable to you.

You got to work quickly, pulling your body up from her finger. As you reached the top, you heard her begin her count "One." Ok, off to a good start. You slowly lowered yourself to pull yourself up a second time. But she didn't count as you lowered yourself back down. You looked to her only to see a somewhat disappointed gaze. "I'm not counting that you. You have to pull all the way up." Crap. Maybe this won't be so easy. You tried again pulling yourself up quickly. "Nope. Not that one either. Your motion's all jerky. Your muscles won't get anything out of this if you keep taking shortcuts." Damn, she really wasn't kidding about the form. And you were already feeling tired from the three you did. "You really are a hopeless case aren't you? I'd bet if I was shrunk and came across you at normal size, I could still kick your ass with no effort." Harsh. Still, you couldn't complain now. You had to save your breath to get the 4, PROPER pull ups done. You feel your muscles aching as you tugged yourself up "TWO." her voice echoed as you lowered yourself back down. "Now keep that up." Unfortunately you managed to mess up another 2 or 3 times. You weren't sure you could keep up with this deceptively difficult demand. Finally a stinging pain to your foot reminded you of your situation and your need for help. Looking back at the bare feet, you figured that would be your best bet at getting this giantess’s attention. Obviously. I mean, why else would you want to move closer to them and touch them... right? You blushed as you made your way closer, unaware that the giant was blushing as well as she plotted a little fun of her own as you got closer.
14431222222222222222222222122.title: The girl tries to get the psychics attention

choices: She presses her other foot against your face
144312222222222222222222221222.content:
As you prepared to press against those... large... soft... fragrant... plump soles, you heard laughter echoing from above helping you back into reality. Looking up you noticed that the psychic was still staring at her book. You figured it was simply the book that lead to this reaction and moved closer unaware that the giant was fully aware of the tiny girl by her feet and the way her mind was basicly screaming it’s desire for her soles. You reached your destination, just in front of her massive toes. You hesitated for a moment, but that was all she needed to make this happen.

Faster than you could process, the toes shot forward and clamped around you, trapping you between her big and second toes. You quickly squirmed about, trying to free yourself from the vicegrip and get her attention for help. The toes gave you another gentle squeeze, immobilizing you completely as the sweat from her toes started to cover your tiny form. The experience was terrifying, Gross, and... admittedly pretty damn hot. But you didn’t want to end here as a smear on this giants toes. You desperately called up to her, still too panicked to piece together that she pretty obviously knows about you.

You could only watch as...
144312222222222222222222221222.title: Her toes grab you

choices: The psychic still tries to feign ignorance...
Her cover's been blown, so she might as well have some fun with the girl...
1443122222222222222222222212221.content:
The girl’s eyes widened as she saw the psychic’s other massive foot moved towards her. Before she could even scream her sole pressed against her face, smothering any screams that she might have been able to croak out. The psychic simply hummed to herself as if nothing were happening as the girl was at the mercy of her feet.

The soft flesh of her soles conformed around her face. The little girl’s face flushed red as she was unable to contain herself from getting aroused by the situation, which she would have thought was a dream if it weren’t for the pressure of her toes gripping her… The soft skin of her sole pressing against her… And the warmth…

The Psychic smiled to herself as she felt the tiny girl squirm against her toes, and scream against her soles. It felt a lot more empowering than she thought that it would. And the girl seemed to be enjoying it too. She grinned harder as she started to slide her foot back in forth over her face.

No amount of screaming and squirming could wrestle her free from her toes grip, but that didn’t stop her from trying. She wasn’t even sure why she was squirming, to get the psychic’s attention? Surely she knew that there was a tiny girl gripped between her toes, right?

Suddenly the psychic released her from the grip of her toes, allowing her to fall panting to the ground. She looked up only to see her foot descending on her again. She screamed for a half of a second before her voice was blocked out as the psychic’s warm sweaty sole pinned her to the ground.

1443122222222222222222222222.title: Do you believe in Fairies?

14431222222222222222222222221.content:
Looking closer at the tent, you notice that it's a ridiculously pretty shade of pink, in fact it's all pink! Even the ropes and stakes that held it in the ground were an even brighter shade of pink. And you swore that you could see some small amount of sparkles on the tent. Whoever owned this tent must really like sparkly pink things! You tried to take this information and use it to make the situation seem better to you. Maybe if the owner liked sparkly pink, then they liked cute stuff? And small stuff is pretty cute. Well you're small as could be so maybe that's a good thing... at least for getting this person's help. You knew that you were stretching it, but you wanted some self assurance.

As you move closer towards the tent, you notice that the campsite had mostly been cleared away. It seems like you had good timing, if you had come later than the person at the camp likely would have been gone. The more you thought about the situation the more you were convinced that you had gotten a bit lucky. You found someone that seemed like they would help you and you caught them just before they would be leaving. They could take you to help right away! Your optimistic thoughts were interrupted by the sound of the tent unzipping. You look towards the opening of the tent, eager to set eyes on your savior.

The first thing you see slip out of the tent was a massive brown mary jane! Even from far away you could tell that the shoe absolutely dwarfed you in size! You didn't want to think about it, but if you even wound up in there you'd probably have a good amount of room to move in, even if you were at the tip of the toe section. Whoever this shoe was attached to had to be absolutely massive! Suddenly, your situation felt slightly less optimistic.

Attached to the shoe was a leg covered in white stockings and that leg rose up into a big voluminous pink dress with some frilly pink bows on the bottom. This person definitely did love pink. Finally the face of your captive came into view. The massive being who's shoe was like a hotel to you was... only a little girl! A little girl with big, fluffy brunette hair, an unsettling pair of eyes and a large pink bow on her head.

You were astounded by the situation you were in. Somehow a little girl was absolutely massive compared to you! You weren't even sure you could consider yourself a bug before her. You felt closer to a speck! Even though this revelation served as a punch to the gut for your optimism, you were still eager to get this child's help. Sure this child wasn't the best source of help, but she would still be useful. After all she couldn't be a bad person to get the attention of, right?

Steeling your nerves, you begin jumping up and down and yelling to get the girl's attention. Your luck seemed good as she looked towards where you were! You continued to call for her attention with greater gusto. Did all of your effort get her attention?
14431222222222222222222222221.title: Smaller than a Fairy!

choices: She still thinks you're a fairy!
144312222222222222222222222211.content:
As you continue to call out to the massive little girl, she seems to gradually register your voice. At first her face kind of shifted a bit, like a bug landed on her face but she didn't notice. Then she reacted a bit more, her eyes wandering a bit half looking for something. After dodging her massive shoe, she seemed to finally recognize something was calling to her. She stopped in her tracks and you stood next to her shoe. It towered over you, not as much as you initially thought, but you could definitely fit in there; and with room to spare for her foot.

The girl was standing right before you and she was clearly looking around, a perplexed look on her face. She had clearly heard you and now was the time to get her attention. Desperate for her attention, you run to her shoe and begin banging your fist against it. And with one deep breath you shout with all your might, pleading fort the girl to look down at you.

After a tense moment of you holding your breath, the girl finally looked down at you! Her eyes bore into your tiny frame and you felt strangely... unnerved. You hadn't noticed before but this girl's eyes were unnatural looking. They seemed to lack pupils and were overly shiny. At first it made you very nervous but then a realization hit you. The girl was already wearing a very frilly, pink outfit and had a equally frilly and pink tent. Her odd looking eyes were probably some kind of contact lenses.

The girl, who had first looked at you with a confused expression, seemed positively overjoyed! She giggled gleefully as she reached her hand out towards you. You flinch and your instincts tell you to run, but you stay put. You needed help badly, and letting the girl pick you up was the quickest way to get it. Her hand gripped you in a strong, yet gentle grip that held you securely in her grasp. When you attempted to move your arms, you noticed that you had complete control over them. So you quickly take your arms out of her grip and wave at the girl, causing her to squeal happily.

"Oh my gosh! I can't believe I actually found one of you guys!" She spoke. "I was beginning to wonder if you actually existed." She brought you towards her face and happily began to snuggle you against her cheek. "Ah you guys are as tiny and cute as I imagined." She giggled to herself as she enjoyed cuddling you.

You let the girl cuddle you against her cheek as you think about what she was saying. Why was she referring to you as "one of them" and what does she mean she thought you didn't exist? Were there other tiny humans running around? Was she some kind of witch who dressed like an innocent girl but secretly shrunk and enslaved people!? You quickly dismiss that last idea. It was simply to crazy and she wouldn't be so overjoyed to see you if she did this to you in the first place. You figure that it would simply be best to ask the girl.

"Uh, why are you reacting like this? I'm a shrunken human, I thought you'd be more shocked and confused."

The girl stops rubbing you against her cheek and brings you in front of her face, shooting you a sly smile. "Oh really? Just a little human who happened to end up near my camp? I don't think so! You are obviously a fairy who was attracted by all of my pretty stuff!" She laughed. "I'd been trying to find one of you guys for so long and had no luck. But then you just wander over by my shoe and call out to me! Now I can learn all about you guys and play with you!" She begins snuggling you with her nose and laughing happily.

You immediately start panicking. This girl thought that you were a fairy trying to trick her! If she kept thinking that you were a fairy, then you would never get help like you needed. She'd just keep you all to herself as long as she thought you were a fairy. And you doubted she would give you a chance to run away and find someone else. You immediately try to tell the girl that you are not a fairy and are, in fact, a small human that needs her help to get back to normal. You to try to point out that you don't have wings as proof that you aren't a fairy. You're not sure if that'll convince her but that's the best idea you had.

Does the girl believe you?
144312222222222222222222222211.title: Seen by the Fairy Girl

144312222222222222222222222221.title: The Elderly Socialite, Madame

choices: You begin to hit her feet.
Before you can do anything, she notices you.
1443122222222222222222222222213.content:
Some of the grass is still too high to make out much of what is going on at the camp. You hustle through praying that you don't run into any hungry Pokemon on the way. As you break through some of the brush, you finally get a good look at the campfire ahead. Sitting on a log is an older woman wearing a green floral dress, relaxing happily as she pokes at the fire with a stick. Seeing her warm expression reflected in the light of the campfire, you're filled with hope that you're finally going to get some help out of this situation!

Dashing towards her with new strength, you hear her musing to herself. "This trip has lasted far too long, my feet are exhausted! After this I need to go to Konikoni and let myself get pampered a little." As she mentioned her feet you looked ahead and saw that she had her bare feet resting crossed on top of a pair of sandals.

As you approach the fire, you look up to her and begin shouting at her for help. Unfortunately she doesn't notice at all, her tired but calm smile unaltered as the pops and cracks of the fire drown out your voice. As you walk closer to her you notice the atmosphere change, a subtle blend of coconut lotion and feet drifting through the air. From this close you can make out the bits of dust on her huge soles, and the dark impressions of her feet on the sandals below them. The toes flex idly as her sole scrunches a bit in the fire light. If you're going to get her attention this is the only way! Nervous about getting stomped on, you prepare for what you need to do next...
1443122222222222222222222222213.title: Gen 7

choices: She tries to find someone who can help
She offers to take care of you
She claims you as her property
14431222222222222222222222222131.content:
You take a deep breath to prepare yourself, unintentionally getting a whiff of her coconut scented soles in the process, and finally began. Though you knew you were much weaker at your new size, you were still a bit worried about accidentally harming or angering this woman. Still you didn’t have many other choices. You needed to get someone’s attention immediately. Making two fists you started to punch at the large sole looming over you.

“Oh?” The older woman was caught off guard by this sudden sensations at her feet. At first it startled her, but she quickly noted how good it felt. You kept on hitting the feet, at first you thought she was going to investigate, but she didn’t seem to react beyond that first sound so you continued not noticing that she was simply laying back and enjoying this strange sensation. She was still curious about the source, but right now she didn’t want to interrupt the free foot massage she was receiving. She quietly hummed to herself as she tried to picture what could be causing all of this pleasure.

After a few minutes you needed to stop to rest for a bit. “Man, how weak have I become that she didn’t feel any of that.” You asked yourself. But the truth would soon reveal itself as the feet would quickly move back and the older woman’s face would lean closer to investigate. With the wonderful sensation finally over, she decided to see who or what was causing it. And imagine her surprise when she saw a tiny person under where her feet were, trying to catch their breath after what must have been a long workout for them. “Oh my. I can’t say I was expecting this.” She said in a surprised tone. You stared up, somewhat nervously as her face moved closer. “I have to say, that was the best massage I’ve ever received. You have some natural talent there little guy. And all that for free too. You must be really popular around these parts.” Though her compliments on your unintended talents did flatter you a bit, you had to get to the point. “I’m sorry to bother you but...” she quickly interrupted “oh you didn’t bother me at all, silly.” You simply nodded and got back to the point. “Well anyway, I was mainly trying to get your attention. I woke up this tiny in the woods and have been trying to get help for the past hour. Would you be able to take me to someone who could help?” The Madame listened to your pleas and considered the options. She could certainly try to help, though who exactly could help with a person who shrink in the middle of the woods. Perhaps it might be better to simply keep you with her. After all, she had more than enough money and resources to keep you safe and cared for. But then another thought crept into her head. The thought of having her own personal tiny foot massager ready to give immaculate services at her beck and call. And at your size she could certainly think of a few other uses for you. But what would she do with you?
14431222222222222222222222222131.title: The Socialite’s Unexpected Massage

Your crush on this girl wasn't exactly normal. You see whenever you and Emma hangout she was usually playing and cuddling up with the small tiny Pokemon, calling them cute and stuff. Seeing this after a while sort of gave you a crush on the thought of being shrunken and her pet to have her do some naughty things to you.You even went as far as to finally talk to her about it that night.

You and Emma were alone talking it up. And you had the strange thought to hear about what you have been thinking about. But you didn't want to look to strange so you said "Hey Emma, so I just had a strange dream last night, that I was shrunken and living happily as your pet" Upon hearing this Emma gave you a strange look and then said "haha that is strange, I don't think you would like life as being my pet" That comment made you turn to wards her and you had to ask "Why do you say that? would you crush me?". Emma just turned and couldn't believe that this was the conversation you guys were having but did you the honor of answering "No, I just don't think you would like life as my pet very much, but hey it would be your life haha...". The conversation was quickly changed after she said that. And the night quickly ended.

The next day you were assigned to work with the psychic Pokemon with Emma. Emma was cleaning the area up where they slept, while you went around the room putting food into there bowls. While the thought of last night was in your head you didn't even notice that you step down hard on an Abra's tail. In an instant it you were starring up at the Abra as it got up and walk away. Emma who didn't even know what was going on turned around and saw you tiny.

"Oh my god your tiny" Emma came up to you and grabbed you while bringing you up to her face. You start to think that this is what you wanted in the first place. And you said "Yea this is great now I can become your little pet...". Emma just looked and after a full min she said "..."

144322.content:
Your vision came to as you laid on a strange, soft surface. You had been shrunk weeks ago, that much you were used to. What caught you off guard was the setting. When you fell asleep, you were resting by an abandoned campsite in the woods. Now you’re in a room of some kind. Did someone find you and bring you here? Did you just... show up here kinda like when you first shrank? A lot of questions flooded your head as you looked around. Whoever owned this place seemed to collect a lot of stuffed dolls. There were many scattered all around with a ratty looking clefairy doll sitting on the bed. You also noticed a door open, leading to rather large looking closet with a countless variety of clothes. Though the clothes looked like they were designed for a girl to wear, you couldn’t really gather much more information on whoever lives here. Just her gender and that she collects dolls.

You soon heard footsteps approaching and quickly hid behind a Cherrum doll. Sure enough a girl entered what you assumed was her own bedroom. She was fairly short, with green hair styled in spiky pigtails and... was dressed exactly like you were... that was... kinda weird. Did she find you and do this intentionally? Whatever the reason she seemed to be looking around for something or someone. You just stuck by your hiding spot, debating if you should try to escape or not.
144322.title: Copycat

1443222.content:
To say you were suspicious of the little girl is an understatement. Not just from the fact that you don't think she's mature enough to act correctly, but also from the fact that she's got an exact replica of your outfit on. That fact is just creepy and makes you really not want her to find, your going to have to watch some more before you can make a decision.

The young girl walked over towards where you were laying, she however became worried when she didn't find you. She looked left and right frantically as she started searching around the bed.

“Oh no no no no! Did he sneak away” the young girl reached for the Cherrim doll and you hang on to it. She lifts it up and drops it back down when she didn't see your hiding body, that was close.

The girl acted quickly and looked around the carpet floor. He wouldn't be able to get far since the last time she checked on him. You watch as the girl shut the door stopping any ideas and chances of escape.

“Um... Hi Little guy.” She said throughout the room speaking in no direction in particular. “I know your in here, can you come out so i can talk to you.” When she didn't get a response she continued “Please!!! I won't hurt you. I found you in the forest when i was camping. I didn't mean to kidnap you but i couldn't just leave you there”

You still didn't come out.

“Oh and don't worry about the clothes, i saw you wearing a pair, and i just sewed a pair for myself. Its nothing creepy or scary or anything like that, i just like trying to recreate outfits I see. It’s a hobby.”

Well she explained everything, but is it enough for you to trust her and come out?

144323142.content:
Though the campsite turned out to be empty, you saw something that made your eyes practically light up. Not too far from the clearing was a small town, close enough for you to reach quickly. If you were quick you might even get someone’s attention before sundown. Or at least find your way into a house where you’d be warm and safe from the wildlife. Not wasting another second, you bolted for the nearest building, not paying any mind to anything else. Your singleminded charge had you power through massive sticks, leaves, uneven terrain and other such obstacles with nothing in your mind besides getting to shelter as fast as possible.

Before long you were out of the woods and already closing in onyour target. The terrain was much nicer allowing you to cover more ground faster and with less effort. Suddenly you saw something that made you stop for a brief moment. There, laying on a chair just outside was a woman. Though difficult to determine her age, you’d estimate that she was somewhere in her 40s. She had long brunette hair and wore a light blue shirt with darker pants and a small apron over top. She seemed to be quite relaxed, but perhaps you could get her to help. Though you never seen her before and know next to nothing about her, you considered the benefits of actually having someone watching over you.

As you reached the chair your mind was finally made up.

If you were going to get her attention, you would need to get closer to her. You find a chair leg with enough of a slope that you could climb it. You wrap your arms and legs around the leg and begin to sidle up.

It feels like it took 10 minutes for you to finally reach the top. With some tricky jumping that probably would've killed you if you missed, you climb up onto the chair with her. Once again, you jump and flail to get her attention. Again, no luck. You walk over and begin to tug on her pants. She seems to feel this as she starts to stir and look down at your position. From what the girl said a few moments ago, you could tell she was inexperienced, and went off on her own to explore the outside world. Which means there are most likely other people who would be looking for her. She did mention a brother, so perhaps he would come to help her back home.


As for what you should do right now, you had a few options. The first was to approach her and wake her up, hoping she would be kind enough to help you. She seemed nice enough when she was talking to herself, and perhaps she could use a friend to keep her company until help arrived, if it even was coming in the first place. Another option was to remain hidden until you were 100% positive she could be trusted to take care of you, or until she brought you somewhere or to someone you knew could help you.


And then there was the third option, which wasn't really an option to help you as much as it was an option to get you into trouble. For some odd reason, your eyes were being drawn to her feet. You couldn't understand why at the time, perhaps you felt sorry for how badly her feet were hurting and you felt like doing something to help her relax, or perhaps you had a reason that a lot of people would deem sick and disgusting. Whatever the case, you had your options. Which one would you choose?
1523313.title: Rubbing Her Feet

15233131.content:
After taking a moment to think things through rationally, you decide the best course of action is to wake her up and see if she'll help you. After a few more moments of walking, you arrive at her face and stare at her for a moment as you feel her warm minty fresh breath wash over you every few seconds. She looked so cute and peaceful, it would be a shame to have to wake her up, but so would not waking her up and risk her killing you unknowingly in her sleep. So you decided to speak up in the hopes that she would hear you.


"Um, e-excuse me, are you still awake?" You were a little scared of her, if only because of her height compared to your own. You could see her eyelids closing tighter, as if she was trying to ignore your plea for help. But you continued on nonetheless.


"Please! I need help! Please wake up!" You were hoping that did it, and sure enough, her eyes slowly opened up as she looked down at your tiny frame for a moment, only to close her eyes again as she muttered to herself. After she was done however, her eyes snapped wide open and she almost jumped out of the tent as her gaze quickly turned towards you, wondering what you were and what you were doing inside her tent. It took her a moment before she realized what you were.


"You're...
15233131.title: Wake Her Up

choices: Leave The Tent As Quickly As You Can

152331311.content:
You almost jumped for joy when you heard her say those words, you didn't know why, perhaps you were just glad someone found you and realized you were a human and not a bug or some other object. In any case, the girl then rubbed her eyes before looking down at you once more, this time less shocked and more confused. The she got down real close until her face was right next to you again, her eyes focusing intensely on your tiny frame. It made you uneasy, so you decided to say something to break the ice.


"Um, could you please help me?" Her eyes seemed to sparkle as they got wider, and you could see a small smirk growing on her face as she returned to her normal sitting position on her knees.


"Help you? Why? Is something wrong?" She had this sly look on her face as she said that last part.


"Yes something's wrong! I don't know if you've noticed or not, but I'm tiny!"


"Yes, i see. And how is that a problem exactly?" You did not like the way this was going. So far, this girl displayed little to no interest in helping you find a way of returning to normal. It was at this moment you began to consider your options. You could try to reason with her some more, or you could run for the exit before she got any bright ideas. Better hurry though, she may have plans of her own.
152331311.title: A.....Person?"

1523313111.content:
After taking another moment to consider your options, you decided it would be best to continue trying to reason with her. She seemed so nice just a few minutes ago, she couldn't be all that bad.


"Please, i really need your help. I'm begging you, i don't know what I'll do without someone to help me return to normal." The girl kept looking down at you, only this time she seemed more upset with what you were saying, though you had no idea why that might be. That is of course until she face-palmed and mumbled to herself.


"I can't believe what I'm hearing right now. I thought this is what you wanted, and now you're telling me it isn't?" For a moment, you couldn't understand what this girl was saying to you, but after you let your mind comprehend the implications of what she just said, you couldn't believe the end result.


"Wait a second, are you saying that we met before, and that i told you that i wanted to be shrunken? That's impossible! I've never seen you before, and i never once told anyone that i want to be tiny!" You were starting to get upset with this girl, which in hindsight was not the best thing to do, what with her towering over you and being able to snuff your life out without much effort at all. Luckily for you, she didn't seem to be in the mood to turn your tiny body into paste. Instead, she decided to explain herself.
1523313111.title: Continue Reasoning With Her

choices: Bonnie Decide's To Cheer You Up
Bonnie Decide's To Take Advantage Of You
You Heard A Male Voice Calling Bonnie's Name (Clemont)
15233131111.content:
"*Sigh* Don't you remember, earlier today? You were taking some pictures, and i walked by and asked you what you wanted more than anything in the whole world, and you told me that you wanted to be tiny. Just like that, as if it was something people pray for every night before they go to bed or whatever." You were not buying a single word she told you, surely you would remember telling a little girl whom you've never met before something like that.


"Listen, i don't know what kind of sick game you're subjecting me to, but i am not going to listen to your lies any longer!" Perhaps losing your cool wasn't the best approach, but it was all you could think of doing considering what this girl was saying to you. Of course, she started getting angry at you as well and began raising her voice too.


"I am not lying to you idiot! I'm telling you the truth! You told me that you wanted to become tiny, and i made it happen! Just like you wanted!" For some odd reason, you could tell in her voice that she wasn't lying. It was hard to believe at first, but you knew what she was saying couldn't possibly be true if you couldn't remember it happening at all. So then, what was going on here?


"Well if you're telling me the truth, and i know for a fact none of that ever happened, then what's going on here?" The girl seemed to calm down for a moment as she brought a finger to her mouth, tapping it lightly against her lips and licking it a moment or two later. Then she snapped her fingers and her face lit right up. (Not literately of course, but you know what i mean.)


"I have an idea. But before that, perhaps we should introduce ourselves. My name is Bonnie. What's yours?" You were a little unsure why she was being so nice all of a sudden, but she did say she had an idea as to why both of you were believing your own story's to be true at the same time. So you decided to get the pleasantry's out of the way and hear what she has to say.


"Fine. My name is...it's.....huh." Before you could say your name, your mind went dead. You had no idea why, but for some reason, when you tried to recall your own name, it wasn't coming forth, nor could you speak it.


"Your name is...Huh? What kind of name is that?"


"No, that's not my name. It's...it's.....what's?!" At that moment, you started gripping your head as you tried to force your name out of your head, but it wasn't working. Then you heard Bonnie sigh once again before saying...


"I knew it. You're suffering from some kind of amnesia. That's why you couldn't remember us meeting up before, and that's also why you can't remember your own name now." You didn't want to believe what she just told you, but at the same time, it was the only thing your mind would accept as an acceptable answer. So that was it, you slowly let go of your head and just slumped down feeling sad about everything that has happened so far. Until...
15233131111.title: Tell Your Story

choices: You try something else with her
This is all too weird. Get out of there fast
152331311111.content:
"Hey, come on little guy. It's not all bad. At least you got what you wanted, right? You're small now, so now you can have fun doing whatever it is that you wanted to do while tiny." Hearing her say those words made you feel a little better, but not much.


"Maybe, but what's the point of being small if i can't even remember why i wanted to be small in the first place?" You just slumped back down again after saying that, but Bonnie wasn't about to let you stay miserable just yet.


"Well, how do you feel now? Apart from sad because you lost your memory. What other feelings do you have now that you're tiny? Do you perhaps..." As Bonnie trailed off, she placed her feet on either side of you as she began developing a loving smile, like everything was going to be alright.


"...Find yourself being drawn to anything?" Now that she mentioned it, you had noticed something odd before, when you first entered the tent. Your mind was drawn to something other than getting her help. But what was it? Before you could realize it yourself however, Bonnie pushed both of her feet together, pinning you between them and shocking you in the process.


"H-hey! What are you doing?!" Bonnie looked down at you with that sly expression yet again, but this time she had something interesting to say.


"Isn't it obvious? I'm helping you live out your fantasy, just like you wanted when i shrunk you. Don't be shocked or anything, it’s not hard to guess why someone would want to be so teeny tiny like you are. And don’t think I didn’t notice you against my foot earlier when you entered the tent. I was just pretending not to notice you then. I figured you were just having fun or playing a game at first, but when you tried to get my help instead, i knew something was wrong. And so, here we are. You seemed to like rubbing it earlier so maybe you’d like this. Or maybe we could play something else and see if that’s what you want."

You couldn't believe what you were hearing her say...again. But it's not like you had much of a choice, so far it's the only thing that seems to make any amount of sense to you. So much of this didn’t make a lick of sense to you. But looking up at the young giantess, her feet hovering overhead and her grinning face above that, you finally decided for yourself.
152331311111.title: Bonnie Decide's To Cheer You Up

15233133.content:
You decide to approach the young girls feet. You don’t really think about it or question why you chose there. Maybe you felt it would be the easiest way to get her attention to help, maybe some unseen force was pushing you towards them, but whatever the reason you moved closer. As you drew nearer a powerful smell rushed over you. Seems she wasn’t kidding about her little rant earlier. Judging by that odor she must have been on the move all day. No wonder she was so exhausted. Although the smell would repulse most people, you didn’t seem too bothered by it. If you gave it any thought, you’d probably question why you weren’t. After all, it was a pretty powerful stench hitting you. Perhaps your current situation was too fantastical for you to really care. Perhaps it, mixed with other factors made the whole thing oddly enjoyable to you. Triggering a sense of adventure and exploration maybe.

As you finally reached her feet you noticed that, when sideways, they still almost beat you in height. Going off this you estimated your current height at about 4 inches tall. Not the best, but it could certainly be worse. Looking up at the resting titan, your left hand leaned against the large sole before you. Though this was just to lean against to rest, you quickly noticed the warmth and texture of her sole. Despite your situation the feeling of her soft yet firm sole, even with the layer of filth and sweat was oddly entrancing. Bringing your other hand to it, you began to lightly rub the wall, making sure to not wake her from her slumber. The feeling of her feet felt strangely relaxing to you. As if it was helping you forget the whole ordeal you went through earlier today. You must have zoned out a bit because you were suddenly knocked back by her foot shifting and unknowingly kicking you. The kick and the landing didn’t hurt you thankfully, but now you ran the very real risk that she felt you and knew you were here. Granted that was your goal in the first place, but actually being in it felt a LOT more awkward. You heard some curious sounds coming from her, but she didn’t seem to notice you just yet. What will you do?

A: Get Bonnie’s attention and see if she’d be willing to help you.
B: Quickly hide from view before she can spot you.
C: Before you can react, a Pokémon spots you
15233133.title: Go Closer To Her Feet

152331331.content:
As the foot shifted in response to your actions, the giantess inadvertently kicked you, knocking you hard on your butt. This was enough to snap you out of your little trance from before, though a quick glance back at her feet shifting reminded you of that almost hypnotic feeling from before. Still, now wasn’t the time for that for a number of reasons. Remembering your current situation, you decided that your only real option right now was to try to get her attention. Though you knew next to nothing about her, she seemed like she was nice enough. And really you didn’t have too many other options. You’re out in the wilderness with this girl. Chances are if you don’t get any help, something will eat you. As you prepared to grab her attention, you saw her lay back down and fall back asleep, making your task a bit harder, but thankfully less awkward.

Carefully moving along her body, you don’t have to travel far before reaching the sleeping face of the giant. She looked so cute, so peaceful like this, even though she was towering over you while laying down. Someone like this couldn’t possibly be a bad choice. Right? Well not like it matters now. Moving close to her ear, you start to call to her. She shifts a bit as your voice enters her ear, but she stubbornly tries to remain in the realm of dreams. You call again, this time a bit louder. Success! Her eye starts to peak open as she groans a bit. Moving quickly, you ran back so she’d see you easier and wave about wildly to draw more attention. Her sleepy eyes seem to shift towards you, taking a few seconds to try to process what she was seeing. At first, Bonnie thought she was still asleep. But as the moments passed she realized the dream was over. This was real. You were real. Her eyes seemed to shoot open as she eyes you curiously. Not saying a word. Finally her hand carefully plucks you up to hold you near her face. As cute as she was, it was a little scary seeing the billboard sized face inspecting you like this. Finally she opened her mouth to speak.
152331331.title: Waking Bonnie Up

1523313312.content:
With you in the young girls hands, time seemed to slow down. What will she say to you, can she be trusted. Will she help or just leave you by yourself, or worse is she gonna treat you like nothing but a toy. Finally she opened her mouth as you see her gain a huge colourful smile, one only a child can give.

“Your.... Your so Cute~! Im keeping you!” She said as you get pulled right in front of her eye. Looking over you inspecting you “I cant believe it your a tiny guy! What was a tiny guy doing in my tent?”

“Uh... i was trying to wake you up” You say as she brings you in front of her face. All the movement making you slightly sick.

“You can talk too! Ohh your gonna make the best pet!” She squealed as she brought you close for a hug, hugging you against her collar bone with both arms wrapped around you. Inside the hug you were surprised. Pet? out of all the things she's making you her pet?

No no no, this is good! You can use this! Sure being a pet’s not the best, but its better then being in a giant forest by yourself. She pulled you out of the hug as she introduced herself.

“My name is Bonnie, whats your tiny guy”

“(Your Name) you tell her as she looks at you funny.

“That doesn't really fit you anymore, how about Tiny. I like Tiny”

“Whatever you say Bonnie” You say as you couldn't help but smile at the girl. She was cute, even if she was able to squeeze you dead in her fingers. “I found this tent when i was walking around the forest floor. Are you by yourself?”

Bonnie looked away “Yeah... Im by myself, i wanted to go on an adventure out of the city but my brother told me that i wasn't old enough. But i showed him! I even pitched a tent!” Bonnie said that last part very proud of herself, like thats something she's never managed before.

“Bonnie, how old are you?”

“Im 8”

“Bonnie, i hate to admit thats way to young to be by yourself in the woods” You tell her “It would be better if you were safe”

“But I'm not by myself. I have my tiny pet!” She said with a smile as she drops you onto her lap, smiling down at you and petting your back.

“Yeah but do you have any Pokemon, that can you know... defend you?”

“N..No”

“What would you do if a Pangoro or Diggersby came for you, you wouldn't last a second”

“Id last longer then you!” Bonnie said as she clearly didn't want to hear this, but she needed to. You have to get her to safety, she's just a little girl. Granted you also want to be out of this forest yourself.

“Im not arguing that, but you need to be safe. And if you think you'll feel like a failure if you go back, don't. I mean.... You got... A... Pet... out of it” You say as you feel like you had to say it to get her to listen

What does Bonnie do?

15233331.title: The fishing sisters

choices: ... opening her shirt and dropping you inside, hiding you...
... moving you forward, showing you to Harper and Sarah!
152333311.content:
Quietly, careful to not draw any unwanted attention from the the two blue haired kids, you sneak your way past them. Luckily, the two young giantesses pay you no attention as they keep playing with eachother.

You breath a sigh of relief as you manage to completely sneak past them completely unseen. You're not sure of how your now fragile life would end up with those two. Maybe they would just mistake you for a toy and treat you like one.

You pale at the thought, but quickly shake it off as you focus on your task: getting the attention of the older giantess, who is currently fishing in a nearby stream of water.

You rise your gaze to take a good look at her. She has blue hair and blue eyes; she wears a white, sleeveless shirt, large, blue pants and purple sandals. Also, she appears to be wearing some sort of crown-shaped hair circlet.

You take notice of the focused expression on her face as she holds her fishing rod, waiting for the proper moment to pull up. She must know pretty well how to do it, you judge. And you can't help but think that she also looks kind of cute...

You shake your head. There's no time to think about this, you gotta get help first.

So you start walking once again towards the giantess. Soon, much to your relief, you manage to reach her and stand before her blue pants, not sure of how to approach her.

A new question forms in your mind. Would she even notice you? Would be she able to see or hear you? And, above all... would she mistake you for a bug and crush you flat?

You find yourself going pale again as you realize that this giantess might be even more dangerous than her sisters. Maybe you should just turn around, walk away and try to find someone else...

Again, you shake your head. This giantess might be the only one who could help you. Without her help, you would never be able to get out of this forest alive. And then again, she doesn't have to be necessarily mean, does she?

So, you make up your mind. You decide to get her help. But one major problem remains.

How to approach her?

As if fate just decided to lend a hand, the girl suddenly starts to pull her fishing rod.
"Gotcha!" you hear her exclaim. You jump back startled as she pulls the pokeball-shaped fishing hook out of the water.

Only to discover that she caught nothing.

"Aw! It fled!" she cries with a dejected sigh.
"Hey, big sister! Caught anything?" you hear one of the two kids crying from behind the girl.

You see her smiling a little.
"No, Harper, nothing yet," she replies as she gently sets her fishing rod down, next to her.

Or, more accurately, in between you and her. Great, just another obstacle to-

You interrupt train of thought as you take notice that the pokeball-shaped fishing hook laying there. An idea forms in your mind.

If you just could climb on it, you'd be able to get the girl's attention when she grabs the rod again!

You swiftly run to it, and immediately start climbing on the fishing hook. Soon enough, you make it and stand on the giant, fake pokeball.
"Uh... Hey! Down here!" you cry at top of your minuscule lungs. As you feared, the giantess doesn't give any signs of having heard you as she doesn't even move her head to check whoever made that faint sound that was your voice.

"Hey! I need help!" you cry again. Again, the young giantess completely ignores you. But you hear her mumbling to herself:
"Well... might as well try again," she says, reaching out for her fishing rod again.

"Hey! Could you help me please?!" you cry again.

And, this time, the girl's gaze shifts on the fishing hook where you are standing.
"... What...?" you hear her mutter as she leans down, her face inches from you as she examines you up close.
"A tiny person...?" she asks, flabbergasted.
"Yes! And I need help!" you say again.

The girl stares at you for a moment, before nodding slightly. Suddenly, you discover her hand coming to grab you, enclosing you in her fist. The other gets a hold of the rod as she stands up.
"Harper, Sarah, I'll search for a better spot around here! Stay there, alright?" you hear the giantess say.

"Yes, big sister!" both her sisters cry in unison.

Soon, you feel the girl starting to walk, while keeping you in the safety of her closed fist.

After a few minutes, you are released from your dark, tight prison as the blue haired giantess lets you sit on her open palm. You discover her staring down at you with curiosity.
"Uh... hi?" you try.
"How did you get so small?" she asks you, going straight to the point.

"Oh right... er... I don't know! I woke up, and I was like this!" you cry out.
"Dear. My name is Lana, by the way," she introduces herself.
"Who are you?" you tell her your name.
"Well, nice to meet you!" she says with a smile.

"The feeling's mutual. Now, would you happen to know a way to help me?" you ask, not bothering to conceal the hint of hope in your voice.

Sadly, the giantess drops her smile.
"Er... no. I'm sorry, but I never had to deal with a shrunken person before, so I really have no clue of how to grow you back..." she admits.

You let out a frustrated sigh.

Great. Just great.

Lana smiles.
"That said... I may be able to help you anyway," she says. You look back at her with curiosity.
"Well... I may not know about your shrinking or how to fix it... but I can look after you... at least until we figure this out!... If you want, that is." she says.

"Wha- really?" her smile grows wider.
"Of course! What do you say?" she asks

You consider this. You're shrunk, alone and helpless and this girl is the only living being who offered her help. And so far, she hasn't shown any malicious intent, just genuine concern for your situation.

So, you can really give one logical answer to her question.

Upon hearing your affirmative response, Lana speaks up:
"Alright then! You'll be staying with me from now on. I promise I'll be taking good care of you, trust me!" she kindly says as she starts to walk back to the campsite.

--

As Lana instructed, her little sisters are still where they were before, playing tag.
"As you may have guessed, those are my younger sisters, Harper and Sarah," Lana whispers to you.

Right then, as if they heard that, the two stop simultaneously as they notice their older sister being there.
"Hey big sister! Got anything this time?" they excitedly cry at the same time while rushing to Lana.

Again, images of you being used as a toy by the two little girls flash across your mind.

But you have little time to think about it as you notice Lana...

Lana watches her younger sisters leave the room, before giving a deep, yet silent sigh, before turning around, looking at her own mother.

But then, her gaze casually falls on said person's feet. And the girl's blue eyes widen.

I'm dreaming.

This is the only thought she manages to formulate as she sees, sitting on her mother's left foot, his arms crossed and an annoyed stare, the little guy she found earlier.

--

In the meantime, two nervous kids make their way to their room, making sure to close the door behind them.
"Big sister almost caught us!" Sarah says in a whisper, knowing that Lana might hear her and her twin sister from the other room.

"Yep! But now, we can finally play! Right tiny-" Harper abruptly stops her own sentence as she notices that she's holding onto nothing. In the excitement of the moment, she didn't notice that she actually left you in her mother's room.

More specifically, on her mother's foot!

"Uh oh..."

--

Whatever thing you were thinking about is quickly cut off as Lana grips your small body with a hand, before walking out of the room, closing the door behind herself.

The giantess then carries you into her own room, locking it behind her, all while not speaking a single word.

But then, once she makes sure no one could see or hear her, she glares at you.
"Okay, first me, then my mother? You-"
"Ask your sisters about your mother." you quickly interrupted, glaring back at her.

"What? My sisters? What about them?" Lana asks in a cold voice.
"Beats me. They brought me in your mother's room, they told me to ‘play’ with her feet, like I did with yours. When I refused, they tried to force me, when you came in." you tell her.
"Thanks, anyway."

Lana doesn't hear the last part as a fiery red shade spreads on her face at light speed.
"You are lying! You are lying!" she says twice, before glaring daggers at you.
"How can you blame my sisters for something so-" for the second time you interrupt.

"I am NOT blaming anyone. I'm telling the truth, believe me or not!" you retort, shooting a fiery gaze which takes Lana aback.

For a few moments, you watch her face going through several facial expressions as she displays her emotions: embarrassment, rage, embarrassment again, betrayal.

In the end, the blue haired giantess looks at you again, a strange smirk adorning her face as she talks...

It will only be an hour or so until the sun sets. You had just finished having a bad run-in with some bird pokemon looking for a snack.

You finally had hope when you saw a camp in the distance. Mustering all the strength you had, you ran for the camp site. You take cover behind a downed log near the site to observe the situation. It looked like this camp was occupied by only one person. A man was leaning against the log tou were hiding behind. All you could see right now was his head, his hair looked like a massive spike ball. His eyes seemed to be closed, yet he seemed to be reaching for things just fine. Was he blind and just adapted that well? You round the corner of the log and see that he was wearing...

15311.content:
The man was wearing an orange shirt with a green cargo vest over it. Right now, he was working at a massive soup pot over a miniature burner. The food smelt so good, and you were so hungry after all this time in the forest. Throwing caution to the wind, you approach the man and wave your arms excitably, trying to get his attention.

After minutes of trying, you feel like your efforts are getting you nowhere as the giant man still hasn't noticed you. You rest your hands on your knees and catch your breath. "Huh?" You hear above you. You look up and see that he's finally looking at you (you think). Still winded, all you can do is give him a small wave.

Rather than acknowledge you, the giant instead rummages through his bag for a bit before pulling out a handheld magnifying glass, which he uses to give you a look over. "Amazing. Are you really a tiny human?" He speaks in a gravelly voice.

"Yes, but I don't know how, can you please help me?"

"Sure. Anything to help someone in need." You both pause as your stomach grumbles load enough for even him to hear it. "I guess you're hungry huh?" You nod in response with a blush forming on your face. "Here then, let me see what I can do." He goes through his supplies again and pulls out a tablespoon. He stuck it in the soup and pulled out a spoonful before setting it on the ground next to you. It was the size of a bowl for how you are now.

"Sorry I can't give you something to eat with." Rather then say something to assure him, you instead dig right in and slurp the broth, burning your mouth in the process. "Careful, it's hot." You blow on your spoon trying to cool it off. "By the way, my name's Brock."

"(Your name). Thanks for the food by the way."

What happens next?
15311.title: A cargo vest. (DP)

153111.content:
You continue to slurp at your spoonful of soup. It was still hot enough to have have practically come off a Magcargo but you were too hungry to care. It was delicious. This Brock was an amazing cook.

*splash

Something drenched you out of nowhere. Your clothes were soaked through already. You look around to see massive splashes of water erupt around you. At your size, this can only mean one thing.

"Oh no, it's raining." Brock says. "And I haven't pitched the tent yet." Brock wasn't concerned for himself. To him, it was just a light rain so far. But to his tiny new companion this must be like a hurricane. "I know." He goes back into his bag (just how much does that bag hold?). He pulled out an iron pan. "I'll use my trusty frying pan..." he puts the pan over you and your spoon of soup upside-down, "as a drying pan." You hear his muffled voice say. You hear him moving around, you assume to set up his camp. With nothing else to do, you get back to your food, using the smell to guide you in the darkness under the pan.

*****

Soon, your belly was full and your body warm from the soup. You can hear the rain outside hitting the pan, it was getting heavier out there. You see a sliver of light as the pan is slightly lifted, and from that light came a hand that swiftly snatched you and the spoon before quickly moving.

The hand opened to show you were inside a tent with Brock. He hands you a small towel to dry off. "Thank you." You say as you begin to dry off.

What happens next?
153111.title: It starts to rain

The clearing happened to be empty. Someone must have used it recently, but aside from the remains of a campfire, there we no signs that anyone would be coming back. You sighed and pressed on, not even passing the campsite when you started to hear some sort of commotion nearby. Almost like a city or small town. Was civilization actually so near? Without missing a beat, you quickly ran off towards the noises.

Before long you finally saw a building on the edge of the woods. This was perfect. No you no longer needed to worry about being captured or eaten by the wildlife. As you got nearer, you noticed that the structure appeared to be a contest hall. By now almost everyone was already inside to watch the coordination competitions that were taking place. Well all except for one girl standing near a tree just outside sulking. She had a dark pinkish colored hair styled in drill-like pigtails.Judging by her somewhat elegant blue dress with the white coat over it, you assumed that she is a coordination. And judging by her current activity, she most likely just suffered a rather big loss.
"Stupid Judge. I had that contest in the bag. She grumbled as she tried to vent her frustrations alone. You were a bit reluctant to get near her while she's in this mood. Lord know how that could end for you. Then again, maybe something like you will clear her mind from whatever's bothering her... or maybe she'll see you as the perfect stress release toy. Maybe you should stay back and wait for her to calm down.

1541233.content:
Your sure there must be others inside that building less angry and hopefully more willing to help you. Sure its some more walking but its gonna be better in the long run. You pass the girl as you make your way to the building. Thinking that your far too small to actually be seen you don't stress or panic about her seeing you.

That was a mistake on your part.

Cause while the girl was venting outside she did spot you, anger turn to curiosity in a second watching the little man stroll away from her and into the building. She may not have won the stupid contest, but maybe she can nab a better prize.

“Come on, work you stupid thing” You say jumping down on the floor panel of the automated door. Due to your zero weight it cant detect you, meaning you cant get the glass sliding doors open. “Im gonna have to wait for someone to come through. Darn it” You say out loud thinking the girl won't be able to hear your small voice.

“Let me help you with that” A voice from behind says as the two doors open wide. You turn around and see the girl from before, this time not only standing right over you but with a huge smile on her face.

She has seen you.

“You know I've seen some petty attempts of people not buying a ticket and trying to sneak in. But I've never seen someone going to such ‘small’ measures” She teased. As you look around, hoping someone else will come. Your not running away from this girl, you know that. “Too bad you won't see your no doubt favorite coordinator in there since she's been screwed by the judges.”

“.... and who is that?”

“Me!” She said as you jump back a bit. “Ursula! Ive been screwed over big. I was no doubt the biggest and most popular one in there. But no they said i lost and gave the win to.... Dawn instead” She gritted her teeth. Obviously angry about this Dawn.

“Well, if its anything you look quite impressive from my point of view” You joke trying to stall for time. Something that she noticed but didn't care.

“Yeah about that, and about you.” She said addressing you as you hope the next words come out of her mouth are not as bad as you think they will. “Ive decided that I'm going to do you the biggest favour in your entire life and I'm going to keep you”

“Keep.... me” You say as you didn't share the same enthusiasm.

“Thats right. Who needs a ribbon from this event when i can walk away with my own personal shrunken guy. One that flatters me and serves my every whim and absolutely loves me. Your going to be Ursula’s now. Aren't you lucky”

She doesn't realise how heart breaking this is for you, whether she's actually got that big of an ego or she's just playing it up a bit your not really sure. One thing you do know is this is gonna be interesting.

15412331.content:
Well. She's better then just running around small and aimless. At least she's gonna give you a home, not to mention she really is kind of attractive. Sure her ego and her attitude is terrible and quite rude but you feel like you can put up with it.

“Ok, guess ill go home with you” You say to her as she smiles victorious. You can tell she really needed this today. It did sound like she was very angry about whatever happened in there. She reached down at you and picked you up in her massive grasp. Thankfully she wasn't holding you by her fingers but instead let you wonder around on her open palm. A lot more comfortable and a lot less scary. Being this close you were able to make out her face even more and the conquering smile she wore.

“Well no duh. Of course you want to stay with me. I am kind of amazing” She said “Aren't you lucky, getting to serve under your favourite coordinator Ursula” She said giving you her name and showing you her arrogance. “Ok, i need to take you somewhere, so no one will see you. But i don't have any pockets on me... Hmmm....”

“You could drop me in your clothes or something?” You say to her.

Needless to say she got a bit angry at the idea “You little perv, I'm not gonna put you near my body. Another idea like that and ill put you under my sock!”

Being near her foot, not that you hate that option. But then again you want to avoid getting stepped on in her shoe. Thinking some more you tried to think of other options. She doesn't have pockets on her dress and she isn't carrying a purse or bag and she doesn't want to drop you in her clothes.

You were drawing a blank, but Ursula got an idea. Reaching down into her dress leg, you watch as she pulls out a small Pokeball. Expanding it into a bigger size. It was slightly bigger then you. 15421.content:
Success was something that came easy for you. Ever since you were 14 and invented your first great invention that changed the way doctors worked, saving more life’s in the process. After this you essentially had your childhood taken away from you. So, you could join other great minds in a lab, you spent five years working there so far and even though it sounded bad being young and having to work. There were moments where you got to have fun.

Sure, you had to produce great inventions in such short time frames and having fun didn’t always happen. But you did get moments of free time in which you spent watching your favorite show Pokémon. Upon turning 20 this year you had gotten a new idea for an invention that would allow you to have fun all the time. This idea was sparked from essentially loneliness. Since you weren’t able to make too many friends your own age, you had fallen or more so had a crush on a girl you saw in Pokémon named Dawn. Ever since you saw her in gen 4. You couldn’t stop feeling a certain way towards her. You were smart enough and in the right mind to know she wasn’t real, but still couldn’t help but fall in love with her.

So, you made up your mind that you had to have her. And being the great inventor, you were, you thought that there had to be some way to transfer your life out of this world and into the fictional world of Pokémon.

It took you some time, but you had finally cracked the code and had an invention that just might work under certain conditions. The invention hooked up to a TV and only worked for live time TV programs where whatever episode was on the air that would be where you would end up in the show. Which means in an example if the episode where ash lets his Butterfree is on you would end up right next to him watching his Butterfree leave. You were only really able to test it out 3 times, (since cartoon network announced it was doing a random assortment of Pokémon episode marathon that night) and each time on an episode of friends with a plastic ball, the ball ended up in random spots each time, which meant that even if you enter the right episode you wouldn’t know where you would end up in that episode, you could even land outside a window. And since you didn’t test it on anything living you could end up dead or worse…

But you didn’t care, all you knew is that you made it, so it’s got to work. And since this was your best chance at seeing Dawn you had to take the chance. That whole day you spent getting ready, picking out an episode that Dawn was in, setting a self-destruction timer to the device so no one could follow you in and also finishing up some last farewell messages to the people of the real world. And you ended up finishing in good enough time as you saw that it was 7:48 and the episode started at 8:00. You ran around getting everything ready, you were just going to jump in as soon as the clocked struck 8:00. (But something you didn’t know or count for is that the network was running behind and so the episode that was currently on “All fired up” was going to continue to run for an extra 10 mins) …

The clock struck 8, you jump without even looking, and a goodbye to your old life. Lights flashed everywhere and you feel your body become more animated. Then in a matter of a second you slammed with a bang against a huge thin metal flat surface, you then fell into an opening that had zig-zags of metal around the roof of it, and finally hitting a soft but hard cloth flooring. You were fortunate not to pass out. Then you got up and dusted yourself off, looking around with minimal lightening you saw walls that felt like cushion, giant sticks that looked like giant pens, a flat surface that almost reached the top of whatever you were in that looked like a giant notebook, and then you turn to see a shocking thing giant poke-balls. Seeing this was making you come closer to figuring out where you were and what happened to you. But as you were coming to this realization of figuring out that you had shrunk and enter the Pokémon world an earthquake happens followed by a loud female voice (it was normal to normal people).

You hear 2 loud thuds and then more as the earthquakes begin to slow down, but the loud female voice keeps rambling to herself. The place your in then suddenly moves and then your met with what puts all the pieces together as you look up to see a giant face (https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/poke...). Then with the girl completely unaware of your existence, you are greeted with two titanic track shoes being pushed into the backpack that your trapped in. And then the zipper is shut with a tiny hole in the top, which isn’t big enough for you to fit.

The air around you starts to become toxic smelling, as you look up you begin to realize the bad smell is emitting from the sweaty dirty track shoes. You start to then feel the bag begin to move with the girl carrying it. You try to keep your balance and think that there is no way this could get any worse being trapped in an enclosed space with basically this unaware girl’s smelly sweaty foot sweat shoes to keep you company. And as that thought enter your mind, a clump of dirt that was stuck to the bottom of the girls track shoe lands on you causing you to lose your balance and bounce around the bag till she gets home.

(what happens next?)

Now start talking, I wanna hear everything from the robbery to when I found you. Your answer will determine how you're treated around here." She explains.
