15431212.content:
This is not good! Well it wasn't good before when you got shrunk by a random teleporting Abra. But at least it presented you with the opportunity to escape her. Run from the law and live your days at this size. Now you've wasted that chance and your eyes are being locked at by this woman. Hopefully your small enough for her not to be able to recognise you.

“Wait, is this a tiny man” She said showing that she sees you. You watch the Growlithe move around her owners legs, seeing you as well. It moved around and you couldn't help but stare at the giant beast of a Pokemon. Much bigger then an Arcanine as you fear its gonna end up eating you. Your fears were countered though as you feel a gloved hand reach down and grab you. Two fingers on each side of you. You get lifted off of the ground and up to her face. You stare at it as you really couldn't understand how every girl in the Jenny family not only looks the same, but looks dead drop gorgeous. You didn't get the chance to appreciate her before when you were running from her. Up to her beautiful face, you really hope that there is no chance she will be able to recognise you.

“Wait a second” Jenny said as you watch her face move as she puts pieces together “Your that Criminal i was just chasing! But a lot smaller” She said gaining a sudden smile which did scare you “Well i guess that makes my job a lot easier. Your under arrest right now by the Saffron City Police. Anything you say or do will be used against you in a court of law. Id put the handcuffs on you but it seems they would be far to big for you” She was almost playful with her final teasing.

“Please miss, listen to me. or at least help me grow big before you send me to prison!” You shout to her.

“Hey if you can't do the time, then don't the crime. Your going.... to.... prison?” She said as she questioned herself. In her mind she was having a debate. She wants to send you to prison but she can't do it while your this size. You'd be teared apart on the first day. She can't take you in right now. Hence in her mind she needs to do something. “Okay fine. Tell me how you got this small?”

She wanted you to talk about the size, but your taking this opportunity to tell her something else “Well miss, I'm not really a criminal! I had to try to rob that place. Im behind on my rent and i really don't want to be homeless. If there was another way i could earn the money fast i would of. Promise!”

Ok, that confirms that. Jenny’s seen a lot of hardened criminals, and she was easily able to tell that you weren't one. Still she had to be tough “Thats not the question i asked. I asked how you got small?”

Okay, she knows. Thats whats important “Well how i got small. Lets see i was running away from you, then i was hiding, then an Abra teleported in, shrunk me, then teleported out”

Jenny looked at you for a second, like it was hard for her to realise what you were saying was true. “So your telling me, a random Abra came in just to shrink you and then left”

“I don't know, its weird!” You admit to her as she glared at you, trying to determine if you were telling the truth to her. As you retreated under her glare she came to the conclusion that you wouldn't lie to her. Especially since your literally in her hand.

“Ok, since I'm assuming this is your first sentence and you are remorseful about it. I doubt the system will go to hard on you.” Jenny admitted as you were happy about it “But like i said, i can't take you in until we find this Abra. If it shrunk you so I'm willing to bet it can grow you back”

“Great, uh how are you gonna find it?”

“That, i don't know” Jenny admitted returning her Growlithe back to her Pokeball. “Regardless I'm off duty as of this moment. We can start the search tomorrow. Im sure you don't mind?”

“No of course not” You say, figuring time with the officer can't be all bad.

Provoking a Psychic Pokemon, never a good idea. As they can simple use their psychic power to 'I don't know'. Shrink you down to a size which would make a Joltik seem like an intimidating Pokemon. Still it could be much worse as the Psychic Pokemon just let you go, letting you roam the forest at such a small size. Luckily you seem to be to small for Pokemon to find you. And even better you found a campsite in front of you.

It was late at night so there was a campfire going on as well. Letting you see the owner of the campsite. Sitting on a log was a very cute girl. She had blonde curly hair, a nice stylish hat and a face which you found adorable. She looked about your age and you have the feeling she's nice. At least that's the kind of atmosphere she's putting out.

You run towards the campsite and get close to the girl. She was sitting on a log so she was elevated a bit, however you hope she's low enough to hear you. You run up towards her sneaker and start yelling at her.

"Hey, down here. C'mon! Please look down here!" you yell up at her, hoping that she would look down at you.

It seemed to work as she glanced down and her eyes went wide when she realized she was staring at a small person.

"What in the world?" she said unable to understand.

"Hey. I'm (Your Name) and I'm so glad I found you. I thought I would of been eaten by a Pokemon in this forest." you joke to her.

Little did you know, you just ran into one of the top officials in the criminal organization Team Rocket. Domino. She was currently in disguise mode so that's why you didn't recognize her. Domino didn't know how you got so small, but one thing was for sure. Domino is in line for a promotion from Giovanni

What happens next?

154321321.content:
"Oh My Gosh, your so small" Domino said playing her ditzy character. After all, This is stuff she needs to know about. "Your smaller then my big toe!"

"Yeah I know, that's why I'm glad I found your campsite. Miss......." you ask her.

"Oh, silly me" she says hitting her head in a cute manner. "My name is Domino. Nice to meet Cha."

She extended a hand towards you pointing a finger towards you. You accept it and shake her finger up and down. Domino then unexpectedly lifted her finger while your still holding on. This caused you to hang off her finger as she lifts it up to her face.

"I can't believe it, how did you get so small?" Domino said pretty much squealing

"I'll tell you, but can you give me a safe landing first" you tell her looking at her billboard sized face, worried that you'll fall down to the ground. She helps you and puts you down on her palm. There you take a break and take a breather.

"Ok, well I was just exploring the local forest, you know watch the Pokemon eat and stuff. Well I saw this Pokemon I haven't seen before. I followed the Pokemon and I may have annoyed it. I'm not really sure why but it was angry. Anyway It shrunk me and I've been wondering the forest all day, trying to avoid any Pokemon. That's when I found you"

"Wow, Weird story, do you know what Pokemon shrunk you?" Domino said wanting more information.

"I couldn't tell you it's name, but I can tell you what it looks like. It was a green Pokemon. It had a head kind of like a seed and if I had to bet, I would say its a Psychic Grass type"

Domino eyes go wide. She knows exactly what Pokemon this is. It's the legendary Pokemon Celebi. They are so rare to see, that the only time Domino heard someone found one was once.

What does Domino do now?

What does she do?

You watch as Domino comes back from her wiz, you've been looking out for her patiently waiting for the sweet girls return. “Hey Domino, your back” You say happy to see her.

Domino sees your happy face and is really looking forward to what she's about to do next. Domino walked right in front of the stump and towered over you, she was wearing a smile that looked a bit more mischievous then your use to.

“Shocked huh, I'm not surprised” She said as the mischievous face she had seemed to fit her perfectly now. “Just so you know my codename is Domino, as well as 009. Or as you probably know me as. The Black Tulip.” She said the last part in a proud pose, a pose you broke with what you said next

“So your just a Team Rocket Grunt in disguised!” You yell to her as she trips up.

“You think I'm a grunt! I just happen to be an Elite Officer of Team Rocket!” She said to you. Your shocked that a girl this young would be classified as Elite. “And thanks to you, we finally now have the location of the Legendary Pokemon Celebi”

“Celebi?” You echo back.
“That right, with Celebi in our grasp. No one will be able to stand up to Team Rocket! we will take over Kanto, Johto and every other region in this world!” Domino said as you realised that the stakes have been raised severely. “Now, tell me which direction did you see him”

You pause for a second as you realise that you haven't told her where you found Celebi, which means you kind of have the advantage, well as much advantage you can have being stranded on a stump in front of a giant evil girl

“Oh, Celebi was that way” You say pointing in a random direction

What happens next?
15432132122.title: Domino Reveal Herself

choices: Help Domino By Telling Her Where You Found Celebi
Help Celebi By Lying To Domino To Throw Her Off Course
154321321223.content:
Unsurprisingly, the elite Team Rocket agent merely crossed her arms, ultimately unimpressed by your ignorance but smiling all the while.
         "Come on, you can't honestly expect me to believe that," she chided. "Tell you what—to make this easier on the both of us, I'll just have to take you with me and have you show me where you encountered Celebi. Do a good job and I'll keep you around as my…well, I can't really say 'boyfriend', so 'little helper' will have to do. Keep in mind, though, that there's a reason my codename is the 'Black Tulip'—and you don't want to be the one finding out why. Got it?" More than a little intimidated by the giant girl's threat, you nodded your head in understanding, earning yourself a smug grin from the Team Rocket agent. "Good~. Now, I don't really know where I can put you… I guess I'll just have to hold you in my hand; I don't think you're ready to be put anywhere else—that'll be too close to comfort for us both." Domino had quickly snatched you up in her grasp and pulled you up to her eyes as if to get a good look at you.
         "Oh yes, I can see a lot of uses for you, so be a good boy and be on your best behavior—understood?" Again you nodded your head in compliance, though this didn't seem to do the trick for her this time. "I'm sorry, I didn't catch that—am I understood crystal clear?" You could feel her grip on you tightening ever so slowly, so you quickly gave her a verbal response to satisfy her—even referring to her as "Miss Domino". At this her grip loosened—not enough to let you go, but enough to not hurt so much anymore. "Alright then, that's settles it—from now on, as my private little helper, I'm not just 'Domino' to you but 'Miss Domino', and you will meet my high expectations on a daily basis. You may find my very demanding of your time and effort, but that comes with the territory, so do yourself a favor and don't disappoint me, capisce?" You responded in kind with a "Yes, Miss Domino", and with that the girl closed her eyes with a satisfied smile.
         "You catch on pretty quickly—excellent. Now that we've got all that out of the way, it's time to move on to more important matters: Celebi. I trust that you'll point us in the right direction, won't you?" You replied, though not without some general uncertainty, that at the very least you could lead her to the spot where you found yourself shrunken down. Domino seemed satisfied enough with the response and had you lead the way, lifting you high above her so you could get a better vantage point. After giving her directions here and there, the two of you eventually found yourselves back in the same spot where Celebi had shrunk you.
         "So you're absolutely sure that this is where you had encountered Celebi?" Domino asked you. You replied that you were one-hundred percent positive that this was the exact spot that Celebi had shrunk you down, and after Domino gave you what looked like an intense glare she reached for a black tulip she had hidden behind her back. You observed as she pressed an almost invisible button on it and watched as it grew several feet long, and you could see Domino plant the false tulip into the ground to watch extra appendages spring out from it. They took root into the ground and the black petals of the object crackled with weird energy. A multicolored aura soon sparked to life around the petals but not much else seemed to occur. "Hmm… Well, from what I can see, there was clearly some sort of psychic power at work here, but I'm not getting any strong readings in any direction. You—keep watch of the area while I look at this more closely." Domino's hand pushed your waist above her thumb and index finger to allow you a little more movement but kept her grip tight on your legs to keep you from escaping. Sighing quiet enough so Domino couldn't hear it, you responded with "Yes, Miss Domino" and did your part. It wasn't too long, however, that after peering into some trees you caught the sight of the target pokemon; Celebi was hiding in between some trees in a way that would make it difficult to spot right away, but by pure chance you managed to spot it eating some berries. Looking back at the device Domino pulled out, it still wasn't giving any indication that a pokemon was in the direction you found Celebi—likely due to Celebi hiding its power from predators perhaps. This gave you a bit of pause at what to do next: you could just tell Domino that you found the pokemon and direct her to it, but then you briefly remembered that you were in the hands of a Team Rocket operative—an elite one even. For all you knew Domino could easily dispose of you afterward since by then you would no longer be of any practical use to her despite her declaring to make you her "little helper", and you clearly wanted to make it out of this ordeal alive and well as well as back to your own size again. You didn't have much time to decide before Celebi decided to leave the area, so you knew you had to make your next decision quick and make it count.
154321321223.title: Domino Doesn't Believe You; She Takes You With Her

choices: Domino decided to wait for Team Rocket first...
Before Domino could decide, Celebi glowed - she was about to time-travel!
15432132123.content:
Satisfied with the chat she had with her boss, Domino walked through the forest.

She was in no rush, she could take her time to walk and think about what to do. Interrogate the little victim of Celebi, of course, to discover the location of the legendary, make sure it stayed where it was (at a safety distance, of course!) and wait for backup to come and capture it.

As for the little man she found... he was going to make a great pet or plaything, whatever she preferred.

But for now, the blonde girl decided to play it dumb for a little while longer; that way, she quickly figured, it'd be way too easy to obtain the answers she was seeking.

If she revealed herself to the little guy now, he'd be scared and would probably lie to her... not that she couldn't make him talk anyway, but figured it'd be still easier if he was unharmed.

So, adopting an innocent grin on her face, Domino made her way back to the camp and, more specifically, on the stump where she had left you.

But, upon reaching her destination, the look of fake confusion she wore became one of actual confusion and one big question formed in her mind.

Where were you?

--

You felt afraid. Very afraid. Afraid for your life, which was literally in the hands of the giant currently holding.

It had found you again and was back to finish the job? It wanted to got with you like the doll you looked like?... It wanted to grow you back to your original size?

You never found an answer to these questions, because the green titan that had snatched you from the camp where Domino left you suddenly stopped its flight to lay its eyes down on you.

"Biii..." the Celebi mumbled quietly.

You didn't know the pokemon, but the Celebi recognized you much like you recognized it.

Earlier, this female Celebi was wandering through her forest when she had bumped into some random human - you - who knocked her back by accident, startling her.

And when said human reached out for her, muttering an apology, she was quick to shrink you down to size with a recently developed power before fleeing, leaving the human to fend for himself.

But, after wandering around for a bit more, she found you again, sitting on a stump all by yourself.

Taking you by surprise, the giantess had quickly scooped you up before leaving the camp where you were waiting for Domino's return.

"Bii..." the green titan muttered again, causing you to gulp in fear.

"N-Now..." you stuttered, cursing your not-so-firm tone,
"D-Don't do anything you might regret. I d-didn't mean to scare you earlier. So please, just grow me back and I'll leave you alone."

Celebi cocked her head, taking in the flow of words.

But the fairy simply ignored you and went to sit down at the foot of a tree, wanting to examine her little victim from up close. After all, it was not every day a pokemon got to hold a tiny human in their hands?

It was like some sort of role reversal, given how humans usually treated pokemon like pets, keeping them in those weird, dual-colored spheres of theirs.

Pets.

A sly grin crawled across the Celebi's face - maybe she could do just that to this little human.

After all, keeping a human as a pet seemed not only intriguing, but enticing too: a tiny companion who could possibly escape her and would join her during her occasional trip through the time.

While the unknown green titan pondered what to do with her latest catch, you were left staring at her in absolute terror.

Your scenarios were much scarier than the ones she was thinking about; she could easily eat you, crush you like an ant, snap your body in half like it was nothing more than a twig fallen from a tree.

There were thousands ways this relatively little pokemon could make you suffer in, and you were completely powerless to stop whatever thing she wanted to do to you.

"Please... let me go..." you tried begging, but the Celebi completely ignored you... or maybe she didn't, because the only response she offered was a low giggle which made you understand what she was thinking about: no way she'd let you go, you were hers and hers alone now.

You gulped in fear, before remembering about the girl you met before.

Domino.

A sliver of hope penetrated your heart like a feeble light piercing a dark abyss.

Did Domino return to her camp, noticing you weren't there anymore? Was she searching for you?

You hoped so...

--

Much to your hopes, Domino was actually searching for you, but not for the reasons you believed.

Without you, she thought, she couldn't know the location of the Celebi. Afterwards, she could also crush you if so she wished, but for now you were necessary.

That's why she had to find you at all costs before Team Rocket agents showed up.

At least, that would take a while, allowing her to search for you.

And it was just as she searched for you that she spotted something green and small sitting against a tree.

Her heart made a leap within her chest as she rushed behind a tree several feet away from the Celebi.

"Bi?" the legendary cries softly, having heard a noise; but, seeing no one, the small legend turned her attention to her own paws.

Domino peered from behind the tree; she had found Celebi! The little guy wasn't necessary anymore after all... too bad, she mused, she'd have loved to keep him.

Now, the disguised Team Rocket Elite only had to wait for the agents to come and help her catch the Celebi; she was a good fighter, but there was no way she could catch a legendary without pokemon or backup along.

Domino only had to make sure to not lose the Celebi...

Speaking of the small legend, she seemed to be holding on something, Domino noted.

Something that looked much like-

Domino had to choke back a gasp.

The ‘thing’ that Celebi was holding was actually the shrunken guy she had found earlier, and the very victim of Celebi himself!

Suddenly, Domino felt a strong urge to get out of her hiding spot and try to stun and catch the Celebi, and by extension the little guy, by herself.

But it'd be the equivalent of committing suicide, she quickly reminded herself... or maybe not?

1543311.content:
You get out of the underbrush thinking that you spotted a tent, but it wasn't a tent to your surprise. Not really sure how you could mix it up... but instead it was a giant suburban house. Accompanied by a little garden out the front and a little path way below that. Your not really sure where you are exactly and as much as you want to go and inspect the house, maybe set up camp and live inside that house. But you really want to inspect and see who lives in the house. You don't want it to be a crazy person or something like that.

You keep waiting for someone, anyone to come to and eventually someone did. A Mr Mime! It came out and walked up to the door, setting everything up to start working on the garden. A watering can, some gloves and a little spade.

“Mime Mime!” It said as it looked like it was satisfied with what it did. Then suddenly you watch as another thing comes out of the house, this time human.

It was a woman, with brown hair done into a ponytail, a beautiful face and a slender figure. “Thank you Mr Mime, you can go inside and relax now” She said as the Pokemon enjoyed being thanked. She started to walk to the garden and started walking on, crouching down and humming to herself. The Mr Mime no longer being needed went back inside.

The girl now by herself and you start questioning whether you should and get her attention. At first impression she just seemed like a nice normal woman, if not a little hot. You should get her attention but you don't know if you can trust her completely.

After some more debating you decide to just go for it. Running up to her you plan to get her attention. You run pass the walkway right in front of her house and arrived just behind her. After a little marvelling at her size, you continued. The marvelling was expected figuring she's the biggest person you've seen yet. So far you've just seen on your small travels were some low leveled Pokemon, a couple bug trainers and a couple of Lass. You run up to her and start banging on her foot, planning to get her attention. Luckily for you she was wearing sandals so her foot as completely exposed and she was able to feel it.

She looked down your way as she dropped the watering can from shock. She surely didn't expect to see a small man while gardening as you swallow something in your mouth. You've already made this deal, hopefully it will pay off and she will actually help you. She seems like a nice enough lady but you know that she can just peal that back and reveal she's nothing but a horrifying wench.

And now that you've revealed yourself, you know you could do absolutely nothing if she decided to make you her little slave.

But will she though?
1543311.title: Delia Ketchum

15433112.content:
You give a hopeful smile, thanking that she's gonna be nice to you. You've done the risk with putting yourself out, you just hope it was all worth it.

The woman looked down at you with a surprised look, like she was looking you over before she turned into a smile. “I assume you need my help”

“Uh... yes miss!”

She giggled at your nervous answer “My name is Delia. Delia Ketchum”

“Uh.. my name is (Your Name)”

“(Your Name) huh, thats a nice name” Delia said as she sounded so nice “Can i finish my gardening first, then ill see what i can do to help”

“Oh. Thank You! Take your time miss!” You say as you really feel like she's this nice. Score! You back up a bit as she grabs the watering can. With another look she got back to her garden, watering it as you wait. The way she crouched down gives you a good view of her rear, which you try to ignore. If she's really officially helping you, you don't want to tarnish it by peeping on her. Instead you just kept your eyes on the road, just incase someone came.

No one did. And after about 15 minutes Delia was finished, she left everything in there as she yelled out “Mr Mime! The Garden’s finished. Can you please put away the tools while i go inside” She didn't need to wait for her Pokemon to answer cause she knows he will do it. Looking down she saw you patiently waiting, reaching down she grabbed you. Her fingers surrounding you as you feel kind of uncomfortable being inside of her grip. She stands up and walks inside, holding you tight as you panic. You don't like being this high.  Delia enter her room and you saw a pretty typical house, nothing out of the ordinary. Delia walk around before dropping you on the coffee table right in front of the couch, then she sat down on said couch. Crossing her legs as she relaxed

“So (Your Name), will you tell me how you got that size” She asked very curiously, leaning forward.

You stand up on the wood as you start talking to her, you tell her that you don't remember, well you remember not being this size but besides that its all a fog. How you got small? Why your near her house? Where your from? You know nothing

“Well, that sounds troubling” She told you as she didn't know what to do “Well if its anything, you can stay here with me”

“Are... are you serious Miss Ketchum?”

“Please, call me Delia” She said modestly, although really liking the nickname “and of course you can stay! In fact I'm glad to let you, i haven't had anyone stay with me since my son left for his big adventure. it will be nice to have company”

“Oh... so your a mother?”

“Why yes i am, so you know when it comes to caring that i cant be beat” She says nicely.

What happens next?
15433112.title: Delia Will Help You

154331121.content:
"Well, since youre gonna be here a while,why dont I show you around?" your current motherly guardian oh so generously offers. Not being one to turn down a lonely mother's offer, you gladly accept.
"I would really like that, Miss K... Delia!"
Delia, pleased by that answer, gave you the world's sweetest smile just before scooping your little body off the table and carrying you in her hand for the tour of her enormous house!

"Well, first of all, this is my living room as you may have already guessed," Delia showed off the living room to you, "it's not really anything special. Not to anyone my size, anyways. You've already seen the couch and coffee table. This is the tv. It doesnt have many channels at the moment cuz the cable's out. Still waiting on the cable guy to come fix it. Sorry."
"Like I can even use the remote," you say shrugging your arms.

After a short walk which equated to a walk to the other side of town for you, Delia brought you to the next destination.
“This is my kitchen,” she introduces you to the towering fridge and the dark damp cavern of a stove, both of which you could get lost in and never heard from again if you arent careful, “my son and his friends say I'm a great cook. However, ever since he left to go on his journey, I havent done much cooking lately, so my skills might be a little rusty. Hope you dont mind take-out.”
“I aint very particular when it comes to food,” you tell her, “ever since I moved out of the house, it's been mostly microwave dinners and pot noodles. Whatever you can cook up will be gourmet cuisine compared to that!” As if you'd be able to eat much anyways. You'll live off table scraps if you can get your size back.

She walked you over to the dining table. Nice dining table. She kept it pretty clean and tidy. Youre kinda scared of heights though, so youre a little reluctant about standing on it.
You were almost spooked out by the short Mr. Mime helper polishing the hardwood (short to Delia, still frighteningly huge to you!).
“Oh! I almost forgot to properly introduce you to him! Mr. Mime?”
“Mime?” Mr. Mime's big puffy clowny face turned toward you and our caretaker with full attention on his face.
“I'd like you to meet [Y/N]. He'll be our guest for here for a while.”
Mr. Mime's big beady eyes stared into your body, kinda creeping you out, but he quickly brushed away that fear with a smile and a big hand wave.
“MI-IME!” he greets you.
“Hi, Mr. Mime!” you wave back.
“Mr. Mime is the other caretaker of the house,” Miss Ketchum explains, “he's a really big help and looks after the place whenever I'm out. He's very reliable and pretty much the only other companion I've got at the moment.”
“Miiiime...” Mr. Mime scratched the back of his head and blushed with flattery. He didnt seem to notice the slight hint of sadness in her voice. But you did.

As Delia walked down the hallway, you glanced over at the family photos. Among all of them were mostly of Delia herself and a black haired kid with a cap and the world's most determined smile. There was also one or two pictures of the kid and several of his friends. A brown skinned slanty eyed boy, a red haired tomboy carrying a togepi, a young brunette in red with a red bandana, a blue haired girl in a white beanie…

Of all the photos you glanced at, one particular person was missing in all of them: The father.

“This is my son's room, the bedroom of the greatest pokemon trainer in Pallet Town!” Delia broke your train of thought to show you a young boy's bedroom, “it's normally not neat and tidy, but after he left, I've taken the liberty to keep it that way. Still… no matter how cleaned up I make it, it just feels so empty without him.”
“You miss him, dont you?” you ask.
“Doesnt every mother?” she sighs, “but I know he's doing fine. He's got plenty of friends looking out for him. Every time he comes by, he brings a brand new person traveling along side him.” Good. Her darling boy sounds like he's doing pretty well for himself. Still, you cant help but think about the family photos. And what's missing in them.

Not long after, she brought you over to the next room. Another bedroom. This time a bit more mature looking… not counting the frilly pink drapes, the pikachu alarm clock, and the really cute Azumarill slippers aside the bed.

“And this is my bedroom,” she said with a bit less glee in her voice than earlier. And that was the entire description. Nothing else. Not even a single comment about how her alarm clock was modeled after her son's prized pokemon!

“It's… very nice,” you say something to break the silence.
“Yeah...” but your titaness caretaker just wasnt in the mood for it. It's official. The dad is not present. Youre not sure whether you should ask about him to her out of worrying you might reopen old wounds that still havent properly healed yet. For now, it's best to keep your mouth shut until you could feel the appropriate time to ask about him.

In the meantime, you might as well attempt to fill the void that her son and missing husband left behind. Thinking THAT way, you start to feel less bad about checking out her ass earlier! Maybe she'd be flattered if she knew you appreciated her figure!
Er, anyways! Back on the subject!

“By the way, um…. Delia?”
“Yes, [Y/N]?” you snap her out of her emotional silence.
“That reminds me,” you asked, “where will I be sleeping?”

Delia smiled again as she answered...

You finally come across a small camp by a river. Where there's a camp, there's people, and with people, there's help. You book it full speed to the camp, hoping to find someone that can help you. The thought of these people possibly hurting you escapes your mind right now.

info.brief_description: You wake up small in the big world of Pokemon. Will the Trainers help you or capture you?
info.description:
{This interactive is under new management after the original creator left the site. It will remain the same as it was before. A big thanks to the original creator for starting such a wonderful thing!}

You go for a walk in the woods and end up shrunken. Fortunately you find a campsite with someone in it, but will the inhabitant be helpful or will they take advantage of your size?

February Bonus Characters


[Bonus Characters- Additions to them will net you 1,000 to 2,000 GP]
- Rosa
- Shauntal
- Roxanne
- Fairy Tale Girl Trainer Class

[Double Bonus Character]
- Iris

[As before, additions to male characters will receive double the GP of the regular bonus characters.]

-This was made in response to the large number of "Pokemon: Shrunk by..." stories that used to be on this site only to be deleted.
-Both male and female Giants are allowed.
-Keep the main character nameless.
-Keep the main character somewhere between 2-4 inches
-While encountering the Pokemon themselves is allowed, the main focus of the story should still be the trainers in the long run.
-The intro chapters in the forest are meant to give you an easy place to start the story. If you have a different setting in mind, you're free to start there instead. However, do not abruptly end someone else's story to start your own.
-While its safe to assume that player avatar characters are of legal age for this story, for any characters who are explicitly children (Max, Bonnie, etc), while interaction is allowed, please refrain from anything sexual.
